[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde kha ba bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D95}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya la li ta bi stA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[1b.2\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge 
[\[1b.3\]]slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang 
[\[1b.4\]]po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[1b.5\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[2a.2\]]'ug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra 
[\[2a.3\]]gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_byang chub 
[\[2a.4\]]sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[2a.5\]]dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa/_byang 
[\[2a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig 
[\[2b.2\]]pa thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b.3\]]mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na/_'khor bzhi dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i sras dang /_rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang /_chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang /_rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_'khor gyi mi 
[\[2b.4\]]dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_dpyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang myang ba dag bsod cing mang 
[\[2b.5\]]ba dang /_na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rung ba brnyes shing /_bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang /_grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang pad ma la chus mi gos pa ltar thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so/_/bcom 
[\[2b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang /_sgra dang snyan pa ni 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[2b.7\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to/_/de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/_'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lha 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dang mir bcas pa dag_/rang gis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to/_/de thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_
[\[3a.2\]]yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes 
[\[3a.3\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/_des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i 
[\[3a.4\]]gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de las bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo /_/ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa/_/'od 
[\[3a.5\]]bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa/_/sku lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi ba po/_/shAkya'i seng ge thub dang phrad par gyis/_/ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste/_/chos kyi mnga' bdag kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang /_/mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa/_/chos la rang byung mnga' dbang 
[\[3a.6\]]mdzad la rton/_/gang zhig gdul dka'i sems la mnga' mdzad de/_/gang zhig bdud kyi rnyi las grol ba'i thugs/_/de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyis/_/rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du deng /_/mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste/_/mun sel tshul bzang ston par 
[\[3a.7\]]rab mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa/_/de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis deng /_/de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong /_/de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms/_/de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas/_/de ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston pa'o/_/gnas gtsang ma'i 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ris kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bskal pa grangs med tshad med 
[\[3b.2\]]bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang /_chos bstan pa gang yin pa 
[\[3b.3\]]de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/_/de nas de'i nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dga' bo dang /_shin tu dga' bo dang /_tsan dan dang /_mchod byas dang /_rab zhi dang /_dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la 
[\[3b.4\]]sogs pa de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog 'phags shing shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis/_lha'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[3b.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu 
[\[3b.6\]]rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan pa/_dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang /_ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang /_mngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstan pa/_rigs bzang por skye 
[\[3b.7\]]ba'i sa'i mthu kun du bstan pa/_byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis shin tu 'da' ba bstan pa/_'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas dang /_yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_lag rtsis dang /_rtsis dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang /_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]stobs dang /_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa kun du bstan pa/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_yul gyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pas 
[\[4a.2\]]yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes pa yongs su brjod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig pa bstan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa 
[\[4a.3\]]nges par bstan pa/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon chad gsungs pa mchis te/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i bla ma dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_mar me mdzad dang /_yon tan gyi tog dang /_yon tan 'byung gnas dang /_'od zer chen po dang /_drang srong lha 
[\[4a.4\]]dang /_dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_bden pa'i tog dang /_rdo rje mkhregs dang /_thams cad zil gyis gnon dang /_gser mdog dang /_shin tu mthor gshegs dang /_byi ru'i rgya mtsho dang /_me tog gi tog dang /_gzugs bzang dang /_spyan bzang dang /_drang srong sbed dang /_dmag 
[\[4a.5\]]tshogs las rgyal dang /_mtho ba dang /_me tog rgyas pa dang /_mdzod spu gzi brjid dang /_shin tu rgyas dang /_'od zer bzang po dang /_bkra shis ldan dang /_blta na bzang dang /_seng ge'i gzi brjid chen po dang /_blo gros brtan pas byin dang /_sos ka'i spos dri dang /_bden pa'i 
[\[4a.6\]]chos grags rgya chen dang /_'od ldan dang /_skar rgyal dang /_'jig rten mdzes dang /_'od rgya chen dang /_rin chen grags dang /_drag shul gzi brjid dang /_rin chen gzi brjid dang /_tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang /_sgra snyan dang /_me tog bzang po dang /_ri rab me tog dang /_rab tu 
[\[4a.7\]]yid 'ong dbyangs dang /_dge ba tshul [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang /_yon tan phung po dang /_'brug sgra dang /_kha dog mdzes dang /_tshe'i gzi brjid dang /_dom bag glang po'i 'gros dang /_'jig rten mngon par smon dang /_dgra las rgyal dang /_yang dag 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mchod dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa lags na/_de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4b.2\]]kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang /_sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po 'di'ang brjod pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 
[\[4b.3\]]tshar gcad pa dang /_bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dkon mchog 
[\[4b.4\]]gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang kun tu bstan pa'i slad du da bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas 
[\[4b.5\]]gnang ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[4b.6\]]lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_me tog man dA ra bdag gis kyang mngon par gtor te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam nangs pa dang /_smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der 
[\[4b.7\]]gshegs te byon nas/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/_gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang dga' bo dang /_shin tu dga' bo dang /_tsan dan dang /_mchod byas dang /_rab zhi dang /_dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de 
[\[5a.2\]]dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po zhes bya ba nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[5a.3\]]sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan du gsol/_de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse bar mdzad pa dang /_skye bo phal 
[\[5a.4\]]po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams dang /_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de 
[\[5a.5\]]dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dge slong dag kye nga ni mdang sum 'dir/_/gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing /_/nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la/_/
[\[5a.6\]]rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du/_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la/_/dri med dpal 'bar lha yi bu lhags nas/_/dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te/_/dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags/_/dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan dan dang /_/
[\[5a.7\]]dga' bo rab tu sems zhi mchod byas dang /_/shin tu dga' bo zhi ba lha yi bu/_/bye ba lha mang de dang de dag rnams/_/nga yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te/_/nga yi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur/_/sor mo bcu yis thal sbyar gus bcas par/_/de dag 'dir ni nga la 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]gsol ba btab/_/'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du/_/rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang gsungs pa/_/shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di/_/thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun bzung bzhed pas/_/phas kyi rgol dang bdud 
[\[5b.2\]]rnams 'dul mdzad la/_/theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing /_/thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol/_/lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de snang phyir/_/mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad pas na/_/thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas/_/dga' 
[\[5b.3\]]ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor/_/de phyir dge slong shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa/_/gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig_/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//dge 
[\[5b.4\]]slong dag de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa/_mchod par bya bas mchod pa/_dbang bskur ba thob pa/_lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te brjod 
[\[5b.5\]]cing bsngags pa/_bsam pa thob pa/_smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_khrel yod pa 
[\[5b.6\]]dang /_dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po 
[\[5b.7\]]dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par 
[\[6a.2\]]brgyan pa/_yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/_ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba/_drang zhing ma yo la/_gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_'jigs pa 
[\[6a.3\]]dang /_zhum pa thams cad med pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/_brgya byin 
[\[6a.4\]]dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/_tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste 
[\[6a.5\]]bstan pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa gzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrul pa med pa dang /_gzungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang 
[\[6a.6\]]dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang /_bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i 
[\[6a.7\]]ded dpon chen po/_chu bo bzhi'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa/_g.yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa/_nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa/_ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ldan pa/_byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/_thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[6b.2\]]gyi ze 'bru dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/_nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_bag yod pa'i bsung gi ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/_'jig rten na 
[\[6b.3\]]shes pa'i thu bor gyur pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/_skyes bu chen po'i pad ma/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/_shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa/_rdzu 
[\[6b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i so drang bsnyer ba/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan 
[\[6b.5\]]lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing /_rig pa dang /_ye shes kyi ze ba can/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha 
[\[6b.6\]]gdangs pa/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa/_spyod lam bzhi dang /_'dul ba'i nags tshal dang /_nags 'dab nas 
[\[6b.7\]]skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa/_skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang spu g.yo ba med pa/_rtsal la zhum pa med pa/_mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/_bdag 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]med par sgra brjod pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa/_skyes bu seng ge/_rnam par grol ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang /_'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/_ma rig pa'i mun 
[\[7a.2\]]pa mun nag gi ling tog dang rab rib med par byed pa/_stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba/_lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i nyi ma/_nag po'i phyogs med pa/_dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa/_blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas 
[\[7a.3\]]mig gi dbang po la thogs pa med pa/_lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/_mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 
[\[7a.4\]]'byed pa skyes bu chen po zla ba/_'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/_blo dpyad thogs pa med pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs 
[\[7a.5\]]shing rab tu rdzogs pas khyad par du bogs dbyung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/_chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba/_chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[7a.6\]]zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/_chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/_thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba/_blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang 
[\[7a.7\]]mnyam pa'i sems su gyur pa/_ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa/_nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]dag pa/_sbyin pa legs par byin pa/_sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/_lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/_bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba/_gos par bya ba bsgos pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa/_
[\[7b.2\]]bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa/_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu bsten pa/_legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum/_ngag gi rnam bzhi/_yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa/_
[\[7b.3\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pa dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bsten par gyur pa/_yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btab pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/_yang dag 
[\[7b.4\]]pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa/_yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/_yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa drang por byas pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga 
[\[7b.5\]]la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa/_rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[7b.6\]]bar 'dod pa/_tshe gcig gis thogs pa/_'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/_lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang 
[\[7b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa/_gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong la rab tu gnas pa/_stegs bu dang /_ba gam dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khyams 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]kyis legs par brgyan pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sgreng ba/_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag chal par bkram pa/_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/_me tog 
[\[8a.2\]]a ti muka ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_skya snar dang /_sa brtol dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_tin du ka dang /_A sa na dang /_dong ka'i me tog dang /_shing ke sa ra dang /_ta ma la dang /_sA la dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa 
[\[8a.3\]]chen pos brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/_me tog snang 'od dang /_mA li ka dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_bAr shi ka dang /_ta ra ni dang /_ba li dang /_ko ta ra ni dang /_mchog tu dri zhim dang /_d+ha nus ka ri dang /_lha'i sna 
[\[8a.4\]]ma'i me tog dang /_ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla re chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/_bya 'dab spen dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_ngang pa dang /_rma bya dang /_ngur pa dang /_ku na la dang /_ka la ping ka 
[\[8a.5\]]dang /_shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltad mor bya ba/_chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa/_nga rgyal dang /_
[\[8a.6\]]rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_khro ba dang /_tha ba dang /_khong khro ba med par gyur pa/_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dran pa rgya che zhing gsal ba skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang /_sil snyan dang /_
[\[8a.7\]]glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang /_/blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa/_/mtshungs 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]med stobs mnga' sku rtsal rgya che ba/_/mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod/_/rgya chen dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba/_/dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs/_/sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod/_/zhi gnas 
[\[8b.2\]]tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang /_/dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams spyad pa/_/spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod/_/sems can rnams la thugs brtse mdzad gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag 
[\[8b.3\]]khrig khyod kyis mchod/_/dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas/_/de dus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig_/rga shi nyon mongs 'jig mdzad rdul bral ba/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis/_/
[\[8b.4\]]'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod/_/bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang /_/rgya mtsho chu yis ji bzhin mi ngoms kyis/_/ngoms pa khyod kyi thugs dam dge ba ste/_/yun ring skom nyen skye bo tshim par mdzod/_/smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba khyod/_/
[\[8b.5\]]chos la dgyes par khyod dgyes 'dod mi dgyes/_/'on kyang dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod/_/lha rnams bye ba khyod las chos thos pas/_/ngoms par 'gyur bam lags 'on gyis kyang /_/dal dang mi ldan gyur pa'i 
[\[8b.6\]]ngan song du/_/gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsol/_/dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten dag gi sangs rgyas gzigs gyur cing /_/de dag rnams la chos gsan chos mchog de/_/'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod/_/dpal ldan khyod 
[\[8b.7\]]kyi bsod nams dpal gyis ni/_/dga' ldan pho brang shin tu mdzes mod kyi/_/'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na/_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob/_/brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub reg ces te/_/'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yi/_/gzugs kyi 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]khams na lha rnams gang 'khod pa/_/du ma thams cad mngon par rab tu dga'/_/mgon po khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams bcom/_/khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham mdzad de/_/khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra/_/de dus lags kyis 
[\[9a.2\]]btang snyoms ma mdzad cig_/nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'jig rten la/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzad de/_/bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par rab tu phob/_/lha mi rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod/_/khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas pa ste/_/yun ring nad pa sman 
[\[9a.3\]]pas bor ba yi/_/sems can rnam thar gsum gyi sbyar sman gyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du khod/_/seng ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas/_/wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gis/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra ni rab sgrogs te/_/mu stegs can gzhan wa 
[\[9a.4\]]rnams skrag par mdzod/_/sa yi dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi/_/stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron ma bsnams/_/phyag mthil dam pas sa la brdab mdzod de/_/'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod/_/gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'bul ba yi/_/'jig 
[\[9a.5\]]rten skyong ba bzhi po sdod cing mchis/_/khyod bltam gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi/_/brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis/_/blo gros bzang po rigs chen rigs ldan pa/_/gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/spyod pa ston gyur dam pa'i rigs skyes pas/_/
[\[9a.6\]]rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs/_/snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che/_/bzhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/nor bu rin chen lta bur dri med thugs/_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob/_/glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi/_/tshigs su bcad pa mang po 
[\[9a.7\]]byung gyur nas/_/'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzad ces/_/snying rje'i yid dang ldan la skul bar byed/_/yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de lta bus yang dag par bskul 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]ba dang /_gzhal med khang chen po de nas byung ste/_chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang seng ge'i khri chos bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug go/_/de 
[\[9b.2\]]nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam pa theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de nyid du zhugs so/_/gang yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag kyang lha'i 
[\[9b.3\]]bu mo'i tshogs rnams bsal cing lha'i bu phal rnams kyang bsal nas lhag pa'i bsam pa 'thun pa'i 'khor can du byas te/_'khor bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der zhugs nas so so ci rigs par rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la 'khod par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar 
[\[9b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags nas/_lha'i kha dog mi snang bar byas te/_bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas/_bram ze rnams rig byed slob tu 'dzud de/_gang zhig 
[\[9b.5\]]rnam pa 'di lta bur mngal du zhugs par gyur na/_de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/_gsum du 'gyur ba med de/_de gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal 
[\[9b.6\]]ba chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang 
[\[9b.7\]]bdun no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mgo khrus byas te/_dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/_shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong yod pa/_mu khyud dang ldan pa/_lte ba dang bcas pa/_thams cad gser las grub pa/_mgar bas ma byas pa/_'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/_rgyal po 
[\[10a.2\]]rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/_lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis thos pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la mgo khrus byas te/_dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi 
[\[10a.3\]]tshogs kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/_shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che byung bar gyur na/_de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos te/_bdag gi drung du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/_bdag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so 
[\[10a.4\]]snyam ste/_de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_lag pa g.yas pas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de skor zhing 'di skad du btsun pa lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyis skor cig_/chos 
[\[10a.5\]]ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang /_de nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bskor bas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs par 'gro ste/_rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi 
[\[10a.6\]]pa dang lhan cig rjes su 'gro'o/_/sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gnas par 'gyur ba der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal po gang yin 
[\[10a.7\]]pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes bkang ste thogs/_gser gyi snod ni dngul sil mas bkang ste thogs nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bstsa zhing 'di skad du lha 'dir legs par gshegs so/_/lha tshur gshegs su gsol/_lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]ste/_lo legs shing nyams dgyes la skye bo mang po dang /_mis gtams pa lags na/_lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas khams kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag 
[\[10b.2\]]chos kyis gyis shig_/chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/khyed srog chags ma gsod cig_/ma byin par ma len cig_/'dod pa la log par g.yem par ma byed cig_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du ma smra shig_/phra ma ma zer cig_/ngag rtsub po ma smra shig_/tshig kyal pa ma smra shig_/brnab 
[\[10b.3\]]sems can du ma gyur cig_/gnod sems can du ma gyur cig_/log par lta bar ma gyur cig_/srog gcod pa la byams par ma gyur cig_/log par lta ba can gyi bar la byams par ma gyur cig_/nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa 'byung da re/_chos ma yin par spyod pa la byams 
[\[10b.4\]]par ma byed cig ces bsgo nas/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/_shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o/_/shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/_shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 
[\[10b.5\]]las rgal lo/_/rgal nas kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o/_/snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[10b.6\]]du nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do/_/byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o/_/byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo/_/rgal nas kyang nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i 
[\[10b.7\]]pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i steng du nyams pa med par gnas te/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_thams cad thal kar gyur pa/_yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/_gtsug gser gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/_gser gyi rgyan gyis 
[\[11a.2\]]brgyan pa/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/_'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya ba'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur 
[\[11a.3\]]pa de'i tshe/_nyi ma shar kar glang po rin po che de la zhon te sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/_rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas khye'u sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa 
[\[11a.4\]]de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rta rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_thams cad sngon por gyur pa/_mgo gnag pa/_rngog ma lcang lor 'dug pa/_
[\[11a.5\]]zhon na gus par byed pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/_gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/_'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya ba'o/_/gang gi 
[\[11a.6\]]tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe nyi ma shar kar rta rin po che de la zhon nas sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/_phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor nas khye'u sus kyi 
[\[11a.7\]]bde ba myong bar byed de/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]thams cad du sngo ba/_bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin/_zur brgyad du 'dug pa/_shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ste/_nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nor bu rin po che de brtag par 'dod 
[\[11b.2\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe/_mtshan mo nam gyi gung la mun pa mun gnag gi nang du nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_skyed mos tshal gyi sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir song na/_nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams 
[\[11b.3\]]cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu rin po che'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang /_gcig gis gcig mthong /_gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad smra ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag longs/_
[\[11b.4\]]las kyi mtha' dag byos shig_/tshong 'dus dag khrom/_nyi ma shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan 
[\[11b.5\]]pa yin zhe na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_tshul dang 'thun pa rgyal rigs su skyes pa ha cang yang mi ring ba/_ha cang yang mi thung ba/_ha cang yang mi sbom pa/_ha cang yang mi skem pa/_ha cang yang mi dkar ba/_ha 
[\[11b.6\]]cang yang mi gnag pa/_gzugs mdzes pa/_tshul du shis pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_de'i spu'i khung thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/_kha nas ud pa la'i ngad ldang ba/_ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/_de grang ba'i dus na ni 
[\[11b.7\]]lus la reg na dro ba/_dro ba'i dus na lus la reg na bsil ba ste/_de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'dod chags su mi byed na/_lus kyis lta ci smos te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i/_khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_lha'i mig 
[\[12a.2\]]dang ldan pa 'byung ngo /_/de lha'i mig des dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i gter dag kyang mthong /_bdag po med pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/_de bdag po med pa'i gter gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/_'khor los 
[\[12a.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/_'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/_mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa'o/_/
[\[12a.4\]]de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des bsams pa tsam gyis bsko bar bya ba'i dpung rnams sko'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la bu stong 'byung 
[\[12a.5\]]ste/_dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag ste/_des rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos kyis legs 
[\[12a.6\]]par phab ste gnas so/_/gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/_'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro/_/zhes rig byed 'don du 'dzud do/_/de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan 
[\[12a.7\]]dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags shing /_rang sangs rgyas dag la skul ma 'debs te/_'phags pa dag da ste lo bcu gnyis na byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bor cig ces zer ro/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]chen po na mjug ma sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ri la rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba 'dug pas sgra de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'jim pa la bya ba de bzhin du 'dug ste/_nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so/_/gyen du 'phags nas kyang me'i khams la snyoms par 
[\[12b.2\]]zhugs te sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu rgyus dang /_rus pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/_ring bsrel 'ba' zhig sa la lhags nas/_rkang rjes de dag ni da dung 
[\[12b.3\]]yang drang srong gi rjes zhes grag ste yod do/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe yul bA rA Na sI'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags drang srong lhung ba na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas/_nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas/_me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[12b.4\]]te/_sgron ma bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de dag gi mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu rgyus dang /_rus pa dang /_sha dang /_khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/_ring bsrel 'ba' zhig sa la lhags so/_/de ltar 'dir 
[\[12b.5\]]drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes de phyin chad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba yang drang srong lhung ba drang srong lhung ba zhes ming du chags par gyur to/_/mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag kyang de na gnas pas de phyin chad [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags zhes bya ba yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags zhes ming du gyur to/_/
[\[12b.6\]]dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni rnam par blta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus la rnam par lta ba dang /_gling la rnam par lta ba dang /_yul la rnam par lta ba dang /_rigs la rnam par 
[\[12b.7\]]lta ba'o/_/dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi_/gang gi tshe 'jig rten gsal bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/_skye ba snang bar gyur/_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]rga ba snang bar gyur/_na ba snang bar gyur/_'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go/_/dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi 
[\[13a.2\]]gling du mi skye/_shar gyi lus 'phags por mi skye/_nub kyi ba lang spyod du mi skye/_byang gi sgra mi snyan du mi skye'i/_lho'i 'dzam bu gling nyid du skye'o/_/dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 
[\[13a.3\]]'khob kyi yul gang na mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can legs par bstan pa dang /_nyes par bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i skal ba med pa dag yod pa dag tu mi skye'i/_byang chub sems dpa' ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o/_/dge slong dag 
[\[13a.4\]]ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni rigs dma' ba gdol pa'i rigs sam/_smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/_shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/_g.yung rigs su mi skye'i/_bram ze'i rigs sam/_rgyal 
[\[13a.5\]]rigs kho na ste/_rigs gnyis su skye'o/_/de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs su skye'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe rgyal rigs su skye ste/_dge slong dag da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13a.6\]]rgyal rigs su skye ste/_dge slong dag don gyi dbang de la brten nas/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa rnam par blta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/_de ltar bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol 
[\[13a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur/_yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi lhums su 'jug par 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'gyur zhes 'dri'o/_/de la la la na re yul ma ga d+hA na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang /_bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma 
[\[13b.2\]]yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni ma'i rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin/_pha'i rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin la/_bsod nams chung ngus byung gi/_bsod nams rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma yin zhing rgod la mi brten te mi gnas pa yin la/_yul de yang nye 'khor 
[\[13b.3\]]gseg mas gang ba/_skyed mos tshal dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dag kyang mi mang la ri brags ltar mtha' 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang zhing bzhon pa mang la nor che ba ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[13b.4\]]sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ko sa la'i rigs ni gdol pa'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/_pha dang mas dag pa yang ma yin la/_dma' ba la mos 
[\[13b.5\]]pa ste/_rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/_nor dang rin po che'i gter yang tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma yin te/_de'i phyir de ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re rgyal po bad sa'i rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la/_lo legs pa dang /_bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni 
[\[13b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang de'i tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rgyal po bad sa'i rigs ni phal pa ste/_gtum la gzi brjid 'bar ba yang ma yin zhing /_skyes pa gzhan las skye ba grub pa/_
[\[13b.7\]]pha ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las kyis grub pa ma yin la/_de'i rgyal po yang chad par smra ba ste/_de'i phyir de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor cing rgyas la/_lo legs pa dang /_bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/_nyams 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dga' la skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba/_stegs bu dang /_ba gam dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/_me tog gi ra ba dang /_nags tshal gyi 
[\[14a.2\]]phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs 
[\[14a.3\]]par smra ba med do/_/chos spyod pa med do/_/gong ma dang bar ma dang rgan pa dang /_gtso bo dag la yang rim gror bya ba med cing /_re re zhing yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o/_/bdag ni rgyal po'o snyam du sems pas slob mar khas len pa med cing chos khas len pa med pa ste/_de'i 
[\[14a.4\]]phyir de'ang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re grong khyer 'phags rgyal na rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che zhing bzhon pa mang ba/_pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba 'thob pa yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/
[\[14a.5\]]la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la brlang zhing gzu lums can rgod pa ste/_las yod par blta ba'ang ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de yang byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no 
[\[14a.6\]]zhes zer ro/_/la la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa/_skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba yin pas/_rgyal po lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sde dpa' ba'i bdag po'i rgyal po'i pho brang de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i 
[\[14a.7\]]gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa ste/_mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]rigs te/_de'i phyir de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re grong khyer hasti na pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skya bseng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud las skyes pa/_dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang ldan pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'joms pa ste/_
[\[14b.2\]]rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar skya bseng gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag gis ni rigs kyi rgyud rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/_
[\[14b.3\]]g.yul ngor brtan pa la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer/_'jigs sde la ni rlung gi bu zhes zer/_srid sgrub la ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/_rigs med dang lhar bcas la ni tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/_de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes 
[\[14b.4\]]zer ro/_/la la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di ni shin tu yang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi steng du rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa yang yin la/_rgyal po de yang glang po dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dang /_dpung gi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa/_gser dang /_
[\[14b.5\]]dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_nor dang /_yo byad shin tu mang ba/_rgyal po dang blon po thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa/_mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la 
[\[14b.6\]]dga' ba ste/_rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/_/la la na re de yang tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod mod kyi/_de ni shin tu rgas 
[\[14b.7\]]pas bu skyed pa'i mthu yang med la/_bu'ang mang bas de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul chen po bcu drug po thams 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]cad na/_rgyal po'i rigs mthon po mthon po gang ji snyed cig yod pa/_de dag thams cad la bltas na thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/_de dag de ltar sems pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 
[\[15a.2\]]byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig yod pa des byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang /_lha'i 'khor chen po yod pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag tshur shog_/byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/_rigs rin po che 
[\[15a.3\]]yon tan ji lta bur phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang /_legs so zhes te/_de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin te dris pa/_skyes bu dam pa rigs rin po che yon tan phun 
[\[15a.4\]]sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa skye bar 'gyur/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /_lha'i tshogs chen po de dag la rnam par bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid 
[\[15a.5\]]pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs de ni btsun pa yin/_rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa yin/_rigs de ni phran tshegs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa yin/_
[\[15a.6\]]rigs de ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni kun gyis 
[\[15a.7\]]mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/_rigs de ni skyes pa mang ba yin/_rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/_rigs de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/_rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhum 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]pa med pa yin/_rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/_rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni blon pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/_rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/_rigs 
[\[15b.2\]]de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/_rigs de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi srog la lta ba yin/_rigs de ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/_rigs de ni 'dun pas mi 'gro ba yin/_rigs de ni zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba yin/_
[\[15b.3\]]rigs de ni gti mug gis mi 'gro ba yin/_rigs de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/_rigs de ni kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin/_rigs de ni gti mug la mi gnas pa yin/_rigs de ni lag sbabs che ba yin/_rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/_rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa 
[\[15b.4\]]yin/_rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin/_rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin/_rigs de ni rtsal brtan pa yin/_rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni drang srong mchod pa yin/_rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/_rigs de ni mchod 
[\[15b.5\]]rten mchod pa yin/_rigs de ni mtshun rjed pa yin/_rigs de ni khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/_rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/_rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/_rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[15b.6\]]rigs de ni rigs kyi nang na gtso bor bya ba yin/_rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin/_rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa yin/_rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/_rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/_rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/_rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin pa yin/_rigs 
[\[15b.7\]]de ni nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/_rigs de ni dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rdzas dang /_yo byad mang ba yin/_rigs de ni glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ba lang dang /_lug shin tu mang ba yin/_rigs de ni bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/_rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yin/_rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa yin/_rigs de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi 
[\[16a.2\]]rgyud du skyes pa yin/_rigs de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/_rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/_rigs de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i 
[\[16a.3\]]skye dgu dang bcas pa'i nang na rigs las smos pa'i skyon gyis kha na ma tho ba thams cad dang bral ba ste/_grogs po dag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i 
[\[16a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa'i bud med kyi mngal du 'jug go/_
[\[16a.5\]]kun gyis mngon par rig pa dang /_spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ming phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sngan chad ma btsas pa dang /_tshul 
[\[16a.6\]]khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_'thun par 'dzin pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_dul ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_sgyu med pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_mi khro ba dang /_
[\[16a.7\]]phrag dog med pa dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_mi g.yeng ba dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi shas chung ba dang /_bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang /_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go/_/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa 
[\[16b.2\]]gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi_/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste rgyas pa la skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/_ma gso sbyong blangs pa'i mngal du 'jug go/_/
[\[16b.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang /_ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_skyes bu dam pa 'dis rnam pa ji snyed du bstan pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang 
[\[16b.4\]]zhig la yod snyam du sems so/_/de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la zhugs pa na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya'i grong khyer 'di 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/_nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba yin la/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang ma'i rgyud kyis dag 
[\[16b.5\]]pa/_pha'i rgyud kyis dag pa/_chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/_las kyi mtha' la nyon mongs pa med pa/_dpe byad bzang ba/_shin tu mdzangs pa/_bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa/_nor dang /_
[\[16b.6\]]gter dang /_rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/_las yod par lta ba/_sdig pa'i lta ba med pa/_shAkya'i yul kun na yang rgyal po de gcig pur zad de/_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror bya zhing mchod pa/_mdzes pa/_
[\[16b.7\]]blta na sdug pa/_ha cang yang mi rgan ha cang yang mi gzhon zhing gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/_bzo shes pa/_dus shes pa/_bdag shes pa/_chos shes pa/_sems can shes pa/_'jig rten shes pa/_mtshan shes pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chos 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]kyis rjes su ston pa'o/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas te/_gang dag der skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang skal ba 'dra ba dag go/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba 
[\[17a.2\]]shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo zhig yod pa'ang phyug cing gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa sngan chad ma btsas pa/_bu dang bu mo med pa/_gzugs mdzes pa/_bu don la bris pa ltar blta na sdug pa/_lha'i bu mo ltar 
[\[17a.3\]]rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_bud med kyi skyon rnams dang bral ba/_bden par smra ba/_mi drag pa/_mi brlangs pa/_mi gcor ba/_kha na ma tho ba med pa/_gyo mo'i sgra lta bu med pa/_ca co med pa/_'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong bar smra ba/_mi des pa dang /_khong khro ba dang /_nga 
[\[17a.4\]]rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_rgyags pa dang /_khro ba med pa/_phrag dog med pa/_dus su smra ba/_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_khyos chog par 'dzin pa/_khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/_skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral ba/_
[\[17a.5\]]mgo dang /_rna ba dang /_sna gnas su phebs pa/_bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i skra dang ldan pa/_dpral ba legs pa/_smin tshugs legs pa/_khro gnyer med pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_gsong por smra ba/_'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_'thun par 'dzin pa/_drang ba/_
[\[17a.6\]]gya gyu med pa/_sgyu med pa/_g.yo med pa/_khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa/_mi rgod pa/_mi g.yeng ba/_kha ngan mi smra ba/_'chal pa'i tshig med pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi shas chung ba/_ngang des shing bzod pa dang ldan pa/_rkang lag dang /_mig dang /_blo shin 
[\[17a.7\]]tu bsrungs pa/_rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/_ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/_pad ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/_sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug pa/_yan lag shin tu brtan pa/_'ja'i dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud pa/_yan lag 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]dang /_nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/_yan lag la smad du med pa/_mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/_blta na mdzes pa/_mgul rim bzhin du 'dug pa/_rgyan dam pa dang ldan pa/_sna ma'i me tog dang bAr shi ka ltar so shin tu rnam par dag pa/_phrag pa legs par byin gyis 
[\[17b.2\]]'tsham pa/_rim gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung pa dang ldan pa/_rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba/_gzhogs nyams pa med pa/_lte ba khung zab pa/_sta zur 'jam zhing yangs la zlum zhing brtan par grub pa/_rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshungs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[17b.3\]]glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i lta bu/_lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/_'gro ba'i mig tu sdug pa mig gi dbang po nyams pa med pa/_yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/_bud med rin po che'i 
[\[17b.4\]]gzugs las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa mtshungs pa med pa/_sgyu 'phrul sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa/_sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar btags pa/_sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/_dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[17b.5\]]nang na 'dug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum du tshul dang 'thun gyis gang byang chub sems dpas rigs dag pa bstan pa de ni shAkya'i rigs nyid la snang gi gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dag pa'i sems can chos mtho khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na/_/chos bzang 
[\[17b.6\]]seng ge'i khri la rab tu 'dug_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ldan pa dang /_/skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams drang srong 'khor/_/de na 'dug cing de ni 'di snyam sems/_/rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye dang tshul 'thun gang /_pha ma 
[\[17b.7\]]gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu rnam bltas na/_/rgyal rigs rgyal rgyud che ba gang yin pa/_/kun kyang skyon dang bcas par rjes bsams nas/_/shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong /_/zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs nang rigs dang ldan/_/
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]mi dbang rgyud ni rnam dag cho rigs can/_/'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug pa med pa ste/_/skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can/_/ser skyar brjod pa'i grong khyer sems can gzhan/_/kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan/_/skyed mos kun dga' gzhal med 
[\[18a.2\]]khang gis brgyan/_/skye ba'i sar ni ser skyar brjod par mdzes/_/kun kyang tshan chen stobs dang ldan pa ste/_/glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog_/'phong rtsal bslab pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang /_/srog gi don du gzhan la gnod mi byed/_/zas gtsang rgyal 
[\[18a.3\]]po'i bud med dben pa ste/_/bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin/_/yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs/_/de yi ming yang lha mo sgyu 'phrul te/_/mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha yi bu mo bzhin/_/'byes pa'i lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug_/lha dang mi rnams gang 
[\[18a.4\]]yang rung ba dag_/sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngoms de med kyang /_/'dod chags zhen med sdang bas zhe sdang med/_/de ni 'jam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan/_/mi brlang mi rtsub shin tu des pa ste/_/de ni bzhin 'dzum khro gnyer rab tu spangs/_/ngo tsha khrel yod chos spyod ldan pa ste/_/
[\[18a.5\]]nga rgyal med cing ma khengs rgod pa med/_/phrag dog med cing sgyu dang g.yo med de/_/gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan/_/las yod blta zhing log pa'i sbyor ba spangs/_/bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams/_/sa la gang yod bud med skyon mang tshogs/_/
[\[18a.6\]]de dag thams cad de la yod mi yin/_/mi yi 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam/_/lha yi 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med ga la lhag_/drang srong chen po'i mar ni de 'os te/_/tshe rabs lnga brgya kho nar tshang bar yang /_/de ni byang chub sems 
[\[18a.7\]]dpa'i mar gyur to/_/de dang der ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste/_/de phyir yon tan ldan pa ma yi 'os/_/dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas/_/brtul zhugs rjes spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod/_/rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na/_/'dod pa ma spyad zla ba sum cu 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gnyis/_/gang gi phyogs na de 'dug 'greng ba 'am/_/nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur pa'i gnas dag kyang /_/de yi las dge gzhol ba'i 'od zer gyis/_/shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/_/lha dang lha min mi rnams gang yang rung /_/'dod chags sems kyis blta bar 
[\[18b.2\]]nus pa med/_/spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan/_/de la kun kyang ma dang bu mor lta/_/sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyus/_/rgyal po'i srid ni rab yangs rnam par 'phel/_/khams kyi rgyal po'ang 'jug par mi byed cing /_/rgyal po'i grags dang brjod pa 
[\[18b.3\]]rnam par 'phel/_/de ltar sgyu 'phrul snod du 'thun gyur cing /_/de ltar sems can dam pa mchog mdzes pas/_/de gnyis yon tan mchog dang ldan pas na/_/'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma yi 'os/_/lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste/_/glang po'i khri yi stobs bdog ma gtogs par/_/
[\[18b.4\]]'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di na mi mchog de/_/'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med/_/de skad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya chen dag_/shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' bar mdzad pa yi/_/yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer/_/
[\[18b.5\]]rigs yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas/_dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po chu dang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa gang du byang chub sems 
[\[18b.6\]]dpa' 'dug ste/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de gzhal med khang chen po der song nas phyin pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/_khyed rnams 'dir 'du bar gyis shig_/'chi 
[\[18b.7\]]'pho ba'i rnam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos rjes su dran pa chos rjes su bstan pa tha ma'i chos mnyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig_/de skad kyi tshig thos nas/_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas te/_gzhal med khang chen po der 'dus so/_/der 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]byang chub sems dpas 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas/_de de tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du blta na sdug la/_de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod 
[\[19a.2\]]pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rang rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas yongs su brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba spras pa/_lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting 
[\[19a.3\]]ba/_lha'i spos zhim po du mas bsgos pa/_bdug spos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/_lha'i me tog kha dog du ma'i dgram pa bkram pa/_nor bu rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/_nor bu rin po che du ma'i dra bas g.yogs pa/_rin po che'i dril bu 
[\[19a.4\]]g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma'i sgra 'byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong du mas yongs su gsal bar gyur pa/_rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/_dar brgya stong du ma rab 
[\[19a.5\]]tu spyangs pa/_dar gyi phreng ba lda ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo brgya stong du mas glu blangs/_gar byas/_rol mo byas pa/_yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/_'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas rjes su bsrungs pa/_brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/_
[\[19a.6\]]tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtha' yas pas dgongs pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su 
[\[19a.7\]]byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba de lta bu la 'dug go/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/_shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs bcu kun na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma pa la mngon du phyogs pa/_lha'i tshogs kyis 
[\[19b.2\]]yongs su bskor ba 'chi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa/_tshad med grangs med bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/_de nas lha'i 'khor de thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[19b.3\]]dag mthong bar gyur te/_mthong bar gyur nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi 
[\[19b.4\]]rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas 'di skad ces smras te/_grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa 'chi 'pho'i rnam pas 
[\[19b.5\]]lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig_/grogs po dag chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/_lha'i 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ba ste/_brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_grogs 
[\[19b.6\]]po dag dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro/_/dang ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste sems rnyog pa can dang bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi 
[\[19b.7\]]sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lus kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spong 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_skyon med par 
[\[20a.2\]]'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rdzas thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[20a.3\]]byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rnam par 'tshe ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi dga' ba thams cad sel bar 
[\[20a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro/_/mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal du so sor rtog 
[\[20a.5\]]pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_smon lam kun tu chad par 'gyur ro/_/bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro/_/zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rjes su chags pa 'bar ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ngo tsha shes pa ni 
[\[20a.6\]]chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_nang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_phyi rol nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bden pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lha dang mi rnams mi slu bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdag la slu ba med par 'gyur ro/_/chos 
[\[20a.7\]]spyad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos la rton par 'gyur ro/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa gzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/byas pa rig 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'gyur ro/_/bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdag la stod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos kyi 
[\[20b.2\]]rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/_/dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro/_/nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdag dang 
[\[20b.3\]]gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro/_/khon du mi 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_the tshom med par lhur len par 'gyur ro/_/mi sdug par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur 
[\[20b.4\]]ro/_/gnod sems med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gti mug med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi shes pa rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/_/chos don du gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_don la rton par 'gyur ro/_/chos 'dod pa ni 
[\[20b.5\]]chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa tshol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/_/ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa ni chos snang ba'i 
[\[20b.6\]]sgo ste/_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyur lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mtho bar sems pa med cing dma' 
[\[20b.7\]]bar sems pa med par 'gyur ro/_/phung po la mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sdug bsngal yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/_/khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro/_/skye mched gsal ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lam sgom par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/_/lus la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lus dben par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[21a.2\]]sems la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/_/chos la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rab rib dang bral ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba 
[\[21a.3\]]dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro/_/dad pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i 
[\[21a.4\]]sgo ste/_shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa'i dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_las legs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i 
[\[21a.5\]]sgo ste/_mngon sum gyi ye shes su 'gyur ro/_/dad pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdud kyi stobs las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi 'phrogs 
[\[21a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi thul bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[21a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_shin tu rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba yang 
[\[21b\]]
