[\[21b.1\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa 
[\[21b.2\]]nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_skye ba thams cad la smod par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_rtog 
[\[21b.3\]]pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_yi ge dang sgra dang /_skad dang tshig gi lam thams cad brag ca dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_
[\[21b.4\]]las med cing rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_tshol ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_dran 
[\[21b.5\]]pa med cing yid la byed pa med par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems mi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[21b.6\]]bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs 
[\[21b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mi khom 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_nga rgyal dang /_dregs 
[\[22a.2\]]pa dang /_rgyags pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gnod sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_dge ba'i chos brtsams pa thams cad nyams su lon par 'gyur zhing /_le lo can gyi sems can yongs su smin 
[\[22a.3\]]par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thams cad bskyed cing sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_ma rig pa 
[\[22a.4\]]dang gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang /_dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing shes rab 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur 
[\[22a.5\]]ro/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems can thams cad sdud cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i 
[\[22a.6\]]chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_stobs bcu 
[\[22a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong gi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni chos 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]snang ba'i sgo ste/_chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro/_/rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa thob pa ni 
[\[22b.2\]]chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_
[\[22b.3\]]lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang 
[\[22b.4\]]bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/_mngal du 'jug pa dang /_btsas pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan 
[\[22b.5\]]las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par bya ba'o/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 
[\[22b.6\]]'di bstan pa'i tshe/_lha'i 'khor de dag las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyangs pa byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni 
[\[22b.7\]]chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yog par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'as lha'i 'khor de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang gi tshe na dga' ldan gnas mchog nas/_/'dren pa skyes bu seng ge 'chi 'pho'i tshe/_/lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni/_/bag med mtha' dag rnam par spongs zhes smra/_/lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa/_/yid kyis bsams pas 
[\[23a.2\]]'byung ba dpal ldan pa/_/thams cad las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste/_/de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin/_/de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis/_/sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni zad gyur te/_/gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba/_/ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re/_/nga la gus 
[\[23a.3\]]par bya ba bskyed nas ni/_/chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la/_/nan tan gyis ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang /_/bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'gyur/_/'dod pa thams cad mi rtag brtan pa min/_/ther zug ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste/_/smig rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra/_/
[\[23a.4\]]glog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dag gi dga' bas ni/_/lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur/_/gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur/_/lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni/_/gar gyi 
[\[23a.5\]]ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra/_/dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su/_/phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor bar byed dang mtshungs/_/dge ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing /_/phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par/_/'dus byas dag la grogs yod ma yin te/_/mdza' bshes 
[\[23a.6\]]nye du med cing 'khor kyang med/_/de lta bas na lhan cig 'thun byos la/_/phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i sems byos te/_/chos kyi spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis/_/spyad pa legs par spyad la gdung ba med/_/thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing /_/bzod dang des pa phun 
[\[23a.7\]]sum tshogs kyis te/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis/_/rtag pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams dag ni ldan gyur cing /_/bdag po med la bems por gyur pa yi/_/chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]par gyis/_/nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang /_/spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams gang thob pa/_/kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste/_/thos dang tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung /_/sems can don dang phan dang byams don du/_/nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang /_/
[\[23b.2\]]bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang /_/yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis/_/ngag dang skad dang sgra rnams tsam gyis ni/_/dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyis/_/nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub byos la/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos/_/gzhan gyis gleng ba'i 
[\[23b.3\]]skabs ni ma dbye bar/_/bdag ni rtag tu bsgrims pas 'bad par gyis/_/la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin/_/ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba med/_/sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag_/myong bar gang gyur de ni dran par gyis/_/khyed cag log pa nyid du nges 
[\[23b.4\]]pas na/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'dod chags bral ma thob/_/de lta bas na dal dang bshes gnyen dang /_/tshul dang 'thun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang /_/chos mnyan dam pa thob par byas nas ni/_/'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis/_/nga rgyal dang ni rgyags dang dregs thong la/_/
[\[23b.5\]]rtag tu mnyen zhing drang la g.yo med cing /_/mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te/_/lam rtogs bya ba'i phyir ni sbyor bar gyis/_/gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang /_/shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis/_/bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra ba rnams/_/ye shes rdo rje 
[\[23b.6\]]yis ni rnam par khrol/_/shin tu mang por smra ba ci dgos te/_/don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la/_/khyed cag gnas par byas par ma gyur na/_/de la chos kyis lan pa ma yin no/_/gang tshe ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te/_/'chi med 'gro ba'i chos char 'bebs pa'i tshe/_/rnam par dag 
[\[23b.7\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyed/_/chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shog shig_/chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste/_bzhi pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas/_bzod par byas nas/_lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o/_/kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[24a.2\]]sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don 'thun par bya ba bzhi la mgron du bos la/_grogs po dag da kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni kho bos byas pa ma shes shing 
[\[24a.3\]]rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod mi bzhugs na dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 
[\[24a.4\]]'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di khyed la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/_de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi mgo las thod dang cod pan phog ste/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad du/_skyes bu dam pa khyod 
[\[24a.5\]]ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes de skad smras te/_de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas/_yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras 
[\[24a.6\]]pa/_grogs po dag kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/_de la kha cig na re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro/_/la la na re brgya byin gyi gzugs su/_la la na re tshangs pa'i gzugs su/_la la na re rgyal po chen po'i 
[\[24a.7\]]gzugs su/_la la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/_la la na re sgra gcan gyi gzugs su/_la la na re dri za'i gzugs su/_la la na re mi'am ci'i gzugs su/_la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/_la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/_la la na re zla 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]ba'i gzugs su/_la la na re nyi ma'i gzugs su/_la la na re nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes bya ba sngon drang srong las shi 'phos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 
[\[24b.2\]]phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rig byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa'i rigs so/_/de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/_glang po dam pa lus chen 
[\[24b.3\]]mchog gyur pa/_/mche ba drug can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs/_/mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes/_/'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan pa'o/_/rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi/_bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang 
[\[24b.4\]]ldan 'gyur zhes/_/yang dag nyid du lung ni ston par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus la bltas nas/_dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der snga ltas brgyad ston to/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khyim de 
[\[24b.5\]]rtswa dang /_sdong dum dang /_tsher ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med cing /_dri ma med la chag chag legs par btab pa dang /_phyag dar legs par byas shing rlung rdul can dang /_mun pa dang /_rdul dang bral ba dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_phye ma leb dang /_sdig 
[\[24b.6\]]sbrul med cing me tog gis kun tu gang ba lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba dang po'o/_/ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la bya 'dab spen dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_ngang pa dang /_rma bya dang /_ngur pa dang /_kun la dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_
[\[24b.7\]]shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgro gshog sna tshogs mdzes pa yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang /_ba gam dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng dag tu gnas shing dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin te/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang /_nags 
[\[25a.2\]]tshal nyams dga' ba dang /_skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba/_de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing 
[\[25a.3\]]la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang pad ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de na mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_
[\[25a.4\]]bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /_sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_yongs su gang bar snang ste/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag na rnga 
[\[25a.5\]]bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rgyud gsum pa dang /_khar ba'i sil khrol dang /_pheg la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur te/_'di ni snga ltas 
[\[25a.6\]]byung ba drug pa'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha bye zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag cing 
[\[25a.7\]]rab tu gang bar snang ste/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba bdun pa'o/_/nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing /_lus dang sems dga' ba skyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/_'di ni snga ltas byung ba brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/_lus byug pas byugs/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/_gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing btsun spu dang bcas la/_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa thob nas/_bud 
[\[25b.2\]]med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma rol mo bya ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/_g.yas rol na khri bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la 'dug nas/_'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing rab tu dad pa'i mdog 
[\[25b.3\]]gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal po sa bdag legs par bdag la gsan du gsol/_/rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnong shig_/bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba/_/de dag bdag la gsan cing thugs dgyes rangs 
[\[25b.4\]]par mdzod/_/lha bdag bsnyen gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol/_/bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te/_/srog chags gnod pa spangs shing bsam pa rtag dag pas/_/ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi/_/rku sems rnam par spangs te 
[\[25b.5\]]'dod dang dregs pa spangs/_/rgyal po 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid/_/bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhe gcod spang /_/mi dge kyal pa'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do/_/gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyags pa dang /_/brnab sems kun spangs rang 
[\[25b.6\]]gi nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi/_/yang dag sbyor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spang /_/dge bcu'i las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi/_/bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis/_/mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad/_/rgyal po 
[\[25b.7\]]khyod la yun ring mi dger gyur du mchi/_/bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod/_/rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags deng myur stsol/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsil khang ldan pa dang skya ldan pa'i nang /_/me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar/_/
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyid/_/skyes pa nyung rum rnams dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang /_/bud med phal pa rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal/_/snyan cing yid mchi sgra snyan nyan pa ma gtogs par/_/gzugs dang sgra bsung yid du 
[\[26a.2\]]mi mchi bdag mi 'tshal/_/bcings dang btson rar stsal ba thams cad dgye bar gsol/_/nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod/_/zas skom rang pa shing rta khyogs dang bzhon pa rta/_/'gro la bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal ba mdzod/_/pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud 
[\[26a.3\]]med dag_/ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing /_/phan tshun byams pa'i yid ldan phan dang des sems kyis/_/dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar 'thun zhing bde spyod mdzod/_/rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis bda' ba dang /_/gnod pa bgyid dang rdeg btsog sdigs ru mi 
[\[26a.4\]]mdzad par/_/kun la'ang dad pa'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te/_/lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs/_/rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas/_/smras pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya/_/khyod kyi bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsams 
[\[26a.5\]]shing /_/khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no/_/rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms/_/me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs/_/gdugs dang ba dan ta la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis/_/
[\[26a.6\]]'thab phod stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can/_/mda' mdung lcags mda' mdung thung ral gri thogs pa dag_/yid 'ong sgra gcan dang skya ldan pa bskor gyis te/_/lha mo 'jigs pa med par bya phyir srung zhing gnas/_/khrus byas spos byugs gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan/_/bud 
[\[26a.7\]]med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'dra/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te/_/lha mo de bzhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/_/lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsa spras pa/_/khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'ong mal bshams te/_/mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rin chen klod byas nas/_/'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/_/dge slong dag de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_
[\[26b.2\]]bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang /_mdun na 'don tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_'od bkod pa dang /_'od gsal dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_mthar thug dang /_'og min pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa dang /_
[\[26b.3\]]gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/_gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/_bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/_bdag cag la mi chas/_grogs po dag 
[\[26b.4\]]khyed kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_lhums na bzhugs pa dang /_bltam pa dang /_thor bu dang /_byis pa'i nang na rol pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_rol mo gzigs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' 
[\[26b.5\]]ba spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du phan pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_phangs pa'i sems 
[\[26b.6\]]dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_mnyen pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis/_/gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring 
[\[26b.7\]]byed par spro/_/su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi brjid dang /_/stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod/_/gang zhig lha yi pho brang 'di dag na/_/lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi/_/lha yi bde bas dga' bar 'dod pa dag_/dri med zla ba'i zhal gyi zhabs 'bring gyis/_/de 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog_/lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na/_/gser mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na/_/dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring gyis/_/gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du/_/dga' tshal me tog man dA ra 
[\[27a.2\]]'dab rgyas su/_/lha mo lhan cig rtse bar 'dod pa dag_/skyes bu chen po 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/_/'thab bral bdag po'am dga' ldan bdag po'am/_/yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_/'gro ba kun gyis mchod 'os 'dod pa dag_/grags pa mtha' yas 'di yi zhabs 
[\[27a.3\]]'bring gyis/_/gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang /_/dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod cing /_/yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa/_/yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/_/bdud kyi dbang po zhe sdang yid med pa/_/rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar 
[\[27a.4\]]phyin pa'i/_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na/_/phan pa mdzad pa 'di dang lhan cig deng /_/de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te/_/tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par su 'dod pa/_/de ni tshad med bzhi yi gzi mnga' ba/_/skyes bu chen po'i zhabs 'bring deng nas 
[\[27a.5\]]gyis/_/'on tam gang zhig mi yi nang dag tu/_/'khor los sgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod na/_/rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs bde sbyin pa/_/bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i zhabs 'bring gyis/_/gang zhig sa bdag de bzhin tshong dpon bu/_/phyug cing skyid la nor mang tshogs chen 
[\[27a.6\]]dang /_/dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa/_/de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig deng /_/gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang /_/snyan pa grags dang spobs dang yon tan dang /_/gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa/_/de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du 
[\[27a.7\]]song /_/lha dang mi yi 'dod pa gang yin dang /_/srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams cad dang /_/bsam gtan bde dang dben pa'i bde 'dod pa/_/de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zhabs 'bring gyis/_/'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spong ba dang /_/nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cing /_/zhi ba rab 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]zhi nyer zhi yid ldan pa/_/de ni thugs dul zhabs 'bring myur du song /_/gang zhig slob dang mi slob rang rgyal dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod cing /_/stobs bcus seng ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa/_/de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung song /_/gang zhig ngan song rnams 
[\[27b.2\]]kyi lam gcod cing /_/bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang /_/yan lag brgyad lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na/_/'gro lam mthar 'byin 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/_/gang zhig bde gshegs yongs su mchod pa dang /_/thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang /_/dge 'dun 
[\[27b.3\]]yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zhabs 'bring gyis/_/skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang /_/'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par grol ba dang /_/nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa/_/de ni sems can dag pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis/_/
[\[27b.4\]]'gro ba kun na yid 'ong sdug mdzes shing /_/gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang /_/bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'grel 'dod pa/_/de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song /_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang /_/zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba 
[\[27b.5\]]yi/_/rnam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de/_/sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song /_/yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang /_/srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/yon tan thams cad rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa/_/de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song /_/tshig 
[\[27b.6\]]de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang /_'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang /_'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang /_tshangs ris 
[\[27b.7\]]kyi lha drug khri brgyad stong dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra yi/_/tshig 'di lha yi dbang po dag gis gsan du gsol/_/'dod pa'i dga' 'byor bsam gtan bde ba mchog spangs te/_/sems can dag pa 
[\[28a.2\]]dam pa 'di yi zhabs 'bring bgyi/_/lhums su gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs dang bltam pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin tu mchod par bgyi/_/bsod nams dag gis bsrungs pa'i drang srong yongs bsrungs na/_/zhe sdang sems kyis sus kyang glags rnyed 'gyur ma mchis/_/
[\[28a.3\]]glu dbyangs sil snyan rol mo'i dbyangs sgra legs bsgrags pas/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de/_/gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par/_/lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi/_/rgyal po'i pho brang me tog sil mas rgyas par 
[\[28a.4\]]dgang /_/a ga ru mchog nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi/_/de yi dri tshor lha mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing /_/nad med rims nad bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi/_/me tog man dA ra dang kun nas 'du ba dang /_/sim byed rab tu sim byed s+tha la rnam snang dang /_/me tog bzang pos phrin 
[\[28a.5\]]las dge las byung ba de/_/mchod pa'i slad du ser skya'i grong kun dgang bar bgyi/_/ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum ma gos bzhugs/_/ji srid rga shi mthar 'byin bltam par gyur gyi bar/_/de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyis zhabs 'bring bgyi/_/blo gros che mnga' mchod pa bgyi bar 
[\[28a.6\]]bdag cag sems/_/bltam nas gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis/_/lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba/_/sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi/_/lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen legs par thob/_/ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su 'thun mdzad cing /_/
[\[28a.7\]]'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la/_/ji srid cig na rgyal srid kun spangs khab nas 'byung /_/de srid dus su dad pa'i sems kyis zhabs 'bring bgyi/_/ji srid cig na ran bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs/_/ji srid cig na bdud bcom byang chub 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]reg gyur cing /_/tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa/_/de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med btul gyur te/_/stong gsum khams su sangs rgyas phrin las nam lags nas/_/zhi zhing bsil ba'i mya 
[\[28b.2\]]ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa/_/de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen gtang mi bgyi/_/dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can dag pa mchog 
[\[28b.3\]]dam pa 'di lta bu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas/_de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin 
[\[28b.4\]]gyis brlabs pa/_de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ser skya'i grong khyer chen po dam pa skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po dang skya ldan zhes bya ba lha'i dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas/_
[\[28b.5\]]lha'i bu mo gos lhug lhug po gyon pa/_dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu brgyan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal mchog gi steng na 'dug pa mthong nas/_phan tshun mdzub mos ston cing /_nam mkha'i 
[\[28b.6\]]dkyil na 'khod de/_gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams/_/yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas/_/de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyur ci 'dra snyam/_/lag na me tog phreng can 
[\[28b.7\]]de dag rnams/_/the tsom skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/_/me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su/_/sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags/_/lhug lhug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong nas/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]sor mos phyag byas te/_/mi yi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer/_/bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa/_/lha yi bu mo gzugs mchog yid 'ong snyam/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na/_/lha yi lus kyang zil gyis non 
[\[29a.2\]]par mthong /_/'di ni gang zag mchog gi yum 'gyur du/_/yon tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os/_/nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar/_/lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin/_/rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man cad du/_/yan lag yid 'ong lha las lhag pa ste/_/mig 
[\[29a.3\]]gis blta na ngoms par 'gyur ma yin/_/yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/'di yi kha bzhin lus mdzes sdug pa ni/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra/_/nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste/_/'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung /_/gser 
[\[29a.4\]]sbram btso ma bzang po'i gser bzhin du/_/lha mo 'di yi kha dog rnam par mdzes/_/'di yi skra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste/_/bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lcang lor 'khyil/_/'di yi mig ni pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra/_/rnam dag so ni nam mkha'i skar ma bzhin/_/rked pa gzhu ltar 
[\[29a.5\]]phra zhing sta zur yangs/_/phrag pa zlum zhing tshigs rnams mngon pa med/_/brla legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra ste/_/byin pa shin tu legs pa byin gyis phra/_/rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste/_/'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor nges/_/de ltar rnam mang du mar blta 
[\[29a.6\]]byas nas/_/me tog gtor te bskor ba byas nas ni/_/grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te/_/skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong /_/de nas phyogs bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang /_/'thab bral rab dang brgya byin 'phrul pa dang /_/lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang /_/
[\[29a.7\]]mi'am ci dang lto 'phye ches smras pa/_/skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la/_/skyes bu dam pa de la bsrung ba gyis/_/'gro ba dag la yid kyis sdang ma byed/_/mi rnams la yang gtse ba ma byed cig_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa/_/der ni 'thun par 'khor dang 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]lhan cig kun/_/mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te blta bar gyis/_/de ltar shi 'pho'i dus shes lha'i bu rnams/_/me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni/_/sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul 
[\[29b.2\]]drung du deng /_/smra ba'i seng ge dus ni deng lags kyis/_/'jig rten kun la thugs rje brtse bskyed de/_/mi dbang sems can dag pa 'chi 'pho ston/_/mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe shar phyogs nas 
[\[29b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems 
[\[29b.4\]]dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa 
[\[29b.5\]]bzhi sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/_/de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 
[\[29b.6\]]kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing /_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad 
[\[29b.7\]]kyis yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/_dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so/_/dge slong 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la tha gru che ba 'dir sngan cad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od las shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing 
[\[30a.2\]]snang bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa snang ba med pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang 'od dang /_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid kyis lam 
[\[30a.3\]]mer ma gyur/_thal ler ma gyur/_lhang nger ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang rang gis lag pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing /_der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas gcig 
[\[30a.4\]]gis gcig mthong zhing gcig gis gcig shes te/_'di skad du kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so/_/kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[30a.5\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang /_ltas chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab 
[\[30a.6\]]tu 'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/_/dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/
[\[30a.7\]]nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba/_tshim par 'gyur ba/_mgu bar 'gyur ba/_dad par 'gyur ba/_sim par 'gyur ba/_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]mnyan par 'os pa/_bsngags par 'os pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_mnyan na gtang mi bra ba/_mi 'thun pa med pa/_dngang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grag par gyur to/_/skad cig de la sems can gang la yang gnod pa'am/_'jigs pa'am/_dngang ba'am/_bag 
[\[30b.2\]]non pa med par gyur to/_/skad cig de la nyi zla dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 
[\[30b.3\]]sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang gis gnod par mi 'gyur/_gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing /_phrag dog gam/_ser sna'am/_nga rgyal lam/_'chab pa'am/_
[\[30b.4\]]rgyags pa'am/_khro ba'am/_gnod sems sam/_yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la/_phan tshun pha ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/_byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur 
[\[30b.5\]]to/_/lha dang mi'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang phrag pa dang spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po de dag 'deg cing khyer bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag 
[\[30b.6\]]gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/_mdun dang /_rgyab dang /_g.yas g.yon dag nas byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_khyod kyis sngan chad dge las bsags pa dang /_/yun ring dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang /_/khyod kyis chos 
[\[30b.7\]]rnams kun gyi tshul sbyangs pas/_/de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung bar gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/_/sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na/_/lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di/_/sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags/_/gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcad de/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]srang la bcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang /_/sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom thob/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/_/tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas na/_/tshul khrims de spyad pa 
[\[31a.2\]]yi 'bras bu des/_/mi khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/_/byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni bzod pa bsgoms/_/bzod pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/_/lha dang mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis 
[\[31a.3\]]sngon/_/brtson 'grus ma god dam pa bsgoms pas na/_/brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/_/sku ni ri rab bzhin du mdzes par grub/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/_/nyon mongs sbyang slad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzad pas/_/bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/_/
[\[31a.4\]]'gro ba dag la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon/_/nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgoms mdzad pas/_/shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/_/'od gsal dam pa rnam par snang zhing mdzes/_/byams pa'i go mnabs nyon mongs 'joms 
[\[31a.5\]]mdzad cing /_/sems can kun la thugs rje ches byung ba/_/dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa/_/bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis 'phags shing /_/gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba/_/'dren pa stong 
[\[31a.6\]]gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i/_/thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes mchog la mkhas/_/bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa/_/rgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[31a.7\]]thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas/_/'chi 'pho 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho ba ston/_/'jig rten chos kyi rjes su 'thun mdzad kyang /_/'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'/_/gang dag khyod ni nyan tam ltar lhags pa/_/de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab/_/khyod la chos 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]nyid thos te gang dad cing /_/dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos ci 'tshal/_/dga' ldan gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/_/nyon mongs gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad/_/deng ni pho brang 'byor 
[\[31b.2\]]cing rgyas gyur la/_/bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur/_/lha yi bu mos sil snyan sgra phyung bas/_/rgyal po'i khab na sil snyan grags par 'gyur/_/bsod nams gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba/_/bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa/_/de yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 
[\[31b.3\]]'byor/_/dpal gyis 'jig rten gsum ni zil gyis gnon/_/mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis/_/de phyi phyin chad pho brang dam pa 'dir/_/lus can rnams la 'dod dang 'thab rtsod med/_/kun kyang byams pa'i sems kyis sri zhur bcas/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal 
[\[31b.4\]]byung bas na/_/rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs/_/rin chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba pa/_/lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcas/_/mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas 
[\[31b.5\]]pa rnams/_/de dag ring por mi thogs thar pa 'thob/_/gus dang sri zhu la ni gnas nas su/_/'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa/_/kun kyang byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo/_/mi yi dam pa khyod ltar myur du shog_/bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//
[\[31b.6\]]dge slong dag de ltar dgun 'das te/_dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]tshe/_skar ma sa ga la bab pa dus kyi dam pa la shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing /_me tog mchog tu rgyas nas grang dro dang /_mun pa dang /_rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas khebs par gnas pa'i tshe/_
[\[31b.7\]]'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyis mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas/_tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su/_yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i rum du/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/_dran zhing shes bzhin du/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]glang po'i phru gu thal kar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/_mgo'i kha dog srin bu lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/_mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/_ma'i glo g.yas pa nas zhugs so/_/
[\[32a.2\]]zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas pa logs su brten te gnas kyi/_glo g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brten to/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo /_/glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug_/rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug pa/_/
[\[32a.3\]]'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa/_/glang po mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed/_/des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang /_/ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te/_/lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas/_/bsam gtan mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du gyur/_/
[\[32a.4\]]de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lhug lhug por gyon cing /_thogs pa las lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/_dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob nas/_mal dam pa de las langs te bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[32a.5\]]de'i steng nas babs te/_shing mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song nas/_de mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya btang nas/_rgyal po gshegs su gsol/_lha mo de khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do/_/zhes byas 
[\[32a.6\]]pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas/_rab tu dga' bar gyur te/_lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te/_blon po dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_'khor dang /_gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal ga 
[\[32a.7\]]la ba der song ngo /_/song nas kyang bdag gi lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas/_mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/_mya ngan 'tshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas/_cung zad cig bsams te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/bdag ni g.yul du dpa' 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ba'i phul phyin pa/_/deng ltar lus lci bdag gis myong mi dran/_/bdag gi khyim du'ang 'gro bar deng ma nus/_/kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de 
[\[32b.2\]]smras pa/_dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan ldan pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/_/byams dang snying rje thob pas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te/_/rgyal po khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du 
[\[32b.3\]]zhugs/_/de tshe rang gi mgo cogs sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te/_/rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs/_/nga rgyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ngor bltas te/_/ngas ni khyod la ci bya ci sbyar khyod kyis nga la smros/_/lha mos smras pa/_kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra 
[\[32b.4\]]nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/_/rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid/_/glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/_/bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de yi lo rgyus gsan par gsol/_/stong gsum khams 'di mdzes par rab rib ma mchis 
[\[32b.5\]]bdag gis mthong /_/bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod/_/'on kyang bdag la khro zhing 'tshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis/_/zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid/_/bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge'am dngo 'am ci/_bdag gi 
[\[32b.6\]]rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa/_/rig byed rmi lam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan/_/rgyal po myur du bram ze 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol/_/de skad tshig thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la/_/bram ze rig byed bstan bcos gzhung la shin tu 
[\[32b.7\]]mkhas pa gnyer/_/sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/_/kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gson/_/bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_lha mo bka' stsal du gsol/_khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs/_thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]lha mos smras pa/_kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/_/rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid/_/glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/_/bdag gi rum du zhugs na de yi lo rgyus mnyan par 
[\[33a.2\]]gyis/_/de skad tshig thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras/_/rigs la dngo ba ma mchis dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par 'gyur/_/khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba che ba nyid/_/gal te 
[\[33a.3\]]'dod pa dag dang rgyal srid pho brang spangs gyur te/_/'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na/_/de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/_/bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad 'gyur/_/de skad tshig snyan lung bstan 
[\[33a.4\]]te/_/rgyal po'i pho brang zan zos nas/_/bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su/_/bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang /_rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa dag las de skad kyi tshig de thos nas/_
[\[33a.5\]]tshim zhing mgu ste/_yi rangs la/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_bram ze de dag bza' ba dang btung ba dang /_myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas/_bya dga' byin te bkye'o/_/de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi 
[\[33a.6\]]grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhi na/_grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/_ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_bzhon pa 'dod pa 
[\[33a.7\]]rnams la ni bzhon pa/_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/_gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/_'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin no/_/dge slong dag de nas 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha thugs las su ma mdzad par 
[\[33b.2\]]btang snyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig_/bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang bsham mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams ngan/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang /_/byang 
[\[33b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni/_/rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gis dbul/_/de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/_/brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur/_/'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan khang /_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[33b.4\]]sras la bdag 'bul lo/_/de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/grags pa che mnga' sngon chad ni/_/dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa/_/pho brang dam pa dgyes pa de/_/rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo/_/de 
[\[33b.5\]]nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang /_/de ni rin chen rang bzhin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog don du/_/rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyis/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[33b.6\]]rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa/_/gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa/_/bdag gi gzhal med khang drung na/_'od dang mdog kyang stor bar snang /_/de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul/_/byang chub sems 
[\[33b.7\]]dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/_/rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang /_/de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis/_/lha yi me tog rab bkang ste/_/lha yi spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i/_/pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul/_/der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis/_/dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]dbang po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang mi'i las ni 'das kyi lha yir ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur te/_de la byang chub 
[\[34a.2\]]sems dpa' bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/_glo g.yas phyogs logs su skyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po de dag 
[\[34a.3\]]thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dug gi gzhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ting 'dzin bkod pa che la gnas gyur te/_/sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas/_/lha rnams thams cad bsam pa 
[\[34a.4\]]rdzogs par byas/_/rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bro na skyo zhing 'byol na/_de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum cu rtsa gsum mam/_'thab 
[\[34a.5\]]bral lam/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos kyang ci dgos na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri nga ba dang bral ba/_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/_yum gyi lhums mi'i lus dri mi 
[\[34a.6\]]zhim par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang /_'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin 
[\[34a.7\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/_bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/_'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/_yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]brten te bzhugs so/_/zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu'ang ngo mtshar che ste/_bcom ldan 'das/_sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smra bar ni bdag la spro ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs 
[\[34b.2\]]su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad par gyur pa mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni da lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni da lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub 
[\[34b.3\]]sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de bstan te mthong na glo ba dga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad de/_des mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/_tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 
[\[34b.4\]]'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du mi 
[\[34b.5\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems dpa'ar gyur cing ma'i rum na zla ba bcur 'dug 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa blangs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar 
[\[34b.6\]]gshegs pa de de lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa da de ga la yod ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig 
[\[34b.7\]]dang /_ji tsam du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/_tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[35a.2\]]grogs po khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di man chad sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra sgrogs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bkur na khyed kyi nang nas mthong bar su dga' ba myur du shog shig 
[\[35a.3\]]ces sgras go bar gyis shig_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i steng du bzhag 
[\[35a.4\]]nas/_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/_'dzam bu'i gling du phab bo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang /_
[\[35a.5\]]lha'i phreng ba dang /_lha'i spos dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_lha'i longs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus 
[\[35a.6\]]su 'dug nas rgyang ring po nas gdong thal mos bskyabs te mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i nang na tshangs pa dag ni mthu che ba ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[35a.7\]]byed kyi lha dag kyang de dag gi drung na dma' ba yin na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/_lha'i rol mo dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de thos pa tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams myo myo por 'gyur 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]du 'ong ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/_des de dag la smras pa/_grogs 
[\[35b.2\]]po dag kho bos kyang ji ltar bya/_kho bo nyid kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus so/_/grogs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha'i dbang po de bas na ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[35b.3\]]smras pa/_grogs po dag lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/_dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig_/de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod de mgo byol nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod 
[\[35b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su 
[\[35b.5\]]spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gru bzhi lham pa/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_steng khang pa brtsegs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/_de'i tshad ni 'phang du 'di lta ste/_dper na byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo/_/khang pa brtsegs pa/_
[\[35b.6\]]de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang kha 
[\[35b.7\]]dog 'dra ba gang yang med do/_/lha rnams kyis de mthong na yang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ste/_dper na mgar ba mkhas pas shin tu bzhu ste/_legs par sbyangs nas/_dri 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i gser bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i dung mgrin ma gtogs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs 
[\[36a.2\]]dang /_kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_rlung dang char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas 
[\[36a.3\]]pa ste/_de'i phye ma zho gcig la'ang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rin du mi chog go/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de lta bus kun nas bskor ba ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang na ma chags ma reg 
[\[36a.4\]]par 'dug go/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de kho na dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa de'i nang na ma reg ma chags par 'dug go/_/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste gdan bting ngo /_/tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de'i kha dog ni rnam pa 'di lta 
[\[36a.5\]]bu ste/_dper na bai dUr+ya sngon po rigs dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no/_/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na me tog lha'i las 'das pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsegs pa der skye'o/_/
[\[36a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa/_rin po che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/_sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/_ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[36a.7\]]yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der kun tu snang ngo /_/gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'jug pa de yi nub mo 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_sa chen po'i rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te pad ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]par 'phags so/_/pad ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu'i dam pa dang /_tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stobs la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na snying khu dang /_snying po dang /_bcud ji snyed yod pa de 
[\[36b.2\]]dag thams cad pad ma chen po de la zil dngar gyi thigs par chags te/_'dug nas de tshangs pa chen pos bai dUr+ya'i snod bzang pos blangs shing byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to/_/snying khu'i 
[\[36b.3\]]thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu bar nus pa sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do/_/las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs 
[\[36b.4\]]pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ce na/_byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i tshe/_sems can nad pa dag la sman byin pa dang /_sems can bsam pa la rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang /_skyabs su 
[\[36b.5\]]'ongs pa rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang /_rtag par me tog gi phud dang /_'bras bu'i phud dang /_ro'i phud de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang /_pha dang ma la phul 
[\[36b.6\]]zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po zil dngar gyi thigs pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo/_/khang pa brtsegs pa der gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo dang /_phreng ba brgyus pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa 'phags pa ji snyed 
[\[36b.7\]]cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas der byung bar snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der gos stong phrag brgya'i rgyan ces bya ba phrugs cig byung ste/_de'i byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de ni med pa gang yang med do//_//
[\[37a.2\]]'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su grub pa/_'di ltar shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_yul ka ling ka nas byung ba'i dar ltar reg 
[\[37a.3\]]na bde ba'o/_/de yang 'ol byir bstan par zad kyi/_de la dpe med do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di ni bsams pas 'grub ste/_gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang /_mngon par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[37a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_ma gang gi rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i rum g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub cing /_phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 
[\[37a.5\]]'phos te khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur nur po dang /_mer mer po dang /_ltar ltar po dang /_reng reng por 'gyur ba med cing /_yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_mtshan thams cad phun sum 
[\[37a.6\]]tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do/_/de de ltar 'dug pa la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gang las lag na rdo rje skyes 
[\[37a.7\]]pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i lha mo bzhi yod de/_u khu li zhes bya ba dang /_mu khu li zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang /_'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste/_bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo /_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 
[\[37b.2\]]zhugs pa shes nas/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur te/_dper na mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na ri'i spo la me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang ngo /_/
[\[37b.3\]]dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur gyur te/_'od gsal zhing gzugs bal mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/_khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du skyil mo krung du 'dug 
[\[37b.4\]]na gser gyi sa le sbram rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai dUr+yas brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na sprin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba chen po 
[\[37b.5\]]skyed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa yang dpal dang /_gzi brjid dang /_kha dog gis nye bar rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de snang bar byed do/_/snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do/_/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs 
[\[37b.6\]]pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/_spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byed do/_/spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do/_/de snang bar byas nas de stan gang la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do/_/de snang bar byas nas 
[\[37b.7\]]khyim thams cad snang bar byed do/_/khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/_shar phyogs snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang kha dog gis snang bar byas par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po 
[\[38a.2\]]bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya tsam dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste mdzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston to/_/'jig rten skyong ba la sogs 
[\[38a.3\]]pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du/_skyes zin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bar lag pa bskyod cing 'deg la/_rnam par bskyod cing gzhog pa mthong nas/_de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob 
[\[38a.4\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas/_chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/gang 
[\[38a.5\]]gi tshe de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe 'ang /_byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to/_/de ltar lag pa brkyang ste/_'dong ba'i brda bstan nas/_phyir skum par byed de/_ma 
[\[38a.6\]]la gnod pa med do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam sems shing /_de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[38a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' nub mo mi nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing brkyangs nas kyang bskum pa dang /_bskums nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa de 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de yin no/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'am/_bu mo su yang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i tshe/_thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba smra'o/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/_sngar dga' 
[\[38b.2\]]bar bya ba smra ba la mkhas par gyur te/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa su yang rung byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba smra zhing de'i 'og tu byang chub sems 
[\[38b.3\]]dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o/_/de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/_nyi ma gung la bab nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa/_mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang /_de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos 
[\[38b.4\]]mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/_gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing mdzub mo brkyang ste/_stan ston 
[\[38b.5\]]to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas 
[\[38b.6\]]chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang lta bar gyur to/_/des na lha de dag 
[\[38b.7\]]kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo/_/de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' zhig la smra ste/_bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo/_/khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur to/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do/_/dge slong dag gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_de ma 
[\[39a.2\]]yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to/_/brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/_dran zhing shes bzhin du 
[\[39a.3\]]lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do/_/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dod par gnang ngo snyam du sems shing /_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub 
[\[39a.4\]]sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag nyi ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lha yul ba'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas byang chub 
[\[39a.5\]]sems dpa' ga la ba der/_byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas/_byang chub 
[\[39a.6\]]sems dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga' bar bya ba smras te/_mdzub mo brkyang nas stan ston to/_/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub 
[\[39a.7\]]sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog par ma nus nas/_ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to/_/de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do 
[\[39b.2\]]snyam ste lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' zhig la smras te/_bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' ba'i gtam byed do snyam mo/_/dge slong dag gang gi tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa 
[\[39b.3\]]de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to/_/de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/_dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do/_/
[\[39b.4\]]de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to/_/
[\[39b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog par gyur te/_dge slong dag shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[39b.6\]]de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to/_/de dag de ltar 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/_'od kyi bkod pa de dag seng ge'i khrir sprul nas/_de 
[\[39b.7\]]ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod du bcug ste/_de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te brtags kyang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sus kyang de dag ma mthong 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]ste/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de yin no/_/dge slong dag lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/_lus lci bar ma tshor te/_gzhan du na yang 
[\[40a.2\]]ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_bde bar tshor zhing lto mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yang myong bar ma gyur to/_/'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba'am/_zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba'am/_gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdung bar ma gyur/_'dod pa'i rnam 
[\[40a.3\]]par rtog pa'am/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'am/_gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/_grang ba'am/_tsha ba'am/_bkres pa'am/_skom pa'am/_mun pa'am/_rdul lam/_ngal ba tshor ba'am/_mthong bar ma gyur te/_de la 
[\[40a.4\]]gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg yid du mi 'ong ba snang bar ma gyur to/_/rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to/_/de la bud med kyi sgyu'am/_g.yo'am/_phrag dog gam/_bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur to/_/de'i tshe byang chub 
[\[40a.5\]]sems dpa'i ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/_tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang skyes pa gang la yang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/_skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[40a.6\]]ma la 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye'o/_/ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de dang /_yul gzhan dag na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo su gang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_'byung pos non pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub 
[\[40a.7\]]sems dpa'i ma mthong ma thag tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur to/_/mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du 'dong bar gyur to/_/sems can gang la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_'dus pa las byung ba'i 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang /_mig gi nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_mchu'i nad dam/_so'i nad dam/_lkog ma'i nad dam/_shu ba'am/_'bras sam/_mdze'am/_sha bkra'am/_skem pa'am/_brjed byed dam/_rims sam/_lba ba 
[\[40b.2\]]'am/_phol mig gam/_me dbal lam/_rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mas/_lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing /_rang rang gi gnas su 'dong bar gyur to/_/tha na lha mo sgyu 'phrul 
[\[40b.3\]]gyis rtswa nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs te sems can nad pa dag la byin yang de dag de blangs ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lto g.yas par bltas pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de 'di lta ste dper na me 
[\[40b.4\]]long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/_de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_
[\[40b.5\]]nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur to/_/char ni dus bzhin du 'bab/_rlung ni dus bzhin du ldang /_dus dang skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'pho bar gyur to/_/rgyal srid kyang bde zhing lo legs 
[\[40b.6\]]la 'khrug pa med cing dgra med par gyur to/_/ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na shAkya'i rigs dang /_sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung /_dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod do/_/sbyin pa dag kyang gtong /_bsod nams dag kyang byed de/_zla ba bzhi 
[\[40b.7\]]'das pa'i dus ston bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis rtse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par blangs te/_rgyal po'i las btang nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs su dag pa na gnas pa bzhin 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[41a.2\]]kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i tshe gnas gnas pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[41a.3\]]mthong lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_mi gzhan dag kyang bstan te mthong nas/_de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba 
[\[41a.4\]]dang /_yid bde ba skyes so/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par bya ba'i phyir bteg ste khyer nas bzhag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[41a.5\]]dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pas lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang tshe rgyal sras sems can dam pa ma yi rum gnas pa/_/de tshe sa 'di tshal dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/
