[\[41a.6\]]gser mdog 'od bkye ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs par gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'/_/gzhal med khang chen dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par spras/_/der ni dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa zhugs par gyur nas 'dug_/
[\[41a.7\]]tsan dan dri zhim mchog gis rab tu gang zhing rnam par mdzes/_/stong gsum rin chen yongs bkang de yi srang phyed rin mi chog_/stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang 'og nas brtol ba byas nas ni/_/yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi pad ma'i snying khu'i thigs pa byung /_/de bzhin 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags/_/de las snying khu'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras la 'bul/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo tshangs pa 'dra ba ma gtogs par/_/sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can ris na med/_/
[\[41b.2\]]bskal pa du ma'i bsod nams gzi brjid snying khu'i thigs gnas pa/_/de zos lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par gyur/_/'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus gsum rgyun tu 'ong /_/phyag byas 
[\[41b.3\]]mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas/_/bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang nas 'ongs pa'i gnas su 'dong /_/'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong /_/'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun snang /_/mchog tu bya ba'i 
[\[41b.4\]]theg pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas/_/kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing 'dong /_/bud med byis pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang /_/'byung pos non dang sems 'khrugs gos med rdul gyis yog pa rnams/_/de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul 
[\[41b.5\]]mthong nas sems ni rnyed gyur te/_/blo gros rtogs dang dran dang ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim 'dong /_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang /_/mig nad rna nad dag gis lus sems mi bder gyur pa dag_/rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag 
[\[41b.6\]]gnod gyur pa/_/de dag sgyu 'phrul lag pa mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur/_/yang na rtswa yi nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te/_/sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nad med par gyur/_/bde ba thob cing da rod ma nyams so so'i khyim du 'dong /_/de ni sman gyur sman 
[\[41b.7\]]pa'i rgyal po rum na 'dug phyir ro/_/gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa/_/de tshe byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni/_/ji ltar bar snang gnas kyi zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]brgyan pa snang /_/de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gnod par 'gyur ba med/_/'dod la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med/_/dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas/_/de la bkres dang skom dang tsha dang grang ba'i gnod 
[\[42a.2\]]pa med/_/lha yi rol mo sil snyan dbyangs sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung /_/lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char yang 'bab/_/lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha mi thams cad kyang /_/de dag phan tshun gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med/_/sems can dga' bder 
[\[42a.3\]]rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed/_/dga' ba'i sgra sgrog de dag dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid dang ldan/_/rgyal po'i srid bde 'khrug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab/_/rtswa dang sman dang me tog rnams kyang de yi dus su skye/_/rgyal po'i khab tu zhag bdun rin chen char pa bab gyur 
[\[42a.4\]]pas/_/sems can dbul po de las len cing sbyin byed bde bar spyod/_/sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur pa de tshe gang yang med/_/ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal sems can bzhin du dga' dang ldan/_/shAkya'i rgyal po de yang gso sbyong rab la nyer gnas shing /_/de ni 
[\[42a.5\]]rgyal po'i bya ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod/_/de ni dka' thub nags tshal song nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul la/_/sems can mchog srel khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rmed/_/lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar zla ba bcu 'das te/_
[\[42a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i skyed mos tshal du snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_me tog thams cad kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang /_rdzing dag na me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku 
[\[42a.7\]]mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang sa las 'thon te kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad byung ba dang /_gter chen po nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]par snang ba dang /_khyim gyi nang du yang rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang spos chu'i dpal gyi wa 'bru mar dri zhim pos sbags pa rnams kyang zag par gyur pa dang /_gangs kyi ri'i ngos las seng ge'i phru gu dag 'ongs te/_dga' bar rtse zhing ser skya'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas nas 
[\[42b.2\]]sgo na gnas par gyur kyang sems can gang la yang 'tshe ba med par gyur pa dang /_glang po'i phru gu thal kar lnga brgya lhags te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtse mos nyug cing gnas par gyur pa dang /_lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings pa dag kyang rgyal po zas 
[\[42b.3\]]gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi pang pa nas pang pa dag tu 'gre ldog par snang bar gyur pa dang /_klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang ba dang /_lha'i bu mo khri yang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs shing nam mkha' 
[\[42b.4\]]la 'khod par snang ba dang /_bum pa gang ba khri yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byed par snang ba dang /_lha'i bu mo khri yang spos chu'i ril ba bring ga ra glad la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang /_lha'i bu mo khri yang gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[42b.5\]]thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang /_lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po dag kyang dung dang /_rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga mgul nas spyangs te sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang /_rlung thams cad kyang mi ldang bar gnas par gyur pa dang /_chu klung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi 'gul zhing mi 
[\[42b.6\]]'bab par gyur pa dang /_nyi zla dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyang mi rgyu bar gyur pa dang /_skar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang rin po che'i dra bas yog par gyur pa dang /_me yang mi 
[\[42b.7\]]'bar bar gyur pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_yang thog dang /_rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang /_rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang /_ras bcos bu'i mdzod dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo bye bar snang ba dang /_bya 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rog dang /_'ug pa dang /_bya rgod dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang /_sgra skad snyan pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang /_skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha' 'ang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang /_sa'i phyogs mthon dman du 'dug 
[\[43a.2\]]pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_srang dang /_tshong 'dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil ltar gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par snang ba dang /_sbrum pa thams cad kyang bde ba dang /_legs 
[\[43a.3\]]par btsa' bar gyur pa dang /_shing sA la'i nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyang shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste/_phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par snang ba ste/_snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi 
[\[43a.4\]]gzi brjid dang mthus byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par shes te/_nam gyi srod la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gi bsam pa gang lags gsol gyis lha ni gsan du gsol/_/yun ring ring po 'das nas 
[\[43a.5\]]skyed mos tshal gyi blo skyes te/_/gal te khyod mi bkyon cing zhe sdang phrag dog mi mnga' na/_/bdag ni rtse nas skyed mos tshal du myur du mchi bar bgyi/_/chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thub spyod pas khyod kyang skyon mkhyen grang /_/bdag kyang sems can dag pa bsrel nas yun ni ring 
[\[43a.6\]]lags la/_/sA la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te/_/skyed mos tshal gyi dog sar da ni mchi ba'i rigs so lha/_/sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du gyur lags te/_/nags rgyu khu byug dang ni rma bya sgra rab snyan pa 'byin/_/gtsang zhing 
[\[43a.7\]]mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang /_/da ni mchi na ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol/_/rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas/_/dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor la smras pa ni/_/bzhon pa bzhon che 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis/_/yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis/_/ri sngo'i mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog 'thun par gyur pa yi/_/glang po stong phrag nyi shu snyed cig myur du bstad par gyis/_/glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug 
[\[43b.2\]]ldan dril mdzes glo la brgyus/_/gser dang nor bus rnam par spras shing gser gyi dra bas spud/_/rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/_/dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rngog lcang lo bzang 'khril ba'i/_/rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs 
[\[43b.3\]]pa myur du stong gyis te/_/gser dril g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas sbyang ba gyis/_/skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag_/mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rno thogs pa/_/stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du chos te bsham gyis la/_/
[\[43b.4\]]sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis/_/lum bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis/_/gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis/_/lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal par khrom/_/
[\[43b.5\]]de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis/_/'khor rnams kyis ni de skad tshig thos skad cig tu/_/bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum bi ni yang brgyan byas te/_/rgyal gyur rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol/_/ji skad bka' 
[\[43b.6\]]stsal de bzhin kun bgyis dus bab lha gzigs shig_/mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nam/_/khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras/_/gang zhig nga la snying nye nga la dga' bar 'dod pa dag_/nga yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi 
[\[43b.7\]]lus kun brgyan par gyis/_/spos mchog ngad kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos/_/'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo bar gyis/_/brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par gyis/_/rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad de ring 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]kun gyis bstan par gyis/_/khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu pi wang rdza rnga dum dum pheg_/sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bsham par gyis/_/sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing /_/lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[44a.2\]]ba khyed kyis gyis/_/shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis/_/bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod/_/na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te/_/gang du'ang yid du mi 'ong mi 'thun sgra rnams mi [(]grag [,]grags [)]kyis/_/
[\[44a.3\]]lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe/_/rta dang glang po shing rta rkang tang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung /_/rgyal po'i sgo drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par gyur/_/rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grag_/de tshe bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong 
[\[44a.4\]]dkrol bar byas/_/shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la/_/lha rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bsham pa byas/_/rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan bzhin ldan par byas/_/rma bya khrung khrung ngang pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/_/
[\[44a.5\]]gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgreng /_/lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bkab/_/lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lta/_/lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/_/gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul 
[\[44a.6\]]seng ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa/_/de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/_/lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing me tog sna tshogs 'thor/_/de ring lum bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltam gyur te/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren 
[\[44a.7\]]par byed/_/sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam gyi byi dor byed/_/tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro bar gyur/_/lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa de la lta/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de ni 'di snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed/_/gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshangs pa dbang por bcas pa'i lha/_/mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong /_/gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod 
[\[44b.2\]]pa'i sems can de med de/_/yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang bral bar 'gyur/_/'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod/_/dge slong dag de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor/_
[\[44b.3\]]glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rkang tang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa/_go cha legs par bgos pa sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/_shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du 
[\[44b.4\]]bdar/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes pa'i shAkya rgan pa dang /_gzhon pa dang /_bar ma bzhi khris ni yongs su bsrungs/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i slas glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra ni byed/_khar ba'i sil khrol dang /_pheg rdob sil snyan dang /_glu 
[\[44b.5\]]dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/_lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[44b.6\]]kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa/_rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o/_/lum bi ni'i nags tshal de thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab cing lha'i me tog gis gtor bar gyur to/_/nags tshal dam pa de'i nang 
[\[44b.7\]]na shing ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu skyed par gyur to/_/nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa bzhin no/_/
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las babs te/_mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing /_shing drung nas ni shing drung dag tu 'gro/_nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag_/ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la 
[\[45a.2\]]lta zhing de rim gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/_yal ga shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/_lo ma dang dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/_mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/_spos mchog dang phul du bya ba'i dri'i ngad dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[45a.3\]]spyangs pa/_nor bu dang rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong po dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma rnams rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/_yal ga ring zhing shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/_blag sha zhes bya ba sa'i 
[\[45a.4\]]phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzang la yangs pa/_rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes pa/_ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/_lha'i glu dbyangs blangs pa/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing 
[\[45a.5\]]dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis thor tshugs dang cod pan mngon par btud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon 
[\[45a.6\]]par btud de phyag byas so/_/de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gi phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/_blag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste/_tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas nas bya smyangs byed cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[45a.7\]]de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang bkur sti byed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/_rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so/_/de zla ba bcu tshang 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhing shes bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/_gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bu med par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis 
[\[45b.2\]]mdun na 'khod de/_de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi pa'i sleb mos lus dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing ma'i rum na gnas gnas 
[\[45b.3\]]pa de yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste/_mchod rten du bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[45b.4\]]dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de sa la babs par gyur ma thag tu pad ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di yang brtol te byung ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam 
[\[45b.5\]]mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang /_dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus bkrus so/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems 
[\[45b.6\]]dpa' btsas ma thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang /_me tog sil mas lus 'khru zhing mngon par 'thor ro/_/bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang /_rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to/_/de pad ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/_seng ge'i 
[\[45b.7\]]lta stangs dang /_skyes bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lha'i mig thogs pa med pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs su bcas/_yul du bcas/_mi dang lhar bcas pa rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/_shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[46a.2\]]tam/_shes rab bam/_dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang 'dra ba de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma mthong nas/_de'i tshe byang chub 
[\[46a.3\]]sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/_zhum pa dang bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsam pa dran par byas te/_bsams brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par bya ste/_sus kyang bstan pa med par byang chub 
[\[46a.4\]]sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad ma dag kyang skyes par gyur to/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur 
[\[46a.5\]]bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/_/nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o/_/'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng ge 
[\[46a.6\]]ltar tshim par gyur pa'i sgra bsgrags so/_/sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/_/bdud dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o/_/sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me gsad pa'i phyir chos 
[\[46a.7\]]kyi char sprin chen po'i char phab ste/_de dag bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]dpas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras mngon par go bar gyur te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' 
[\[46b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag byung ngo /_/dge slong dag de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to/_/'jig 
[\[46b.3\]]rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba yang byung bar gyur to/_/mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgrar bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang dus 
[\[46b.4\]]mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang rnam par dag par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/_sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las kyang dal bus dal bus phra ba phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /_gos dang /_
[\[46b.5\]]rgyan dang /_spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa 'bab par gyur to/_/rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba 'jam pa dri zhim po dag kyang ldang bar gyur to/_/phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang /_rdul dang /_du ba dang /_khug rna med cing rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang las kyang 
[\[46b.6\]]tshangs pa'i sgra chen po snyan cing zab pa grag par gyur to/_/nyi zla dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/_'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/_reg na mchog tu bde ba/_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa/_
[\[46b.7\]]'jig rten las 'das pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_dregs pa dang /_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]mi dga' ba dang /_zhum pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_chags pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams cad spangs par gyur to/_/sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to/_/bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[47a.2\]]kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to/_/chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to/_/smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/_/mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to/_/rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par gyur to/_/yan lag dang 
[\[47a.3\]]nying lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob par gyur to/_/btson ra na 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to/_/mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nad du bya ba dang sdug 
[\[47a.4\]]bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur 
[\[47a.5\]]to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/_brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/_mthu chen po dang ldan pa/_btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[47a.6\]]khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa'i phyogs de de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa mdzad de/_dge slong dag de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag pa gom pa bdun 'dor bar 
[\[47a.7\]]gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur te/_gar gyi sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan dang /_gos kyi 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/_mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/_bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[47b.2\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[47b.3\]]gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/_da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 
[\[47b.4\]]bdag ni lan bzhi'am lan lngar yang /_lan bcur yang /_lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang /_lan brgya'i bar du yang /_lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 
[\[47b.5\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/_sems ma bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa/_byis pa mi mkhas pa/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/_rgod pa/_khengs pa/_ma bsdams pa/_
[\[47b.6\]]sems g.yengs pa/_nem nur gyis 'khor ba/_the tshom mang ba/_dad pa med pa/_dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa/_dge sbyong gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu 
[\[47b.7\]]tshogs nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/_kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltos/_byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa btsog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la yang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang /_de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri mas ma gos 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]par byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/_skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi shes so/_/dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu 
[\[48a.2\]]dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu yang bzang ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/_lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo sems can rnams zhum 
[\[48a.3\]]par 'gyur zhing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyi/_bdag cag ni mi tsam du zad pas na/_bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so/_/zhes zhum par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i 
[\[48a.4\]]phyir te/_skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_de ni bdag cag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems so/_/kun dga' bo de dag ni de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la'ang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/_de bzhin 
[\[48a.5\]]gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_kun dga' bo da ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i zil gyis non pa/_mi gtsang bar bying ba/_rim gro'i zil gyis non pa/_ma rabs kyi ngang tshul 
[\[48a.6\]]can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa/_kun dga' bos gsol ba/_bcom 
[\[48a.7\]]ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/_'di lta bu'i mdo sde bzang po la yang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung ba lags pa lta/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod par yang ma zad de/_sdig pa rnam pa du 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed cing dge sbyong gi dngos po don du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_tshe rabs 'phos nas ni ji lta bu zhig tu mchi/_bcom ldan 
[\[48b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur pa btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[48b.3\]]dga' bo spu g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di dag thos nas bdag ni brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[48b.4\]]kun dga' bo de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[48b.5\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing yid mi ches pa dang /_/spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de 
[\[48b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/kun dga' bo la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_/dad pa skye 
[\[48b.7\]]ba'i sems can de dag gis ni thob pa legs par thob pa yin te/_de dag gi 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o/_/de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o/_/de dag gi spyod pa legs par spyad pa'o/_/de dag gis ni snying po blangs so/_/de dag ni ngan song gsum las grol ba'o/_/de dag ni de 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo/_/de dag gis dad pa thob pa ni don yod do/_/de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par zos so/_/de dag gis ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos 
[\[49a.2\]]pa yin no/_/de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa gtubs pa yin no/_/de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal to/_/de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu phyung ngo /_/de dag gis ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su thob bo/_/de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs 
[\[49a.3\]]so/_de dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te mchod par 'os pa'o/_/de dag ni 'jig rten na 'byung bar dkon pa'o/_/de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gzung ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i 
[\[49a.4\]]phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/_kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong 
[\[49a.5\]]ba yod kyi mthong na ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo la la ni mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi thos pas ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong la thos na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do/_/kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/_la la zhig 
[\[49a.6\]]mthong ngam/_/thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar gyur na/_khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ba ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgrol bar 
[\[49a.7\]]bya ba'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bzung ba'o/_/kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tshe yang sems can su yang rung ste/_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas mi 'jigs pa slong na sems can de dag la ngas mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/_/nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig_/'di ni de 
[\[49b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pas bcol ba'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so/_/nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsal to/_/kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du yang 'gro ste/_thos pas 
[\[49b.3\]]kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/_/sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/_gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen cing sems can de dag ni de 
[\[49b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste/_/de dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/kun dga' bo mdza' bo gang yin pa de ni mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/_/mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la sdug cing yid du 
[\[49b.5\]]'ong ba yin no/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par byas/_/dad pa tsam yang skyed par gyis shig_/ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang gtad de/_/de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi yang 
[\[49b.6\]]mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing /_/bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyan cing /_'thun par 'dzin pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur la/_skyes bu de yang mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/_pha de shir zin 
[\[49b.7\]]kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang su yang rung ste nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/_/de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o/_/de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang po mnga' ba ste/_/de 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi gsung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad 
[\[50a.2\]]kyis/_kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig_/'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng 
[\[50a.3\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dge ba dri med rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi zla'i 'od ldan pa/_/lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug cu de yi tshe/_/skad cig de la lum bi ni ra lhags lha mo sgyu 'phrul de 
[\[50a.4\]]la smra/_/mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchis ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig_/bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags/_/khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i nyams bskyed mi 
[\[50a.5\]]dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol/_/rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo myur skyed 'gyur/_/ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing /_/stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang /_/ji ltar dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug 
[\[50a.6\]]tu g.yos lags na/_/khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras bltam 'gyur/_/ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang /_/nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang /_/ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod 
[\[50a.7\]]chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya stong yang /_/dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltam par gyur/_/brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang /_/dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid/_/skyes bu 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]seng ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang rtsib logs g.yas nas byung /_/gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltam/_/brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dar te thub pa de yang blangs/_/zhing rnams brgya stong 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bkye bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par 
[\[50b.2\]]gyur/_/ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te/_/lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi g.yab mo phyung /_/de tshe sa 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad ma mdzes/_/sna tshogs mngon mthon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i 
[\[50b.3\]]mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste/_/gom pa bdun du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni/_/rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lha mchog nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod gyur te/_/gtsang zhing dang la mdzes 
[\[50b.4\]]pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil/_/klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtor/_/lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos len/_/stong gsum 
[\[50b.5\]]'di yang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltam pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag zhi/_/mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la/_/lha rnams me tog sil ma 'thor/_/
[\[50b.6\]]stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi/_/brtan pa gom pa bdun du bzhud/_/sa phyogs gang du zhabs bzhag pa/_/der ni pad ma bzang po'i mchog_/rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag_/sa las mngon du 'thon par gyur/_/de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas/_/rga dang 'chi ba sel ba yi/_/
[\[50b.7\]]sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung brjod do/_/'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te/_/de nas don ldan gsung phyung ba/_/nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/_/'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren/_/nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes/_/mi yi 'dren pas 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]'dzum pa mdzad/_/lha dbang bcas dang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dad sems skyes/_/spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang bsil/_/klu yi dbang po rnams kyang lhan cig 'thun par byas nas ni/_/dri zhim spos chu dag gi rgyun gyis sku yang 
[\[51a.2\]]bsil ba byas/_/lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang la ni gnas nas su/_/dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil/_/gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni/_/bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/_/skyes bu 
[\[51a.3\]]gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas gtsang de la dgar smras pa/_/lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltam/_/de ni nges par 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tshob/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang gcig 'gyur phas kyi dgra 
[\[51a.4\]]yang ma mchis 'gyur/_/de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i mdun du de song ste/_/lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur na/_/shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur/_/kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub 
[\[51a.5\]]stobs dang ldan zhing tshan po che dang 'dra/_/skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las dgyes pa'i sgra gson lha/_/'dun pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/_/bsngags ldan gyi ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te/_/chibs mchog 
[\[51a.6\]]dam pa gser gyi 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang lor 'khril ba lags/_/mtha' 'khob khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du/_/rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legs par rgyal gyur lha/_/da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol/_/
[\[51a.7\]]rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar spyon/_/gser gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag_/nam mkha' las ni sgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis/_sbrum ma la sogs nag gu zal lu dag dang be'u ni drug stong 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'brangs/_/lha cig lha mchog bltam zhing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs/_/rje cig rgyal por gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltam pa yi/_/yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa/_/rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la 
[\[51b.2\]]nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol/_/myur du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par zhugs/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang skad cig de la sbyin pa gtong ba yang de bas rgya cher gyur to/_/ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya yang btsas par gyur 
[\[51b.3\]]to/_/grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang /_bran mo brgyad brgya dang /_'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang /_rte'u mo khri dang /_bsngags ldan la sogs pa rte'u pho khri dang /_ba lang gi phrug gu mo lnga brgya dang /_ba lang gi phrug gu pho lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par 
[\[51b.4\]]gyur nas de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras bu gzhon nu rtsen pa'i phyir byin par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shwad tha'i sdong 
[\[51b.5\]]po skyes par gyur to/_/gling phra mo rnams su yang tsan dan gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi kho ra yug tu yang skyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag byung bar gyur to/_/gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen du 'bus te sgo ston par gyur 
[\[51b.6\]]to/_/de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du bdag gi bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bu 'di skyes ma thag tu 
[\[51b.7\]]bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub par gyur gyis/_'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas bu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so/_/dge 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa yang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to/_/der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur/_spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i 
[\[52a.2\]]spos kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar dri zhim po khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhag nas/_bltams pa legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam/_zhes 'dri bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang /_rnam par byug pa thogs te/_byang 
[\[52a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam/_zhes 'dri bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa 
[\[52a.4\]]legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur 
[\[52a.5\]]to/_/lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltam pa legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[52a.6\]]ma'i drung du lhags te bltam pa legs par bltam mam/_sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te/_rgyal po zas 
[\[52a.7\]]gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/_rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum bi ni'i nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod par byas so/_/bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to/_/shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to/_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin no/_/bsod nams dag kyang byed do/_/
[\[52b.2\]]bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so/_/su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa yang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul te gral gyi thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[52b.3\]]brjod par gyur to/_/ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing /_/ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na/_/'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi/_/bde ba mdzad cig bltam par mngon/_/ji ltar rab rib med 'od kyis/_/lha dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang /_/mi snang zil du rlag pa las/_/bsod nams 'od cig 
[\[52b.4\]]byung bar mngon/_/mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing /_/rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la/_/smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las/_/'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon/_/ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing /_/'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur las/_/tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su/_/
[\[52b.5\]]gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon/_/sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing /_/sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las/_/'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi/_/thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon/_/ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing /_/pad ma chen po 'thon pa las/_/nges par gzi 
[\[52b.6\]]brjid chen po 'di/_/'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur/_/lha yi spos kyis spags gyur pa/_/'jam pa'i rlung gi ngad ldang zhing /_/sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las/_/'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon/_/gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha brgya po/_/'dod chags bral ba 'di dag 
[\[52b.7\]]kyang /_/thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa las/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon/_/mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing /_/lha rnams kyis ni mi mthong yang /_/phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las/_/'di ni ded dpon chen por byon/_/me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing /_/chu klung thams cad mi g.yo 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]la/_/sa yang dal bus g.yo ba las/_/'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/_de shi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so/_/
[\[53a.2\]]dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang btsas nas zhag 
[\[53a.3\]]bdun lon na ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung na ma snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas thog ma ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas lha mo 
[\[53a.4\]]sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so/_/de zhugs pa dang /_bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du 
[\[53a.5\]]drangs par gyur to/_/de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/bu mo lnga stong ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril ba b+h+ring ga ra thogs te lam chag chag gis 'debs shing mdun du 
[\[53a.6\]]'dong bar gyur to/_/bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyi me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/bu mo lnga stong ni bzang por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te/_lam gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs 
[\[53a.7\]]shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/bram ze lnga stong ni dril bu thogs te bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/glang po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/rta nyis khri ni gser gyi brgyan gyis bkab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/_/shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/_byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/_/rkang tang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa/_yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang 
[\[53b.2\]]ldan pa/_go cha sra ba bgos pa bzhi khri ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/_/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[53b.3\]]du ma byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to/_/shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis chas pa rin po che'i 
[\[53b.4\]]phreng ba thogs pa nyis khri shing rta de drangs te lha'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig 'dug_/mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/_mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs 
[\[53b.5\]]mthong na bag med par ma gyur to/_/dge slong dag ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tshe/_rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/_thal mo sbyar 
[\[53b.6\]]nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/_kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye kha lo sgyur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye dga' zhing 
[\[53b.7\]]bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye kun nas spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/_kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba/_mtshan 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu yang zhugs par byas te/_zla ba 
[\[54a.2\]]bzhi lon pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs par gyur to/_/de na shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/_phan pa'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems 
[\[54a.3\]]kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba dang /_byi dor bya ba dang /_nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang /_de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o/_/bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro 
[\[54a.4\]]bgyi'o zhes zer ro/_/de na shAkya ches 'gras ches 'gras pa de dag na re bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon nu la gzugs dang da ral bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya ba mi nus so/_/skye dgu'i 
[\[54a.5\]]bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI gzhon nu'i sru mo ste/_'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang legs par skyed par nus so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang mnyes par nus so/_/zhes thams cad gros gcig tu 'dus te/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dad par byas nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo 
[\[54a.6\]]gau ta mIs gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror ma ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bskos par gyur te/_de la brgyad ni pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/_/brgyad ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o/_/brgyad ni rtsen grogs kyi ma ma'o/_/brgyad ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/_/de 
[\[54a.7\]]nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa/_ji lta gzhon nu 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur ram 'on te ma yin gyis rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang /_de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]nag po zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/_nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra 
[\[54b.2\]]sgrog cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang /_dga' zhing phan tshun 'dong ba mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_ma la bdag gis rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya'am snyam nas/_des lha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[54b.3\]]ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan pa zhig btsas par mthong nas/_bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u shes 
[\[54b.4\]]par gyis shig_/'dzam bu'i gling du ni rin po che chen po byung ste/_ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan 
[\[54b.5\]]pa btsas so/_/de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di 
[\[54b.6\]]lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bu stong yod par 'gyur te/_dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog 
[\[54b.7\]]gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang /_chos dang 'thun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/_dbang 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro/_/de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_'jig rten du sgra rnam par 
[\[55a.2\]]grags par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na tshur shog de ltar 'dong ngo /_/de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang 'grogs te/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldings te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul brtul 
[\[55a.3\]]nas rkang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do/_/dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang po 
[\[55a.4\]]'dus pa mthong ngo /_/de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang ma la chab sgo na drang srong zhig mchis so zhes gsol cig_/de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/_rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[55a.5\]]ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang thal mo sbyar te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/_'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o/_/
[\[55a.6\]]de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/_mi de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig_/de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/_drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/_nang du bzhud cig_/de nas drang srong nag po rgyal 
[\[55a.7\]]po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig_/rgyal bar spyon cig_/sku tshe ring bar srungs shig_/chos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]drang srong nag po la yon chu dang rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la bdar te/_de stan la bde bar 'dug par shes nas zhe sa dang bcas/_gus dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong sngon mthong bar mi dran na 'dir ci la byon 
[\[55b.2\]]ci zhig bzhed/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras shig bltam par gyur pa de lta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis 
[\[55b.3\]]langs kyi bar du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig gzhes shig_/drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/_skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse 
[\[55b.4\]]ba nye bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda byas so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu legs par blangs te/_drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro/_/de nas drang srong nag pos byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/_skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[55b.5\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba las 'phags pa'i lus can nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_yan lag thams cad 
[\[55b.6\]]du mdzes pa mthong nas/_kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyi gang zag 'di byung ngo /_/kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/_stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal 
[\[55b.7\]]te/_bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te/_sems zhing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/_de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang /_gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung 
[\[56a.2\]]na ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/_des de lta bu mthong ba dang /_mchi ma blags te ngus nas shugs ring du phyung ba dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de 
[\[56a.3\]]mchi ma blags te ngus nas shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/_sngangs te mi dga' zhing rings par rings par drang srong chen po de la smras pa/_drang srong de ltar bshum mo blags te bshums pa dang /_shugs ring du 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/_/gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba'am 
[\[56a.4\]]cig mi gda' 'am/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du ngu ba yang ma lags/_'di la mi dge ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/_bdag nyid ngu bar bas so/_/
[\[56a.5\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te nas gzer la gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_
[\[56a.6\]]bram ze'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par bskor bar mi nus bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog 
[\[56a.7\]]mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba'i chos/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]chos de thos nas/_skye ba las yongs su ma grol ba rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[56b.2\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/_sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[56b.3\]]char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/_sems can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs thibs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni lam drang por mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/_sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang btson rar 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa 
[\[56b.4\]]rnams ni bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad par 'gyur/_sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /_rab rib dang /_ling tog gis mig ldongs pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/_sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug pa rnams la ni zug rngu 
[\[56b.5\]]'byin par 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_
[\[56b.6\]]de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol bar 'gyur zhing 'chi ba med pa la 
[\[56b.7\]]rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/_bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang /_bdag gi nad ma mchis pa 'di la yang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so/_/rgyal po 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[57a.2\]]dang ldan pa ste/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/_rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad 
[\[57a.3\]]grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor 'khril la g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_'phral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa ni kha ba 
[\[57a.4\]]dang dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang /_spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang /_tshems thags bzang ba dang /_tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa 
[\[57a.5\]]lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /_ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang /_'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /_dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang /_bdun mtho ba dang /_thal gong rgyas pa 
[\[57a.6\]]dang /_pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang /_bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa dang /_ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /_spu re re nas skyes 
[\[57a.7\]]pa dang /_yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang /_mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /_brla legs par zlum pa dang /_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang /_sor mo ring ba dang /_zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang /_zhabs kyi gong mtho 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ba dang /_phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam pa dang /_phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan la/_mu 
[\[57b.2\]]khyud dang bcas/_lte ba dang bcas pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no/_/
[\[57b.3\]]rgyal po chen po mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/_mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/_de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu 
[\[57b.4\]]don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/_gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang /_
[\[57b.5\]]sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang /_sen mo mdog snum pa dang /_sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /_sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang /_sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang /_rtsa mi mngon pa dang /_long bu mi mngon pa dang /_tshigs mi mngon pa dang /_zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[57b.6\]]zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni phyag gi ri mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang /_phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang /_phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang /_phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang /_
[\[57b.7\]]sgros bim pa ltar dmar ba dang /_sgra mi grag pa'i tshig dang /_ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang /_glang po che'i nga ro dang /_'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang /_snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_phyag ring ba dang /_sku'i na bza' gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sku 'jam pa dang /_bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang /_zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang /_rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang /_shin tu dpa' bar 
[\[58a.2\]]mdzes pa'i sku dang /_rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang /_pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya che la shin tu gang ba dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/_sku shin tu 'jam pa dang /_sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang /_sku 
[\[58a.3\]]rim gyis legs par grub pa dang /_lte ba zab pa dang /_lte ba ma yo ba dang /_lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang /_kun nas mdzes pa dang /_snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing /_rab rib ma mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan 
[\[58a.4\]]pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang /_seng ge'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /_khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /_ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang /_g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros 
[\[58a.5\]]dang /_dku zlum pa dang /_dku skabs phyin pa dang /_dku ma rnyongs pa dang /_rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba dang /_mdog gi nyes pa sngo ba'am/_gnag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni mche ba 
[\[58a.6\]]zlum pa dang /_mche ba rno ba dang /_mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang /_shangs legs par mtho ba dang /_spyan gsal ba dang /_spyan dri ma med pa dang /_'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang /_spyan ring ba dang /_spyan yangs pa dang /_ud pa la sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa 
[\[58a.7\]]lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang /_smin ma stug pa dang /_smin ma gnag pa dang /_smin ma rgyun chags pa dang /_smin ma rim gyis gzhol ba dang /_mkhur ba rgyas pa dang /_mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang /_sdang ba dang /_khro ba'i mdog med pa dang /_shin tu rig pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang /_dbu 
[\[58b.2\]]yongs su rgyas pa dang /_dbu skra gnag pa dang /_dbu skra mnyam pa dang /_dbu skra dri zhim pa dang /_dbu skra mi bshor ba dang /_dbu skra mi 'dzings pa dang /_dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang /_dbu skra lcang lor 'khril ba dang ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams 
[\[58b.3\]]cad grub pa de ni dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang /_sdong ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/_de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams 
[\[58b.4\]]cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyis/_gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' 
[\[58b.5\]]ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing /_/drang srong rnams kyis mchod gyur te/_/'jig rten kun gyi mchod rten pas/_/
[\[58b.6\]]bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po dang /_snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang bcas te/_kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/_gos bskon te bskor ba byas so/_/de nas drang srong chen po nag po 
[\[58b.7\]]gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mis byin khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe/_khyod song ste de'i 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bstan pa la rab tu byung shig dang /_de ni khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrog pa/_/lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul gnas pas mthong 
[\[59a.2\]]nas dga' mchog thob/_/'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyed sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci/_/bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/_/lha 'am 'on te lha min yang na nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya dga' dang 
[\[59a.3\]]mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci/_/lha yi mig gis phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas/_/phyis yangs ri mtsho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong /_/'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing /_/ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams 
[\[59a.4\]]su byi ru'i myu gu 'thon gyur la/_/shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bus brgyan gyur las/_/srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal/_/sa 'di thams cad mnyam zhing dri med lag mthil bzhin du snang ba dang /_/lha rnams 
[\[59a.5\]]dga' zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/_/klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen rmad 'byung 'phyo ba las/_/'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi 'byung gnas nges par 'byung /_/ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams ni bder 
[\[59a.6\]]ldan la/_/lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan par rgyu ba dang /_/ji ltar lha yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba grag pa las/_/srid pa gsum 'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi ltas su gdon mi za/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mig gis rnam 
[\[59a.7\]]bltas na/_/ser skya'i grong na rgyal po zas gtsang grong khyer dam pa yod pa der/_/mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong /_/mthong nas dga' mgu rangs shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur/_/de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ma lhan cig [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]dong /_/phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgor 'dug ste/_/zhabs 'bring srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas/_/sgo ba de la smras pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol/_/de mnyan myur du pho brang nang phyin 
[\[59b.2\]]rgyal po la ni de bsnyad pa/_/lha cig drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can zhig chab sgor mchis/_/drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi/_/rgyal po chen po nang du btang ngam mi btang bdag la bka' stsal gsol/_/de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos 
[\[59b.3\]]khyod song nang du bos zhes bsgo/_/drang srong nag pos bsgo ba'i tshig thos dga' mgu bde dang ldan par gyur/_/skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar/_/drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du mngon par dga'/_/rgyal po rgyal gyur sku 
[\[59b.4\]]tshe ring bsrung gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras/_/snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la 'dug_/rgyal pos gus par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs/_/khyod kyi sras bltam 
[\[59b.5\]]gzugs mchog pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid che dang ldan/_/mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis kun nas rgyan mnga' ba/_/rgyal po khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste/_/de slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yod ma mchis/_/legs 
[\[59b.6\]]so legs par byon te mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong bdag dga'o/_/mchog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal da ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyis/_/re zhig yud tsam gzhes dang 'dir ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa/_/skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs par 'gyur/_/
[\[59b.7\]]gang tshe kha lo sgyur mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i 'od mnga' de sad pa/_/de tshe rgyal pos 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang nyi las 'phags 'od pang blangs te/_/'di ltar drang srong lha mis mchod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan da gzigs shig_/drang srong nag pos de yi rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]lo'i mtshan can mthong /_/de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_/bdag nyid chen po bstan bcos mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsams shing bltas/_/des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyi mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/_/mgo 
[\[60a.2\]]lcogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong /_/stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'am sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur/_/shin tu mi dga' lus dang sems kyis mchi ma blags te shugs ring phyung /_/rgyal po mchog kyang sngangs par gyur 
[\[60a.3\]]nas bram ze ci slad bshums zhes smra/_/drang srong nag pos bdag gi don grub bgegs zhig ma gzigs sam/_drang srong ci slad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la mang bar gsungs/_/khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te/_/bdag 
[\[60a.4\]]la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur/_/bdag gis dga' ba thob pa'i yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de slad du/_/'di yi sku la mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dri med 
[\[60a.5\]]mnga' ba las/_/rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 'gyur yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor byon/_/'di ni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/drang srong lung bstan de 
[\[60a.6\]]thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur/_/de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/_/stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni lhas mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste/_/srid gsum kun gyi 'gro ba'i ded dpon mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[60a.7\]]drang srong dga' bas tsha bo de la smras pa nga yi gdams ngag nyon/_/gang tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo skor thos pa/_/de tshe myur du thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/drang srong dam pa de yis rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/_/'di 'dra'i sras 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]mnga' khyod kyi thob pa rgya chen legs par thob ces smras/_/'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mir bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur/_/drang srong mchog de ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya 
[\[60b.2\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po drug pa/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[60b.3\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_thos pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub can 
[\[60b.4\]]spyad pa legs par spyad pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/_sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/_brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par bgos pa/_sngon gyi 
[\[60b.5\]]rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas byung ba/_bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa/_rtul ba nges par byas pa dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/_dga' ba'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/_ye shes 
[\[60b.6\]]chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/_/bdud kyi stobs mthar 'byin pa/_stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po/_lha dang mis mchod pa/_mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/_bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_'byung ba'i bsam pa can/_skye 
[\[60b.7\]]ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/_legs par skye bas skyes pa/_'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa de/_bu ram shing pa'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/_de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]par 'tshang rgyas tshur shog_/bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba 
[\[61a.2\]]mthong ba dang /_de dag kyang nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang bkur sti byed par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'chi ba med pa
