[\[61a.3\]]'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel ba yang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po/_lha'i bu brgya stong 
[\[61a.4\]]phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par bkang ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_sgo bas rgyal po la gsol te/_rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[61a.5\]]phyin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal 
[\[61a.6\]]po chen po dgyes pa'i dam pas dgyes par mdzod cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang /_gzhon nus lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_
[\[61a.7\]]grags pa dang /_dpal gyi zil gyis non pa las na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]kyi lha'i bu mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /_rim gro chen po byas te/_de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltam pa/_/lha 
[\[61b.2\]]yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la smras/_/de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal pa bye mang shin tu dka'/_/tshur shog mi yi dbang po de la mchod du 'deng /_/rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/_/gtsug pud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha/_/stong phrag 
[\[61b.3\]]bcu gnyis tshang ba ser skya'i gnas mchog tu/_/myur du lhags nas rgyal po'i sgo yi drung na sdod/_/de dag rnams kyis sgo ba la ni yid 'ong smras/_/rgyal po'i pho brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol/_/chab sgo bas kyang tshig de mnyan nas nang du song /_/thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la 
[\[61b.4\]]'di skad smras/_/lhan cig rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe ring du srungs/_/bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag 'od can chab sgor mchis/_/rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan/_/zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od/_/rgyal po de dag gang du mchi yang grib mi 
[\[61b.5\]]gda'/_/sug pa 'dor yang gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur/_/dog sar rgyu ba bgyid kyang rdul ni yong mi ldang /_/skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms mi 'gyur/_/de dag lus kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsal/_/tshig kyang yid du mchis te mi la dpe ma mchis/_/zab cing 'jam 
[\[61b.6\]]mnyen snyan pa 'byung ba'i gnas/_/de dag mi ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid/_/me tog mchog phreng byug pa dar gyi lda ldi dag_/kun gyi lag na thogs nas gus dang bcas par sdod/_/rgyal po lha rnams de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha/_/blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i 
[\[61b.7\]]slad du mchis su nges/_/rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgar gyur nas/_/song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du gshegs zhes gyis/_/de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na/_/rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba ni mi la gang yang med/_/sgo bas thal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras/_/
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rgyal pos gnang gis khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol/_/lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yi rangs te/_/lha yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs/_/lha mchog de dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni/_/rgyal po stan las langs te thal mo 
[\[62a.2\]]sbyar byas nas/_/rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir/_/thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol/_/nga rgyal dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur/_/bdag cag ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol/_/khyod sras rnam dag 
[\[62a.3\]]sku mnga' bsod nams chen po bltam/_/shin tu legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal/_/gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur/_/mtshan bzang mtshan gyi cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal/_/de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang bar mdzod/_/sna 
[\[62a.4\]]tshogs mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa blta bar 'tshal/_/rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab dga'/_/gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba pang du blangs/_/lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen/_/thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di dag kun tu g.yos/_/lha mchog de 
[\[62a.5\]]dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni/_/zangs mdog dri med rnam dag gzi brjid ldan mthong nas/_/gtsug pud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par gyur/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta ba dpal can dang /_/'di 'dra'i 
[\[62a.6\]]bsod nams gzi brjid spyi gtsug mi mthong dang /_/mdzod spu nas ni rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las/_/bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub brnyes 'gyur gdon mi 'tshal/_/mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su/_/yang dag yon tan ji ltar don mthong de la 
[\[62a.7\]]bstod/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi dang nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i/_/sems can rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung /_/yongs rtog 'dod chags yul gyi gtsub mas bskyed pa yi/_/rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par/_/dpal khyod chos kyi sprin 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gyis stong gsum bkang nas ni/_/'chi med char gyis nyon mongs gdung ba zhi mdzad 'gyur/_/byams pa'i gsung mnga' thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung /_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong gsung du sgrog mdzad pa/_/stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba/_/
[\[62b.2\]]bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrogs/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags bcings bying srid pa'i rtser gnas pa/_/mu stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom/_/khyod kyi rgyu la brten dang stong pa'i chos thos nas/_/seng ges wa tshogs bzhin du de dag 
[\[62b.3\]]'byer bar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal te/_/kun tu byung ba skye bo nges par snang byed pa'i/_/ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od rig gzigs pa yis/_/'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po bsal bar gsol/_/gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 
[\[62b.4\]]'dra byung /_/lha dang mi rnams kyis ni rnyed pa rgya chen thob/_/rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen 'dis/_/ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni gtod par 'gyur/_/ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab nas/_/bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni/_
[\[62b.5\]]sangs rgyas sangs rgyas legs zhes de dag tshig rjod cing /_/lha tshogs de dag tshul du shis par mkha' las dong /_/bltam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi nub mo 
[\[62b.6\]]rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/_/rgyal po zas 
[\[62b.7\]]gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo/_/mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]mo nyi khri phul lo/_/blon po'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phul lo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe shAkya'i rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad 
[\[63a.2\]]ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyis de bas na grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig_/srang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_tshong 'dus dag 
[\[63a.3\]]ni mdzes par gyis shig_/bkra mi shis pa sgur po dang /_zhar ba dang /_'on pa dang /_lkugs pa dang /_dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig_/bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig_/bsod nams kyi rnga ni 
[\[63a.4\]]rdungs shig_/bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig_/grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par spud cig_/rol mo sil snyan dang pheg brdab pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag ni long zhing rdobs shig_/khams kyi rgyal po thams cad ni sogs shig_/tshong dpon dang /_khyim 
[\[63a.5\]]bdag dang /_blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor gyi mi dag ni gcig tu sdus shig_/bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig_/bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyen cig_/bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig_/lha khang rnams ni shin tu brgyan par gyis shig_/dge slong dag de nas rgyal 
[\[63a.6\]]pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang /_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shig_/legs so zhes skye dgu'i 
[\[63a.7\]]bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs de ltar mnyan te/_gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan to/_/de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe/_bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis sru mo la smras pa/_ma bdag gang du bkur/_smras pa/_bu lha khang du bkur ro/_/de 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas sru mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag btsas de tshe stong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur/_/brgya byin tshangs pa lha min lto 'phye chen po dang /_/nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dang gzhon nu yang /_/spyi bos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 
[\[63b.2\]]phyag 'tshal na/_/de ring ma yis gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/_/lha gzhan bdag gi gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis/_/lha rnams kun las bdag 'phags lha yi lha lags te/_/bdag 'dra'i lha yang ma mchis gong ma ga la mchis/_/'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyag 
[\[63b.3\]]tsam du bdag mchi'o/_/bdag gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthong na dgar 'gyur zhing /_/rim gro bkur sti shin tu che bar bgyid 'gyur la/_/lha mis 'di ni lha yi lha zhes rig par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de ltar grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[63b.4\]]nas/_bkra shis thams cad bshams te rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu pang du blangs nas/_bram ze dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_khams kyi rgyal po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor gyi mi dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye 
[\[63b.5\]]dus bskor te/_srang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_tshong 'dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni bdugs/_me tog sil ma ni gtor/_rta dang glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_rkang thang gi bun long ni cher gyur/_gdugs dang 
[\[63b.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ni bsgreng /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung ste/_song bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te/_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char phab ste/_sil snyan 
[\[63b.7\]]gyi sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khang du phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der rkang pa 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang /_/de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/_gu lang dang /_skem byed dang /_lus ngan dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[64a.2\]]la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong ni kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang /_ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to/_/ser skya'i 
[\[64a.3\]]gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha'i sil snyan brgya stong du ma dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/lha gang dag gi gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas/_
[\[64a.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to/_/ri rgyal ri mchog ri rab nam yang yungs kar 'bru la phyag mi 'tshal/_/rgya mtsho klu rje gnas ni nam yang ba rjes chu la phyag mi 'tshal/_/nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal/_/bsod nams shes rab rigs byung 
[\[64a.5\]]legs ldan lha rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bzhes/_/yungs 'bru ba rjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gyur pa ni/_/stong gsum 'di na lha mi gang yang rung ste nga rgyal gnas pa lags/_/ri rab rgya mtsho nyi zla 'dra ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste/_/de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal 
[\[64a.6\]]ba ni mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lha khang du khyer 
[\[64a.7\]]ba'i tshe btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni de yin/_rgyu ni de yin no/_/lha khang du khyer ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don 'char po zhes bya ba 'char 'gro'i pha/_bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/_skar ma me 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bzhi 'das nas nag pa la bab pa'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis byed du chug shig_/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_
[\[64b.2\]]shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis/_rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/_'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang /_rkang pa'i rgyan dag dang /_mgo'i rgyan dag dang /_mgul gyi rgyan dag dang /_sor gdub dag dang /_rna rgyan dag dang /_dpung rgyan dag dang /_gser gyi ska rags dag dang 
[\[64b.3\]]gser skud dag dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dag dang /_rin po che'i dra ba dag dang /_lham rin po ches spras pa dag dang /_do shal rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag dang /_gdu bu rgyan can dag dang /_mgul gdub dag dang /_cod pan dag kyang byed du bcug ste zin nas/_
[\[64b.4\]]skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/_shAkya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha gzhon nu brgyan du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed kyis gzhon nu la brgyan pa dang /_mchod pa byas pas chog gis/_ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad 
[\[64b.5\]]byed du bcug go/_/smras pa/_bdag cag gi rgyan 'di dag gzhon nu'i sku la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig gdags su gsol/_de ltar gnang na bdag cag gis sug las bgyis pa yang don mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe nam langs te nyi ma shar ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[64b.6\]]skyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba der zhugs so/_/de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mIs byang chub sems dpa' pang du blangs so/_/bud med brgyad khris kyang byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/bu mo stong phrag bcus byang 
[\[64b.7\]]chub sems dpa' bsu ste/_gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/bram ze lnga stong yang lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas shAkya'i rgyal po 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyed cig byas pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags te/_de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas lam mer ma gyur/_lhan ner ma gyur/_lhang nger ma gyur 
[\[65a.2\]]te/_'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsa'i yug bzhag na lam mer mi rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du rgyan de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis phog na lam mer mi rung /_lhan ner mi rung /_lhang nger mi rung ngo /_/
[\[65a.3\]]de bzhin du rgyan gyi rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la btags pa de dang de dag mog mog por gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsa'i yug bzhag pa bzhin no/_/de'i tshe skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa des lus 
[\[65a.4\]]chen po bstan nas mdun du 'dug ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_stong gsum sa 'di grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa kun/_/gal te gser gyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang /_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gzegs 
[\[65a.5\]]gcig gis zil rlag ste/_/gser gzhan dag ni dpal dang bral zhing gsal mi 'gyur/_/sa 'di mtha' dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser khebs kyang /_/'dren pa dpal rgyas spu khung 'od phyung zil gyis non/_/mi snang mi gsal mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing /_/bde gshegs 
[\[65a.6\]]skyob pa'i drung na snag tsa bzhin du 'gyur/_/yon tan brgyas gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan/_/de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min shin tu dri med sku/_/nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od kyang dpa' stug mdun mi gsal/_/gang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras 
[\[65a.7\]]bus mtshan spras pa/_/de la gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyan phal ci zhig dgos/_/rgyan rnams phrol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzad ma gtse shig_/blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi bzhed/_/'dun pa de ni rgyal khab sras dang lhan cig btsas/_/dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]'bangs de stsol/_/shAkya'i rigs ni rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas/_/shAkya dag ni yid dga' mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur/_/lha mo des de skad ces smras nas/_lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/rgyan gyi le'u ste dgu 
[\[65b.2\]]pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de ya zad skyes pa dang /_bkra shis brgya stong byas nas khye'u stong phrag bcu dang /_bu mo stong phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te yi ge'i grwar 'jug par byas so/_/bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang bas 
[\[65b.3\]]gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu dang /_gser dngul dang /_dbyig gis gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/_skyer skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang dang /_grong bar dang /_tshong 'dus kyi phyogs gang yin pa dag tu gtor to/_/mngon par byin no/_/sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad 
[\[65b.4\]]kyi sgra yang phyung zhing me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par bab po/_/stegs bu dang /_sgo khang dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gi steng nas/_bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag_/byang chub sems 
[\[65b.5\]]dpa' la lta zhing me tog dag 'thor bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo stong phrag brgyad ni rgyan rnams kyis lhug lhug por brgyan te/_rin po che bzang byed thogs nas lam 'phyag cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong bar gyur to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[65b.6\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi bre bar gyur to/_/shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong 
[\[65b.7\]]bar gyur te/_bkod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod de/_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]khas bub tu sgyel to/_/de ltar 'gyel ba dang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu yan lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas/_lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bslang ngo /_/bslangs nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang skye bo phal po che de 
[\[66a.2\]]dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa/_/grangs dang yi ge rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang /_/'jig rten bzo yi sbyor ba tshad med mang po dag_/bskal pa bye mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslabs/_/'on kyang skye bo'i rjes su 'thun pa 
[\[66a.3\]]tsam mdzad de/_/byis pa mang po theg pa mchog la smin mdzad dang /_/sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi med dgod pa'i phyir/_/shin tu lobs pa'ang bslab phyir yi ge'i grwar zhugs so/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i bden bzhi lam gyi tshul mkhyen cing /_/rgyu la brten nas ji ltar 'byung ba 
[\[66a.4\]]de la'ang mkhas/_/ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad bsil 'gyur de tshul yang /_/mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos tsam lta cis mi mkhyen/_/'jig rten gsum na 'di yi slob dpon gong na med/_/lha dang mir bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste/_/bskal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'dis 
[\[66a.5\]]bslabs pa'i/_/yi ge de dag ming yang khyed kyis shes mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba/_/skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa 'dis mkhyen te/_/gzugs med bltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab mkhas na/_/yi ge gzugs yod bltar snang dag 
[\[66a.6\]]lta smos ci dgos/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas ma ma dang bran mo'i 'khor bkod de/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa shAkya gzhan ni phyir dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub 
[\[66a.7\]]sems dpa' tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa'i yi ge'i shing lha'i tshon gyis byugs pa/_gser gyi yang mig gis btags pa/_mtha' ma nor bu rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te/_slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mkhan pos bdag 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]la yi ge gang zhig bslab/_tshangs pa'i yi ge'am/_kha ro sti'i yi ge'am/_pad ma'i snying po'i yi ge'am/_ang ga'i yi ge'am/_mang ga'i yi ge'am/_yul ma ga d+hA'i yi ge'am/_bkra shis pa'i yi ge'am/_sor mo pa'i yi ge'am/_sha ka ni'i yi ge'am/_ya ba na'i 
[\[66b.2\]]yi ge'am/_bag le ba'i yi ge'am/_pa ru sha'i yi ge'am/_'gro lding ba'i yi ge'am/_kir ta'i yi ge'am/_lho phyogs pa'i yi ge'am/_drag shul can gyi yi ge'am/_grangs kyi yi ge'am/_spyi'u tshugs pa'i yi ge'am/_rjes su 'thun pa'i yi ge'am/_bru sha'i yi ge 
[\[66b.3\]]'am/_ka sha'i yi ge'am/_rgya'i yi ge'am/_phu na'i yi ge'am/_hu na'i yi ge'am/_yi ge 'bring dang /_rgyas par bri ba'i yi ge'am/_rgyal gyi yi ge'am/_lha'i yi ge'am/_klu'i yi ge'am/_gnod sbyin gyi yi ge'am/_dri za'i yi ge'am/_mi 'am ci'i yi ge'am/_
[\[66b.4\]]lto 'phye chen po'i yi ge'am/_lha ma yin gyi yi ge'am/_nam mkha' lding gi yi ge'am/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 'khor lo ba'i yi ge'am/_khwa skad shes pa'i yi ge'am/_sa bla'i lha'i yi ge'am/_bar snang gi lha'i yi ge'am/_nub kyi ba glang spyod kyi yi ge'am/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi 
[\[66b.5\]]ge'am/_shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge'am/_gdeg pa'i yi ge'am/_gzhag pa'i yi ge'am/_bsnan pa'i yi ge'am/_rgya mtsho'i yi ge'am/_rdo rje'i yi ge'am/_spring yig dang /_lan gyi yi ge'am/_rnam 'thor gyi yi ge'am/[ {]rings [,]ring [}]med kyi yi ge'am/_
[\[66b.6\]]bstan bcos bskor ba'i yi ge'am/_rtsis bskor ba'i yi ge'am/_gdeg pa bskor ba'i yi ge'am/_gzhag pa bskor ba'i yi ge'am/_rkang pas bris pa'i yi ge'am/_tshig lan lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi yi ge'am/_tshig gi mtshams bcur brgyud pa'i 
[\[66b.7\]]bar gyi yi ge'am/_bla thabs su bsnan pa'i yi ge'am/_sgra thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge'am/_rig pa dang 'thun pa'i yi ge'am/_rnam par 'dres pa'i yi ge'am/_drang srong gi dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge'am/_lha'i nges pa'i yi ge'am/_sa blta ba'i yi ge'am/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]nam mkha' blta ba'i yi ge'am/_sman thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i yi ge'am/_snying po thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge'am/_'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sdud pa'i yi ge'am/_kye slob dpon yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang nas bdag la gang 
[\[67a.2\]]bslab/_de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen ngo mtshar du gyur nas bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung ste/_nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_rgyags pa med par byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che/_/bstan bcos kun las bslabs 
[\[67a.3\]]gyur kyang /_/'jig rten 'jig rten rjes bsnyag phyir/_/yi ge'i grwar ni byon par gyur/_/yi ge gang gi ming dag kyang /_/bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa/_/de la 'di la byang gyur kyang /_/yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to/_/'di yi zhal ni mthong mod kyi/_/spyi gtsug 'phags pa bltar 
[\[67a.4\]]mi snang /_/yi ge'i shes rab mthar phyin na/_/bdag gis 'di go ji ltar bslab/_/lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni/_/lha rnams kun gyi mchog mkhas pa/_/khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med/_/'jig rten gang zag do zla med/_/bdag kyang 'di nyid mthu yis na/_/shes rab thabs kyi khyad 
[\[67a.5\]]par gyis/_/'jig rten kun kyi dpung gnyen po/_/lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya/_/dge slong dag de ltar byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob cing gang gi tshe/_a zhes brjod pa 
[\[67a.6\]]de'i tshe/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sgra byung ngo /_A zhes brjod pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/i zhes brjod pa dang dbang po shin tu yangs pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/I zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni yams kyi nad mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/u zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni 'tshe 
[\[67a.7\]]ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/U zhes brjod pa dang 'gro ba ni dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/e zhes brjod pa dang /_nyes pa ni btsal ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ai zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/o zhes brjod pa dang chu bo 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]las rgal ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/au zhes brjod pa dang rdzub pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/aM zhes brjod pa dang bdag gi ba mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/aHzhes brjod pa dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ka zhes brjod pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/kha zhes 
[\[67b.2\]]brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ga zhes brjod pa dang chos zab ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/g+ha zhes brjod pa dang ma rig pa dang /_gti mug gi mun pa dang ling thog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/nga zhes brjod pa dang yan lag rnam par 
[\[67b.3\]]dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/tsa zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgra byung ngo /_/tsha zhes brjod pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/dza zhes brjod pa dang rga shi las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/dz+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can 
[\[67b.4\]]gyi dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/nya zhes brjod pa dang shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/Ta zhes brjod pa dang lam shin tu chad pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/Tha zhes brjod pa dang dri ba bzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/Da zhes brjod pa dang dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/D+ha zhes brjod 
[\[67b.5\]]pa dang yul mi gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/Na zhes brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa ni phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ta zhes brjod pa dang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/tha zhes brjod pa dang mthu stobs dang shugs dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/da zhes brjod pa dang sbyin 
[\[67b.6\]]pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_nges pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/d+ha zhes brjod pa dang 'phags pa rnams kyi nor ni rnam pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/na zhes brjod pa dang ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/pa zhes brjod pa dang don dam pa'i sgra byung 
[\[67b.7\]]ngo /_/pha zhes brjod pa dang 'bras bu rnyed pa mngon du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ba zhes brjod pa dang bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/b+ha zhes brjod pa dang srid pa 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/ma zhes brjod pa dang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa zhi bar bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ya zhes brjod pa dang 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ra zhes brjod pa dang dga' ba la dga' ba med pa'i don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/la zhes brjod pa dang 'khri shing chad pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/wa zhes brjod pa dang theg pa mchog gi sgra byung ngo /_/sha zhes 
[\[68a.2\]]brjod pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra byung ngo /_/Sha zhes brjod pa dang skye mched drug gzhom zhing mngon par shes pa drug dang ye shes thob pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/sa zhes brjod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/ha zhes brjod pa 
[\[68a.3\]]dang nyon mongs pa bcom zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/k+Sha zhes brjod pa dang yi ge'i mthar phyin te/_chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/de ltar byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa 
[\[68a.4\]]chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byung bar gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwa na 'dug pa'i tshe byis pa sum khri nyis stong rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lobs par gyur kyang yi ge'i grwar 'jug 
[\[68a.5\]]pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de yin no/_/yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//dge slong dag gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de gzhon nu gzhan dag dang zhang blon gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu zhing pa'i grong lta zhing dong ste/_
[\[68a.6\]]grong bltas nas zhing blas kyi mtha'i skyed mos tshal zhig tu phyin to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par pha zad 'khyam zhing song song ba dang /_'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas 
[\[68a.7\]]te 'dug go/_/'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rtog pa 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas 
[\[68b.2\]]shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug 
[\[68b.3\]]bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de'i tshe phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga yod pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nam 
[\[68b.4\]]mkha' las dong ba lnga zhig lho phyogs nas byang phyogs logs su dong dong ba las de dag tshal stug po de'i steng du phyin pa dang /_phyir phul ba ltar 'dong ma nus nas/_de dag mi dga' zhing ba spu g.yos te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/bdag cag 'di na ri rab nor bu rdo rje brtsegs ri shin 
[\[68b.5\]]tu rngams stug pa yang thal phyung ste/_/glang po a mra'i shing rlon yal gas gzings pa mang po bcom nas 'gro bzhin dong dong la/_/bdag cag 'di na lha yi khyim na'ang thogs med gnod sbyin dri za'i khyim steng nam mkhar gnas gnas na/_/tshal stug 'dir phyin nas ni sgyid lug gyur pa su 
[\[68b.6\]]yi mthu zhig gis na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur/_/de nas tshal stug po de na lha mo zhig gnas pa des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs byung shAkya'i rgyal sras nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'od/_/'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa zla zhal pad 
[\[68b.7\]]ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta bur rab mdzes pa/_/lha dang klu dbang gnod sbyin dri zas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan dgongs shing tshal stug 'di na bzhugs/_/srid pa bye ba brgya dag tu ni bsod nams spel ba de yi mthu yis rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go/_/de nas de dag gis 'og logs su 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bltas pa dang /_/gzhon nu zhig dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong nas 'di dag 'di snyam du su zhig 'di ltar gnas/_nor gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu'am cig ma yin nam/_'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud lta'am/_yang na lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/_'on 
[\[69a.2\]]te dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'am/_yang na gu lang ngam/_grul bum gyi bdag po'am/_'on te spro ba chen po dang ldan pa nag po'am/_'on te lha'i bu zla ba'am/_'on te 'od zer stong dang ldan pa'i nyi ma'am/_'on te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam/_su zhig snyam mo/_/de'i tshe 
[\[69a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/gzhon nu 'di ni rnam thos bu yi gzugs las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas na/_/'di ni sgra gcan yin nam 'on te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam nyi zla'i gzugs/_/'dod mchog dbang po'i gzugs sam gu lang gzugs sam 'on te 
[\[69a.4\]]nag po'i gzugs yin nam/_/yang na 'di ni dpal ldan yan lag mtshan spras sdig med sangs rgyas 'gyur ba zhig_/de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnam thos bu dang mig stong bdog la dpal ni gang yod gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[69a.5\]]bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang /_/mi mjed bdag po tshangs dang gza' rnams la yang dpal ni gang yod pa/_/dpal de shAkya'i sras po 'di drung phyin na gang gi char mi phod/_/de nas drang srong de dag gis lha mo de'i tshig thos nas sa la babs pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[69a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing /_me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba mthong nas/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' la sems shing tshigs su bcad pas bstod de/_de la gcig gis smras pa/_'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs pa/_/mtsho 'di rab tu byung 
[\[69a.7\]]gyur te/_/gang gis 'jig rten sim 'gyur ba'i/_/chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/_/yang gcig gis smras pa/_mi shes rab rib 'jig rten du/_/sgron ma 'di ni rab tu byung /_/gang gis 'gro ba snang 'gyur ba'i/_/chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/_/yang gcig gis smras 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]pa/_mya ngan rgya mtsho 'dal ba la/_/gru yi dam pa 'di byung ste/_/gang gis 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur ba'i/_/chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/_yang gcig gis smras pa/_nyon mongs 'ching bas bcings pa la/_/'grol bar mdzad pa 'di byung ste/_/gang gis 'gro ba 'grol 
[\[69b.2\]]'gyur ba'i/_/chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/_/yang gcig gis smras pa/_rga dang nad kyis gzir ba la/_/sman pa dam pa 'di byung ste/_/gang gis rga shi thar bya ba'i/_/chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur/_/de nas drang srong de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[69b.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' las dong ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang byang chub sems dpa' mi mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' med pas mi dga' ste/_des smras pa/_gzhon nu de mi snang na gar song /_de'i tshe skye bo phal po che 
[\[69b.4\]]gzhon nu tshol du dong dong ba dang /_de'i tshe blon po gcig cig gis byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma ni yol na/_'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus 
[\[69b.5\]]mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rings shing myur ba myur ba'i gzugs kyis/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal po gzhon 
[\[69b.6\]]nu de la gzigs/_/'dzam bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad/_/brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du/_/gzi brjid dpal gyis rab tu mdzes/_/zhugs shing gang gi grib ma la/_/mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i/_/grib ma des ni de ma btang /_/skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad 
[\[69b.7\]]la sgrib/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/ri yi spo la me 'bar 'dra ba ste/_/zla ba skar ma'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing /_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]gzi brjid sgron 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na/_/nga yi lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur/_/de skad ces smras nas/_des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/thub pa gang tshe bltam pa dang /_/gang tshe 'od ldan bsam 
[\[70a.2\]]gtan mdzad/_/'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su/_/mgon po khyod zhabs phyag 'tshal lo/_/de'i tshe byis pa khre'u thogs pa dag ca co'i sgra 'byin par gyur nas/_de dag la blon po dag gis sgra ma che sgra ma che zhes byas pa dang /_de dag ci zhig nongs zhes zer ro/_/blon po dag gis smras 
[\[70a.3\]]pa/_rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan bzang po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang ba mnga' ba 'di ri ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang /_shing gi grib ma de ma yol zhing sgrib par gnas so/_/de 
[\[70a.4\]]la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dpyid 'das dbyar gyi dus bab dbyar zla ra ba la/_/me tog rgyas shing me tog yal gas khebs gyur te/_/khrung khrung rma bya ne tso ri skegs skad 'byin pa/_/shAkya'i bu dag phal cher mngon du 'dong bar gyur/_/'dun pa can gyis smras pa/_gzhon nu nags tshal 
[\[70a.5\]]dag ni gzigs pa mdzad slad du/_/byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor te gshegs pa'i rigs/_/bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi/_/bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs rnams sbron du mchi/_/nyi ma'i gung la sems can rnam par dag pa de/_/byis pa lnga brgya 
[\[70a.6\]]dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu/_/yab la ma gsol yum la ma gsol ma tshor bar/_/de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du song /_/rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gi grong de na/_/'dzam bu'i sdong chen yal ga mang po rgyas yod pa/_/gzhon nus mthong na nyam thag sdug bsngal phog 
[\[70a.7\]]gyur te/_/'dus byas ci rung sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed/_/dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'dzam bu'i grib mar song /_/rtswa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni/_/skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus bsrang bsam gtan bzhi/_/dge ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bsam gtan byed/_/drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dong dong na/_/'dzam bu'i shing gi steng du phyin nas 'dong ma nus/_/de dag thogs nas nga rgyal dregs pa spang bya zhing /_/de dag thams cad 'thun par lhan cig lta bar byed/_/bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de bzhin 'khor yug dag_/
[\[70b.2\]]thal phyung thags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na/_/bdag cag de ring 'dzam bu'i shing ljon 'di las ni/_/'da' bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod/_/babs te sa steng 'dug nas 'dzam bu'i shing drung na/_/shAkya'i bu pho byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can/_/'dzam 
[\[70b.3\]]gling gser gyi 'od 'phro 'dra ba 'od zer ldan/_/skyil mo krung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong /_/de dag rmad gyur spyi bor sor bcu thal sbyar te/_/thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba shin tu bde mdzad legs par bltam pa legs/_/myur du 
[\[70b.4\]]rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsir sems can thul/_/sdong po mchog ni pad ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud/_/gdugs yol gyur kyang grib mas bde bar gshegs mi gtong /_/lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa thal sbyar nas/_/des par byas pa de yi rkang par phyag kyang 'tshal/_/zas gtsang 
[\[70b.5\]]rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs tshol zhing /_/nga'i bu gzhon nu de ni gang du song zhes rmed/_/sru mos smras pa bdag gis btsal kyang ma rnyed na/_/gzhon nu de ni gar bzhud rgyal pos rma bar gsol/_/zas gtsang rgyal pos nyung rum dag la rings par rmas/_/nga yi gzhon nu 'di nas 
[\[70b.6\]]byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes/_/sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang rmas/_/lha cig khyod gson mchog de zhing pa'i grong du bzhud/_/de ni rings par shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu/_/byung nas dpal zhugs gyur pa'i zhing pa'i grong du bltas/_/ji ltar nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[70b.7\]]shar ba ltar/_/de ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong /_/cod pan ral gri lham dag pha zad phog phud de/_/mgo bor sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag kyang 'tshal/_/drang srong bdag nyid chen po legs par yang dag smra/_/gzhon nu byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]nges/_/rab tu dad lha brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang /_/de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang /_/bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong /_/bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyang skyed/_/des ni stong gsum ma lus sa 
[\[71a.2\]]rnams rab bskyod nas/_/dran dang shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs gyur te/_/mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs pa'i tshig brjod pa/_/yab cig zhing blas thong la gzhan las tshol ma mdzad/_/gal te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis gser char dbab/_/de ste na bza' 
[\[71a.3\]]'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul/_/'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab/_/mi dbang khyod kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor/_/yab dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas/_/skad cig de la de slar grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/_/'gro dang 'thun pa tsam du 
[\[71a.4\]]grong khyer der gnas kyi/_/sems can rnam dag mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan/_/zhing ba'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bdun pa/_dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya 
[\[71a.5\]]zad skyes pa dang /_dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/_shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs kha cig gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 
[\[71a.6\]]'di ni bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang /_blo nges pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos 'di skad du bstan te/_gzhon nu 'di gal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/ji ste mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor 
[\[71a.7\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/_'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang bdun no/_/de la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba 'byung ngo /_/de gnod par bya ba dang /_mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun pas sa'i dkyil 
[\[71b.2\]]'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/_gcig pu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_dgyes pa la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[71b.3\]]gyur pa dang bdag cag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gdung yang mi 'chad/_khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang mi snyan par mi brjod cing rim gror bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/_gal te de ltar bya na de'i phyir gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i bu mo gang zhig 
[\[71b.4\]]yod khyed kyis ltos shig_/de'i tshe shAkya lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun no/_/bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun no zhes zer ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che ba yin gyis/_gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 
[\[71b.5\]]'dod ces dri bar bya'o zhes/_de dag kun kyang 'dus te/_gzhon nu la dngos po de brjod do/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_da ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/_'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis mtha' yas rig_/thab 
[\[71b.6\]]mo khon bcas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa/_/'jigs byed dug gi lo ma 'dra ba ste/_/me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang 'dra/_/'dod pa'i yon tan bdag 'dod ma yin te/_/bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bas zhi sems su/_/bdag ni mi smra 
[\[71b.7\]]nags tshal gnas par bya/_/yang des brtags nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas te/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas/_snying rje chen po bskyed de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'dam dang lcag lcig khrod nas pad ma rnam par 'phel/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob/_/gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mchog thob gyur pa/_/de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul/_/sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba/_/de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras dang 
[\[72a.2\]]slas kyang bsten/_/'on kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams/_/bdag kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya/_/gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa/_/bud med phal pa gang yang bdag gi tshul 'thun min/_/gang zhig bdag gi sems ni 
[\[72a.3\]]mngon par dga' byed cing /_/bag yod gzugs dang na tshod rus rigs dag pa 'os/_/des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yi ger bris/_/'di 'dra'i bu mo mchis na bdag la bka' stsol cig_/skye bo phal pa ma bsdams bdag la mkho ma lags/_/yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan 
[\[72a.4\]]mchis na bdag stsol cig_/dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi dregs dang bral/_/phu nu ma la byams ltar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing /_/gtong la dga' ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can/_/de 'dra'i bu mo mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig_/gang la nga rgyal 
[\[72a.5\]]khengs dang zhe sdang ma mchis shing /_/g.yo dang phrag dog sgyu spangs drang ba'i ngang tshul can/_/rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan la chags dang bral/_/bdag gi khyos ni chog 'tshal rtag sdom bag mchis la/_/rgyags pa ma mchis mi g.yeng zung thub tshul 'chang zhing /_/nga 
[\[72a.6\]]rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral bas bran mo bzhin/_/sgra dri ro la ma chags chang la ma chags te/_/'dod bral brnab sems ma mchis rang gi nor gyis 'tshal/_/bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba ma lags pa/_/ngo tsha'i gos 'tshal rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas/_/
[\[72a.7\]]lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos po rab dag pa/_/gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mang nga rgyal glen bral zhing /_/rtog dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de/_/gyos sgyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan/_/bran dang 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bran mo kun la'ang bdag bzhin byams srel ba/_/smad 'tshong bzhin du bstan bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas/_/slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du mal nas ldang bgyid pa/_/byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis pa/_/de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig_/
[\[72b.2\]]dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas/_mdun na 'don la smras pa/_bram ze chen po khyod ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la/_khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/_bu mo dag ltos la gang la yang rung ste yon tan de lta bu dag yod na/_
[\[72b.3\]]rgyal rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_bram ze'i bu mo yang rung /_rje'u rigs kyi bu mo yang rung /_dmangs rigs kyi bu mo yang rung gis/_bu mo de dag 'dir 'on cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di ni rigs don du gnyer ba ma yin rus don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/_gzhon nu 'di ni yon tan don du gnyer ba yin 
[\[72b.4\]]no/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/rgyal rigs bram ze'i bu mo dang /_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin te/_/su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i/_/bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig_/nga yi bu 'di rigs dag dang /_/rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin/_/yon tan bden pa 
[\[72b.5\]]chos kyi rnams/_/de la 'di yi yid dga' 'o/_/dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des tshigs su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de khyer te/_ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song nas/_khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du song song ba las/_yon 
[\[72b.6\]]tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/_de nas rim gyis shAkya lag na be con can gyi khyim du phyin nas/_des bltas na/_bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug la yid du 'ong ba/_mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_ha cang yang mi ring ba/_ha cang yang mi thung ba/_ha cang yang 
[\[72b.7\]]mi sbom pa/_ha cang yang mi skem pa/_ha cang yang mi dkar ba/_ha cang yang mi gnag pa/_gzod ma dar la bab pa/_bud med rin po che ltar snang ba zhig mthong ba dang /_bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze chen po khyod la 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dgos pa ci zhig mchis/_bram ze mdun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur cing /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can/_/de yis bud med rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris/_/su la 
[\[73a.2\]]yon tan 'di yod de yi chung mar 'os/_/zhes smras te/_des de la yi ge de byin no/_/de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de bklags nas/_bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/_bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bram ze yon tan 'di dag bdag la kun tshang 
[\[73a.3\]]gis/_/des pa'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim thab bo/_/gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi bshol ma mdzad gsungs/_/brgya la skye bo phal dang bzhugs par 'gyur yang gda'/_/de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song ste don de brjod do/_/rgyal po 
[\[73a.4\]]chen po bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i bu mo mthong ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_su la de lta bu zhig yod/_smras pa/_lha shAkya lag na be con can la bu mo de lta bu zhig mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che zhing bzang 
[\[73a.5\]]ba la mos pa yin la/_/bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang /_bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyis/_bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig byas te/_gzhon nu 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/_/bu mo de dag gi nang nas gang la 
[\[73a.6\]]gzhon nu mig mngon par chags par gyur pa de/_gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra 
[\[73a.7\]]bsgrags te/_deng nas zhag bdun na kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/_yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag kyang bu mo dag la sbyin pa byed kyis/_bu mo thams cad kyang 'dun khang du shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/dge slong dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]dpa' 'dun khang du song ste/_seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas bya ra ba dag bkod nas/_gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mig chags pa de nga la gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/dge slong dag de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de na bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de 
[\[73b.2\]]dag thams cad 'dun khang ga la ba de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blangs pa'i phyir der dong ngo /_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag la yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no/_/
[\[73b.3\]]de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas/_yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba myur bar phyir dong ngo /_/de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba/_bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_
[\[73b.4\]]'dun khang ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_mig mi 'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag byin zin par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub 
[\[73b.5\]]sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas 'dzum dmul te byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu bdag gis khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/_bdag la de ltar dngan sdang mdzad/_smras pa/_ngas ni khyod la dngan sdang byas pa'ang med na/_khyod ni shin tu 'phyis te 'ongs so zhes 
[\[73b.6\]]smras nas des sor gdub srang brgya stong du ma ri ba phud de de la byin no/_/bu mo des smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod la bdag gis 'di lta zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/_smras pa/_'o na rgyan gzhan dang gzhan dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod khyer cig_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis 
[\[73b.7\]]par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/_rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so/_/zhes smras nas bu mo de song ngo /_/de nas bya ra bar bkod pa'i mi de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song nas/_lo rgyus de dag smos te smras pa/_lha shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bgyi ba de la 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gzhon nu spyan chags par gyur la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig tu bka' mchid kyang bgyis so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi gan du bram ze mdun na 'don pho nyar btang ste/_khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig ces spring 
[\[74a.2\]]ngo /_/lag na be con can gyis smras pa/_'phags pa gzhon nu de ni pho brang na skyid de bar 'khrungs pa lags la/_bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/_sgyu rtsal shes pa la bu mo gtong gi_/sgyu rtsal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/_gzhon nu de ni sgyu 
[\[74a.3\]]rtsal shes pa yang ma lags la/_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phong dang /_stobs dang /_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyi tshul shes pa yang ma lags na/_bdag gis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gtang /_tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang /_de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du 
[\[74a.4\]]sems te/_nga la des 'di dang lan gnyis su bsngos te/_gang gi tshe ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag_/gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa de'i tshe yang /_ci nged lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/_da'ang 'di skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[74a.5\]]chub sems dpas kyang gtam de thos nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu de dri bas ci zhig bya/_gzhon nus smras pa/_lha de ni bka' mi 
[\[74a.6\]]stsal du mi rung ngo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dris pa dang /_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_lha grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'gran 
[\[74a.7\]]par nus pa 'ga' mchis sam/_de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bgad nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/_smras pa/_lha de ni bdag gis legs par rngo thog go/_/de bas na sgyu rtsal 'tshal ba rnams 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]kun kyang bsog tu gsol/_de dag gi mdun du bdag gis/_sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/_deng nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rang gi sgyu rtsal ston gyis/_der sgyu rtsal shes pa thams 
[\[74b.2\]]cad shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam tshogs par gyur to/_/de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste/_'dir ral gri'i thabs dang 'phong dang /_stobs dang /_gyad kyi 'dzin 
[\[74b.3\]]stangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces dam bcas nas/_de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo /_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po bong shin tu che ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa gzhon nu lha sbyin gyis mthong nas phrag dog dang /_
[\[74b.4\]]shAkya'i nga rgyal dang /_stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/_des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna nas bzung ste/_lag pa g.yas pas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas bsad par gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung ba dang /_des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi 
[\[74b.5\]]sgor bsad pa mthong nas/_sus bsad ces dris pa dang /_smras pa/_lha sbyin gyis bsad do/_/smras pa/_lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes/_des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/_grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing 
[\[74b.6\]]rta la zhon te byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sus bsad ces dris pa dang /_smras pa/_lha sbyin gyis bsad do/_/smras pa/_lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor zhes dris pa dang 
[\[74b.7\]]smras pa/_mdzes dga' bos bor ro/_/smras pa/_mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas pa yang legs na/_sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/_rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mi zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/_de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta la 'dug 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bzhin du rkang pa ya gcig sa la brkyang ste/_rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po de blangs te/_ra ba bdun rim dang 'obs bdun rim 'das nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tsam du 'phangs so/_/glang po de phyogs gang du lhung ba'i phyogs de shong chen po zhig tu gyur 
[\[75a.2\]]nas/_da ltar glang po'i shong zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong mang po e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la/_gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/
[\[75a.3\]]glang po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa/_/zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs/_/ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs 'das nas/_/grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/_/mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon mi zar/_/nga rgyal stobs kyis mtho ba'i lus can rnams/_/
[\[75a.4\]]'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du/_/shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas 'thon nas/_sa'i phyogs gang du shAkya gzhon nu dag sgyu rtsal ston pa der dong ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_shAkya rgan rabs rgan 
[\[75a.5\]]rabs dag dang /_skye bo phal po che dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_shAkya gzhon nu gzhan dag gi sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de sa'i phyogs der dong ngo /_/de nas thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga shes pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpar yi ge 
[\[75a.6\]]'gran to/_/de'i tshe shAkya de dag gis slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste/_gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas/_yi ge 'bru'am/_yi ge'i sna grangs kyi mthar phyin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag phye shig_/de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen 
[\[75a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' yi ge la mkhas pa mngon du mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/mi yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam/_/lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam/_/'jig rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang /_/de la sems can dag pa 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]'dis mthar phyin/_/mi yi zla ba 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'i/_/yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi/_/ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yong mi shes/_/'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur/_/shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags 
[\[75b.2\]]pa lta'ang 'phags par chug ste/_gzhon nu 'di grangs kyis shes pa la khyad par ci yod 'gran par bya'o/_/de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces bya ba rtsis pa chen po byed pa bgrang ba dang /_rtsis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dpang du bzhag ste/_gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas grangs 
[\[75b.3\]]kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/_de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas ni rtsis mgo phog_/shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis ni brtsis pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la slebs par ma nus so/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang /_gsum 
[\[75b.4\]]dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_brgya nas/_shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ma slebs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyed kyis ni 
[\[75b.5\]]rtsis mgo phog shig_/kho bos ni brtsi'o/_/de'i tshe shAkya gzhon nu gcig gis rtsis mgo phog na/_byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi chod pa la ma slebs so/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_
[\[75b.6\]]bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu rtsis mgo phog kyang byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi chod pa la ma slebs so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'di la brtsad de yang ci rung gis/_khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus 
[\[75b.7\]]te rtsis mgo phog shig dang /_kho bos ni brtsi'o/_/de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshig gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi med par rtsis mgo phog na/_byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/_de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug par gyur/_byang chub sems 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' med par gyur to/_/de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/legs pa'i blo mnga' 'di dris na/_/mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste/_/shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam/_/kun kyang rtsis kyi 
[\[76a.2\]]lam la thug_/de yi shes rab 'di 'dra ste/_/ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang /_/rtsis kyi mkhyen pa rgya mtsho de/_/da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad/_/de nas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/_shin tu rmad du byung bar sems shing /_de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu 
[\[76a.3\]]tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye don grub gzhon nu khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes thams cad stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod la sras de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing 
[\[76a.4\]]mgyogs la/_yang zhing shugs dang ldan pa can mnga' ba ni brnyes pa legs par brnyes so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub grangs kyi shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/_
[\[76a.5\]]smras pa/_lha rngo thog go/_/smras pa 'o na rtsis shig_/de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa zhes bgyi ba'i rtsis kyi lugs mkhyen tam/_smras pa/_shes so/_/smras pa/_'o na bye ba 
[\[76a.6\]]las brgyar gong du bsgres pa'i rtsis kyi lugs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bye ba phrag brgya na ther 'bum zhes bya'o/_/ther 'bum phrag brgya na khrag khrig ces bya'o/_/khrag khrig phrag brgya na gtams pa zhes bya'o/_/gtams pa phrag brgya na 
[\[76a.7\]]dkrigs pa zhes bya'o/_/dkrigs pa phrag brgya na mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'khrugs pa phrag brgya na khyad phyin ces bya'o/_/khyad phyin phrag brgya na phang steng zhes bya'o/_/phang steng phrag brgya na mang 'dzin ces bya'o/_/mang 'dzin phrag brgya na glang po'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/glang po'i 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]stobs phrag brgya na ngogs 'thob ces bya'o/_/ngogs 'thob phrag brgya na rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgya na rgyu rig ces bya'o/_/rgyu rig phrag brgya na lag sbyin zhes bya'o/_/lag sbyin phrag brgya na rgyu dbang zhes bya'o/_/rgyu dbang phrag brgya na 
[\[76b.2\]]rdzogs thob ces bya'o/_/rdzogs thob phrag brgya na bgrang rtogs zhes bya'o/_/bgrang rtogs phrag brgya na sgrib pa zhes bya'o/_/sgrib pa phrag brgya na stobs zhes bya'o/_/stobs phrag brgya na kun stobs zhes bya'o/_/kun stobs phrag brgya na rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o/_/rnam par 
[\[76b.3\]]brda shes ldan phrag brgya na brda shes kun zhes bya'o/_/brda shes kun phrag brgya na rnam 'byung zhes bya'o/_/rnam 'byung phrag brgya na de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/_'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rtsis kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo /_/de yi yang gong na 
[\[76b.4\]]rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/_grangs des ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo /_/de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/_/de'i yang gong na ded 'dren gdags pa zhes bya ba'i grangs 
[\[76b.5\]]yod do/_/de'i yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/_/de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/_/de'i yang gong na gcod rtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do/_/de'i yang gong na thams cad rnam par 'byes pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/_grangs 
[\[76b.6\]]des ni gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo /_/de'i yang gong na snying po mchog ces bya ba'i grangs yod de/_grangs des ni gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo /_/de'i yang gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i 
[\[76b.7\]]rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/_grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na grangs de 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]shes pa ni nga dang gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba srid pa tha ma par gyur pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs pa gang yang med do/_/srid sgrub kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i grangs la ji 
[\[77a.2\]]ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/_/rdul phra mo bdun la ni rdul chung ngu gcig go/_/rdul chung ngu bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/_/nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong rdul gcig go/_/ri bong rdul 
[\[77a.3\]]bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/_/lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/_/glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/_/sro ma bdun la ni yungs 'bru gcig go/_/yungs 'bru bdun la ni nas gcig go/_/nas bdun la ni sor gcig go/_/sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang ngo /_/mtho do la 
[\[77a.4\]]ni khru gang ngo /_/khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /_/gzhu stong la ni yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyang grags gcig go/_/rgyang grags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/de la khyed kyis nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod sus shes/_srid sgrub kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de 
[\[77a.5\]]la mgo rmongs na gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de bas na gzhon nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad du gsol/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab mi 'khrugs khrag khrig gcig dang /_bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[77a.6\]]sum cu dang /_bye ba drug cu phrag brgya dang /_bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'bum phrag lnga dang /_khri nyis stong yod de/_dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab de snyed cig yod do/_/de ltar 'jug pa des 'dzam bu'i gling 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do/_/nub kyi ba lang spyod la ni dpag 
[\[77a.7\]]tshad brgyad stong yod do/_/shar gyi lus 'phags la ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan la ni dpag tshad khri yod de/_de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'phrul dga' 
[\[77b.2\]]bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs ris bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs chen bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang /_
[\[77b.3\]]'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang /_bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sems can 'du shes med pa bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[77b.4\]]dang /_mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang /_shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'og min gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/_yangs shing rgya che ba de la dpag 
[\[77b.5\]]tshad du yod pa dang /_dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang /_dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang /_dpag tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang /_dpag tshad ther 'bum phrag du yod pa dang /_dpag tshad khrag khrig phrag du yod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i rtsis kyi 
[\[77b.6\]]bar du thug pa la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod ces bya ba'i rtsis de ni grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/_de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas kyang shin tu grangs med pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod do/_/byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi 
[\[77b.7\]]le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub dang /_shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/_de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig bzhag ste gos dang rgyan lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo/_/de nas 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di ltar bye ba brgya na ther 'bum de bzhin du/_/khrag khrig dang ni gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du/_/dkrigs pa mi 'khrugs bdag gi shes thug de gong min/_/mtshungs pa med kyi mkhyen pa rtsis 
[\[78a.2\]]la de bas lhag_/yang kye shAkya dag_/stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtswa dang nags tshal dang /_/sman dang chu yi thigs pa ji snyed yod pa yang /_/hung zhes bya ba gcig la 'di yis rtsi nus na/_/lnga brgya tsam dag gi lta ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_/de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag_/e ma a 
[\[78a.3\]]la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/_/dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i/_/sems dang sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag_/mchog 
[\[78a.4\]]dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag_/thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen/_/dge slong dag de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/_/de'i rjes la mchongs 
[\[78a.5\]]pa dang /_rkyal dang /_bang la sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par gyur nas/_nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang /_/bskal pa bye 
[\[78a.6\]]bar bzod dul byams stobs kyis/_/lus dang sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas/_/de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyan par gyis/_/sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs par khyed kyis mthong /_/'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/_/
[\[78a.7\]]skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa dag la mchod pa mdzad du bzhud/_/'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de/_/byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis yong mi shes/_/ji tsam zhugs zhes de la ci zhig bskyed/_/'di ni mtshungs pa 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]med kyis rim gro skyed/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/_/de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'ang sad par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_shAkya gzhon nu lnga 
[\[78b.2\]]brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/_shAkya gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis shig 'tshogs nas byang chub sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chas te 'khod do/_/de'i nang nas dga' bo dang /_kun dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal 
[\[78b.3\]]ba'i phyir drung du phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis reg ma thag tu de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la sgyel to/_/de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lha sbyin nga rgyal can mthu snyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang shAkya'i nga rgyal gyis snyems la/_
[\[78b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' la sngo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/_bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas ma brtabs shing mi rings par stangs bzang por gzhon nu lha sbyin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste bsad pa'i blos ma 
[\[78b.5\]]yin gyi nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis nam mkha' las bskor bskor te sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_de lta bu gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig_/de 
[\[78b.6\]]nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to/_/de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/_byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/_/
[\[78b.7\]]de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing /_ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo /_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/_dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/phyogs bcu'i sems 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]can gang rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag gyad chen stobs po che 'dra la/_/cig car skyes bu'i mchog la rub gyur kyang /_/reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i 'khor yug dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa/_/lag 
[\[79a.2\]]pas mnyes shing rmeg med phyer rlog na/_/mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che/_/'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i gyad/_/dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa/_/nag po'i rtsa lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms/_/bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya/_/
[\[79a.3\]]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to/_/de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyis shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di dag ni sad kyang zin/_mthong yang zin gyis da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig_/de'i tshe kun dga' bos rgyang 
[\[79a.4\]]grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/_/de'i 'og tu lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/_/de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/_/de'i 
[\[79a.5\]]'og tu shAkya lag na be con can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/_de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dngar nas de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag 
[\[79a.6\]]rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig btsugs so/_/de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/_de phan chod kyi la phog par ma nus so/_/lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 
[\[79a.7\]]'phangs na phog par gyur te/_de phan chad kyil phog par ma nus so/_/mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur te/_de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/_/lag na be con can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]'phangs na phog par gyur te/_thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/_la la ni chag nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis 
[\[79b.2\]]bdung bzod pa'am/_lus kyi stobs dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu yod do/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_lha de lta bu gang na mchis/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i za 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i gnam ru da ltar lha khang na spos dang 
[\[79b.3\]]phreng bas mchod de/_de ni sus kyang bdung bar yang mi nus na/_dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_lha de blang du gsol/_sad par bgyi'o/_/de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang /_shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog 
[\[79b.4\]]gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de bdung bar yang ma nus na dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so/_/de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/_gzhu de bdung bar brgal na ma bdungs so/_/de nas gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no/_/de nas 
[\[79b.5\]]byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te stan las ma langs par skyil mo krung phyed bcas te/_lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis bdungs so/_/gzhu de de ltar bdungs pa'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grag par gyur 
[\[79b.6\]]to/_/grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyang skrag skrag por gyur te/_gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di ltar ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro/_/de la la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi gnam ru bdungs nas de'i sgra byung ba ni 'di yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes 
[\[79b.7\]]zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang /_rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gdan las ma bzhengs brtsal ba ma mchis su/_/thub pas gnam ru 'di 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]'dra bdungs pa las/_/gdon mi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te/_/bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub par byon/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkang nas 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga 
[\[80a.2\]]btsugs pa dang /_lha sbyin gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang /_mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang /_lag na be con can gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad las thal nas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang /_shing ta la bdun dngar 
[\[80a.3\]]ba dang /_phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te mda' de sa la zug nas mi snang bar nub par gyur to/_/sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas da ltar yang mda'i khron pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi 
[\[80a.4\]]brgya stong dag_/e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to/_/shAkya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/_kye ngo mtshar to/_/'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes 
[\[80a.5\]]zer ro/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni sa yi snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/_/zhi gnas gnam 
[\[80a.6\]]ru thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su/_/byang chub dam pa zhi ba rdul med mya ngan med pa 'thob/_/de skad ces smras nas/_lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo /_/
[\[80a.7\]]de bzhin du mchongs pa dang /_yi ge dang /_lag rtsis dang /_rtsis dang /_grangs dang /_gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_bang dang /_tshar dang /_rkyal dang /_'phong dpyad dang /_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /_rta rtsal dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_mda' gzhu'i 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]thabs dang /_brtan pa dang /_mthu dang /_dpa' ba dang /_'gyed stobs dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa'i thabs dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_bzur ba dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stabs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral 
[\[80b.2\]]ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_gzhig pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_mi 'chor bar 'phog pa dang /_gnad du 'phog pa dang /_sgra grag par 'phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dang /_cho lo'i rtsed mo dang /_snyan dngags sbyar ba dang /_lam dang /_ri mo dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs kyi 
[\[80b.3\]]las dang /_thabs kyi dpyad dang /_me'i las dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_yi ge klag pa'i mig 'or dang /_gtam dang /_bzhad gad dang /_rtsed mo dang /_bro dang /_sgeg pa dang /_phreng ba brgyu ba dang /_rlung yab g.yob pa dang /_nor bu tshon gyis bsgyur 
[\[80b.4\]]ba dang /_gos tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang /_mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang /_rmi lam gyi dpyad dang /_bya'i skad dang /_bud med kyi mtshan dang /_skyes pa'i mtshan dang /_glang po che'i mtshan dang /_rta'i mtshan dang /_ba lang gi mtshan dang /_ra'i mtshan dang /_lug gi mtshan dang /_khyi'i mtshan 
[\[80b.5\]]dang /_shes gsal dang /_sgra nges par sbyor ba dang /_nga ro sgyur ba dang /_sngon gyi rabs dang /_sngon byung ba dang /_rig byed dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_yi ge lci yang dang /_tshig bsdeb pa dang /_mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /_skar ma'i lugs dang /_grangs can gyi
