[\[100a.4\]]bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /_shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/_de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su 
[\[100a.5\]]gyur pa/_'phong bslabs pa tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /_shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /_shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs 
[\[100a.6\]]rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_lam po che mang po thams cad na gdod cing 'khod do/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_rta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgo na mel tshe byed do/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[100a.7\]]chen mo gau ta mIs kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/_mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs/_/mu tig rgyan phreng rnams kyang spyangs la khyim 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos/_/glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par mel tshe dam du gyis/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung ba gyis/_/go bgos lag na lag cha ral gri dang /_/mdung thung mda' dang mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs/_/sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis/_/sgo kun chod la gtan par 
[\[100b.2\]]dam du chud/_/sgo 'phar sra ba rked par gtan chug la/_/dus la ma bab par ni sgo ma dbye/_/sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re/_/nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs/_/me tog zla gam seng ge shing lo ris/_/ska rags sor gdub rna rgyan chings shing thogs/_/rkang 
[\[100b.3\]]gdub dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs/_/lha mi phan pa glang po dregs bzhin 'gro/_/gal te blo bur mngon par byung da re/_/ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par/_/de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig_/bud med gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag_/dri ma med pa mal na 'dug pa 
[\[100b.4\]]bskor/_/ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur par/_/phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis/_/rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/_/khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres/_/gling bu dag kyang rab tu 'bud cing long /_/do mod rdul dang bral ba bsrung ba gyis/_/phan tshun gcig la 
[\[100b.5\]]gcig ni sbron byos te/_/do mod ma nyal shin tu bsrung ba gyis/_/rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su/_/khyim nas mngon du 'byung bar gyur ta re/_/'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na go/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'/_/rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa 
[\[100b.6\]]yang /_/rgyal po'i rigs dang rgyud ni chad par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga rtsen la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces smras te/_grogs po dag do mod byang chub 
[\[100b.7\]]sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro bgyis shig_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa/_grogs po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis khyed kyis 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas theg la 'byung bar gyis shig_/gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/_sku ni sred med bu yi stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyed sra la lci/_/sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/_/ri yi dam pa lhun po 
[\[101a.2\]]chen po rmang nas phyung ste nam mkhar gzung nus kyi/_/rgyal po'i yon tan lhun po ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus/_/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/_mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lci/_/gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor/_/
[\[101a.3\]]bsam pa thag pas brtson par byos la gus pa yis/_/bya yis sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis/_/kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa theg_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po [{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang 
[\[101a.4\]]po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig_/de na lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis ni ser 
[\[101a.5\]]skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis ni rta dang glang po che dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_skyes 
[\[101a.6\]]pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams kyi sgra mi grag par bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil du shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/_
[\[101a.7\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram pa/_pog phor nas bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der bkod par bgyi'o/_/klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ces smras so/_/bdag gis bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs len du stsal cing glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar 
[\[101b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bos ni sgo dbye'o/_/lam mtshon par bya'o/_/lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu yang dag skul pos smras pa/_
[\[101b.3\]]bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs par gsol bar bgyi'o/_/de na klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag 
[\[101b.4\]]cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char dbab po/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa 
[\[101b.5\]]nges par bsams te brtsams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa/_glu dbyangs len pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na mal bde ba la 'dug pa/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sems la/_
[\[101b.6\]]sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi mngon du byed do/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sngon nga rang byung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na/_go cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/_sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcings te 
[\[101b.7\]]'khor ba'i btson ra chen por bcug pa la 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te/_bcings pa bkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag go/_/sred pa'i zhags pa dang /_sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to/_/kye ma'o 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag thibs po chen por zhugs pa mi shes pa'i ling tog dang rab rib kyis mig bsgribs pa shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/_ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma yang nye 
[\[102a.2\]]bar bsgrubs la/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman ri lu dang sman thabs dang shes rab dang /_ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/_ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang /_gti mug gi mun pa dang /_rab rib dang /_ling tog dang /_rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas shes rab kyi 
[\[102a.3\]]mig rnam par sbyang ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur to/_/kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can/_'du shes 
[\[102a.4\]]dang /_sems dang /_lta ba phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa bzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstan te/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bsnyal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to/_/kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten rnam par ma zhi ba/_
[\[102a.5\]]thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/_dru gu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa/_'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa/_'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang /_'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor la 'khor ba las mi ldog pa mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi 
[\[102a.6\]]bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon du gyur te/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to/_/skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis btsun mo'i 
[\[102a.7\]]'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te/_mi sdug par gnas pa dang /_smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas nam mkha' la 'khod de/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis/_/pad ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la smras/_/dur khrod dbus 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'dir bzhugs par gyur lags na/_/khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur/_/lha yi dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas/_/yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog_/bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong /_/dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[102b.2\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang /_kha cig ni gos lhung bar gyur/_kha cig ni skra zhig_/kha cig ni rgyan brul/_kha cig ni cod pan lhung /_kha cig ni phrag pa mi sdug par gyur/_kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/_kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par gnas/_
[\[102b.3\]]kha cig ni mig gyur/_kha cig ni kha chu zag_/kha cig ni sngur/_kha cig ni lud pa lu/_kha cig ni rgod/_kha cig ni brdol/_kha cig ni so 'khrig_/kha cig ni bzhin mdog gyur/_kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te/_lag pa ring por gyur/_kha cig ni rkang pa phral/_kha cig ni mgo phyung /_
[\[102b.4\]]kha cig ni mgo g.yogs/_kha cig ni bzhin gyi dbyibs gyur/_kha cig ni lus ma rungs par gyur/_kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/_kha cig ni lus bskums shing sngur/_kha cig ni rdza rnga la 'khyud nas lus gan rkyal du 'gyel/_kha cig ni pi bang dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang /_
[\[102b.5\]]kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs/_kha cig ni rol mo'i cha byad kim pa la dang /_na ku la dang /_khar ba'i sil khrol dang /_pheg la 'dzin/_kha cig ni mig 'dzums shing 'byed la 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha gdangs par gyur te/_de ltar sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 
[\[102b.6\]]'khor la lta zhing byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste/_/snying rjes shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad smras/_/e ma skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur/_/srin mo'i tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar rnyed/_/'dod 
[\[102b.7\]]pa'i yon tan yod min yon tan 'dzin/_/gti mug mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan/_/dper na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin/_/nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu pa/_
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis yang btsun mo'i 'khor la rtog cing snying rje chen po'i smre bas sems can gyi phyir smre ste/_'di na byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/_bsad pa'i gnas su gsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag 
[\[103a.2\]]ni chags pa ste/_ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/_glang po che chur bying ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/_btson ra'i nang gi btson btsas pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na 
[\[103a.3\]]byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste/_phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/_khyi keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/_phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa 
[\[103a.4\]]de dag ni thogs pa ste/_spre'u rnyong la thogs pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bzung ba ste/_nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtubs pa ste/_sha 'tshong gi gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste 
[\[103a.5\]]sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni 'dam du 'bying zhing thogs pa ste/_glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni phongs pa ste/_rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis 
[\[103a.6\]]pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/_dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/_sa'i steng gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni du ba 'thul ba ste/_bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang 
[\[103a.7\]]mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/_rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog rtsol ba ste/_dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/_khyi ltong gis btags pa dang mtshungs 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni rnyis pa ste/_dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so/_/'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/_zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la zab ste/_klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams 
[\[103b.2\]]la 'cha' ba ste/_gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/_'dron po la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jig pa ste/_shing sA la la rlung mar chen po dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/_
[\[103b.3\]]skye bo la sbrul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so/_/byis pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/_ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus pas chod pa bzhin no/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/_shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la rtsed pa ste/_
[\[103b.4\]]byis pa chung ngu rang gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/_glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/_g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag brid pa bzhin no/_/'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[103b.5\]]ba zad par byed pa ste/_rgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so/_/'di dag gis byis pa rnams 'chos pa ste/_srin mo rnams kyis tshong ba 'chos pa dang mtshungs so/_/byang chub sems dpas rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/_lus 
[\[103b.6\]]la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom/_mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/_smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/_rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar rnam par sgom/_lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong /_lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las skyod/_sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 
[\[103b.7\]]'jig_/mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/_'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang /_mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang /_rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/lus kyi zhing las 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]skyes shing sred pa'i chu las byung ba 'jig tshogs ming du btags/_/mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi thigs pas gang /_/zhag dang rnag dang lgang ba dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang /_/rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing 
[\[104a.2\]]kun kyang dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa/_/pags pa so dang skra dang spu yis bsgyur cing pags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan/_/rgyu ma mchin pa mtsher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam chung ba/_/rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par 
[\[104a.3\]]byas/_/sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyen/_/skye ba po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa/_/mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus 
[\[104a.4\]]la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par lta zhing 'dzum yang ston/_/sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir zhing lta na phyi 
[\[104a.5\]]shol byed dam ci/_/yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/yang na chags pa med pa 'di yul rnams la yid chags par ni mi 'gyur grang /_/lha rnams kyis bskul ba yi yi dam brjed par ma gyur grang /_/lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa/_de 
[\[104a.6\]]skad smra ci dgos/_'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon par 'byung ba dang /_gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa de khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/_da srid pa tha ma pa la gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag de 
[\[104a.7\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa/_yid byung bar gyur pa/_blo brtul ba/_tshul du shis shing [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/_glu dbyangs len pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]kyi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/_sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/_nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang des mthong ba/_nam mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lha brgya stong gis bskor cing /_me tog dang /_
[\[104b.2\]]spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_me tog gi rna rgyan dang /_rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/_lus btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/'jig rten 
[\[104b.3\]]skyong ba bzhi yang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing go cha sra ba bgos/_ya lad bgos te/_ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_mdung thung dang /_mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang /_rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shis par nor bu'i cod pan dang /_
[\[104b.4\]]gtsug phud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang glo g.yas g.yos na 'dug par mthong ngo /_/skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/_
[\[104b.5\]]nga yi bkra shis 'di ni don kun grub/_/do mod gdon mi za bar don grub kyis/_/'dun pa phyi shol ma byed la gor du/_/rta rgyal rgyan gyis brgyan pa'ang nga la byin/_/de nas 'dun pas tshig de thos nas/_yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/smin ma ring zhing pad ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 
[\[104b.6\]]'dra'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang /_/me tog ku mu da dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad ma'i rdzing bu sar par 'jam pa'i pad ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal/_/sbyang pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs me yi 'od 'phro nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i 
[\[104b.7\]]gzi brjid can/_/glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs can stabs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa mig dang 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing /_/chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung mgyogs shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang /_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa 
[\[105a.2\]]yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag_/de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab/_/'dun pas smras pa/_jo jo khyod bltam ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir bram ze ltas 
[\[105a.3\]]mkhan rnams la bstan na/_de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan ces bdag gis thos so/_/smras pa/_ji lta bur 'gyur/_smras pa gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan/_/khyod kyi bu 
[\[105a.4\]]btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can/_/de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur/_/nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur/_/gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni/_/btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung 'gyur na/_/byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste/_/
[\[105a.5\]]chos kyi chu yis skye dgu 'di tshim byed/_/jo jo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te/_'di ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi 'on kyang phan par 'tshal ba bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/_smras pa/_ci zhig_/smras pa/_lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang dka' 
[\[105a.6\]]thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa dang /_ral pa'i thor tshugs dang /_rtswa dang shing shun gyon pa dang /_sen mo dang /_skra dang /_ag tsom ring por 'jog pa dang /_lus la gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/_bdag cag 
[\[105a.7\]]ji ltar lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang dka' thub drag po rtsom mo/_/jo jo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes lags te/_rgyal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/_nyams dga' zhing mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba 'di 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dang /_skyed mos tshal dam pa mchog me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang /_rdzing me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur pa/_ngang pa dang /_rma bya 
[\[105b.2\]]dang /_khu byug dang /_ngur pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ngang skya sgra skad 'byin pa/_shing a mra dang /_mya ngan 'tshang dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ku ra ba ka dang /_ke sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/_rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng gis 
[\[105b.3\]]legs par brgyan pa/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bkod pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/_rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/_dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/_dgun dang /_dbyar dang /_ston dang /_dpyid gnas bde ba rnams dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po chos dang /_
[\[105b.4\]]chos bzang dang /_bde ba dang /_mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/_gangs ti se lta bu stegs bu dang /_sgo gang dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_khyams kyis legs par 
[\[105b.5\]]brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang rol mo'i cha byad rgyud gcig pa dang /_pi bang dang /_khar rnga dang /_gling bu dang /_khar ba'i sil khrol dang /_pheg dang /_kim pa la dang /_na ku la dang /_sgra snyan dang /_rdza rnga 
[\[105b.6\]]dang /_pa Ta ha dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang /_'jo ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_tshul du shis pa dang /_spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/_lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/_gzhon 
[\[105b.7\]]pa thor bu dar la bab pa/_lus 'jam pa/_lang tsho la bab pa/_dbu skra gnag pa/_'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la/_slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]cig_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar/_/dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol/_/slad kyis bgres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang /_/dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsam par mdzod/_/
[\[106a.2\]]byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa mi dgos te/_'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_'gyur ba'i chos can/_myur du 'gro ba/_g.yo ba/_ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/_zil pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/_lag pa 
[\[106a.3\]]bcangs pa stongs pas byis pa brid pa ltar snying po med pa/_chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu med pa/_snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa/_ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/_nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi gnas pa/_dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[106a.4\]]sdug bsngal can/_'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/_byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/_chu'i chu bur lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/_smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/_sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/_rmi lam 
[\[106a.5\]]ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongs su zin pa/_rgya mtsho dgang dka' ba ltar ngoms mi shes par byed pa/_tshwa chu ltar skom par byed pa/_sbrul gyi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' ba/_g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/_shes rab can rnams kyis 
[\[106a.6\]]'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyes pa dang bcas pa dang /_skyon dang bcas par shes nas rnam par spangs pa/_rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/_'phags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/_mi mkhas pa 
[\[106a.7\]]rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa yin no/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs/_/ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs/_/'dun pa dge ba thams cad 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'jig byed par/_/'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga' mi skye/_/de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/_ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la/_sdug bsngal bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po 
[\[106b.2\]]rtsom ste [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]pags pa 'chang /_/skra dang sen mo ag tsom ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul zhugs gnas/_/sred dang ni ldam ldum dag dang drus ma 'bras za kha cig spyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas/_/ji ltar bdag 
[\[106b.3\]]cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod/_/mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin tu 'byor cing rab tu 
[\[106b.4\]]rgyas la shin tu lo legs pa/_/de bzhin kun dga'i ra ba dag dang skyed mos tshal dang khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs/_/bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi bang dang ni gling bu dag dang glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis/_/dga' bar bgyid dang gar dang glu 
[\[106b.5\]]dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang btsas dang brdegs dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis 
[\[106b.6\]]yid byung byas ma gyur/_/sngon chad bag med dbang du song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkrigs shing mun gyur chos 'di mi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tshor ba po las 'das/_/dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs 
[\[106b.7\]]shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsob gsog snying po med la bdag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste/_/nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan nga byin ngas sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par 'gyur/_/'dun pas smras pa/_pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing /_/do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/mkha' la sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i glog 'dra ba/_/mal na rnam par mdzes 
[\[107a.2\]]pa 'di la mi gzigs sam/_/pi ldir dang ni khar rnga dag dang sgra snyan dang /_/rdza rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang /_/bya bang rma bya ka la ping ka sgra 'byin pa/_/mi'am ci yi khyim 'dra 'di yang dor lags sam/_/su ma na dang ud pa la dang pAr shi ka_/tsam pa ka dang dri 
[\[107a.3\]]mchog phreng ba me tog brgyus/_/dus kyi a ga ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang /_/byug pa dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam/_/shin tu dri bda' dri ldan ro bro gya nom dang /_/skyu rum dag dang bshos gtsang shin tu legs sbyar dang /_/skyems kyi ro yang kha ra bcas par 
[\[107a.4\]]rab sbyar ba/_/'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud/_/grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang /_/tsha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_/ka shi pa yi na bza' bzang po mang po dang /_/de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud/_/lha yul dag na lha rnams 
[\[107a.5\]]dag ni ci 'dra bar/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rab 'byor pa/_/dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzod de/_/de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med 
[\[107a.6\]]par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang mi dang lha yi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur pa med/_/rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag gi nang na 'dug 
[\[107a.7\]]pa dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i lha yi nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngon chad spyad/_/lha yi gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor pa mchog la spyad kyang ngoms 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]ma gyur na da ci dman pa 'di la bsten pas nga ngoms 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no/_/gzhan yang 'dun pa nga ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdug pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing /_/gti mug ma rig mun pa 
[\[107b.2\]]dag na rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu gnod cing rnam par gnod pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/_/ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bsogs 
[\[107b.3\]]te sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan por gzungs btab sbyar/_/gru der nga nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgal te bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'da' bar che ba khro ba'i dba' rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glong 'khyil dgra 
[\[107b.4\]]yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las bsgral lo snyam ste nga sems de 'dra'o/_/de phyir srid 'tsho dgrar bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri dang /_/nyon mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgal te/_/bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa/_/rga med shi med zhi ba'i 
[\[107b.5\]]thang la dgod par bya/_/de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon/_/sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson/_/mi g.yo las kyang mi 
[\[107b.6\]]g.yo gnod pa med/_/ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo/_/'dun pas smras pa/_jo jo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_rdo rje'i gnam lcags dgra sta mdung thung mda' char dang /_/lcags bskol glog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba 
[\[107b.7\]]dang /_/ri rtse kun tu 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bab kyang /_/nga ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir yang mi skyed do/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu nam mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/_me tog gi char yang phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yul rnams la 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]ni yid kyang ma chags shing /_/sems can dag pa snying rje snying brtser ldan/_/blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig_/mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa/_/mkha' la rdul gnag du ba mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag_/mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog 
[\[108a.2\]]thugs mi chags/_/dri med yul gyi bde bas mi gos te/_/chu las pad ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang /_
[\[108a.3\]]bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so/_/sgra thams cad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig_/nam gyi gung la bab par rig_/skar ma'i bdag 
[\[108a.4\]]po rgyal dang ldan par rig_/da kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas 'dun pa la smras pa/_'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed par rta bsngags ldan legs par brgyan te ma thogs par nga la byin/_byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/_de nas skad cig de 
[\[108a.5\]]nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/_rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkod pas rings pa rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so/_/de na dri za'i bdag po 
[\[108a.6\]]rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/_ji ltar 'ongs pa'i 
[\[108a.7\]]shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/_spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/_ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[108b.2\]]po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/_spos kyi phye ma dang me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas slong ba'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs 
[\[108b.3\]]nas 'ongs par gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/_ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/_/rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar 
[\[108b.4\]]ma'i 'od zer thogs pa/_lag na mar me thogs pa/_sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa/_mda' gzhu dang /_ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_'phang mdung la sogs pa mtshon 
[\[108b.5\]]cha sna tshogs thogs pa/_go cha dang ya lad sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/_ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/_byang 
[\[108b.6\]]chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/_lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_me tog gi rna rgyan dang /_
[\[108b.7\]]rgyan thogs pa rnams dang /_lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur te/_'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/_ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/_byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/_/dge slong dag de ltar 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]'dun pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/_mig mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo jo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa/_tshod mkhyen pa/_ran pa mkhyen pa lags na/_da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/_
[\[109a.2\]]ci'i slad du bka' de skad stsal/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dun pa da ni dus la bab po/_/smras pa/_jo jo gang gi dus la bab/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_sems can rnams kyi don ni tshol ba na/_/byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas/_/'gro ba dgrol 
[\[109a.3\]]zhes nga yis yun ring nas/_/smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bab/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid de/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/sa bla ba dang bar snang de bzhin skyong /_/lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas/_/'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang /_/gzhan 
[\[109a.4\]]'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur/_/klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang /_/ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang /_/mi mchog mngon par byung ba'i dus bab pas/_/de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par gyur/_/gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /_/
[\[109a.5\]]rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi spyad/_/de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa/_/mi mchog de la mchod phyir mngon par brtson/_/sngon spyad spyod tshe grogs por gyur pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcur lhags pa yang /_/rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta 
[\[109a.6\]]byed cing /_/rjes su 'thun pas mchod pa bya snyam byed/_/gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de/_/rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas/_/lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan/_/gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs/_/lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis 
[\[109a.7\]]kyang /_/g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur/_/sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te/_/mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtog par byed/_/skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang /_/rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te/_/mi yi dam pa de yi mdun 'dug nas/_/yid du 'ong 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te/_/skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab/_/do mod khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub/_/bdag kyang khyod dang thabs cig mchi bar bgyi/_/'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung mi 'gyur/_/lha'i bu yang dag bskul pos bskul byas pa/_/stobs 
[\[109b.2\]]dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs/_/sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol/_/da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab/_/lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang /_/yid 'ong me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/_/de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 
[\[109b.3\]]'dug_/lha yis bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar/_/grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa/_/de dag thams cad yid dal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams/_/rta dang glang po ba lang ne tsho khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs rnams/_/de dag rnams 
[\[109b.4\]]kyang yid dal myur du nyal te de dag gzugs mi mthong /_/shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang /_/glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal/_/rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur/_/bud med tshogs 
[\[109b.5\]]rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yang ma tshor/_/de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/_/nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras/_/'dun pa rta pho bsngags ldan bzang po legs brgyan legs par nga la byin/_/gal te nga la byams par 
[\[109b.6\]]sems na bgegs ma byed par myur du byin/_/'dun pas tshig thos mchi mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras/_/sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas ci zhig bgyi/_/dus mkhyen cing ni tshod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/_/khyod kyi sgo bkum 
[\[109b.7\]]gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur/_/brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur/_/'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor/_/kyi hud bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam/_/gzi brjid 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' zhig thos/_/yan lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed/_/rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di ma tshor/_/bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags 
[\[110a.2\]]ldan gnyid log byas/_/kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig_/lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la smras/_/'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyo mi bya/_/lha dang lha min dag gis rnga dung 
[\[110a.3\]]rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas/_/'on kyang lhas bsnyal ba yi grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur/_/'dun pa bar snang dri ma med la lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos/_/khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lhags ltos/_/bde sogs khyim thab brgya 
[\[110a.4\]]byin dpung bskor sgo na mdzes par 'dug pa dang /_/lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos/_/'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta pho de la smras/_/sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog_/de yis dbyar 
[\[110a.5\]]gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas/_/yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par dbul ba byas/_/mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags/_/khyod kyis sngon chad gang bgos smon lam de grub gyur 
[\[110a.6\]]cig gshegs su gsol/_/gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig_/'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig_/de ni gang tshe mal nas langs tshe sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos/_/rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 
[\[110a.7\]]'khor 'dra ba de la zhon/_/skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag pad ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog bteg_/brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston/_/de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal/_/de tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]nyon mongs gnod pa med/_/me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstod/_/thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dong /_/skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs/_/mdun du 'dug nas snying 
[\[110b.2\]]rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad ma 'dra ba'i bzhin la smras/_/khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur/_/do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/_/slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyis sgra 
[\[110b.3\]]dag dang /_/grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sad bgyid pa'i/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang /_/bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur/_/nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na/_/gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi/_/lha dang grub tshogs slan 
[\[110b.4\]]chad mthong mi 'gyur/_/lha yi dri yang slan chad snom mi 'gyur/_/phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar/_/khyod kyis do mod pho brang de bzhin spangs/_/khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis/_/gar la lta ba bzhin du bdag la gda'/_/grong khyer kun gyi byin dang 
[\[110b.5\]]stobs phrogs te/_/'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags/_/gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du/_/lung bstan drang srong tshig ni deng [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyur/_/bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na/_/sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 
[\[110b.6\]]'dir gdung yang 'chad/_/shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams/_/dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par/_/bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi/_/'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni/_/khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol/_/blo gros ldan pa khyim 
[\[110b.7\]]la bltas nas ni/_/snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te/_/skye 'chi mthar 'byin ma thob bar du ni/_/nga yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya/_/rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa/_/byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par/_/nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]'greng 'dug nyal dang 'chag par mi bya'o/_/gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing /_/de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe/_/lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin/_/'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin/_/
[\[111a.2\]]'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing /_/'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/_/sems can rnams la thugs rje bas/_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/_/'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/_/'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag_/brtul 
[\[111a.3\]]zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams/_/'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams/_/don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung /_/sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/_/'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung /_/yan lag nying lag gcad gyur kyang /_/khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'/_/'di ni 
[\[111a.4\]]rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/_/bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'/_/'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/_/mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad/_/'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/_/thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi/_/nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni/_/sems can 
[\[111a.5\]]bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur/_/'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las/_/grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te/_/rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur/_/'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan/_/thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon/_/dga' dang btang snyoms bsam 
[\[111a.6\]]gtan pa/_/tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho ga mkhyen/_/'di ni shin tu lha yi lha/_/lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os/_/thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral/_/yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon/_/'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs/_/mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste/_/gnod pa rnams 
[\[111a.7\]]kyi skyabs kyang lags/_/ring nas na ba'i sman pa lags/_/rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal/_/dbang po lta bur spyan stong mnga'/_/tshangs pa lta bur rang byung gyur/_/lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa/_/brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang /_/dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]chags bral/_/nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste/_/ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags/_/seng ge lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs/_/glang po lta bur rab dul thugs/_/khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso/_/bzod de 'khrug pa rab tu spangs/_/zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal/_/nyi 
[\[111b.2\]]ma lta bur snang ba mdzad/_/sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa/_/skar ma lta bur mun pa bral/_/pad ma lta bur chags mi mnga'/_/me tog lta bur khrims dri gda'/_/ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo/_/dog sa lta bur gsos su gyur/_/rin chen 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs/_/'di 
[\[111b.3\]]ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal/_/'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal/_/'di ni lha yi bdud kyang bcom/_/'di ni ded dpon chen po ste/_/lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la/_/yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog_/ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur/_/rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa 
[\[111b.4\]]po/_/mun pa rab rib rnam par grol/_/sa dang lha yul grags pa yi/_/rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags/_/skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba/_/dpag tu med la bstod pas bstod/_/khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des/_/smra ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog_/dge slong 
[\[111b.5\]]dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas shAkya'i yul dang /_kau ta'i yul dang /_gyad yul las 'das te me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang nam nangs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[111b.6\]]sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o/_/slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[111b.7\]]rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar gtang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar log shig_/sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/_deng sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas 
[\[112a.2\]]des ral gris gtsug phud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang /_de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/_deng sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus ston byed do/_/der mchod rten yang byas te/_deng sang mchod rten de gtsug phud 
[\[112a.3\]]blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chags so/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_rab tu byung yang gos ka shi pa gyon pa ji ltar rung gis gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i gos shig rnyed na ni legs so snyam du bsams pa dang /_de nas 
[\[112a.4\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig dgos par gyur to snyam mo/_/de na lha'i bu gcig cig lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas te/_rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 
[\[112a.5\]]phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur smrig rnams kho bo la byin na/_kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/_'o ni rnams kyang kho bo la 
[\[112a.6\]]mdzes so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kho bos khyod la bslang ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/_gos ka shi pa rnams kyang blangs so/_/de nas lha'i bu des mos pa bskyed de lag pa gnyi gas gos 
[\[112a.7\]]de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/_de dag la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo /_/de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas des mchod rten brtsigs te/_deng sang du yang mchod rten de ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]byang chub sems dpas gtsug phud bcad nas/_gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/_lha'i bu brgya stong dag dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yi rangs te/_mchog tu rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo /_/kye 
[\[112b.2\]]grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo /_/de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/_sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/_rga ba dang /_
[\[112b.3\]]'chi ba dang /_na ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/_bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/_mya ngan med pa/_gnod pa 
[\[112b.4\]]med pa/_zhi ba/_rdul dang bral ba/_'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro zhes nas/_a la la zhes bya ba dang /_ca co dang ga zha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to/_/sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to/_/de nas btsun 
[\[112b.5\]]mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/_dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams dang /_khri rnams dang /_khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/_bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du ngud mo 'thon par gyur to/_/de na bud med kha cig ni 
[\[112b.6\]]shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/_kha cig ni kyi hud bu zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni kyi hud ming po zhes 'dzer cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni kyi hud khyim thab ces 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni rje bo zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o/_/kha cig ni lus rdeb cing 
[\[112b.7\]]ngu'o/_/kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo/_/kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni brang rdung zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni lag pa dpung par rdeb cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni mgor rdung zhing ngu'o/_/
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]kha cig ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni skra 'jig cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho de 'don to/_/kha cig ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo dug mdas phog pa bzhin du glo bur du rgyug cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni gdong gos 
[\[113a.2\]]kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni chu shing rlung mar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyor zhing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni sa la sgyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to/_/kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o/_/kha cig ni shing rtsa nas phyung ba bzhin du blo bur du sa la sgyel nas ngu'o/_/
[\[113a.3\]]sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag_/shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gda'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang 
[\[113a.4\]]du gzhon nu tshol cig_/de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI smre sngags 'don te/_sa la 'gre ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol/_de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho 
[\[113a.5\]]nya rta pa bkye ste/_khyed deng la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig_/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo /_/zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang /_lam gyi bar zhig na me tog 
[\[113a.6\]]gi char 'bab par mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu ni lam 'di nas byung ngo snyam nas de dag cung zad cig pha zad du song ba dang /_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag ni 
[\[113a.7\]]gzhon nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na/_gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo/_/de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/_kye 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis de la ma dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/_de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/_kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di dag gi phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang /_'dun pas smras pa/_de lta ni ma yin te 'dis kyang gzhon nu 
[\[113b.2\]]la gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo/_/gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi pa 'di rnams 'di la byin no/_/de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la thogs te/_de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo /_/de dag gis yang 'dun pa la dris pa/_'di 
[\[113b.3\]]la ji snyam du sems/_kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu dong na nus sam/_des smras pa mi nus so/_/gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa yin te/_nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer 
[\[113b.4\]]chen por mi 'jug go zhes de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/_gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog go/_/de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[113b.5\]]nang du phyin to/_/de nas ring ba zhig lon pa dang /_rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pas bteg pa dang /_sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang /_sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de rnams de dag gis ma theg go/_/gang gi tshe de dag 
[\[113b.6\]]gang gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[113b.7\]]chen mo gau ta mIs rgyan de dag rdzing du bor te/_deng sang du yang rgyan gyi rdzing zhes ming du chags so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung /_/de tshe ser skya'i grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sad/_/kun gyi snying la gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]sems/_/mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra/_/sa 'tsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad/_/mal du ltas na byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas/_/kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[114a.2\]]khyim du ngud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur/_/rgyal pos sgra de thos nas sa la sgyel gyur te/_/e ma nga yi bu gcig pa zhes ngud mo phyung /_/de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas/_/shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbugs kyang phyung /_/sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la lhung bar gyur/_/
[\[114a.3\]]skra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur/_/sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por mi thogs shes/_/'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs/_/gzugs ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag spras/_/gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi 
[\[114a.4\]]yid 'ong sdug_/dpal yon ldan pa bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os/_/bdag ni mal du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud/_/yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar/_/skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyi/_/sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang 
[\[114a.5\]]thogs par bgyi/_/khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad par bgyi/_/skyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis/_/rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra/_/mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i/_/grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma 
[\[114a.6\]]lags 'brog dang mtshungs/_/kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can/_/kyi hud lhug lhug pa yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor/_/kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang /_/yon tan ldan dang bral bas phyin chad mi blta'o/_/sru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur 
[\[114a.7\]]cing /_/shAkya'i bu mo ma ngu shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin/_/nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi mthar byed ces/_/mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin/_/drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de/_/nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas/_/'dun pa de la rta mchog dang 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ni rgyan rnams gtad/_/'dun pa 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig_/yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni/_/gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi/_/chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang 
[\[114b.2\]]zhi bar 'gyur zhes smros/_/'dun pa ngu bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa/_/'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces/_/mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis/_/bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis/_/byang chub sems 
[\[114b.3\]]dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig_/nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni/_/khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu bsgom gyur te/_/nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur/_/'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su/_/mi mchog dam 
[\[114b.4\]]pa de yi skyed mos tshal du phyin/_/skyed mos tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas/_/kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras/_/gzhon nu 'di yi rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang /_/skyed mos tshal du phyin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/rgyal pos de skad thos nas 
[\[114b.5\]]shAkyas bskor nas ni/_/rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin/_/sa 'tshos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas/_/tshig de la ni yid ma ches te dgar ma gyur/_/gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang /_/byon cing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas 
[\[114b.6\]]ma yin/_/rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas/_/ngud mo btab ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur/_/kyi hud nga'i bu glu dang rol mo sgra dbyangs mkhas/_/rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song /_/'dun pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par smros/_/byang chub 
[\[114b.7\]]sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig_/sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur/_/lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas/_/'dun pas smras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson/_/dgung phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du/_/'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung /_/bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang /_/de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos/_/bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul/_/
[\[115a.2\]]phan pa mdzad pa gang du dgyes par gshegs zhes bgyis/_/brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg_/dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos/_/nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las 
[\[115a.3\]]gshegs gyur te/_/'od ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag bsal/_/me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung /_/lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod/_/nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs/_/'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan 
[\[115a.4\]]rnams khyer nas su/_/de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang /_/sa 'tshos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas/_/rab tu brgyal bar gyur te sa yi steng du sgyel/_/bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni/_/chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed/_/mya ngan 
[\[115a.5\]]rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong /_/phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam byed/_/shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas/_/rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus/_/sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas/_/mya ngan gyur cing sna 
[\[115a.6\]]tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra/_/kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba/_/kyi hud bdag gi gzugs mchog gzugs can kyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan/_/kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa 
[\[115a.7\]]rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la ping ka'i sgra skad tshangs 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dbyangs snyan ldan pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po/_/kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin 
[\[115b.2\]]lum bi ni der bltam pa legs bltam pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa'i ye shes sdong po che/_/kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim pa'i sgros can pad ma'i spyan mnga' gser mdog 'dra/_/kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan ba zho ba 
[\[115b.3\]]mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi shangs legs smin legs smin mtshams bar na dri med mdzod spu gnas pa po/_/kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i rked pa e ne'i byin pa rked pa zlum/_/kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes 
[\[115b.4\]]pa'i sen mo can/_/de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa/_/kyi hud bdag gi glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba/_/kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa/_/
[\[115b.5\]]kyi hud bsngags ldan legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid/_/kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sgron cing slong ma phod/_/do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo sgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te/_/phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs 
[\[115b.6\]]zhes skabs der tshig gcig tsam zhig ci yi phyir ma smras/_/phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yi phyung ba byas/_/gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su gyur pa dpal yon ldan/_/'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug 
[\[115b.7\]]bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig_/'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyis pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os zhes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na/_/de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos/_/kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin/_/byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par gyur/_/de yis sngon chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan/_/khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[116a.2\]]nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur/_/rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol/_/'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshig ni thos gyur nas/_/de ni nga ro 'thon cing tshig tu smras pa sa 
[\[116a.3\]]'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson/_/nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa/_/de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung /_/de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu 
[\[116a.4\]]bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas/_/de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po phyung /_/lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur pas bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur/_/bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yi rgyal 
[\[116a.5\]]po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul/_/bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra byung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam tu grags/_/'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong khyer pa las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur/_/gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis 
[\[116a.6\]]g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs/_/de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi las 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur/_/de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas/_/mkha' las lha rnams bye ba thal 
[\[116a.7\]]mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal/_/gnod sbyin srin po tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis/_/pad ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag bteg_/bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ku mu da dang par sha lta bu de la bcibs/_/sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab/_/bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis/_/de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod 
[\[116b.2\]]nas gshegs/_/bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes/_/lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs/_/lha yi bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub 
[\[116b.3\]]sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing /_/de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs 'thud byed cing snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin/_/bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo ba mi dga' ma skyed cig_/'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song 
[\[116b.4\]]ngan 'gro med par 'gyur/_/lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur/_/yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung zad med/_/bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin 
[\[116b.5\]]chen stegs bu ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying po mchog bdug sa 'di la ltos/_/bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der/_/lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha yi 'dod pa'i 
[\[116b.6\]]dga' bas dga' bar gyis/_/legs pa sa 'tsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzod cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod/_/mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur/_/sa 'tsho mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las 
[\[116b.7\]]bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags/_/de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la bshum mo ma mdzad cig_/rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mis mchod pa yi bkod pa gang lags pa/_/bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gis dgung bdun bar du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus/_/khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/_/bdag gis bsams na khyod kyang mi yi dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid/_/
[\[117a.2\]]mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_
[\[117a.3\]]shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang /_shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de la gos ngur smrig rnams 
[\[117a.4\]]blangs te/_/'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba dang /_sems can la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze'i rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba dang /_des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[117a.5\]]gnas par bya ba dang /_zas la 'gron du bos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad ma'i gnas su song ba dang /_des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang /_zas la 'gron du bos so/_/de nas bram ze'i drang srong nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang /_des 
[\[117a.6\]]kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du bos so/_/de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gron du bos te/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to/_/de'i tshe sgyu rtsal 
[\[117a.7\]]shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /_slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu/_grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/_de slob ma dag la ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/_kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyis te 'di ni ya mtshan che'o/_/dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/_sgyu 
[\[117b.2\]]rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/des smras pa/_kye gau ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bus gang la spyad na tshegs chung ngus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta 
[\[117b.3\]]bu la spyod cig_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du sems te/_nga la mos pa yang yod/_nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/_dran pa yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/_shes rab kyang yod kyis/_chos de nyid thob par bya ba dang /_mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod 
[\[117b.4\]]pa dang /_brtun pa dang dben par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/_dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang /_brtun pa dang /_dben par gnas nas/_tshegs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur 
[\[117b.5\]]ga la ba der song ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam/_des smras pa/_kye gau ta ma de de bzhin no/_/ngas smras pa/_kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do/_/des smras pa/_kye gau ta 
[\[117b.6\]]ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/_de bas na bdag cag gnyi gas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to/_/dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/_nga slob ma 
[\[117b.7\]]rnams la yang don 'thun par byed du bcug go/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/_de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyis/_bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig btsal zhing 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]spyad do snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas/_yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/_ri'i rgyal po skya bo ga la ba der song nas/_ri'i rgyal po skya bo 
[\[118a.2\]]de'i ngos la nga gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so/_/de nas nga nang par sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa 
[\[118a.3\]]dang /_mdun du lta ba dang /_g.yas g.yon du lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang brkyang ba mdzes pa dang /_snam sbyar dang /_thang ba dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa dang /_dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang /_sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang /_'bru 
[\[118a.4\]]mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis nga mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'on te rnam thos kyi bu'am/_'on 
[\[118a.5\]]te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig yin nam snyam mo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste/_/sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar/_/ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas/_/byang chub sems dpas nam nangs 
[\[118a.6\]]shes nas ni/_/mchog tu blta na mdzes par sham thabs bgos/_/lhung bzed thogs te dma' ba'i yid kyis su/_/de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs/_/gser gyi sa le sbram bzhin rab dul la/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa/_/skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud 
[\[118a.7\]]med kyis mthong na/_/su yang lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/_/srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan/_/gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i/_/sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes/_/skye bo sel cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang /_/bud med stong dag khang pa'i steng 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]'dug cing /_/de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang /_/srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas/_/de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lta/_/skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe/_/nyo dang 'tshong ba dag kyang mi byed cing /_/chang dad can yang chang ni mi 'thung la/_/khyim 
[\[118b.2\]]dang srang na 'dug par mi dga'o/_/rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/_/de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/_/grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod/_/lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes zhes zer/_/kha cig brgya byin lha yi rgyal zhes zer/_/gzhan dag 
[\[118b.3\]]'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer/_/de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang /_/gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha yi bu zhes zer/_/kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du/_/sgra gcan stobs ldan thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris zhes zer/_/kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du/_/ri rgyal skya la 
[\[118b.4\]]'dug pa 'di yin zer/_/rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur nas/_/yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo /_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mi de la/_/bsod 
[\[118b.5\]]snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes bsgo/_/ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas/_/kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras/_/gzugs can snying pos nam nangs zhes nas ni/_/mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te/_/ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song /_/ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar 
[\[118b.6\]]bar mthong /_/bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song /_/ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing /_/rtswa bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong /_/rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam 
[\[118b.7\]]byas nas/_/khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyis/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras/_/byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa/_/sa yi bdag po yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]tshe srungs shig_/kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su/_/re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung /_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan/_/lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs ldan na/_/nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te/_/bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_bdag khyod 
[\[119a.2\]]mthong bas mchog tu dga'/_/bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig_/bdag ni khyod la mnga' 'bul 'dod pa spyod/_/nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig_/slan chad sa gnas rtswa steng ma bzhugs shig_/khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon/_/
[\[119a.3\]]bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod/_/byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing gya gyu med/_/dga' 'gyur phan zhing snying brtse'i tshig smras pa/_/rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur/_/kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do/_/'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' 
[\[119a.4\]]yas ldan/_/sems can dmyal dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gror ltung /_/mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pas 'phags ma yin/_/kho bos ngar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor/_/'dod pa shing gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung /_/ji ltar sprin dang char pa bzhin du 'gro/_/mi brtan 'gyur 
[\[119a.5\]]la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/_/dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu/_/de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdung /_/rnyed du zin kyang chog par 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/gang tshe dbang med ma rung rab gyur pa/_/de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen bskyed/_/rgyal po lha yi 
[\[119a.6\]]'dod pa gang yin dang /_/mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i/_/'dod pa thams cad mi gcig gis thob kyang /_/de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo/_/rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa/_/'phags pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes gang /_/shes rab mkhas pas 
[\[119a.7\]]chog pa de legs chog_/'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med/_/rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing /_/sngan chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med/_/ji ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin/_/'dod pa bsten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel/_/rgyal po lus 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]la yang ltos de mi brtan/_/snying po med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin/_/bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag_/rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med/_/kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du/_/blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor te/_/mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob 
[\[119b.2\]]'dod nas/_/kho bo srid pa mi dga' nges par 'byung /_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal pos der smras pa/_/dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon/_/gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs/_/rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze'am rgyal po lags/_/dge slong khur gyi 'du shes 
[\[119b.3\]]med na gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad smras/_/rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong /_/mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur tam/_/kho bo'i pha yi ming ni zas gtsang yin/_/yon tan 'dod pas kho bo der rab byung /_/ma ga d+hA yi rgyal pos 'di skad 
[\[119b.4\]]smras/_/khyod mthong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags/_/gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma/_/'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa/_/thugs nas bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_/gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub brnyes gyur tshe/_/chos rjes bdag la 
[\[119b.5\]]chos kyi bgo bsha' mdzod/_/rang byung bdag gi yul na bzhugs pa ni/_/bdag gis mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do/_/de nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te/_/rgyal pos shin tu gus par bskor byas nas/_/mi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te/_/slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[119b.6\]]zhugs par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+hA yi grong zhugs te/_/ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug_/lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don byas nas/_/mi dbang nai ran dza na'i chu 'gram song /_/gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//
[\[119b.7\]]dge slong dag yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te/_de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun pa'i chos ston to/_/dge slong 
[\[120a\]]
