[\[120a.1\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshogs dang ldan pa tshogs can/_tshogs kyi slob dpon/_grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/_skye bo mang pos mchod pa/_mkhas pa/_kun gyis shes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[120a.2\]]rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/_tshogs can/_tshogs kyi slob dpon/_grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/_skye bo mang pos mchod pa/_mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na/_gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste/_brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni/_
[\[120a.3\]]'di bdag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/_mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /_'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma 
[\[120a.4\]]gyur gyis/_gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya'am/_bdag rangs 
[\[120a.5\]]byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/_bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/_'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya'am snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/_
[\[120a.6\]]rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig_/sus chos bstan pa kun shes/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad 
[\[120a.7\]]ces smras so/_/grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de/_'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyod kyis ci khong du chud/_smras pa/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo/_/byang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thob par 'tshal lo/_/smras pa/_de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste skyil mo krung bcas 
[\[120b.2\]]nas 'dug go/_/'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang /_ye shes kyi khyad par dang /_sngon spyad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang /_de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam 
[\[120b.3\]]gtan la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/_bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa 
[\[120b.4\]]dang /_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam las gong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/_des smras pa/_med do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad 
[\[120b.5\]]pa yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/_bdag la yang dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yod do snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 
[\[120b.6\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po khyod gang du nges par byung ba'i chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud do/_/des smras pa/_de bas na 'dong khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag la rjes su bslab bo zhes byang chub sems dpa' don 'thun pa dang /_slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go/_/byang chub 
[\[120b.7\]]sems dpas smras pa/_grogs po lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_'gog par 'gyur ba ma yin/_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/_mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/_rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas/_de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o/_/de'i 
[\[121a.2\]]tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal cing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma nus kyi/_dge sbyong gau ta mas tshegs chung ngus khong du chud cing mngon du 
[\[121a.3\]]byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing /_de las gong du tshol ba las the tshom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro/_/gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang 'ged par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang pos rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/_
[\[121a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing song song ngo /_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang /_ri ga yA'i bar na tshogs gzhan 
[\[121a.5\]]dag cig dus ston byed de/_tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang /_zas la 'gron du bos so/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+hAr yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+hA'i ri ga yA ga la ba der song ste/_der phyin 
[\[121a.6\]]par gyur to/_/ri ga yA'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/_de der gnas pa'i tshe/_sngon ma thos pa dang /_sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to/_/gsum gang zhe na/_dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas 'dod pa 
[\[121a.7\]]dag las sems dben par mi gnas shing /_de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la brkam pa dang /_'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin la/_de dag bdag 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong ste/_'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/_'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so/_/'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod la 
[\[121b.2\]]shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan dang /_shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du dge sbyong dang /_bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par mi gnas/_'dod pa rnams las sems dben par mi gnas te/_de dag gi 'dod 
[\[121b.3\]]pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la sred pa dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa la brkam pa dang /_'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang /_'dod pa la brgyal ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/_de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing /_lus la 
[\[121b.4\]]gdung bar byed pas/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so snyam ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o/_/yang 
[\[121b.5\]]de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang /_de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la 
[\[121b.6\]]thang la bzhag ste/_shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gis gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya 
[\[121b.7\]]bar mi nus so snyam ste/_'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o/_/gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing /_de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/_thams cad de bzhin du 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]sbyar te de dag gi de ni nye bar zhi ba yin te/_de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa myong mod kyi 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/_'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad 
[\[122a.2\]]par mngon du bya bar nus so/_/'di lta ste dper na skye bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang /_'od tshol bar gyur la/_des shing skam po'i gtsub stan dang /_gtsub shing thogs shing thang la bzhag ste gtsubs na/_des me dbyung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so/_/de bzhin 
[\[122a.3\]]du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/_tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/_'on kyang de mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/_'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i dpe 
[\[122a.4\]]gsum pa'o/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/_'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/_bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du 
[\[122a.5\]]sbyar te/_bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yin la bdag nyid kyis gnod par byas shing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par 
[\[122a.6\]]mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ga yA'i rir ga yA'i rtse mo la gnas te/_rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de na klung nai ran dza na chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bde 
[\[122a.7\]]ba/_shing dang shing gel pa mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' yid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_e ma'o sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam shing nyams dga' ba/_nang du yang dag 'jog 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]dang 'thun pa ste/_rigs kyi bu spong ba don du gnyer ba la ni 'dis chog go/_/bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i 
[\[122b.2\]]dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang /_lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang /_lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/_blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta 
[\[122b.3\]]ste/_sngags spyod pa dang lag pa la ldag pa dang /_mi slong ba dang /_mi smra ba dang /_rtsa ba du ma za ba dang /_sha dang nya mi za ba dang /_dbyar mi 'byung ba dang /_chang dang /_phub ma dang /_chu yongs su spangs pa dang /_khyim gcig dang /_gsum dang /_lnga dang bdun nas zas len pa dang /_
[\[122b.4\]]rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu dang /_nya lcibs dang /_rtswa ku sha dang /_lo ma dang /_ba lang gi lci ba dang /_ba'i gcin dang /_'o thug dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_bu ram dang /_ma brtags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang /_bya ngang pa dang /_phug ron gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te za ba dang /_grong 
[\[122b.5\]]dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang /_ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_khyi dang /_phag dang /_spre'u dang /_glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang /_'greng ba dang /_mi smra ba dang /_dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang /_kham gcig za ba dang /_kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang /_zas 
[\[122b.6\]]lan gcig za ba dang /_nyin zhag gcig za ba dang /_bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang /_zla ba la lta ba dang /_bya rgod dang /_'ug pa'i gshog pa thogs pa dang /_shing leb dang /_rtswa mun dza dang /_zar ma'i shun pa 
[\[122b.7\]]dang /_rtswa dUr ba dang /_gres ma dang /_rnga bal gyi la ba dang /_ra bal gyi la ba dang /_skra'i la ba dang /_ko lpags gyon pa dang /_gos gsher ba dang /_stegs bu'i steng dang /_chu'i nang na nyal ba dang /_thal ba dang /_rdo dang /_gyo mo dang /_shing leb dang /_tsher ma dang /_rtswa dang /_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang /_mgo thur du bstan pa dang /_tsog tsog por 'dug pa dang /_thang la nyal ba dang /_gos gcig dang /_gos gnyis dang /_gsum dang bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_gos mang po srel ba dang /_gcer 
[\[123a.2\]]bur 'dug pa dang /_'khru ba dang /_mi 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang /_skra dang /_sen mo dang /_ag tsom ring por 'jog pa dang /_ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang /_rgya shug dang /_til dang /_'bras 'bru gcig za ba dang /_thal ba dang /_snag tsa dang /_me tog spyad spyad pa dang 
[\[123a.3\]]rdul 'thul ba dang /_rdul nag po dang /_phyag dar dang /_rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang /_ba spu dang /_mi'i thod pa dang /_skra dang /_sen mo dang /_tshal bu'i smad g.yogs dang /_rdzab dang /_keng rus thogs pa dang /_chu dron po dang /_'bras kyi khu ba 
[\[123a.4\]]la bar btsags pa dang /_khrud ma 'thung ba dang /_mdag ma dang /_tshon rtsi dang /_gos ngur smrig dang /_khar ba gsum dang /_mgo 'dreg pa dang /_ril ba dang /_mi'i thod pa dang /_khri'i zur shing 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do/_/du ba rngub pa dang /_
[\[123a.5\]]me rngub pa dang /_nyi ma la lta ba dang /_gdung ba lnga byed pa dang /_rkang pa gcig dang /_lag pa gcig bstod pa dang /_rkang pa gcig btsugs pa dang /_gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub la sogs pa dang /_phub ma la sogs pa dang /_mdag ma bsregs pa dang /_
[\[123a.6\]]bum pa bsregs pa dang /_rdo bsregs pa dang /_me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang /_zas mi za ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_'bab stegs su song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba tshol lo/_/rab bsngags zhes bya ba dang /_gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang /_gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang /_gzhi 
[\[123a.7\]]tshugs zhes bya ba dang /_smon lam dang /_bstod pa dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_dbab pa dang /_sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang /_klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chud do/_/bdag dag par sems shing de dag la rten te/_'di lta ste tshangs pa dang /_dbang po dang /_gu lang dang /_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]khyab 'jug dang /_lha mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_ma mo dang /_ka t+ya'i bu dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_chu lha dang /_nor can gyi bu dang /_tha skar gyi bu dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[123b.2\]]'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_'khor dang /_tshogs dang /_mtshun dang /_sha za dang /_lha'i drang srong dang /_rgyal po'i drang srong dang /_tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag 'tshal zhing de dag la snying por 'du shes so/_/sa dang /_chu 
[\[123b.3\]]dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' la yang rten/_ri dang /_ri sul dang /_klung dang /_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_khron pa dang /_rdzing bu dang /_shing dang /_shing gel pa dang /_'khri shing dang /_rtswa dang /_sdong dum dang /_
[\[123b.4\]]lhas dang /_dur khrod dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_srang dag la yang rten to/_/khang pa dang /_ka ba dang /_rdo ba dang /_tho ba dang /_ral gri dang /_gzhu dang /_dgra sta dang /_mda' dang /_mdung thung dang /_rtse gsum pa dag la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/_/zho dang /_mar dang /_
[\[123b.5\]]yungs kar dang /_nas dang /_shing bal gyi phreng ba dang /_rtswa dUr ba dang /_nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa la bkra shis par 'dzin te/_gzhan mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rten to/_/'di na kha cig bdag cag 
[\[123b.6\]]gi mtho ris dang thar pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub po snyam du sems te/_de ltar log pa'i lam du song bas skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing /_bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la/_dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdag gis 
[\[123b.7\]]ci nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyi las dang bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam du bsams nas lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub shin tu drag po shin tu spyad par dka' ba/_
[\[124a.2\]]shin tu bya bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so/_/ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/_de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/_de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa 
[\[124a.3\]]ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do/_/ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na/_de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun 
[\[124a.4\]]tu 'gog ste/_bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med/_rnam par rtog pa med/_g.yo ba med/_sems pa med/_'gyur ba med cing thams cad du rjes su song ba/_thams cad la mi rten pa ste/_bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa'am/_mi slob pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_
[\[124a.5\]]spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so/_/mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/_khyab par mi byed pa byed pa med pa/_rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/_des thams cad khyab par byed pas na/_bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[124a.6\]]de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /_mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang /_lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang /_
[\[124a.7\]]sems can chad pa dang /_rtag par smra ba/_las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang /_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang /_ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang /_lus kyi stobs dang /_
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang /_sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/_byi dor ma byas pa'i sa tha mal pa la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir to/_/dge slong dag de nas nga dgun gyi tshes brgyad pa'i nub mo 
[\[124b.2\]]de ltar lus tshar bcad cing gzir bas/_mchan khung nas kyang rngul byung ste zags/_dpral ba nas kyang rngul byung ste zags nas sa la lhung ste zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig mgrin 
[\[124b.3\]]pa nas bzung ste btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na mchan khung nas kyang rngul byung zhing zags/_dpral ba nas kyang rngul byung zhing zags nas sa la lhung ste/_zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo /_/dge slong dag de nas 
[\[124b.4\]]ngas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/_dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang /_kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur te/_rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas 
[\[124b.5\]]sgra drag po chen po byung ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_sbud pa bus pa'i tshe sgra drag po dang /_sgra chen po byung ba de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang /_rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang /_sgra chen po byung ngo /_/dge slong dag de 
[\[124b.6\]]nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang /_de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang rna ba 'gags par gyur to/_/de dag 'gags pa dang /_rlung gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper 
[\[124b.7\]]na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btab pa de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to/_/der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kye ma'o kyi hud gzhon nu don grub 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes smras nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[125a.2\]]smras so/_/mi yi dbang po shAkya'i sras po 'di/_/brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad cing /_/'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par/_/mdzad nas dgon 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grang /_/kyi hud sems can snying po thugs dam brtan/_/mgon pos sngan chad bdag 
[\[125a.3\]]cag dga' ldan du/_/dam chos mchod sbyin la ni 'gron du bos/_/sems can dag khyod dam bcas de ga re/_/de nas lha de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste lha mo sgyu 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod do/_/de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs 
[\[125a.4\]]kyis bskor nas/_nam phyed tsam na klung nai ran dza na'i 'gram ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang /_des byang chub sems dpa' lus skams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas mchi mas brnangs shing ngus nas/_de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[125a.5\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/lum bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshal du nga bu btsas pa'i tshe/_/seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song /_/phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes/_/khyod kyis tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong ma rdzogs/_/'jig rten 
[\[125a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong nag pos bstan pa yi/_/de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtag des ma mthong /_/bus ni yid dga' 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la/_/byang chub kyang ni rjes su ma thob tshul du shi bar gyur/_/bu phyir su la bsgrub phyir sdug bsngal su yi 
[\[125a.7\]]gan du mdud/_/bdag gi bu gcig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_shin tu snying rje bar ni ngu byed cing /_/skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnams bor ba/_/shin tu bu yi smre sngags 'don byed la/_/sa steng 'dug cing 'greng ba 'di su 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]zhig/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa/_/bdag gis zla ba bcu bar du/_/rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs/_/bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te/_/rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smre/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa/_bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu 
[\[125b.2\]]yod par byas/_ma 'jigs shig_/sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod pa ste/_drang srong nag pos bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o/_/mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o/_/sa ni rnam brgyar 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid/_/
[\[125b.3\]]rin chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phyo srid/_/nyi zla skar tshogs sa la ltung 'gyur srid/_/so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'chi/_/de phyir 'di la mya ngan khyod ma byed/_/ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong /_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rab tu dga' ste ba spu g.yos nas byang chub 
[\[125b.4\]]sems dpa' la me tog man dA ra bas gtor te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_lha'i sil snyan dkrol zhing /_rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo /_dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa yod kyis/_
[\[125b.5\]]ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/_zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med par zos so/_/dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste de'i tshe'i rgya shug kyang 
[\[125b.6\]]'di nyid tsam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos pas lus shin tu nyam chung zhing rid par gyur to/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang /_ka li ka'i tshigs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying 
[\[125b.7\]]lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs kyang de 'dra bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na bzhon pa'i bres khang ngam/_glang po'i bres khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhigs pa ni gdung rten gyi bar snang 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]zhing mngon no/_/de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi nang snang zhing mngon no/_/'di lta ste dper na lan bur blas pa ni mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur to/_/de bzhin du nga'i sgal tshigs kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi 
[\[126a.2\]]mnyam par gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na kub kha bo gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang /_kun tu rnyis pa dang rtsum rtsum por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nga'i mgo yang rnyis pa dang kun tu rnyis pa dang rtsum rtsum por gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la khron pa'i skar ma dma' 
[\[126a.3\]]bar song ste tshegs chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu yang khung du song ste tshegs chen pos snang bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na nga'i rkang pa'am rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mchan khung dang lto dang brang la sogs pa yang de 'dra bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de 
[\[126a.4\]]nas nga gang gi tshe lag pas lto ba la byug go snyam na sgal tshigs nyid la reg go/_/ldang ngo snyam nas langs na yang de bzhin du sgur por gyur te 'gyel to/_/sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang /_ba spu rul ba thams cad lus las lhags so/_/gang 
[\[126a.5\]]sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang bas med par gyur to/_/nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang nga la 'di ltar/_e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gnag go/_/e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so/_/
[\[126a.6\]]e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mang ku ra'i mdog 'dra'o/_/sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas mngon par 
[\[126a.7\]]shes te/_ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/_gnyis su med pa zos so/_/dge slong dag khyod 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i 'bras che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/_de'i tshe 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig zos pas 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]lus myur du snga ma bzhin du gyur te/_e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma nya mad ku ra'i mdog 'dra'o/_/sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu nyid la nan 
[\[126b.2\]]tan bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/_ngas zas su til 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyis su med pa zos pa nas/_de'i kha dog 'jam po med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig 
[\[126b.3\]]zas mi za bas dag par sems te/_bdag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas/_dge slong dag de nas zas mi za bar 'dug go/_/dge slong dag ngas zas ma zos pas lus shin tu skams shing nyam chung ba dang rid par gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na 
[\[126b.4\]]ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang /_ka li ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis 'gyur dang /_sum 'gyur dang /_bzhi 'gyur dang /_lnga 'gyur dang /_bcu 'gyur gyis nga'i yan lag dang /_nying lag skems par gyur te/_'di lta ste rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs 
[\[126b.5\]]dang /_bzhon pa'i bres khang lta bur gyur to/_/sgal tshigs ni lan bu blas pa lta bur gyur to/_/mgo'i thod pa ni ku ba kha bo lta bur gyur to/_/mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to/_/dge slong dag nga legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod na/_sgur por gyur 
[\[126b.6\]]te 'gyel to/_/sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa/_lag pas phyis pa dang /_ba spu rul pa thams cad lus las lhags so/_/gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur to/_/nga'i spyod 
[\[126b.7\]]yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyang /_'di ltar e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gnag go/_/e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sngo bsangs so/_/e ma'o dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nya mad ku ra'i mdog 'dra'o/_/sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]par gyur to snyam du shes so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du pho nya gtong ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang /_bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang 
[\[127a.2\]]bya ba la gzud pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir til 'bru gcig dang /_rgya shug 'bru gcig dang /_'bras 'bru gcig gis lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa 
[\[127a.3\]]bstan te yid dman pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas/_ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te/_spyod lam nyams pa med do/_/nyi mas bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo /_/grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo /_/rlung dang nyi ma dang char pa'i 
[\[127a.4\]]skyabs ma btsal to/_/sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sdig sbrul ma bskrad do/_/bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs ma bor ro/_/bskum pa dang /_smyang ba ma byas so/_/glos phab pa'am/_khas buba'am/_gan rkyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so/_/sprin chen 
[\[127a.5\]]po dang /_yul ngan chen po dang /_char pa dang /_ser ba dang /_ston dang /_dpyid dang /_dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go/_/tha na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyabs so/_/dbang po yang ma bkag go/_/dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs 
[\[127a.6\]]so/_/gang dag der 'ong ba grong gi gzhon nu'am/_grong gi gzhon nu ma'am/_ba lang rdzi'am/_phyugs rdzi'am/_rtswa thun nam/_shing thun nam/_lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rdul khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/_de las sa skud do/_/der byang chub sems 
[\[127a.7\]]dpa' lo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang /_god pa dang rid par gyur te/_de'i rna ba gnyis su rtswa 'am shing bal bcug nas sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/_/sna'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to/_/rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to/_/khar 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gang 'byin to/_/snar bcug nas rna ba dang /_sna dang khar 'byin to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du 
[\[127b.2\]]gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do/_/smon lam yang 'debs so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dag theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so/_/
[\[127b.3\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim byung ba/_/yon tan dag dang ldan pa de/_/sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir/_/thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes/_/snyigs ma lnga yi dus kyi tshe/_/chos dma' mos pa'i 'jig rten po/_/las dang bya bor 'jig rten du/_/
[\[127b.4\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skyes par gyur/_/mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gang /_/ltad mo dang ni ltas su lta/_/lus la gnod pa bya ba byed/_/byis pa de dag dag par sems/_/g.yang sa me dang mya ngam 'jug_/sgren mo sa dang lci bas skud/_/lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir/_/gdung ba lnga 
[\[127b.5\]]la brtson dang ldan/_/lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang /_/mi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag_/bum pa khar gzhong las mi len/_/sgo dang ka bas chod mi len/_/gang na khyi yod pa nas min/_/'dug ce'am tshur shog ces las min/_/khyim nas kha zas gcig len pas/_/bdag 
[\[127b.6\]]ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems/_/mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho/_/nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong /_/ldam ldum sre da pad ma'i rtsa/_/gzegs dang ba lang lci ba za/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu lo ma za/_/ku sha tshal bu la ba lpags/_/srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu/_/glen pa 'di bden gzhan 
[\[127b.7\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]snyam/_/lag pa sgreng bar byed pa dang /_/skra bsgreng ral pa bsgreng ba dag_/lam las rab tu rnam par nyams/_/lam min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod/_/rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal/_/tsher mar nyal zhing tsog pur 'dug_/kha cig rkang pa gcig pus 'greng /_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gdong bstod nyi dang zla la lta/_/chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang /_/rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang /_/shing dang ri yi rtse mo dang /_/rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/glen pa de dag gnod mang gis/_/lus ni yongs su skom par byed/_/log par lta dang ldan pa 
[\[128a.2\]]dag_/myur du ngan song rnams su ltung /_/nga ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang /_/dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang mis/_/spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i/_/dka' spyad drag po rtsom snyam sems/_/bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis/_/blta bar nus pa ma yin pa'i/_/rdo rje 
[\[128a.3\]]lta bur brtan gnas pa/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/mu stegs brtul zhugs ngan pa yis/_/dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod/_/de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po brtsams/_/sa steng ci yang ma bting bar/_/skyil mo krung 
[\[128a.4\]]ni bcas te 'dug_/rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig_/za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston/_/dbugs dbyung rngub pa rnam par spangs/_/stobs dang ldan pa g.yo ba med/_/lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog_/nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed/_/rtog dang rnam 
[\[128a.5\]]par rtog med pa/_/g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med/_/nam mkha'i khams su khyab pa yi/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/de ni nyin las grib mar ram/_/grib las nyi mar song ma byas/_/lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam 
[\[128a.6\]]gtan byed/_/rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang /_/sdig sprul sbrang bu skyob mi byed/_/rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed pa min/_/gzhan du snying rje sems kyis 
[\[128a.7\]]ni/_/'jig rten don mang ched du bsgom/_/grong gi byis pa ba lang rdzi/_/shing thun dag dang rtswa thun dag/_/de la rdul khrod 'dre snyam sems/_/de la sa yis skud byed cing /_/mi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed/_/de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang /_/g.yo ba med cing 'khrugs 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]med par/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/mtho ba med cing dma' ba med/_/lus ma bsrungs par chos ma reg_/bshang ba mi byed gci mi byed/_/sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta/_/sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur te/_/lags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus/_/
[\[128b.2\]]sgal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang /_/lan bu blas pa ci bzhin no/_/gang dag lhag par byas lha dang /_/lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu/_/yon tan ldan pa mngon sum bas/_/nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed/_/ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam 
[\[128b.3\]]gtan byed/_/de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces/_/smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed/_/snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi/_/don mang phyir byed ma gtogs par/_/bdag phyir ma yin bde blos min/_/bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min/_/phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom/_/mu 
[\[128b.4\]]stegs blo nyams zil gyis mnan/_/mgo reg byang chub ga la yod/_/byang chub bskal mang rnyed dka' zhes/_/'od srung la ni tshig smras pa'i/_/las dang bya ba rab tu bstan/_/skye bo dag ni dga' bya'i phyir/_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/lha mi khrag 
[\[128b.5\]]khrig bcu gnyis tshang /_/theg pa gsum la rab tu btul/_/de yi ched du blo gros bzang /_/mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_bcu bdun pa'o//_//dge slong dag bdud sdig can yang byang chub sems 
[\[128b.6\]]dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_glags bltas skabs btsal kyang nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/_/de glags ma rnyed nas yi chad de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang /_/nags 
[\[128b.7\]]tshal gel pa sgra med dang /_/lteng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na/_/chu klung nai ran dza na der/_/spong ba'i phyir ni brtson par byas/_/rtag tu mthu rtsal brtan pa po/_/grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/_/brtson pas rab tu rtul de la/_/bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig_/smra bar byed cing 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]'ongs par gyur/_/kye srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis/_/gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur/_/gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa/_/de dag byas na mya ngan med/_/khyod ni mdog nyams dman par gyur/_/khyod ni shi la thug cing 'dug_/'chi ba'i cha ni stong 
[\[129a.2\]]snyed tsam/_/cha gcig tsam cig gson par zad/_/sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin/_/me yi sbyin sreg sbyin sreg byos/_/'on kyang bsod nams chen por 'gyur/_/spong ba yis ni ci zhig bya/_/spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal te/_/sems dul ba ni bya dka' zhes/_/de tshe bdud kyis 
[\[129a.3\]]de skad tshig_/byang chub sems dpa' de la smras/_/de skad smra ba'i bdud de la/_/byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras/_/sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po/_/khyod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs/_/nga la bsod nams chud zad kyang /_/don du gnyer ba med do bdud/_/gang dag bsod 
[\[129a.4\]]nams don du gnyer/_/de la de skad smra ba'i rigs/_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas/_/mi 'chi snyam du nga mi sems/_/tshangs par spyod la gzhol gyur pas/_/phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o/_/chu klung dag gi chu rgyun kyang /_/rlung gis rnam par skems byed na/_/spangs pa nyid kyi 
[\[129a.5\]]khrag tsam lta/_/'di yis ci phyir skams mi 'gyur/_/khrag ni skams par gyur pa dang /_/de yi 'og tu sha skams 'gyur/_/sha ni zad par gyur pa dang /_/phyir zhing sems ni dang bar 'gyur/_/phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang /_/ting nge 'dzin kyang gnas par 
[\[129a.6\]]'gyur/_/nga ni de ltar gnas pas na/_/tshor ba dam pa thob gyur kyang /_/lus dang srog la mi lta ste/_/sran thub dag par gyur la ltos/_/nga la 'dun pa yod gyur cing /_/brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod/_/nga yi brtson 'grus bskyod nus pa/_/'jig rten de ni ngas ma 
[\[129a.7\]]mthong /_/srog chad shi ba ches bla ste/_/'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min/_/g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste/_/pham nas gson pa de lta min/_/sdar ma dpung las mi rgyal te/_/dpa' bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med/_/bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bya/_/'dod pa khyod kyi dang po'i dpung /_/mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin/_/khyod kyi gsum pa bkres dang skom/_/sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin/_/rmugs dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste/_/'jigs pa drug par brjod pa yin/_/khyod kyi the tshom bdun pa ste/_/khro dang 'chab pa brgyad 
[\[129b.2\]]pa yin/_/'thob dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang /_/log par grags pa gang thob dang /_/bdag la stod par byed pa dang /_/gzhan la smod par byed pa dang /_/de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu/_/lhung ba'i bdud kyi dpung yin no/_/dge sbyong bram ze kha cig ni/_/'di na glags 
[\[129b.3\]]lta 'khod par snang /_/khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyis/_/'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba/_/so btang ma byas snod chus bzhin/_/shes rab kyis ni de dag gzhig_/dran pa legs par nyer bzhag ste/_/shes rab legs par bsgoms byas nas/_/shes bzhin du ni spyod 
[\[129b.4\]]par bya/_/blo ngan khyod kyis ci byar yod/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_yi ma rangs nas yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[129b.5\]]bam po bcu gnyis pa/_dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang /_lus la gdung ba byed de/_sdug bsngal drag po tsha ba mi bzad pa/_
[\[129b.6\]]yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas de dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba myong ngo snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_spyod pa 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/_'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du ma byas te 'di ni byang chub kyi 
[\[129b.7\]]lam ma yin/_lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/_byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod do snyam mo/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_ngas 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pha'i skyed mos tshal du shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste/_'dod pa rnams las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang 
[\[130a.2\]]po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te skye ba dang /_rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas/_de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/_nga'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/_/ngas 
[\[130a.3\]]'di snyam du bsams te/_'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya mi nus so/_/gal te nga 'di ltar lus ngan cing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying brtse 
[\[130a.4\]]ba byas par mi 'gyur te/_'di yang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/_ngas kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/_de nas gdod byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de na lha'i bu gang dag nga la mos pa de dag gis nga'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 
[\[130a.5\]]sems kyis shes nas/_nga ga la ba der 'ongs te nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig_/bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis 
[\[130a.6\]]dam bcas la/_bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen kor ba rnams kyis kyang /_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par yang shes te/_nga la mos pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/_ngas shin tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras par gyur 
[\[130a.7\]]to snyam ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba spang ba'i phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' bar sems btud do/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul zhugs dang dka' thub nyams su blangs nas/_stan de las langs 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]te/_kha zas rags pa 'di lta ste bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /_mon sran sde'u yi khu bcud dang /_ha re nu kha'i khu bcud dang /_zan dang /_'bras chan dang /_'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do/_/dge slong dag de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge sbyong gau ta mas lam 
[\[130b.2\]]'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon du byed ma nus na kha zas rags pa 'di zos te/_bsod nyams la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsams nas byang 
[\[130b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/_grong khyer bA rA Na sIr song nas drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su gnas so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong pa'i bu mo gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so/_/lnga sde 
[\[130b.4\]]bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug 'bru gcig dang /_'bras 'bru gcig dang /_til 'bru gcig dbul ba yang phul lo/_/grong pa'i bu mo bcu ni bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang /_stobs sbed ma dang /_shin tu sdug dang /_sde las rnam par rgyal dang /_a ti 
[\[130b.5\]]mug ta ka'i phreng ba can dang /_mdzes ma dang /_rdza byed ma dang /_skra lcang lo rgyas dang /_ral bu can dang /_legs skyes ma zhes bya ba ste/_gzhon nu ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos 
[\[130b.6\]]nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas mdog dang /_gzugs dang /_stobs dang ldan par gyur to/_/de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes pa/_dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to/_/dge slong dag de na byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' 
[\[130b.7\]]ba spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang /_lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin gcig bzhin du/_bram ze brgyad brgya zan byin zhing 'di skad du bdag gi zas zos pas byang chub sems 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo/_/dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/_ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_gal te bdag gis 'doms yog 'ga' zhig rnyed na re stes snyam 
[\[131a.2\]]mo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te/_dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthong nas/_ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/_dgus nas lag pa 
[\[131a.3\]]g.yas pa brkyang pa dang /_de nas sa bla'i lhas bar snang gi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/_grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/_phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/_grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du 
[\[131a.4\]]byung ba'o/_/bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o/_/'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan 
[\[131a.5\]]pa la'o/_/dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o/_/'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o/_/skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i 
[\[131a.6\]]rigs su skyes pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/_phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/_'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang /_brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/_
[\[131a.7\]]bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/_gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo/_/de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang /_der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/_deng sang du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]te/_bdag gis chu ni rnyed na/_gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdo leb cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang /_skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb bzhag nas/_de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems 
[\[131b.2\]]dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang kho bos bkru'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid kyis bkrus so/_/de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa 
[\[131b.3\]]dang /_bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gang ba mthon po zhig sprul to/_/rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba dang /_lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing de'i lha mo la smras pa/_lha 
[\[131b.4\]]mo shing gi yal ga smod cig_/des kyang shing yal ga smad nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'jus te byung ngo /_/byung nas kyang shing sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te/_deng sang du'ang de phyag dar khrod pa drubs pa zhes ming du grag go/_/de nas gnas 
[\[131b.5\]]gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des/_lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon du btsos pa rung ba dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul 
[\[131b.6\]]gyi grong du phyogs pa dang /_de na lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/_khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas de kha zas rags pa bzang 
[\[131b.7\]]po bza' bar sems kyis/_sngon khyod kyis bdag gi zas zos nas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyi bya ba de gyis shig_/dge slong dag de nas grong mi 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du snying khur byas pa bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba snying po can blangs te/_blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras sar pa sar pa dag dang /_phru ba sar par blugs nas thab sar 
[\[132a.2\]]bar btsugs te/_kha zas de sgrub bo/_/de sgrub pa na snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/_'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u dang /_bkra shis pa dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_pad ma dang /_sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo /_/de nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/_ltas 
[\[132a.3\]]'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/_byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tsom med do snyam pa dang /_rgya mtsho pa shes shing cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par gyur nas/_des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob pa nyid du lung bstan to/_/de nas legs skyes 
[\[132a.4\]]mas thug pa de tshos pa dang thang la bzhag ste/_me tog gis gtor/_spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting ste/_bran mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/_gong ma song la bram ze bos shig_/ngas ni 'o thug sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o/_/jo mo legs so zhes de'i ltar mnyan nas/_shar 
[\[132a.5\]]phyogs logs su song ba dang /_des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs logs su song na yang de dang der des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe na 
[\[132a.6\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan mu stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa gda' ba las/_dge sbyong ngam 
[\[132a.7\]]bram ze gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi gda'o/_/legs skyes mas smras pa/_de nyid bram ze yin te/_de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/_gong ma song la de nyid bos shig_/jo mo legs so zhes smras te/_gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te legs skyes 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste stan bting ba la 'dug go/_/dge slong dag de nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/_
[\[132b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/_legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu 'di byin pa 'di bdag gis deng zos te/_the tsom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[132b.3\]]byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/_des smras pa/_khyod snoms shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so/_/legs skyes mas smras 
[\[132b.4\]]pa/_ci dgyes su mdzod cig_/bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la yang zas mi stsol to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te/_lteng rgyas nas byung nas dro la bab pa dang /_klu'i klung chu bo nai ran dza na'i ngogs su song ste/_zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gcig tu 
[\[132b.5\]]bzhag nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir klung nai ran dza na'i nang du zhugs so/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ga ru dang /_tsan 
[\[132b.6\]]dan gyi phye ma dang /_byug pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro/_/de'i tshe klung chen po nai ran dza na lha'i spos rnams dang /_me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de 
[\[132b.7\]]lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te mchod rten du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir rang rang gi gnas su khyer ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skra dang ag tshom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/_mchod rten du bya 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' klung nas byung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la lta'o/_/de nas klung nai ran dza na'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/_yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/_
[\[133a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/_grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/_ji tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so/_/'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro/_/bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 
[\[133a.3\]]mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas mig stong pa grong khyer 'jig pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de dbrog tu brgal na ma nus 
[\[133a.4\]]nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/_bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su khyer ro/_/khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyi dus ston byas te/_deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du 
[\[133a.5\]]snod chen po'i dus ston byed do/_/seng ge'i khri de yang klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs 
[\[133a.6\]]kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_'od 'dom gang ba yang byung bar gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lo drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas 
[\[133a.7\]]bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam sems/_/gal te bdag ni 'di ltar rid bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa/_/shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni/_/de dag na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur/_/
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes tshol/_/de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas/_/kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed pa byas na ni/_/shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang 
[\[133b.2\]]rgyar bya bar bsams/_/grong pa'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de/_/'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed/_/de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de tshe 'o thug sbrang rtsi can blangs te/_/klung gi 'gram du song nas 
[\[133b.3\]]dga' ba'i yid kyis nai ran dza na'i ngogs na 'dug_/bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de/_/lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te nai ran dza na ra 'ongs/_/pha rol brgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar bsams nas ni/_/
[\[133b.4\]]thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying brtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru/_/bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag_/klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don du chu la gang bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri med nges pa bkrus te ngogs na 
[\[133b.5\]]'dug par shes gyur nas/_/lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer/_/ngur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin/_/rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung ngogs na 'dug_/klu yi bu mo dga' 
[\[133b.6\]]zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge'i khri yang bshams/_/de la 'jig rten dag gi mig byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas/_/blo gros ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin/_/rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes 
[\[133b.7\]]byas/_/blo gros ldan pas ji tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni chur bor te/_/de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer/_/gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos pa de yi skad cig la/_/de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]yang snga mkho bzhin du gnas/_/legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas/_/seng ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros kyis byang chub shing drung chas/_/nai ran dza na'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[134a.2\]]dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung nai ran dza nar khrus byas te/_zas zos nas lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/_bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la ba der skyes bu chen po'i stabs gang yin 
[\[134a.3\]]pa'i stabs des song ste/_mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang /_dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang /_ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang /_mi dngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang /_ya yo med pa'i stabs dang /_'tshe ba med pa'i stabs dang /_rings pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[134a.4\]]stabs dang /_sdod pa med pa'i stabs dang /_'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang /_'khyor pa med pa'i stabs dang /_'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang /_zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang /_ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang /_mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang /_rtab rtab po med pa'i stabs dang /_
[\[134a.5\]]tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang /_dri ma med pa'i stabs dang /_dge ba'i stabs dang /_zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang /_gti mug med pa'i stabs dang /_chags pa med pa'i stabs dang /_seng ge'i stabs dang /_dad pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang /_sred med 
[\[134a.6\]]kyi bu'i stabs dang /_sa la mi reg pa'i stabs dang /_rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang /_sor mo dra bas 'brel cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang /_so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang /_ri rdob pa'i stabs dang /_mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i 
[\[134a.7\]]rkang mthil gyi stabs dang /_dra ba'i bar nas 'od dang 'od zer phyung nas sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang /_pad ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang /_sngon dge ba legs par spyad pa'i 'gros kyi stabs dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhud pa'i 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]stabs dang /_rdo rje ltar bsam pa brtan zhing mi phyed pa'i stabs dang /_ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang /_bde ba thams cad skyed pa'i stabs dang /_thar pa'i lam ston pa'i stabs dang /_bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang /_ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi 
[\[134b.2\]]tshogs phas kyi rgol ba chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa'i stabs dang /_mun pa'i ling thog dang /_nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang /_'khor ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[134b.3\]]rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang /_rang byung zil gyis [(]mnon [,]gnon [)]pa'i stabs dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang /_dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba'i 
[\[134b.4\]]stabs dang /_rga ba dang 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang /_zhi ba rdul med pa/_bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/_de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar klung 
[\[134b.5\]]nai ran dza na dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to/_/char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab bo/_/me tog kyang chal mar bkram mo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed 
[\[134b.6\]]yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to/_/gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po logs su mgo bstan te nyal lo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang 
[\[134b.7\]]dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to/_/klung nai ran dza na nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bkod par gyur to/_/lam de'i 'gram 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]g.yas g.yos su'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/_steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/_lha'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par sprul to/_/mda' rgyang gang tsam/_mda' rgyang gang tsam gyi 
[\[135a.2\]]zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul te/_shing ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go/_/shing ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spos chus yongs su gang ba gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/_me tog ud pa la dang /_pad 
[\[135a.3\]]ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po la sogs pas gang ba/_rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/_nor bu rin po che bai dU r+yas them skas brgyan pa/_chu sreg dang /_bya gar dang /_ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so/_/lam de na lha'i bu mo 
[\[135a.4\]]brgyad khri ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so/_/lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro/_/shing ta la thams cad kyi mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go/_/rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma'i phur ma 
[\[135a.5\]]thogs pa dang /_dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i pog phor thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to/_/rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu skyod/_'od zer 
[\[135a.6\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/_sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/_me tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/_gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/_rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung /_rta dang glang po che dang /_glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/_bya ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_
[\[135a.7\]]ka la ping ka dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/_bkra shis brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo /_/gang gi nub mo byang chub 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/byang chub 
[\[135b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/_dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/_go cha sra ba mnabs pa/_thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tshar phyin pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa 
[\[135b.3\]]thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 
[\[135b.4\]]'das pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/_ded dpon chen por gyur pa/_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/_
[\[135b.5\]]stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/_chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/_tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pas 
[\[135b.6\]]pad ma chen po lta bu/_chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/_rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/_mi g.yo ba/_mi bskyod pa/_ri rab chen po lta bu/_shin tu dri ma med pa/_shin tu yongs su dag pa/_shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/_nor 
[\[135b.7\]]bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/_chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba/_sems las su rung ba/_tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang /_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /_seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa 
[\[136a.2\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang /_sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang /_chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[136a.3\]]kyi snying por bzhud kyis/_de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig_/de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid 
[\[136a.4\]]dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang /_/btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs pa'i lam snang ba/_/bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur/_/thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa 
[\[136a.5\]]legs par bya/_/de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te/_/lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lo drug bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud/_/kun kyang 
[\[136a.6\]]dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis/_/de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste/_/brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med/_/gang btsas tshe na zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu 
[\[136a.7\]]g.yos gyur pa/_/de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud/_/gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing /_/gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la/_/gang gi gsung 'dir 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing /_/gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong /_/gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang /_/nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 
[\[136b.2\]]'dod dang /_/gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi ba 'chi med 'thob 'dod dang /_/gal te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis/_/gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang /_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skar khung bsil 
[\[136b.3\]]khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang /_/me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa skyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang /_/rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs/_/dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la stong 
[\[136b.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_gyo mo dang rdo med pa dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byu ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul mang ba/_rtswa sngo zhing 'jam la g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yung 
[\[136b.5\]]drung 'khyil pa ka tsa lin di ka'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to/_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 
[\[136b.6\]]'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang mi'i las 
[\[136b.7\]]shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brgyan par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur snang bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar dag dang /_
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ri nag po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo /_/byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/_/'di lta ste/_lha'i bu 
[\[137a.2\]]ud ka li zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu mud ka li zhes bya ba dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang /_dpa' stobs dang /_dpung rgyan stobs dang /_rab brtan dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_snang byed dang /_dri ma med dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_'gro grub dang /_mig thogs pa med 
[\[137a.3\]]dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang /_pad ma'i 'od de/_lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag ste/_thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/_/de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 
[\[137a.4\]]byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/_dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor/_shing ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang /_rin po che brgyus pa rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor/_'dzam 
[\[137a.5\]]bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs bam rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang /_gser gyi tsong tsong dag dang /_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma dag gis ni khebs par byas/_snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/_rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[137a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/_bzang ba mngon du mchod pa/_lha yul ba dang /_mi yul ba gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang /_thang las skye ba'i 
[\[137a.7\]]me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]snying po brgyan par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to/_/de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/_de dag lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dag gis mthong 
[\[137b.2\]]nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes skyed par gyur to/_/bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/_e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do/_/byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi yod de 
[\[137b.3\]]'di lta ste/_'od ma dang /_snyan ldan dang /_yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_mdangs ldan ma ste/_byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/_sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_
[\[137b.4\]]me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/_khrun dang sboms phun sum tshogs pa mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_shin tu 'gel ba/_'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho ba/_de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba/_bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_rin po che sna bdun 
[\[137b.5\]]gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/_rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang /_rin po che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bskor ba/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol dang 'dra ba/_mig gis blta 
[\[137b.6\]]bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do/_/gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/_sra ba/_snying po yod pa/_mi phyed pa/_rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par 
[\[137b.7\]]gyur pa'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/_'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to/_/mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to/_/ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to/_/sems can 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to/_/mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to/_/'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to/_/bcing bas bcings pa rnams 
[\[138a.2\]]ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to/_/sems can dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to/_/nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par gyur to/_/bkres pa rnams ni lto 'grangs par gyur to/_/skom pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to/_/sbrum ma rnams ni 
[\[138a.3\]]bde bar btsas par gyur to/_/zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_khro ba dang /_chags pa dang /_tha ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_phrag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to/_/
[\[138a.4\]]de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/_'pho ba med/_skye ba med do/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes bskyed par gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar/_/dmyal ba 
[\[138a.5\]]mi bzad snang ba yi/_/sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/bde ba'i tshor ba thob par 'gyur/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams/_/phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa/_/thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na/_/de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[138a.6\]]rnams/_/bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur/_/mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing /_/ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur/_/sems can thams cad bder gyur te/_/lha yi bde bas rab tu tshim/_/mig dang rna ba 
[\[138a.7\]]med pa dang /_/gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams/_/de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing /_/yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i/_/nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang /_/gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun/_/zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan/_/
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]smyos pa dag ni dran ldan zhing /_/dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan/_/nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing /_/bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur/_/ser sna med cing dgra med de/_/gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag_/phan tshun byed pa med gyur te/_/de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas/_/pha dang 
[\[138b.2\]]ma dag bu gcig la/_/ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems can phan tshun du/_/de tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis/_/phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang /_/gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/_/zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[138b.3\]]gsal/_/ri bo nag po rnams dang ni/_/khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur/_/rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun/_/gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang /_/lag mthil lta bur gyur pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/_/zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas/_/thams cad rin 
[\[138b.4\]]chen nyid du snang /_/byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa/_/lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod/_/dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang /_/byang chub snying po brgyan par gyur/_/zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na/_/bkod pa chen po gang yod pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/de dag thams cad der 
[\[138b.5\]]yang snang /_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la/_/dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur/_/'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas/_/lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur/_/bsod nams gang gi rgyu 'thun 'dir/_/phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs 
[\[138b.6\]]'tshar/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/_/brtson par byed pa med par yang /_/de yi yid la 'dod pa dang /_/bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/_/ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang /_/sngon spyod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa/_/las de'i rnam par smin pa yis/_/'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 
[\[138b.7\]]'di byung /_/byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis/_/lha yi shing ni yongs 'du ba/_/de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis/_/byang chub snying por brgyan par byas/_/byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang /_/lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_/yon tan de dag tshig gis ni/_/thams cad brjod par yong 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mi nus/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba rnam par dag pa/_dri ma med pa/_lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' bskyed pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/_sems can la dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu 
[\[139a.2\]]dga' ba thams cad skyed pa des klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas/_de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'di gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lha der gyur pa las/_/ji ltar 
[\[139a.3\]]'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba mthong ba dang /_/ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar/_/mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig 'byung du the tshom med/_/sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi 
[\[139a.4\]]khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang /_/khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gis rgya cher 'od kyang yong mi snang /_/me dang nor bu dag dang dri med glog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang /_/brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang na/_/de ring khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi 
[\[139a.5\]]dge bas mdzes gyur la/_/sems kyang dga' bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur te/_/lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shin tu gsal/_/klu yi me tog mdzes dang 
[\[139a.6\]]bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shal dang /_/rgyan dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la/_/glu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga bzang /_/brdung zhing 'gro bla kun gyis mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'deng /_/
[\[139a.7\]]de ni langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang /_/de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig_/lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'di zhes ston cing 'dong ba mthong /_/klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te/_/gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug_/klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed/_/me tog rnams
