[\[139b.2\]]dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed/_/klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis bstod/_/'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs/_/bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba 
[\[139b.3\]]khyod kyang de 'dra ste/_/de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phang brnyes par 'gyur/_/gang gi don du sngan chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la/_/gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms/_/gang gi don du brtson 
[\[139b.4\]]'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/_/khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud/_/ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la bskor ba 
[\[139b.5\]]rab bgyid cing /_/ji ltar tsa sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang /_/ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' la mchi zhing tshul du shis ldan par/_/dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/_/ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta 
[\[139b.6\]]bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchis te/_/ji ltar ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye dgu'i sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang /_/ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun tshad bser ma'ang dal bus ldang ba las/_/srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur/_/ji ltar lha 
[\[139b.7\]]rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang /_/tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang /_/gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las/_/srid pa gsum du skye rga thar ba mdzad pa'i sman 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]pa'i rgyal po de ring byon/_/ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la/_/bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs/_/ji ltar pad ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dog sa brtol byung ste/_/
[\[140a.2\]]de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma'i gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud/_/de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa'am g.yos ma nus/_/mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang gA 
[\[140a.3\]]klung gi bye ma snyed/_/khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes/_/rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar ltung gda'/_/ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur yang gda'/_/skyes bu mkhas 
[\[140a.4\]]pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'/_/khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi gda'/_/gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang /_/byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed 
[\[140a.5\]]par gyur/_/bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur cing /_/glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi/_/dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba klu'i bu mo rin po che'i 
[\[140a.6\]]gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_lha'i dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_pog phor sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_sil snyan dang glu 
[\[140a.7\]]dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do/_/'khrul pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi 'dzem bag mi tsha/_/ma zhum mi 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dman rab tu dgyes par gdul dka' ba/_/ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba/_/chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba 'dul mdzad pa/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog_/gnas dang skyabs ma mchis 
[\[140b.2\]]shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni/_/'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo /_/ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te/_/me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang /_/'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las/_/de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu 
[\[140b.3\]]dgyes par mdzod/_/shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs/_/bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol/_/sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar/_/byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgyar mdzod/_/khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal pa bye 
[\[140b.4\]]mang du/_/'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad/_/khyod kyis dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la da bab kyis/_/shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci 
[\[140b.5\]]zhig la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo/_/de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsams te/_rtswa bting nas bzhugs so snyam mo/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis byang 
[\[140b.6\]]chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/de de bzhin no/_/skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[140b.7\]]rgyas so/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa sngo ba/_'jam pa/_shin tu gzhon pa/_nyams dga' ba/_lcang lor 'khril bar 'dug pa/_g.yas su 'khyil ba/_rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/_ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bde ba/_dri rab tu zhim pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_yid du 'ong ba dag brnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bor te/_rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/_tshig 
[\[141a.2\]]de ni kun shes par byed pa dang /_rnam par shes par byed pa dang /_rnam par gsal ba dang /_mi chod pa dang /_chags par byed pa dang /_snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /_mnyan par 'os pa dang /_snum pa dang /_go bar byed pa dang /_skul ba dang /_tshim par byed pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa 
[\[141a.3\]]dang /_mi rtsub pa dang /_sha sha bo ma yin pa dang /_mi brlang ba dang /_mi brkam pa dang /_'jam pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_rnar bde ba dang /_lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa sel ba dang /_ka la ping ka'i 
[\[141a.4\]]sgra skad lta bu dang /_bya ku na la dang /_shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang /_rnga bo che dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_bden pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_yang dag pa dang /_tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang /_
[\[141a.5\]]rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang /_ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang /_zab pa dang /_gting dpag dka' ba dang /_bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang /_seng 
[\[141a.6\]]ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang /_rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang /_klu sgra sgrog pa lta bu dang /_'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_rtab rtab 
[\[141a.7\]]por ma yin pa dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_mi shol pa dang /_'tsham pa dang /_rigs pa dang /_dus su smra ba dang /_dus las mi yol ba dang /_chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang /_mnyen pa dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang /_bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang /_bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang /_thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang /_lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang /_'khor las mi 'da' ba dang /_'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_sangs 
[\[141b.2\]]rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang 'thun pa ste/_byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bkra shis rtswa dag nga la myur du byin/_/de ring nga la rtswas ni don chen 'gyur/_/dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su/_/byang chub 
[\[141b.3\]]dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur/_/gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du/_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang gtong byas dang /_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab spyad pa/_/de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs/_/bsam gtan stobs 
[\[141b.4\]]dang de bzhin shes rab stobs/_/bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs/_/de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur/_/shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang /_/rdzu 'phrul dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs/_/so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs/_/de ni de ring nga la 
[\[141b.5\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/de ring nga la rtswa sbyin byas na ni/_/khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te/_/de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/_/bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thos nas/_/dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs rab tu dga' 
[\[141b.6\]]ba'i yid kyis ni/_/rtswa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs/_/mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad smras/_/gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa/_/mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na/_/yon tan chen 
[\[141b.7\]]po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag med khyod bzhes shig_/bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang rgyar bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par/_/bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni 'thob mi 'gyur/_/
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags/_/de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung ston to/_/bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na/_/srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za/_/gang tshe 
[\[142a.2\]]nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes/_/khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur/_/'dren pas shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtsa ni spar gang blangs/_/seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos/_/lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu 
[\[142a.3\]]dga' yid kyis/_/deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na lha'i bu rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang 
[\[142a.4\]]chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/_byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/_byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du 
[\[142a.5\]]dpag tshad stong pa yang yod/_byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod/_byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa yang yod/_byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du 
[\[142a.6\]]dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa yang yod/_byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod do/_/byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'dug pa'i seng ge'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba 
[\[142a.7\]]bshams par gyur to/_/byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to/_/kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no/_/kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la 'dug 
[\[142b.2\]]par kun tu snang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi gzhan gyi khri la ni ma yin par shes so/_/ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[142b.3\]]rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang /_lha dang mi thams cad dang /_'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i 
[\[142b.4\]]khri la 'dug par mthong ngo /_/de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtswa spar gang thogs te/_byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_bdag nyid 
[\[142b.5\]]kyis rtswa'i rtse mo ni nang du bstan/_rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas/_rtswa'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting ste/_seng ge lta bu dang /_dpa' bo lta bu dang /_stobs lta bu dang /_brtan pa lta bu dang /_brtson 'grus lta bu dang /_mthu lta bu dang /_glang po lta bu dang /_dbang phyug lta bu dang /_rang byung lta 
[\[142b.6\]]bu dang /_ye shes can lta bu dang /_bla na med pa lta bu dang /_khyad par lta bu dang /_mngon par 'phags pa lta bu dang /_grags pa lta bu dang /_brjod pa lta bu dang /_sbyin pa lta bu dang /_tshul khrims lta bu dang /_bzod pa lta bu dang /_brtson 'grus lta bu dang /_bsam gtan lta bu dang /_shes rab 
[\[142b.7\]]lta bu dang /_ye shes lta bu dang /_bsod nams lta bu dang /_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang /_tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas rtswa bting ba de la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas/_lus drang por bsrang ste/_dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yi dam brtan po byas so/_/
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung /_/pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung /_/bskal mang rnyed dka' byang chub ma thob par/_/stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o/_/byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_bcu dgu pa'o//_//
[\[143a.2\]]'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/_shar 
[\[143a.3\]]phyogs logs su gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang /_byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas 'od des phyogs 
[\[143a.4\]]bcu kun tu grangs med dpag tu med pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub 
[\[143a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[143a.6\]]la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai dUr+ya sngon po dag las byas pa zhig tu bstan to/_/'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i 
[\[143a.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par bstan to/_/sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing sems can tshul du shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig_/'di ltar rnam par mdzes 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pa'i sems can 'di su zhig ces 'dzer to/_/sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul te/_de na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yin 
[\[143b.2\]]bag chags bcas bton pa/_/gang gis lus las 'od phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas/_/gang gis bsod nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal pa mang por kun spel ba/_/shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu 
[\[143b.3\]]mdzes/_/de nas lha phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[143b.4\]]bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams 
[\[143b.5\]]de bkab bo/_/de na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer te/_gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_
[\[143b.6\]]gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag_/byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med par bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul/_/de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa/_/yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa 
[\[143b.7\]]byas/_/de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi phreng ba nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po 
[\[144a.2\]]che'i dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo/_/de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/_'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs 
[\[144a.3\]]su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog_/rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes/_/dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes/_/byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di/_/de nas byang 
[\[144a.4\]]phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag 
[\[144a.5\]]gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor 
[\[144a.6\]]gyi khyams der kun tu bstan to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te/_bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam 
[\[144a.7\]]sbyangs shing /_/gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag sbyangs la/_/gang gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa/_/de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed/_/de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor 
[\[144b.2\]]cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de 
[\[144b.3\]]las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min dang /_/gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bgos/_/yon tan can de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes/_/yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/_/de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams 
[\[144b.4\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_
[\[144b.5\]]byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te/_rin po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su 
[\[144b.6\]]bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnam dag dang /_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhon pa mkha' rten brgyan/_/me tog phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang skyed mos tshal rnams dang /_/rkang pa lag pa mgo dang 
[\[144b.7\]]mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug_/de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs zhes bya ba 'od des bskul 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[145a.2\]]ba'i a ga ru'i sprin mngon par sprul te 'khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par phab bo/_/dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/rig dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad 
[\[145a.3\]]khyab/_/dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed char pa 'bebs/_/'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par byed pa 'byin/_/de nas byang shar gyi 
[\[145a.4\]]phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub 
[\[145a.5\]]sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[145a.6\]]mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus 
[\[145a.7\]]btud nas me tog gi phreng ba spyangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing /_/gus dang bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/_/byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/de nas 'og 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su 
[\[145b.2\]]bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bai dUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad ma rnams mngon du byung bar bstan to/_/pad ma de 
[\[145b.3\]]dag gi snying po la bud med lus phyed snang ba/_kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bstan te/_lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa 
[\[145b.4\]]mang po thogs shing me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi spyangs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang /_/rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud/_/khrims 
[\[145b.5\]]ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med/_/yon tan ldan pa de la 'dud pa byos/_/de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des 
[\[145b.6\]]bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin 
[\[145b.7\]]du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_bdug spos dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i khang 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pa dang /_rin po che dang /_nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dang /_bzhon pa dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_lha dang /_klu 
[\[146a.2\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par 
[\[146a.3\]]phab ste/_thams cad dga' ba dang /_bde ba skyed kyi sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa'am gnod par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang /_/phan par byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa/_/
[\[146a.4\]]'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi bkod rim dang /_/rtsal dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gi dpe tsam nyon/_/kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu spyangs byas te/_/nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/_/kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing /_/
[\[146a.5\]]cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug phud 'phyang zhing lhags/_/kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing /_/sa las seng ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/_/kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing /_/khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing 
[\[146a.6\]]lhags/_/kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing /_/rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags/_/kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing /_/zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags/_/kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de/_/bdud 
[\[146a.7\]]kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags/_/bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i/_/dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags/_/kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen dra ba 'thor/_/zla ba zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thang skyes rnam mdzes 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]man dA ra/_/par sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng /_/byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor/_/kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la/_/sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags/_/kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la/_/bar 
[\[146b.2\]]snang gnas te me tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags/_/kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni/_/sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags/_/kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni/_/rgyang ring 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lhags/_/
[\[146b.3\]]kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te/_/yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa/_/de dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang /_/dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags/_/kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi_/
[\[146b.4\]]lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur cing /_/de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te/_/brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor/_/kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar/_/dri za srin po mi'am ci yis yongs bskor te/_/glog ltar 
[\[146b.5\]]gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags/_/dri za mi'am ci yi skad kyis brtan pa bstod/_/kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas/_/me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la/_/lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags/_/btud 
[\[146b.6\]]nas sa yi snying por me tog rnams kyang 'thor/_/kha cig pad ma ud pa la pad ma dkar po rgyas/_/pad ma'i snying por sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas/_/de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags/_/chags med yid ldan byang chub sems dpa' mkhas la bstod/_/kha 
[\[146b.7\]]cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags/_/bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor/_/bor ma thag tu me tog phreng ba rnams su gyur/_/stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed/_/kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags/_/de dag lus las chos kyi sgo mo mang grag ste/_/de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong /_/kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'dra la bzhin mdzes shing /_/kha bzhin rdzogs la mi'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags/_/do 
[\[147a.2\]]shal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra/_/de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur/_/kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can de/_/rkang pas 'og gi chu yi phung po 'bog cing lhags/_/nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la/_/'od byed nyon mongs skyon rnams 
[\[147a.3\]]bcom pa kha cig lhags/_/kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin chen thogs/_/zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs par byed cing lhags/_/sems can mang la phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir/_/rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs/_/kha cig gzungs chen rin po che yi mdzod gyur 
[\[147a.4\]]cing /_/ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la/_/spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan/_/rgyags zhing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags/_/kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar thogs nas ni/_/rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags/_/de yi 
[\[147a.5\]]sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste/_/bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa do mod 'tshang rgyar sgrog_/byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[147a.6\]]dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub 
[\[147a.7\]]kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba bdud sdig can de la 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bdag gis ma sbran par bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mi chas/_bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o/_/de las rnam par rgyal na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[147b.2\]]'on tang bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar bsams nas 
[\[147b.3\]]de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig phyung ste/_'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas mog mog por byas te rab 
[\[147b.4\]]tu g.yos par byas par yang gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to/_/bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di yang thos so/_/sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod 
[\[147b.5\]]spyad pa/_/zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/_/phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung /_/byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim par gyis/_/de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed/_/de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed/_/de 
[\[147b.6\]]ni bdag kyang dbugs phyin gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zlo/_/ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur/_/lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur/_/phan pa byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas/_/bsam gtan 
[\[147b.7\]]mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur/_/gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab tshe/_/nag po'i rtsa lag khyod kyi grong khyer stongs byed 'gyur/_/stobs med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur te dpung nyams 'gyur/_/phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur/_/dge 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so/_/rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa dang /_rang gi gnas rdul gyis 
[\[148a.2\]]gang zhing gyo mo dang gseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang /_bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang /_bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis pa dang /_bdag mchu dang gre ba dang /_rkan skams par rmis pa dang /_bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa 
[\[148a.3\]]dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams rnyis par rmis pa dang /_rdzing rnams skams te chu med par rmis pa dang /_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_ku na la dang /_shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya'i tshogs rnams 'dab gshog zegs par 
[\[148a.4\]]rmis pa dang /_rnga dang /_dung dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_pi bang dang /_rgyud gsum pa dang /_pheg dang /_khar ba'i sil khrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnams chag grugs te sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang /_'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te ngo 'dzum 
[\[148a.5\]]gnag cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang /_chung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste lag pa gnyis mgo la rdeb par rmis pa dang /_bdud kyi bu gang dag shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[148a.6\]]gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang /_bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab/_kyi hud yab ces cho nge 'don par rmis pa dang /_bdag lus la gos dri ma 
[\[148a.7\]]can gyon par rmis pa dang /_bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya bo bseng bseng po dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_skar khung dang /_rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang /_de'i sde dpon 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang oms tshugs bcas te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po 
[\[148b.2\]]dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_brgya byin dang /_rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dang /_dbang sgyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang /_
[\[148b.3\]]thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shugs nas ma phyin cing bdag mi shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang /_rang gi 'khor gyis bdag por bar rmis pa dang /_bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang /_bram ze mis byin gyi bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang /_sgo ba kun 
[\[148b.4\]]tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang /_nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang /_'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang /_bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang /_rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs 
[\[148b.5\]]ma yin par rmis pa dang /_nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas 'brul bar rmis pa dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmis pa dang /_shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang /_bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad 
[\[148b.6\]]kyang khas sbub tu 'gyel bar rmis pa ste/_dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so/_/de sad pa dang /_'jigs skrag sngangs nas nang mi thams cad bsogs te/_dpung dang bcas pa dang /_'khor dang sde dpon dang /_sgo ba dang de 
[\[148b.7\]]dag 'dus par rig nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdud des rmi lam de dag mthong nas nyam thag ste/_/sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang /_/bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras/_/nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su dris/_/shAkya'i 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras/_/lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul zhugs drag po spyad/_/byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces/_/mdang sum bar snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad grag_/byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs 
[\[149a.2\]]rgyas nas/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams rtogs byed/_/gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe/_/des ni nga gnas ma lus stong par byed par 'gyur/_/dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la/_/shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya/_/
[\[149a.3\]]yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrims/_/gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig_/dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang /_/mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur/_/de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni/_/bgrang las 
[\[149a.4\]]'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhal mi 'chad/_/dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yab cig ci nongs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams/_/thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nying lag 'dar/_/khyod kyis ci gsan ci 
[\[149a.5\]]gzigs myur du bka' stsol cig_/yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi/_/nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu cig nga la nyon/_/ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzad rmis/_/de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus smras na ni/_/khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu 
[\[149a.6\]]sgyel bar 'gyur/_/ded dpon gyis smras pa/_gal te 'thab dus bab ste rgyal na nongs ma mchis/_/gal te der ni bcom par gyur na nongs dang bcas/_/gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltas lags na/_/bzhag na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su bstangs mi 'gyur/_/bdud kyis 
[\[149a.7\]]smras pa/_brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par 'gyur/_/gal te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal/_/kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su/_/kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus/_/ded dpon gyis smras pa/_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shin tu mthu chung ste/_/stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal/_/gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang /_/nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du brlag ste 'od mi bgyid/_/gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis/_/
[\[149b.2\]]mkhas dang mi 'thun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus/_/dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig mnyan nas/_yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che ba/_'thab mo la dpa' ba/_'jigs su rung ba/_spu zing zhes byed nus pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma 
[\[149b.3\]]mthong ma thos pa/_bzhin bsgyur ba rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/_rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis dkris pa dang ldan pa/_ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_sta re dang /_rtse gsum kha gdeng dang /_bong ba dang /_
[\[149b.4\]]gtun shing dang /_be con dang /_zhags pa dang /_dbyug to dang /_'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa dang /_lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/_mgo dang /_rkang lag dang /_mig log par 'dug pa/_mgo dang /_mig dang /_gdong 'bar ba/_lto dang rkang lag 
[\[149b.5\]]dbyibs mi sdug pa/_bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/_shin tu bzhin bsgyur cing so gtsigs pa/_'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/_lce stug cing zheng che ba mang po 'phyang ba/_lce 'bar 'bur can re lde dang 'dra ba/_mig me dang sbrul nag po dug gis rgyas pa'i mig ltar dmar ba dag 
[\[149b.6\]]char bcug ste/_de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug skyug pa/_kha cig ni nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin du lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste za/_kha cig ni mi'i sha dang /_khrag dang /_rkang lag dang /_mgo dang /_mkhal ma dang /_nang grol dang /_ngan skyugs la sogs pa za 
[\[149b.7\]]kha cig ni gzugs sngo bsangs dang /_kham pa po dang /_sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser por 'dug ste/_'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can/_kha cig ni mig zhigs pa dang /_mig khron pa lta bu dang /_mig phyung ba lta bu dang /_mig 'bar ba dang /_mig bzur ba/_mi sdug 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]pa/_kha cig ni mig log pa dang /_'bar ba dang /_mi sdug pa/_kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/_'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong /_kha cig ni shing rtsa thon byas te byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug cing 'ong /_kha cig gi rna ba ni phag rna lta bu dang /_zhib ma lta bu 
[\[150a.2\]]dang /_glang po'i rna ba lta bu dang /_'phyang ba dang /_phag rna lta bur 'dug pa/_kha cig ni rna ba med pa/_kha cig ni keng rus mang po sprul nas lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/_gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa/_rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/_pags pa dang /_sha dang 
[\[150a.3\]]khrag skams pa/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_rkang lag dang /_mig dang /_mgo bcad pa/_kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas gcig la gcig mgo gcod pa/_kha cig ni sgra sha sha po dang /_sgra mi snyan pa dang /_'jigs su rung ba dang /_sgra rtsub pa dang ldan pa/_hu hu zhes bya ba dang /_mchi 
[\[150a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_spyugs pa len pa dang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di shing dang chos te 'on cig ces zer ba dang /_'or cig ces zer ba dang /_rgyob cig ces zer ba dang /_rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang /_chings shig ces zer ba dang /_zung shig ces 
[\[150a.5\]]zer ba dang /_chod cig ces zer ba dang /_gtubs shig ces zer ba dang /_gtogs shig ces zer ba dang /_bab bab tu 'or cig ces zer ba dag go/_/kha cig ni wa dang /_ce spyang dang /_phag dang /_bong bu dang /_ba lang dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_rkyang dang /_
[\[150a.6\]]ma he dang /_ri bong dang /_g.yag dang /_bse dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ldang sko ska la sogs pa'i kha gdong sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba sngangs par byed pa/_mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go/_/kha cig ni seng ge dang /_stag dang /_phag rgod dang /_dred dang /_spre'u dang /_gzig dang /_byi la dang /_ra 
[\[150a.7\]]dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_ne'u le dang /_nya dang /_chu srin dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_rus sbal dang /_bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_'ug pa dang /_nam mkha' lding lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag go/_/kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag go/_/kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang /_mgo 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]gnyis pa nas mgo brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/_/kha cig ni mgo med pa'o/_/kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/_/kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go/_/kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas rkang pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go/_/kha cig 
[\[150b.2\]]ni rkang pa med pa dag go/_/kha cig ni rna ba dang /_kha dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_lte ba'i khung bu nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to/_kha cig ni ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_mdung thung dang /_rtse gsum kha gdeng dang /_dgra sta dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig 
[\[150b.3\]]pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_bong ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs gsor zhing gar byed la/_byang chub sems dpa' la sdigs mo byed do/_/kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas phreng bar brgyus te thogs so/_/kha cig ni keng rus dang /_thod pa dag phreng ba lta bur 
[\[150b.4\]]brgyus te thogs so/_/kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug pas dkris so/_/kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling me can thogs te/_glang po dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_ma he la zhon no/_/kha cig ni spyi'u tshugs su 'dug la khab lta bu'i spu can dag go/_/kha cig 
[\[150b.5\]]ni ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_phag rgod dang /_ne'u le dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_byi la dang /_spre'u dang /_spyang ki dang /_ce spyang gi spu lta bu dang ldan la/_sbrul gdug pa skyug cing lcags kyi thu lum mid pa dang /_me 'byin pa dang /_lcags dang /_zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs 
[\[150b.6\]]pa dang /_lce 'bebs pa dang /_rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang /_lcags kyi bye mtshan mo'i char 'bebs pa dang /_sprin nag po bsdus te rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang /_mda'i sprin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang /_mun gnag ston pa dang /_sgra 'byin cing byang chub sems dpa'i logs su 
[\[150b.7\]]rgyug pa dag go/_/kha cig ni zhags pa skor ba dang /_ri chen po rnyil bar byed pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs par byed pa dang /_ri chen po las mchong ba dang /_ri'i rgyal po lhun po sgul ba dang /_rgyug pa dang /_'bros pa dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag 'thor ba dang /_lus skor ba dang 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gad mo cher rgod pa dang /_brang rdung ba dang /_brang la rdeb pa dang /_mgo gsig pa dang /_mgo 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang /_phan tshun shugs phyung ste rgyug cing wa'i mig lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do/_/bud med rgan mo dag kyang ngu zhing 
[\[151a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/_'di skad du kyi hud bu/_kyi hud nga'i bu/_longs shig_/longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dzer to/_/srin mo'i gzugs dang /_sha za mo'i gzugs dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]long ba/_theng po/_rke ba/_bkres pas rid pa/_lag pa bsgreng 
[\[151a.3\]]ba/_kha gcus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/_sngangs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug go/_/bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad cu khor khor yug tu gang bar gyur to/_/bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bye ba phrag 
[\[151a.4\]]brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can rnams kyi dpung dag gis thad ka dang /_steng gang bar gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/_/srin po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sha za'i gzugs dang bcas/_/'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa/_/thams 
[\[151a.5\]]cad sgyu yis der ni sprul pa byas/_/mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas/_/mgo stong bar du ldan bzhin gnod sbyin mang /_/lag gcig lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas/_/lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu mang /_/rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas/_/
[\[151a.6\]]rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang /_/kha bzhin sngo la lus ni ser ba dang /_/kha bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang /_/kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang /_/kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang /_/kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang /_/de 'dra'i phyag brnyan dag gi 
[\[151a.7\]]dpung rnams lhags/_/stag dang sbrul dang phag gi gdong can dang /_/glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong /_/spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang /_/de 'dra'i kha gdong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags/_/ral pa brdzes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang /_/lug mgo rus pa 'bar 'bur 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]lba ba can/_/lus ni mi yi khrag gis rab tu sbags/_/gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lhags/_/rkang pa dag ni dgo ba'i rkang pa 'dra/_/mig gi 'bras bu spre'u'i mig dang mtshungs/_/mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra/_/kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags/_/
[\[151b.2\]]lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste/_/mig gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar/_/rna ba dag ni ra yi rna ba 'dra/_/kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags/_/kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig pa thogs/_/tho ba mdung thung rtse gsum lag na thogs/_/kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na 
[\[151b.3\]]thogs/_/'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags/_/gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing mig sgyur dang /_/ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang /_/rlung dang rdo dang gnam lcags rab 'bebs shing /_/gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der yang lhags/_/rlung ni rab tu gtong 
[\[151b.4\]]zhing char yang 'bebs/_/brgya phrag stong gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin/_/'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing shing ljon sgyel/_/byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mi g.yo/_/char pa rab tu 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong /_/chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa yang gang /_/de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan 
[\[151b.5\]]mo byung /_/de yi nub mo sems med shing yang sgyel/_/thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug_/'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang /_/yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/_/lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yo ba med/_/sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang /_/
[\[151b.6\]]sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la rtog_/de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na/_/legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas/_/gang zhig nga dang nga yi snyam sems shing /_/dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa/_/mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni/_/
[\[151b.7\]]'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos/_/shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams rten byung ba/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan/_/dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang myos pa med/_/dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gi nang nas ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol tu 'khod par gyur to/_/gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol tu 'khod par gyur to/_/de na bdud sdig 
[\[152a.2\]]can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/_yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dpa' gdul bar bya/_de na g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas pha la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_klu yi dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang /_/glang po'i dbang po gnyid log 
[\[152a.3\]]slong 'dod dang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po gnyid log slong 'dod pa/_/de ni mi dbang legs gnas slong bar 'dod/_/g.yon rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bltas pa tsam gyis snying yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la/_/'jig rten dag na snying po ldan 
[\[152a.4\]]pa'i shing chen 'gas/_/bdag gi lta bas phog na 'gro ba 'chis phog ltar/_/'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni de la ga la mchis/_/g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa/_bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la/_/bdag bsgrim ci dgos zhes smras snying po ga 
[\[152a.5\]]la yod/_/gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jig 'gyur yang /_/de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yong mi nus/_/gzhan yang mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing /_/de yi chu ni brngubs te 'thung bar nus 'gyur gyi/_/de yi kha bzhin dri ma med la mngon sum du/_/
[\[152a.6\]]lta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras/_/g.yon rol nas lag brgya ba zhes bya bas smras pa/_bdag gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa/_/gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyis te/_/dge sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi/_/yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs 
[\[152a.7\]]shig_/g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa/_ba spu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min/_/lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod/_/lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang /_/de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni/_/dug dang mtshon dang me yis mi tshugs te/_/mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur/_/gzhan yang mkha' dang sa dang chu la stobs ldan gang /_/mi'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra sta thogs/_/mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin/_/stobs 
[\[152b.2\]]chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur/_/g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas smras pa/_bdag ni de yi lus bzang gi/_/khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyi/_/'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis/_/rkang dang bcas pa'i shing yang bskam/_/g.yas rol nas mi [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[152b.3\]]kyis smras pa/_khyod ni ri rab sa yi nang zhugs te/_/thams cad ma lus bsreg par nus gyur kyang /_/khyod dang 'dra ba gang gA'i bye snyed kyis/_/rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni bsreg mi nus/_/gzhan yang ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid/_/rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid/_/nyi zla sa la lhung yang 
[\[152b.4\]]srid/_/sa ni zhu bar 'gyur yang srid/_/'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa/_/thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po/_/byang chub dam pa ma thob par/_/shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid/_/g.yon rol nas lag [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]bsgyings te smras pa/_khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du/_/
[\[152b.5\]]bdag gis sug pas nyi ma dang /_/zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas/_/thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las/_/tshul du shis par chab kyang blang /_/yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste/_/rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi/_/yab cig dpung 'di gzhag tu gsol/_/
[\[152b.6\]]khyod ni thugs ngan che ma mdzad/_/byang chub shing de drungs phyung ste/_/sug pas phyogs phyogs gtor bar bgyid/_/g.yas rol nas dad pa thob pas smras pa/_gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te/_/lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/_/sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/de dag lag pas 
[\[152b.7\]]phyir rlog kyang /_/khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can/_/de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus/_/g.yon rol nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa/_/dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du/_/yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyengs/_/de 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]la dpung grogs ga la mchis/_/ci slad khyod 'dir de la bsnyengs/_/g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa/_'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis/_/'khor los sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis/_/
[\[153a.2\]]'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod/_/g.yon rol nas glags ltas smras pa/_mdung thung rtse gsum dbyug to ral gri rta/_/glang po shing rta rkang tang ma mchis pa/_/dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de bdag gis/_/do mod dgum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab/_/g.yas rol 
[\[153a.3\]]nas bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa/_sred med bu ltar mi phyed mi shigs sku dang ldan/_/bzod stobs go mnabs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mda'/_/rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gzhu lags yab/_/bsod nams stobs kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal/_/g.yon 
[\[153a.4\]]rol nas phyir mi ldog pas smras pa/_'brog me rtswa la tshig pa phyir mi ldog_/lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog_/mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir mi ldog_/shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal bdag gnas med/_/g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa/_gsher ba'i rtswa dang 
[\[153a.5\]]phrad na me yang ldog_/brag gi rtse mor bab na mda' yang ldog_/rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/_/zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob de mi ldog_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_yab cig bar snang la ni ri mo bri bar nus kyang gda'/_/sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdur nus kyang gda'/_/yab 
[\[153a.6\]]cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kyang gda'/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus/_/g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/_lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par bgyi/_/rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang bskam par bgyi/_/
[\[153a.7\]]bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal bar brlag par bgyi/_/yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol/_/g.yas rol nas don grub kyis smras pa/_gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la/_/stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang /_/yon tan 'byung gnas kyis 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]ni gzigs tsam gyis/_/dug ni dug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur/_/srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni/_/'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste/_/de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med/_/mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab tu dag_/
[\[153b.2\]]sems can kun la byams pa'i thugs dang ldan/_/de la mtshon dang dug gis yong mi tshugs/_/de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog tu gsol/_/g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags pas smras pa/_bdag gis sil snyan stong dag rab bgyis te/_/lha yi bu mo brgyan pa bye stong gis/_/
[\[153b.3\]]chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri/_/'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi/_/g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras pa/_de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes/_/bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes/_/sems can thar bar mdzad dang byams la dgyes/_/'dod 
[\[153b.4\]]chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi mdzad/_/g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs zhes bya bas smras pa/_bdag gi shugs kyis nyi zla mid bgyis la/_/nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab gtang zhing /_/yab cig do mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni/_/rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi/_/g.yas 
[\[153b.5\]]rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar/_/gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar gyur/_/de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang /_/zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus/_/g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo 
[\[153b.6\]]gros kyis smras pa/_de 'dra'i drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni/_/khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'joms mi nus/_/bgyi ba thams cad mang pos 'grub lags na/_/gcig pus khyod la ci bgyi smos ci 'tshal/_/g.yas rol nas seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_sa la seng ge khyus 'khod sngon ma 
[\[153b.7\]]byung /_/lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus mi 'khod/_/gzi ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po/_/skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus mi 'khod/_/g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa/_ji ltar khyod kyi sras po brtson 'grus dang /_/shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sgrogs pa/_/tshig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis sngon gsan tam/_/myur du dge sbyong de ni gzhom du bzhud/_/g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs zhes bya bas smras pa/_nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang pos/_/seng ge med pa de na sgra yang sgrogs/_/seng ges sgra bsgrags 
[\[154a.2\]]'jigs pa thos pa dang /_/skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros/_/de ltar bdud bu mi mkhas 'di dag kyang /_/mi mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du/_/de dag spyi brtol byed cing byung rgyal smra/_/mi yi seng ges gsung bsgrags 'bros par 'gyur/_/g.yon rol nas nyes par 
[\[154a.3\]]bsam pa sems pas smras pa/_bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na/_/de ni ci slad dpung tshogs 'di mi lta/_/gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas/_/de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ba/_/g.yas rol nas don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa/_de ni mi 
[\[154a.4\]]glen pha rol gnon pa ste/_/khyed cag glen zhing shin tu ma bsdams pa/_/khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yong mi shes/_/de yi shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pham/_/bdud kyi bu ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal can/_/de yi ba spu gcig kyang g.yos mi nus/_/
[\[154a.5\]]gsad par bsams pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos/_/khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems/_/gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis/_/'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas na/_/'thab mo ma byed par ni slar log shig_/de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa 
[\[154a.6\]]dang nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang /_/skyong dang 
[\[154a.7\]]mi'am ci yi tshogs rnams dang /_/lha min dbang dang mkha' lding dbang po rnams/_/thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na/_/khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa/_/tshangs pa 'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dang /_/gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag kun/_/de la phyag 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal/_/khyod kyi sras po shes rab can/_/stobs dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa' la/_/snying dang 'thun gyur phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpag tshad brgyad cur khyab pa yi/_/gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di/_/phal cher rab tu dang 
[\[154b.2\]]yid kyis/_/kun kyang nyes pa med la lta/_/'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba/_/dpung tshogs mi bzad 'di gzigs nas/_/ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum mi mnga'/_/nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur/_/gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der/_/wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la/_/bya rog bong bu 
[\[154b.3\]]sgra 'byin pas/_/myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs/_/byang chub snying por gzigs su gsol/_/pa ta kun ta ngang pa dang /_/khu byug rma bya mngon skor bas/_/nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur/_/gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der/_/rdul dang snag tsa'i char 'bab la/_/sa dkyil me tog char 
[\[154b.4\]]'bab pas/_/bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs/_/gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de/_/shang shong gyur cing tsher mas gang /_/sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas/_/shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs/_/gal te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i/_/rmi lam de dag mngon sum 'gyur/_/drang 
[\[154b.5\]]srong rnams kyi yul brlag pa/_/de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar rlog_/rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog_/tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pas/_/dan da ka yi nags tshal tshig_/lo mang zhig tu rtswa ma skyes/_/drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa po/_/dka' thub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na/_/ji snyed 
[\[154b.6\]]'khod pa kun gyi mchog_/'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di/_/gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar/_/khyim nas kyang ni byung ba der/_/nyon mongs pham byas 'tshang rgya zhes/_/khyod kyis sngon chad ma gsan nam/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du/_/'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul/_/de bas 
[\[154b.7\]]nges par sems can mchog_/sbyin bsreg dam pa len par 'gyur/_/'di yi mdzod spu dri med pa/_/bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes/_/de yis bdag cag mog mog bgyis/_/bdud dpung nges bcom gdon mi 'tshal/_/srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis/_/de yi spyi gtsug bltar mi nus/_/nges 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]par gzhan gyis ma bstan par/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar lhun po khor yug dang /_/nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang /_/shing ljon rnams dang ri mchog kun/_/sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na/_/bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs/_/ye shes stobs 
[\[155a.2\]]can bzod pa'i stobs/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de/_/bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad par nges/_/glang pos so ma btang snod dang /_/seng ges ji ltar wa bcom dang /_/nyi mas srin bu me khyer ltar/_/bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur/_/tshig de skad thos pa dang bdud kyi bu 
[\[155a.3\]]gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por gyur te smras pa/_khyod ni gcig pu de yi bsngags pa dag_/shin tu dpag tu med par rjod byed na/_/gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar nus/_/'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam/_/de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya 
[\[155a.4\]]bas smras pa/_'jig rten nyi zla seng ge dang /_/'khor los sgyur la grogs byed med/_/byang chub bzhugs nas nges pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir gang mthong bas bdag gi dpung byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i nang du 
[\[155a.5\]]zhugs so snyam du sems shing bdud bros par gyur pa dang /_bros nas kyang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log ste/_'khor dang bcas pas mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phen cing /_ri rab tsam gyi ri de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang /_me 
[\[155a.6\]]tog gi bla re dang /_gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang /_gang dag mig gdug pa dang /_myur du gdug pa dang /_dbugs gdug pa rnams me lce gtong ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor de yang byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa 
[\[155a.7\]]rgyas pa lta bu'i bzhin bskyod do/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpas lag pa g.yas pas mgo la byugs pa dang /_bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na ral gri thogs par mthong nas lho phyogs su bros pa dang ci yang ma yin no snyam nas yang slar log go/_/slar log nas kyang byang chub 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sems dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu dang /_mdung thung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_dgra sta dang /_bong ba dang /_gtun shing dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_dbyug to dang /_'khor lo dang /_tho ba dang /_shing drungs phyung dang /_pha bong dang /_zhags pa dang /_lcags kyi thu lum 
[\[155b.2\]]shin tu 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/_de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang /_me tog gi bla rer gyur te gnas so/_/me tog sil mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor ba dang /_phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa 'byor pa 
[\[155b.3\]]de dag mthong nas bdud sdig can phrag dog dang ser snas sems la gnod de/_byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs/_bzhengs/_rgyal srid la spyod cig_/khyod kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis khyod kyis thar pa ga la 'thob/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas brtan la zab 
[\[155b.4\]]cing rgya che ba dang /_'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thob tu zad do/_/ngas ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so/_/
[\[155b.5\]]lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_mgo dag kyang bcad cing slong ba rnams la byin no/_/sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mal cha dang /_gos dang /_'chag sa dang /_skyed mos tshal rnam pa du ma dag kyang slong ba rnams la byin no/_/de nas bdud sdig 
[\[155b.6\]]can gyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa/_sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma tho med/_/gtan pa med pa byas pa khyod 'dir dpang du yod/_/khyod la 'di na dpang po gang yang yod min pas/_/smras kyang phan pa ci yod khyod ni pham par gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[155b.7\]]smras pa/_sdig can sa 'di ni nga'i dpang yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi 'khor la byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas/_seng ge ltar mi 'jigs mi skrag la bag tsha ba med cing mi dman la ma zhum pa dang /_ma 'khrugs 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]pa dang /_ma rnyogs pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_spu zing zhes byed pa med par lag mthil na dung dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_nya dang /_bum pa dang /_bkra shis pa dang /_lcags kyu dang /_'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod pa/_sor mo bar dra bas 'brel ba/_sen mo 
[\[156a.2\]]shin tu mdzes shing zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa/_'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon pa/_bskal pa dpag tu med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams cad la byugs nas tshul du shis par sa la brdabs te de'i tshe 
[\[156a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye 'khon med/_/'di ni bdag gi dpang ste bdag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]med/_/'di la khyod ni bdag gi dpang byos shig_/byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thag tu rnam pa 
[\[156a.4\]]drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/'di lta ste dper na/_yul ma ga d+hA'i brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag pas bsnun ma thag tu 
[\[156a.5\]]sgra byung zhing sgra rgyun ring du byung ngo //_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba sa'i lha mo'i 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa 
[\[156a.6\]]gang yin pa des sa chen po thams cad g.yos par byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu sa brtol te/_lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyed phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[156a.7\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de de bzhin no/_/skyes bu chen po de de bzhin no/_/khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te/_'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo/_/de lta lags mod kyi/_'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang /_tshad mar gyur pa dam 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]pa lags so/_/sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan mas de skad ces smras nas/_rnam pa du mar bdud sdig can gyi glags ni med par byas/_byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod de/_rang gi mthu rnam pa mang po bstan nas 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/g.yon can dpung bcas sa sgra 
[\[156b.2\]]de thos nas/_/nags su seng ges sgra bsgrags was thos dang /_/bya rog rdo 'phangs mod la 'byer ba bzhin/_/sngangs skrag snying gas thams cad rab tu byer/_/de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_yi ma rangs la skyengs bzhin du nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas ma song la phyir 
[\[156b.3\]]yang ma log cing bros kyang ma bros te phyir bltas nas yang dpung rnams la smras pa/_khyed lhan cig 'dus te cung zad cig sdod cig_/rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems can rin po che glo bur du chud mi gzan par kho bos rjes su 'chags pas 'di bslang bar nus sam mi nus sad par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[156b.4\]]bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu mo rnams la smras pa/_bu mo khyed deng ste byang chub kyi snying por song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/_'on te 'dod chags med/_ci gti mug can nam/_'on te shes rab can/_ci ldongs pa zhig gam/_'on te phyogs shes pa zhig gam/_'on 
[\[156b.5\]]te dpung gnyen med pa zhig gam/_dman pa zhig gam brtan pa zhig yin pa bgoms shig_/tshig de thos nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/_bud med kyi sgyu rnam pa sum cu 
[\[156b.6\]]rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to/_/rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i nang nas kha cig ni bzhin phyed 'gebs pa dang /_kha cig ni nu ma mkhrang zhing 'bur ba ston pa dang /_kha cig ni cung zad 'dzum pas so'i phreng ba ston pa dang /_kha cig ni lag pa brkyang ste bya rmyangs byed 
[\[156b.7\]]cing mchan khung ston pa dang /_kha cig ni shing thog bim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa dang /_kha cig ni mig phyed btsums te byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing /_bltas nas myur ba myur bar 'dzums pa dang /_kha cig ni nu ma phyed g.yogs te ston pa dang /_kha cig ni gos snyil bar byas 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]te/_gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang /_kha cig ni gos du ku la srab mo gyon te/_gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang /_kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang /_kha cig ni nu ma'i bar nas phreng ba gcig nye bar ston 
[\[157a.2\]]pa dang /_kha cig ni brla phyed tsam brdzes pa nye bar ston pa dang /_kha cig ni mgo dang phrag pa dag la bya 'dab sbed dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs 'dug par nye bar ston pa dang /_kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la mig zur gyis lta ba dang /_kha cig ni gos legs par bgos kyang 
[\[157a.3\]]bgo ma legs pa lta bur bcos pa dang /_kha cig ni rked pa dang /_gser gyi phag ska skyod pa dang /_kha cig ni 'khrul ba ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste phan tshun 'chag pa dang /_kha cig ni gar byed pa dang /_kha cig ni glu len pa dang /_kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos 
[\[157a.4\]]pa dang /_kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskyod pa ltar brla sgul ba dang /_kha cig ni brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_kha cig ni seng ras bgos te gser gyi phag ska dril bu can bcings nas dgod cing 'chag pa dang /_kha cig ni gos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ba ltar slar yang len 
[\[157a.5\]]pa dang /_kha cig ni gsang ba dang /_gsal ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston pa dang /_kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis bskus pa ston pa dang /_kha cig ni mkhur ba bskus shing rna cha yang ston pa dang /_kha cig ni mgo yang g.yogs shing bzhin yang g.yogs la skad cig tsam 
[\[157a.6\]]gyis ston pa dang /_kha cig ni sngon rgod rgod pa dang /_dga' dga' ba dang /_rtse rtse ba phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang /_kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs dang /_bu ma btsas pa'i gzugs dang /_na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang /_kha cig 
[\[157a.7\]]ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la sgugs pa dang /_kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la me tog sil mas 'thor ba dag ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la rtog cing gdong du yang blta ste/_'di ci chags pa'i dbang 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pos blta 'am 'on te mig rgyang ring du blta 'am/_g.yo'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la sgra gcan las thar ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang /_nyi ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang /_gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang /_
[\[157b.2\]]pad ma 'dab ma stong pa rgyas pa lta bu dang /_gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang /_lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang /_khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang /_dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang /_glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo 
[\[157b.3\]]de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir glu dang gar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab/_/zhugs shing me tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol/_/khyod kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste/_/
[\[157b.4\]]mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag 'gyur/_/bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te/_/lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag cag byung /_/byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar sgyur la/_/myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod/_/khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lhags 
[\[157b.5\]]gyur pa/_/lha yi bu mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs/_/gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang /_/chags par 'gyur na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi 'gyur/_/skra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri dang ldan/_/cod pan rna cha 'dab 
[\[157b.6\]]ris bzhin rgyas la/_/dpral ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan/_/pad ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs/_/kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste/_/shing tog bim pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan/_/dung dang kun da kha ba dkar so ldan/_/sdug pa dga' la chags pa 
[\[157b.7\]]rnams la gzigs/_/nu ma shin tu mkhrang zhing rgyas la 'bur/_/lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes/_/rked pa 'khor sa lta bur yangs shing mdzes/_/na chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs/_/glang po'i sna 'dra ba yi brla ldan zhing /_/lag pa gdu bus chal 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]par gang ba can/_/rked pa gser gyi phag ska rab mdzes brgyan/_/khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon po gzigs/_/ngang pa'i stabs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa/_/'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba/_/rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la/_/lha 
[\[158a.2\]]yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas/_/glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs/_/dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes/_/'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na/_/'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus/_/mi glen nor gyi bde ba mi shes 'ga'/_/gter 
[\[158a.3\]]mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar/_/khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lhags pa/_/na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums par 'dzum dmul te/_bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing /_dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[158a.4\]]lus ma bcos pa dang /_brjid pa dang /_ma chags pa dang /_mi sdang ba dang /_ma rmongs pa dang /_ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang /_ma zhum pa dang /_ma gyur pa dang /_'dzem pa med pa/_blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spangs pa'i phyir 
[\[158a.5\]]rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang /_'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang /_tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang /_bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang /_snyan pa dang /_yid du 'ong bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po 
[\[158a.6\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste/_/mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed/_/bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras/_/nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur/_/'dod pa bsten na srid pa phyir zhing rnam 
[\[158a.7\]]par 'phel 'gyur te/_/dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin/_/de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min/_/nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin/_/khyod kyi gzugs ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra/_/sgyu ma'i tshon 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/_/rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang /_/byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed/_/mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste pags pas g.yogs/_/khrag brlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad 
[\[158b.2\]]kyi 'bras dang mtshungs/_/lto ni gcin dang phyi sa sogs te shin tu mi gtsang ba/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung /_/byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis/_/lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min/_/
[\[158b.3\]]sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzad mang po myong /_/rked pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag_/brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas/_/nga yis khyed la yang dag 
[\[158b.4\]]brtags na sgyu ma ji bzhin te/_/phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin/_/'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol ba phyin ci log gyur pa/_/me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba/_/'dod pa'i yon tan yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na/_/
[\[158b.5\]]de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing brgyal bar gyur/_/mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang /_/gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing /_/dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing /_/bsam gtan lam gol 
[\[158b.6\]]blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas/_/nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te/_/rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin/_/mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la/_/nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 
[\[158b.7\]]'dra/_/gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la/_/bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni/_/nga la tha ba med cing chags med gti mug mi 'gyur te/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro/_/lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]la/_/khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba/_/de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te/_/rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi sgyu rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang cher 'dod chags dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs
