[\[159a.2\]]pa bskyed de/_steg pa bstan nas lus rnams brgyan te/_bud med kyi g.yo nye bar bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' la rngod do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu/_/bdud kyis btang ba shin tu tshul du shis par rings par 
[\[159a.3\]]lhags gyur te/_/shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/_/gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rngod par byed/_/dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste/_/skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang 
[\[159a.4\]]bcom/_/khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyis gang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da bab bo/_/bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa/_/ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i gzugs/_/'brug 
[\[159a.5\]]bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dbang po sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po/_/'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa/_/'dod pa rtsod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa/_/byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs pa/_/gang du 
[\[159a.6\]]bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i dus la bab gyur gyis/_/do mod bdud las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur/_/sgyu rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ras pad ma 'dra ba gsan du gsol/_/khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa sa bdag stobs dang ldan par 
[\[159a.7\]]'gyur/_/bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na/_/thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la dga' ba bsten du gsol/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la/_/chos kyi 'khor los 'gro 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed/_/chos kyi dga' bas dga' yi yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin/_/de dag gis smras pa/_re shig dar la bab pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur pa dang /_/
[\[159b.2\]]khyod ni re shig snyun gyis ma btab mi shis bgres par ma gyur dang /_/ji srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa/_/de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa'i dga' ba spyad du gsol/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_ji srid do mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon 
[\[159b.3\]]pa rnyed pa dang /_/ji srid lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang /_/ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa/_/de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[159b.4\]]bdag po lha mos bskor ba dang /_/'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na/_/lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la/_/rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[159b.5\]]smras pa/_'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs/_/klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin/_/brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song /_/'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su 
[\[159b.6\]]zhig dga'/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shing mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la/_/shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs/_/sa las rtswa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo can mchis pa/_/nags mchog mi ci tshogs 
[\[159b.7\]]kyis bsten par na chung rnams dang dgyes par mdzod/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas/_/bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags/_/gang zhig dus na sa las skyes pa rnams kyang 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]nyi mas skams par 'gyur/_/nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad/_/bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa/_zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad ma sar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can/_/snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan 
[\[160a.2\]]so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra/_/'di 'dra lha yi gnas na dkon na mi yi gnas nag la mchis/_/gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_lus ni ngan skyugs mi gtsang srin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig 
[\[160a.3\]]po/_/myur du 'gyes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong /_/rgyu bar bcas dang mi rgyu ba yi 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa/_/go 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya/_/de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste/_/rkang 
[\[160a.4\]]gdub gser gyi phag ska 'khrol zhing gos kyang shig shig byas nas ni/_/'dod pa'i mda' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad smras/_/jo jo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi/_/srid pa kun gyis nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras/_/
[\[160a.5\]]'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra/_/sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas na/_/bud med yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs/_/bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig bye ba de dag gis/_/gang gi tshe na 
[\[160a.6\]]glang po'i phru gu'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe/_/ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/_/dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas/_/pad ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal/_/mar gyis sbyin bsreg 
[\[160a.7\]]bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba/_/srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig_/bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol/_/de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnam mang 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]bstod/_/mchog tu gyur pa'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni/_/song ste pha yi rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras/_/yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs/_/bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis 
[\[160b.2\]]lta/_/de ni chags pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags/_/lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'/_/srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas de bas kyang 
[\[160b.3\]]cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/_yi ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa/_kye mi shes shing glen te/_khyed kyi gzugs dang da rod ma mthong ngam/_/ji ltar gyur na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus/_de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag 
[\[160b.4\]]gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te/_/gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags/_/spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis/_/lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu 
[\[160b.5\]]zab/_/bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs/_/'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis/_/gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba/_/lha yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis/_/de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags 
[\[160b.6\]]bstan na yab/_/chags bcas gang lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na/_/de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma g.yos/_/ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo g.yo ma mchis/_/bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bltam yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs/_/
[\[160b.7\]]bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad/_/lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge_/de dag de yi rkang par mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal/_/sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi/_/rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'thob 'gyur nges/_/yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te/_/stobs ldan dag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di tshegs rab che/_/yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus 
[\[161a.2\]]par gnas/_/rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan/_/stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs/_/gang dag sems pa ma mchis gang dag sems ma mchis/_/shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag_/yon tan ri bor 
[\[161a.3\]]mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las/_/yab cig do mod slar log na ni legs pa 'dra/_/gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar mi phyin der ni rkyal mi bgyi/_/gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin de ni brko mi bgyi/_/gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi/_/gang gis yid mi bde bar 
[\[161a.4\]]'gyur ba de mi bgyi/_/dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/_dpal ldan dang /_'phel mo dang /_dka' thub dang /_dge ma dang /_mkhas ma dang /_mdangs stobs dang /_bden smra dang /_ldan ma ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang 
[\[161a.5\]]dag par mchod nas dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/_mngon du stod par byed de/_sems can dam pa khyod ni dgung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o/_/blo rnam par dam pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhang nge ba'o/_/sems can dam pa 
[\[161a.6\]]khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 
[\[161a.7\]]'phags pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltams shing gting dpag dka' ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o/_/sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas ma mchis pa'o/_sems 
[\[161b.2\]]can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam 
[\[161b.3\]]bcas pa brtan pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o/_/sems can dam pa khyod ni ring por mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha 
[\[161b.4\]]mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do/_/dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/_rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan 
[\[161b.5\]]po ltar sems khong du chud cing dmas pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o/_/
[\[161b.6\]]sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar sgyel ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni mi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman 
[\[161b.7\]]pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o/_/sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sbrul la bab pa ltar deng tshar 
[\[162a.2\]]chod par 'gyur ba'o/_/sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyam smad pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam 
[\[162a.3\]]pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed de/_bcu drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpas do mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni gyad stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 
[\[162a.4\]]tshar bcad par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar ba gang la rlung mar btab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa 
[\[162a.5\]]ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sngangs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni shing sA la chen po rtsa ba nas bcad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sgyel bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur 
[\[162a.6\]]ro/_/sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la nyi tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bung 
[\[162a.7\]]ba'i khyu ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khong du 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i 
[\[162b.2\]]bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas [(]brnyil [,]bsnyil [)]bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis 
[\[162b.3\]]bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te/_/slongs shig rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig_/'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas 
[\[162b.4\]]gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur/_/langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces smras/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_ri yi rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid/_/skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par 
[\[162b.5\]]mkha' las sa la ltung yang srid/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi/_/nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang /_/lha dang lha min tshogs bcas 
[\[162b.6\]]mi dang dud 'gro rnams/_/kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur/_/kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa longs la tshig bzhin gyis/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min/_/yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin/_/gal te ngan 
[\[162b.7\]]'gror mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug_/dbang med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed/_/khyod kyis gang btsal de dang phrad par sla ma yin/_/rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang /_/go 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'phang mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci smos/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khro ba'i zil non blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang /_/bdag la rtag dang mi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang /_/yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi/_/drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' 
[\[163a.2\]]thub spyad/_/de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra/_/khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang kha cig rtag ces smra/_/lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can/_/byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer/_/stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pas sde dpung bcas/_/khyod pham byas te 
[\[163a.3\]]byang chub rdul med deng thob nas/_/'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das/_/sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya/_/bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di zung shig_/gcig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas 
[\[163a.4\]]zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis/_/nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed du chug_/sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam pa mang po 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_nam mkha' la ni ri mo 
[\[163a.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang srid/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid/_/nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed pa nus srid kyi/_/khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang 
[\[163a.6\]]po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus mi 'gyur/_/bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer/_/dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs/_/bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/_/kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces zer/_/'dzam 
[\[163a.7\]]klung gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser/_/shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os/_/khyod deng g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlag 'gyur te/_/dbang pos lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping ka'i sgra skad kyis/_/bde bar gshegs pas gnod 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]sbyin srin tshogs de la smras/_/mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa/_/de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod/_/gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang /_/gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang /_/skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba/_/
[\[163b.2\]]des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus/_/bdud khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gis bar tsam 'dug_/shubs nas phyung ba'i ral gri rnon po lag na thogs/_/dge sbyong myur longs nga yis bsam pa bzhin du song /_/'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad da re/_/byang chub sems dpas 
[\[163b.3\]]smras pa/_gal te stong gsum sa rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la/_/kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gyur kyang /_/de dag nga yi ba spu bskyod par mi nus nga la gnod byed smos ci dgos/_/sun 'byin ma [{]rings [,]ring [}]shig dang de'u re btags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/_/rnga 
[\[163b.4\]]mo ba lang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs mig dang /_/myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad 'dra ba dag_/me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing /_/rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen/_/sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing /_/rdo rje'i lce dang lcags 
[\[163b.5\]]kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs/_/ral gri mdung thung rno dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs/_/sa ni rtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms/_/kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mda' brgya 'phen/_/kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor/_/chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len/_/kha 
[\[163b.6\]]cig nam mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen/_/kha cig khros nas lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam/_/me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen/_/sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed/_/'og gi chu yi phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug_/kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab tu 
[\[163b.7\]]mchong /_/kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchong /_/rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la/_/glog ltar rab tu 'bar bar mig nas mngon du 'byin/_/bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas/_/sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin rtog_/'di la bdud med 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]stobs med 'gro med bdag kyang med/_/chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor/_/mig dang skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gi med/_/rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus/_/chos 'di byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral/_/brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong /_/bden 
[\[164a.2\]]tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na/_/'dul 'thun gnod sbyin des pa gang yin de dag gis/_/lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces/_/rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te/_/de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa/_/sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo 
[\[164a.3\]]can/_/'dzam klung gser 'bar dang 'dra bsod nams dges bsten pas/_/tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs/_/mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas/_/tshig tu smras pas 'di nga yi dpang yin te/_/ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas/_/slong la mi sbyin snyam ste don med 
[\[164a.4\]]gzhar ma byin/_/chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te/_/tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang /_/gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dpang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dpang /_/brtson 'grus de 
[\[164a.5\]]bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang /_/tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dpang /_/rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dpang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa/_/de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang /_/gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms 
[\[164a.6\]]kyang ni/_/de dag nga yi ba spu'i brgya yi char mi phod/_/de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs/_/khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur/_/bdud kyi sgra thos nas ni sa la sgyel gyur te/_/nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang thos/_/lus las rngul byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur/_/
[\[164a.7\]]rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur/_/brang rdung cho nge 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med/_/bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur/_/glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung /_/srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug_/mgo rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rlung btab nags mes byas ltar bltas nas song bar gyur/_/pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag_/gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed/_/de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tsho ba'i skabs kyang med/_/bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snyed po de/_/thams 
[\[164b.2\]]cad rnam par 'thor cing tha dgur gyes gyur te/_/zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur/_/mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer/_/shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas/_/chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor/_/myur du longs la phyi shol ma byed skyen du song /_/bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan 
[\[164b.3\]]pas de ltar gyur pa yin/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_bdag gi bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/_/sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na/_/sdug bsngal 'jigs phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang /_/cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thob/_/lha mos smras pa/_mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la 
[\[164b.4\]]nyes byed pa/_/de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang /_/cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang /_/gsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min mkha' lding mi ci srin po'i dbang /_/tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas pa dag_/'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi 
[\[164b.5\]]dpung bcom pas/_/'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yis rgyal ba brjod/_rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul/_/me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs/_/sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa/_/dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 
[\[164b.6\]]'gyur/_/stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs/_/rgya chen pham mdzad dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes/_/stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang /_/sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur/_/bdud gdul ched du 'dir 
[\[164b.7\]]ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba/_/bye ba sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon/_/bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_dgra btul ba/_g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las 
[\[165a.2\]]dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa 
[\[165a.3\]]med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing /_dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams 
[\[165a.4\]]kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba 
[\[165a.5\]]yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_'od gsal ba/_
[\[165a.6\]]nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_mnyen pa/_las su rung bar gnas pa/_mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[165a.7\]]lha'i mig yongs su dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang /_ngan pa rnams mthong ngo /_/las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/_kye ma sems can 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/_ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta ba dag ste/_de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log 
[\[165b.2\]]par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/_yang dag par lta ba dag ste/_de dag yang dag 
[\[165b.3\]]par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog 
[\[165b.4\]]bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror song ba dang /_ngan 'gror song ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po dag dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do/_/mun pa sel 
[\[165b.5\]]to/_/snang ba bskyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_'od gsal ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_mnyen pa/_las su rung bar gnas pa/_mi g.yo bar gyur pas 
[\[165b.6\]]nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do/_/de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_'di lta ste/_skye ba gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum 
[\[165b.7\]]dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_skye ba lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya dang /_skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba bye ba dang /_skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang /_skye ba bye ba brgya stong 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]dang /_skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /_skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /_skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 
[\[166a.2\]]'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no/_/bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/_ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o/_/kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za 
[\[166a.3\]]za'o/_/tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo/_/yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas so/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo /_/bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas shi 'phos 
[\[166a.4\]]nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_'od gsal ba/_
[\[166a.5\]]nyon mongs pa med pa/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_mnyen pa/_las su rung bar gnas pa/_mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha smad skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig 
[\[166a.6\]]pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod de/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/_'on kyang rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba la sogs 
[\[166a.7\]]pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/_e ma'o rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di thams cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]gang yod pas rga ba dang 'chi ba byung /_rga ba dang 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/_rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas skye ba byung /_skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin 
[\[166b.2\]]snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/_skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas srid pa byung /_srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_
[\[166b.3\]]len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/_srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas len pa byung /_len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/_len pa'i rkyen 
[\[166b.4\]]ni sred pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas sred pa byung /_sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/_sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang 
[\[166b.5\]]chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas tshor ba byung /_tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/_tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 
[\[166b.6\]]yod pas reg pa byung /_reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/_reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas skye mched drug byung /_skye 
[\[166b.7\]]mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du sems te/_ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/_skye mched drug gi rkyen ni ming dang gzugs yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung /_ming 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas rnam par shes pa byung /_
[\[167a.2\]]rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod pas 'du byed byung /_'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin 
[\[167a.3\]]snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byung ste/_'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen 
[\[167a.4\]]gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang 
[\[167a.5\]]smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed 
[\[167a.6\]]pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/_mig skyes/_rig pa skyes/_mang po shes pa skyes/_yid gzhungs pa skyes/_shes rab skyes so/_/snang ba byung ngo /_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/_gang 'gags pas rga 
[\[167a.7\]]shi 'gag snyam nas/_des 'di snyam du bsams te/_skye ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/_skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur/_gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/_des 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]'di snyam du bsams te/_srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/_srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam mo/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med pas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/_'du byed med par 'gyur/_gang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i 
[\[167b.2\]]bar du'o/_/des 'di snyam du bsams te/_ma rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go/_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas/_skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[167b.3\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas 
[\[167b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/_mig skyes/_rig pa skyes/_mang po shes pa skyes/_yid gzhungs pa skyes/_shes rab skyes so/_/snang ba byung ngo /_/dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni zag pa sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni zag pa'i 
[\[167b.5\]]kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o/_/'di ni sred pa'i zag pa'o/_/'di ni ma rig pa'i zag pa'o/_/'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o/_/'dir zag pa ma 
[\[167b.6\]]lus par 'gag go/_/'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ma rig pa'o/_/'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni ma rig pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/
[\[167b.7\]]'dir ma rig pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur te nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]shes so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni ming dang gzugs so/_/'di ni ming dang 
[\[168a.2\]]gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni skye mched drug go/_/'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni skye mched 
[\[168a.3\]]drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni reg pa'o/_/'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni tshor 
[\[168a.4\]]ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni tshor ba 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni sred pa'o/_/'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni len pa'o/_/'di ni len pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[168a.5\]]'di ni len pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni srid pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni skye ba'o/_/'di ni skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni skye ba 'gog pa'o/_/
[\[168a.6\]]'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni rga ba'o/_/'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni rga ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/'di ni 'chi ba'o/_/'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 
[\[168a.7\]]'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di dag ni mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/_'gog par 'gyur 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[168b.2\]]dpas nam gyi cha smad skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod tsam na skyes bu dang /_skyes bu dam pa dang /_skyes bu mchog dang /_skyes bu chen po dang /_skyes bu khyu mchog dang /_skyes bu glang po dang /_skyes bu seng ge dang /_skyes bu skyes mchog dang /_skyes bu dpa' bo dang /_skyes bu rtul 
[\[168b.3\]]phod dang /_skyes bu cang shes dang /_skyes bu pad ma dang /_skyes bu pad ma dkar po dang /_skyes bu ljid khyer ba dang /_skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang /_khong du chud par bya ba dang /_thob par bya ba dang /_blta bar bya ba dang /_
[\[168b.4\]]mngon du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/_grogs po dag 
[\[168b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas so/_/de nas lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas de dag gis de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda 
[\[168b.6\]]mdzad cing brda mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis brda mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cig_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur par mkhyen nas/_shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_der 
[\[168b.7\]]bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad do/_/rdul ni nye bar zhi'o/_/zag pa ni skams te yang mi zag go/_/lam ni chad de yang mi 'jug go/_/'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tog gis gtor te/_de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/_sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs/_lta ba ni bzlog_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam 
[\[169a.2\]]par dkrugs/_zug rngu ni phyung /_mdud pa ni bkrol/_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng /_bag la nyal rnams ni bton/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/_chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/_sems can gyi 
[\[169a.3\]]khams ni rnam par bkod/_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni bsngags/_log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/_ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung /_sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs/_sems can gyi spyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/_sems can gyi 
[\[169a.4\]]nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/_bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar ba ni grub/_sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung /_sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa por ni gyur/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 
[\[169a.5\]]rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/_rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni brnyes/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/_chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med par ni gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 
[\[169a.6\]]'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid na bzhugs so//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_dge slong dag byang chub sems 
[\[169a.7\]]dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/_'jig 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/ldeg_/rab tu ldeg/_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/
[\[169b.2\]]'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la legs so 
[\[169b.3\]]zhes bya ba byin te/_chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang skur ro/_/chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur te/_rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ste/_de dag gis phyogs 
[\[169b.4\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha'i bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra rjod par gyur te/_sems can mkhas pa'i pad ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba/_'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo /_/
[\[169b.5\]]thugs rje chen po'i sprin yang dag par 'phags te/_chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas/_'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/_dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin 
[\[169b.6\]]par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te/_/ston pas bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni/_/gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po mnyes gyur tshe/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba 
[\[169b.7\]]g.yos par gyur/_/chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa/_/zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyel tam/_/bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de/_/shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom/_/khrag khrig zhing 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs rnams bskur/_/des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul/_/khyed kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes/_/srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du phob/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang ste/_/ka la 
[\[170a.2\]]ping ka'i sgra yi gsung du brjod pa ni/_/bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas/_/dper na mar dang mar gyi snying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin/_/dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mngon par shes pa brnyes pa 
[\[170a.3\]]dang /_/brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_rgyal ba 'phags pa dang /_skyes bu dang /_skyes bu chen po dang /_sman pa'i mchog dang /_zug rngu 
[\[170a.4\]]'byin pa chen po dang /_seng ge ltar mi bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang /_glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang /_dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang /_rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang /_chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs 
[\[170a.5\]]gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang /_sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang /_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang /_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas dge sbyong du gyur pa dang /_nyon mongs pa bsal bas 
[\[170a.6\]]gtsang sbra can du gyur pa dang /_rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dang /_stobs bcu mnga' ba'i shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang /_rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 
[\[170a.7\]]mngon par bstod do/_/'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du/_/bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas/_/ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs/_/bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad/_/'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du/_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis/_/byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs/_/des na 'dir ni 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]do mod mdzes/_/byang chub dam pa tshol ba na/_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/_/brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyi go mnabs te/_/sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs/_/des na gser mdog 
[\[170b.2\]]'od dang ldan/_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni/_/gzhan dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de/_/des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal/_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis/_/thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod/_/des na do mod 'di la 
[\[170b.3\]]mchod/_/'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/_/shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags/_/sems can bye ba phan yang btags/_/des na byang chub myur du brnyes/_/'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal/_/'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal/_/'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal/_/des 'di mya ngan mi 'da'o/_/
[\[170b.4\]]'di ni shin tu lha yi lha/_/lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i cha/_/'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/_/bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing /_/'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa/_/'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste/_/'di la sbyin pa btang na de/_/byang chub dam pa thob bar du/_/bar ma dor 
[\[170b.5\]]ni chud mi za/_/'di yi mdzod spu mdzes pa yis/_/zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyid/_/nyi zla dag kyang zil du rlag_/sems can rnams la snang bar gyur/_/'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te/_/gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs/_/mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed/_/
[\[170b.6\]]'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os/_/'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste/_/zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs/_/sems dang ldan dang sems med pa/_/mang po dag la rang byung gzigs/_/'di snyan shin tu rnam dag ste/_/lha yi dag dang mi yi dang /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi dang /_/
[\[170b.7\]]mtha' yas pa yi sgra rnams gsan/_/'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste/_/ka la ping ka 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i/_/chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan/_/bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs gyur kyang /_/de yi thugs ni 'khrugs mi mnga'/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]gzigs gyur kyang /_/shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'/_/'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis/_/bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags/_/bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/_/sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo/_/gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni/_/de yi sku la gnod 
[\[171a.2\]]ma byung /_/de yi skabs su byams mi mnga'/_/zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so/_/gang dag khyod las chos thos nas/_/sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi/_/lha dang mi rnams de dag ni/_/rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags/_/rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba/_/khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams 
[\[171a.3\]]kyis/_/mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar/_/kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog_/skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pham mdzad de/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping ka'i sgra skad kyis/_/'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[171a.4\]]gsungs so/_/bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel/_/bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub/_/bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po thob/_/de bas bsod nams bya bas chog par 
[\[171a.5\]]su zhig 'dzin/_/bdud rtsi chos mnyan pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin/_/skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin/_/sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin/_/byang chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang ste tshig brjod pa/_/mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du deng /_/
[\[171a.6\]]kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dong /_/dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol/_/dpung bcas bdud las rgyal te bdud rtsi reg shog ces/_/
[\[171a.7\]]sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de/_de dag ni bskal par yang 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sa ni lag mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par gyur/_'dab ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang ldan pa byung /_lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud/_/seng ge sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong /_/stong gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma 
[\[171b.2\]]dang /_ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud/_/stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud/_/'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying por rol/_/sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste/_/rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi/_/de nas skad cig yud tsam 
[\[171b.3\]]mi khom skams par gyur/_/sems can gang la'ang tha ba rgyags sdang gnod pa med/_/'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/_/nyi zla nor bu me dang glog dang lha yi 'od/_/'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me min/_/'gro ba gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong /_/
[\[171b.4\]]'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol/_/phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos/_/de yi bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dkrugs/_/bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'dri ba/_/'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la rol pa lags/_/mngon par 
[\[171b.5\]]rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas/_tshul dang 'thun pa'i 
[\[171b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do/_/'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung /_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la/_/nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa/_/khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal/_/bsod nams dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs/_/dkar po'i 
[\[171b.7\]]chos rnams kun du rdzogs/_/khyod ni 'gro ba tshim mdzad 'gyur/_/sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal/_/gau ta ma ni thang la bzhugs/_/sems can gzhan dag rlung chen gyis/_/khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur/_/shes rab chen po khyod 'phags te/_/'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis/_/
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]'jig rten chos kyis khyod mi gos/_/chab na mchis pa'i pad ma bzhin/_/'jig rten ring nas gnyid log 'di/_/mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la/_/khyod ni shes rab sgron me yis/_/rab tu sad par mdzad pa spyod/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni/_/nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la/_/
[\[172a.2\]]nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa/_/sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung /_/'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas/_/mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur/_/lha rnams dang ni mi dag kyang /_/bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/_/skyes bu khyu mchog des pa khyod/_/lta bar gang dag 'dong bgyid pa/_/de 
[\[172a.3\]]dag bskal pa stong rnams su/_/nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur/_/gang dag chos nyan 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag mkhas shing nad med dang /_/zag dang phung po zad pa dang /_/'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur/_/nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni/_/kun kyang len pa ma mchis par/_/myur 
[\[172a.4\]]du rab tu grol 'gyur te/_/dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob/_/de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/_/sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os/_/de dag yon phul mi chung ste/_/kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags/_/dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[172a.5\]]mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs 
[\[172a.6\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan/_/thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog_/byang chub rab 
[\[172a.7\]]mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes/_/dbyangs kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod skyabs khyod gling khyod ni dpung gnyen te/_/khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad/_/khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin/_/gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog_/mar me mdzad pa gzigs 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ma thag tu khyod/_/byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs/_/mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phob la/_/lha mi rnams kyi gdung ba zhi bar mdzod/_/khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad ma 'dra/_/khyod ni mi g.yo mi bskyod lhun po 'dra/_/khyod ni thugs dam mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin/_/yon tan mchog 
[\[172b.2\]]kun mnga' ste zla ba 'dra/_/dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de 
[\[172b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan/_/
[\[172b.4\]]mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog mnga' ba/_/dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'/_/mnyel ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral/_/'jig rten gsum du grags shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[172b.5\]]dam pa gsum gyi mig sbyin pa/_/spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus ngan rnyog pa bsal zhing rab tu zhi thugs ldan/_/thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba/_/khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad 
[\[172b.6\]]pa btang snyoms dgyes/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon/_/bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes pa po/_/grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzad pa/_stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud po 'dir 
[\[172b.7\]]lhags pa/_/shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams pas pham mdzad nas/_/khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes/_/g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_bla re chen 
[\[173a.2\]]po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste/_/bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis 
[\[173a.3\]]skad cig gcig la pham par mdzad/_/khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de/_/thub pa don kun 'grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/bdud kyi bu mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de dag rnams kyis byang 
[\[173a.4\]]chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yo ma nus/_/mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gA'i bye ma snyed mdzad de/_/byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags/_/byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad tshe na shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang /_/phangs pa'i sras 
[\[173a.5\]]dang bran pho bran mo de bzhin skyed mos tshal dang grong khyer dang /_/yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang /_/dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes/_/nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos 
[\[173a.6\]]nas/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams/_/dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa/_/khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/_/smra ba'i khyu mchog 
[\[173a.7\]]'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams de/_/bdag cag thams cad dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/_/de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog_/dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu brgya 
[\[173b.2\]]stong du mas yongs su bskor te/_mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzam bu klung gi gser gyi pad ma dag gis mngon par gtor te/_spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa/_/mun rdul 
[\[173b.3\]]bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur/_/lha yul mi yul pa yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel/_/shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams 
[\[173b.4\]]dga' bar mdzod/_/sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa dri ma shin tu mi mnga' bas/_/lha dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal/_/pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa/_/lha dang mi yi srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba/_/shin tu mkhas pa blo 
[\[173b.5\]]ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgyu ba mdzod/_/srid pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te/_/lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod/_/zla ba bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu ba/_/
[\[173b.6\]]srid pa gsum 'dir rmad byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog_/lha dang mi yi srid pa dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'/_/'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dga' la dgyes pa po/_/'khor la sgrogs pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/khyod 'dir 'gro ba 
[\[173b.7\]]rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]lha'i bu rab 'phrul rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la dar gyi lda ldis g.yogs nas spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag 'phags/_/gti mug 
[\[174a.2\]]dang ni lta dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dang dpal gyis rgyas/_/log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi med 'god mdzad pa/_/'jig rten 'dir byung mchod rten lha yul ba dang mi yul bas mchod pa/_/khyod ni gso ba'i sman pa mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin pa po/_/lta dang nyon mongs pa 
[\[174a.3\]]dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal/_/lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste/_/de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu/_/nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal sdug spyan sngar 
[\[174a.4\]]lam me ma lags te/_/shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/_/khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bden dang bden min gsung ba dang /_/dul ba thugs zhi dbang po thul ba rab tu 
[\[174a.5\]]zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/_/ston pa lha dang mi yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa/_/shAkya thub pa mi yi khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ye shes mnga' ba ye shes bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa/_/dri ma gsum bsal rig pa gsum dang rnam 
[\[174a.6\]]par thar gsum ston pa po/_/thub pa blo gros ji ltar gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa/_/stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_
[\[174a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mngon par bkab ste/_spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs tshe der ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad/_/khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad/_/khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan 
[\[174b.2\]]pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te de tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs/_/gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs rab tu zhi/_/gang gi 
[\[174b.3\]]ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad/_/khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen myur du skor/_/chos 'tshal ba dag chos mnyan bgyi zhes te/_/srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis/_/'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor du gsol/_/
[\[174b.4\]]srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral du gsol/_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i rab 
[\[174b.5\]]'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byugs pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/_spyan snga nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[174b.6\]]'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis/_/khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag_/mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/_byang chub snying por lha yis gang bgyis pa/_/bkod pa 
[\[174b.7\]]mdzes pa de dag mthong lags te/_/ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa/_/de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags/_/khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te/_/gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad/_/shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas las rgyal/_/khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]brnyes/_/phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur/_/shes rab sgron mas 'jig rten gsum po gsal/_/khyod ni rab rib sel bar 'gyur ba ste/_/'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa/_/khyod la bstod pa bskal par brjod kyang ni/_/khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis/_/
[\[175a.2\]]yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/de ltar lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[175a.3\]]zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs 
[\[175a.4\]]su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra/_/phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/_/thub pa khyod kyis sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag 
[\[175a.5\]]mchod pa mdzad/_/de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/_/tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal mtshan tog_/rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag la mig sbyin pa/_/thub pa dri ma gsum 
[\[175a.6\]]dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba/_/shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te/_/shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams 
[\[175a.7\]]stobs rnams dang /_/stobs rnams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te/_/stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur/_/dpung tshogs mtha' yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]de/_/nyams par mi 'gyur grang zhes lha rnams thams cad rab tu sngangs shing skrag par gyur/_/khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/_/khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur/_/ji ltar snga ma rnams 
[\[175b.2\]]kyis seng ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa/_/de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du gyur ma lags/_/yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes/_/des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro 
[\[175b.3\]]ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing /_/dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[175b.4\]]po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_me tog a ti mug ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_bar shi ka dang /_d+ha nus ka ri'i phreng ba dang /_chun po thogs te/_lha'i bu 
[\[175b.5\]]mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/_tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/shin tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid du mchi/_/zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba/_/'dzum pa'i zhal 
[\[175b.6\]]ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa/_/thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba/_/sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun/_/khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas na/_/mi yi sgra skad thams cad zil gyis non/_/'dod 
[\[175b.7\]]chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi/_/mi min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed/_/rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas/_/de kun 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob/_/khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad/_/mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nams kyang rgyags ma gyur/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]khyod ni 'gying ba mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin/_/de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na/_/mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/pad ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po/_/de ltar 'jig rten kun la mchod 
[\[176a.2\]]sbyin mdzad/_/de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bar snang gi 
[\[176a.3\]]lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang /_rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang /_rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang /_rin po che dang dar gyi lda ldi dang /_
[\[176a.4\]]rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang /_mu tig gi chun khor dang /_me tog gi lda ldi sna tshogs rnams lus phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang /_zla gam rnams kyis legs par brgyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis 
[\[176a.5\]]mngon par bstod do/_/thub pa mkhas la bdag cag mchis nas ni/_/'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing /_/sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na/_/de ltar khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong /_/mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa/_/
[\[176a.6\]]mi yi 'dren pa de dag nam mkha' khyab/_/'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus lags pas/_/gzhal med khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis/_/bar snang nas ni me tog char bab pa/_/stong chen byur bur rab tu gang gyur pa/_/de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur bab kyang /_/'bab chu 
[\[176a.7\]]rgya mtshor bab pa bzhin du gyur/_/gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng /_/me tog tsam pa ka yi lda ldi dang /_/rgyan phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang 'thor/_/lha yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma mchis/_/bar snang thams cad lha yis gang gyur te/_/'di la skra tsam gzhag 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa'i gnas ma mchis/_/rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni/_/khyod la rgyags pa'am ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/_/de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 
[\[176b.2\]]'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sa gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas spos chus chag chag btab ste/_me tog gis chal bar bkang nas ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi bla re bres te de bzhin 
[\[176b.3\]]gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/stong gsum rdo rje lta bur mi shigs gnas par gyur/_/nga 'dir pags pa sha dang rus pa rkang skams kyang /_/byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas mi ldang zhes/_/rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por 
[\[176b.4\]]bzhugs/_/gal te mi yi seng ge khyod kyis stong gsum kun/_/byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag rkang mthil gyis/_/bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhags tshe ma lus zhig par 'gyur/_/sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag pa 
[\[176b.5\]]ni/_/sa yi lha yis rnyed pa rgya chen legs par rnyed/_/'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snang bar mdzad/_/stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos ci 'tshal/_/'og gi chu yi phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang /_/sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed pa/_/stong gsum sa rnams 
[\[176b.6\]]thams cad bdag cag gzung bar bgyi/_/khyod la kun 'bul ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad du gsol/_/gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam 'chag gam mnal ba dang /_/gau tam bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po nyan thos gang /_/chos gtam smra dang gang yang de dag mnyan pa dang /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[176b.7\]]cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/de ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/mngon par bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gsum pa'o//_//dge slong dag de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lha rnams kyis bstod cing skyil mo krung ma bshig_/spyan mi 'dzums par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang dga' ba'i zas kyi 
[\[177a.2\]]bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to/_/de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der lhags so/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang spos chu'i bum pa khri 
[\[177a.3\]]thogs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_byang chub kyi shing dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la spos chus bkrus so/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 
[\[177a.4\]]'das pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog pa'i spos chu des rang rang gi lus la bskus so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do/_/lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin kyang spos chu de dang ma bral bar gyur te/_spos 
[\[177a.5\]]gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed do/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par yid la bya ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 
[\[177a.6\]]'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la dgung bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par 
[\[177a.7\]]bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa des lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ni dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]pa zhag bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/zhabs ni 'khor los khyab pa po/_/pad 'dab rdul med stong gzi ldan/_/lha yi cod pan zhabs 
[\[177b.2\]]gtugs pa/_/dpal stug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de tshe lha bu de sems dga'/_/lha min rab tu zhi byed pa/_/yid gnyis sel ba'i tshig 'di smras/_/shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa/_/chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin 
[\[177b.3\]]pa/_/zhus pa rnams kyang mthar 'byin pa/_/lha mi'i dogs pa bsal du gsol/_/dpag med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu ci slad du/_/rgyal ba dog sa'i snying por ni/_/dgung bdun skyil mo krung ma bshig_/'dab brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/ci zhig 
[\[177b.4\]]gzigs na dgung bdun du/_/mi yi seng ge rnam dag spyan/_/spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa mdzad/_/gang gis shing rgyal drung du ni/_/skyil krung ma bshig dgung bdun bzhugs/_/smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi 'am/_/smra ba'i seng ge kun gyi lags/_/tshems ni mnyam zhing rnam dag 
[\[177b.5\]]pa/_/stobs bcu'i zhal ni dri rab gda'/_/ma nor legs par bka' stsol te/_/lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod/_/zla 'dra'i zhal gyis bka' stsal pa/_/ngas bshad lha yi bu nyon cig_/ngas ni dris pa de yi lan/_/cung zad tsam zhig bshad par bya/_/dper na rgyal po 
[\[177b.6\]]phyogs gang du/_/gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba/_/zhag bdun bar du sa phyogs de/_/mi 'dor rgyal po'i chos nyid do/_/de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba yang /_/gang tshe smon rdzogs dbang bskur ba/_/sa yi snying por zhag bdun du/_/rgyal ba skyil mo krung mi 'jig_/dper 
[\[177b.7\]]na dpa' bo dgra tshogs rnams/_/ma lus pham byas lta ba ltar/_/byang chub snying por sangs rgyas kyang /_/nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad/_/gti mug byung ba'i 'dod dang khro/_/de dag 'gro ba'i dgra 'dra ste/_/chom po chas ni bzang 'dra ba/_/de dag ma lus ngas 'dir 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bshig_/ngas 'dir nga rgyal rnam dgu dang /_/gnas med rlom sems rab tu bcom/_/zag pa thams cad rab tu spangs/_/nga yi ye shes dam pa skyes/_/ngas 'dir sred pa'i srid rgyu dang /_/ma rig bya min byed pa de/_/bag nyal bcas rtsa dra ba rnams/_/ye shes 
[\[178a.2\]]gsal ba'i me yis bsregs/_/ngas 'dir nga dang nga yi dang /_/nyes zhags ring 'gro rtsa zug pa/_/sgrib pa'i mdud pa dam po de/_/ye shes mtshon gyis bcad par gyur/_/ngas 'dir ring nas nga'i ldan pa/_/slu ba tha ma rnam 'jig pa/_/len par bcas pa'i phung po de/_/ye 
[\[178a.3\]]shes kyis ni yongs su shes/_/gnyis su rmongs pa log 'dzin pa/_/tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams/_/ngas 'dir ma lus bsal byas te/_/phyin chad nam yang skyer mi 'gyur/_/ngas 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba yi/_/me yis sgrib pa'i nags tshal bsregs/_/phyin ci log 
[\[178a.4\]]ni rnam bzhi yang /_/nga yis ma lus nges par bsregs/_/'du shes skud pas brgyus pa yi/_/rnam rtog phreng ba gnod byed pa/_/ngas 'dir byang chub yan lag gi/_/phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog_/bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang /_/gti mug sum cu dri ma can/_/sdig pa 
[\[178a.5\]]dag ni bzhi bcu ngas/_/sa yi snying po 'dir bsal te/_/sa yi snying por 'dug nas ngas/_/sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang /_/khams ni rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bsal/_/nyon mongs chu bo nyi shu dang /_/'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad/_/brtson 'grus mthu dang brtul 
[\[178a.6\]]ba yis/_/nga 'dir de dag shin tu 'das/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas bsgyings sgrog pa/_/lnga brgya ngas 'dir yang dag rtogs/_/brgya phrag stong du tshang ba yi/_/chos rnams nga yis yang dag rtogs/_/ngas 'dir bag nyal ma lus pa/_/dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'/_/kun
