[\[178a.7\]]nas ldang ba'i lo ma rnams/_/ye shes me yis nges par bsregs/_/dogs dang yid gnyis kun 'byung ba/_/lta ba'i chu yis gang gyur pa/_/mi dge ngogs can sred pa'i klung /_/shugs drag ye shes nyi mas bskams/_/tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag spangs/_/sgyu dang ser sna phrag dog 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sdang /_/nyon mongs dgon pa [{]ding [,]deng [}]'dir bcad/_/'dul ba'i me yis rab tu bsregs/_/'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de/_/ngan 'gro nyam ngar 'dren byed pa/_/'phags la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig_/ye shes mchog gi sman gyis bskyugs/_/ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang /_/ting 'dzin 
[\[178b.2\]]thob nas ngu ba dang /_/cho nge 'don dang mya ngan dang /_/smre ba ma lus mtha' mar phyin/_/ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge 'dzin/_/thob nas chu bo sbyor ba dang /_/mdud pa mya ngan zug rngu dang /_/rgyags dang bag med kun las rgyal/_/ngas 'dir nyon mongs gzings pa yi/_/srid 
[\[178b.3\]]pa'i ljon shing rtog rtsa brtan/_/dran pa'i sta res ma lus par/_/bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs/_/ngas 'dir nga snyam nga rgyal te/_/khams gsum dbang byed stobs che ba/_/g.yon can ye shes ral gris bcom/_/lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin/_/dra ba ma 
[\[178b.4\]]lus sum cu drug_/'jug pa sa yi snying po 'dir/_/shes rab ral gri stobs ldan pas/_/bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs/_/nyon mongs rtsa ba bag nyal bcas/_/sdug bsngal mya ngan 'byung de dag_/ngas 'dir shes rab dam pa yi/_/thong lcags kyis ni ma 
[\[178b.5\]]lus bton/_/rang bzhin gyis dag sems can gyi/_/shes rab mig 'dir nga yis sbyangs/_/ye shes mig sman chen po yis/_/gti mug ling tog rgya chen bsal/_/'byung khams bzhi po rgyags pa yi/_/chu srin gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho dran pa 
[\[178b.6\]]dang /_/zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams/_/ngas 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs/_/rnam rtog dud 'thul chags chen me/_/rab tu 'bar ba rnam thar chu/_/bsil ba'i khu bas bsad par gyur/_/ngas 'dir bag la nyal ba'i sprin/_/ro myang glog 'dra rnam rtog 'brug_/
[\[178b.7\]]brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyis/_/'das te kun du gtor bar gyur/_/ngas 'dir dran pa dri med pa'i/_/ting 'dzin thob nas sems spyod dgra/_/srid pa'i khon rgyud ma lus par/_/shes rab ral gri'i stobs kyis bcad/_/ngas 'dir rgyal mtshan mchog 'chang 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]ba/_/shing rta glang po rtas mtho ba/_/gzugs bsgyur bdud dpung brtson pa'i sde/_/byams pa thob nas rnam par bcom/_/mi sdug ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_/ngas 'dir dbang po drug gi rta/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtas pa/_/rtag tu rgyags yan ma lus 
[\[179a.2\]]btags/_/smon med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_/ngas 'dir rjes su chags pa dang /_/khong khro ba dang 'thab pa dang /_/rtsod spang ma lus mtha' mar phyin/_/stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_/ngas 'dir phyi dang nang dag gi/_/rlom sems kun dang rtog pa dang /_/rnam par rtog pa 
[\[179a.3\]]yongs su zad/_/mtshan med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_/lha mi srid pa'i rtser thug pa'i/_/bde ba thams cad ma lus par/_/nga yis 'dir ni yongs su btang /_/ngas 'dir rnam thar gsum thob nas/_/ngas 'dir shes rab stobs kyis ni/_/srid pa dag gi 'ching ba kun/_/
[\[179a.4\]]ma lus kun las grol bar gyur/_/ngas 'dir rgyu mthong gyur nas ni/_/rtag dang mi rtag 'du shes dang /_/bdag dang bdag med bde sdug bsngal/_/rgyu yi 'du shes gsum las rgyal/_/ngas 'dir las kyi rnam pa dang /_/skye mched drug rtsa kun 'byung las/_/byung ba thams cad 
[\[179a.5\]]shing dbang drung /_/mi rtag pa yis bsnun te bcad/_/ngas 'dir ye shes nyi ma yis/_/gti mug mun pa'i rnyog pa dang /_/lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba/_/yun ring mun pa bsal snang byas/_/ngas 'dir brtson 'grus stobs kyi grus/_/'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can/_/
[\[179a.6\]]ngar 'dzin lta ngan sred rlabs chu/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las rgal/_/gang rtogs chags dang gti mug dang /_/sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te/_/phye leb nags mer lhung 'dra ba/_/ngas 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs/_/nga 'dir ring nas song ba yi/_/bskal pa dpag 
[\[179a.7\]]med bye khrag khrig_/'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa/_/gdung ba med nas ngal yang sos/_/'jig rten phan phyir rga shi dang /_/mya ngan sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa/_/phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa/_/bdud rtsi de ni ngas 'dir rtogs/_/sred las byung ba'i skye mched kyis/_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba/_/phyis mi 'byung ba 'jigs med kyi/_/grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to/_/ngas 'dir nang gi dgra chen po/_/khyab pa de dag rjes su rtogs/_/rtogs nas rab tu bsregs te ngas/_/de dag yang byung gnas med byas/_/bdud rtsi'i don du bskal pa 
[\[179b.2\]]ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig rang gi sha/_/mig dang rin chen mang btang ba/_/de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag med pas/_/gang sangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs/_/gang gi snyan pa nyams dga' ba/_/sgra ni 'jig rten rnams su grags/_/rten nas byung ba'i 'gro ba stong /_/
[\[179b.3\]]sems kyi skad cig gcig la 'jig_/smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 'dra/_/de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/_/gang gis lag pa'i mthil du ni/_/shing tog bzhag bzhin 'jig rten khams/_/thams cad mthong ba'i mig mchog de/_/nga yis 'dir ni dag par byas/_/sngon gyi 
[\[179b.4\]]gnas ni ngas 'dir dran/_/rig pa gsum yang thob par gyur/_/bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med pa/_/gnyid kyis log las sad bzhin dran/_/lha mi nor zhing 'du shes log_/phyin ci log gyur gang 'bar ba/_/de yang de bzhin ma nor bar/_/ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i 
[\[179b.5\]]snying khu 'thungs/_/gang gi don du stobs bcu po/_/sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/_/byams pa'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/_/ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs/_/gang gi don du stobs bcu po/_/sems can kun la snying rje bsgoms/_/snying rje'i stobs 
[\[179b.6\]]kyis rgyal gyur nas/_/ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs/_/gang gi don du stobs bcu po/_/sems can kun la dga' ba bsgoms/_/dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/_/ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs/_/gang gi don du stobs bcu po/_/bskal pa khrag 
[\[179b.7\]]khrig btang snyoms bsgoms/_/btang snyoms 'di yi stobs kyis rgyal/_/ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs/_/stobs bcu gang gA'i bye ma bas/_/rab tu mang bas gang gsol pa/_/sngon rgyal seng ges sngon gsol pa/_/bdud rtsi'i snying khu ngas 'dir 'thungs/_/rga shi mtha' 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]mar ma phyin par/_/skyil mo krung ni mi gzhig ces/_/sder bcas pa yi bdud mdun 'dir/_/nga yis tshig ni gang smras pa/_/ye shes rdo rje brtan 'bar bas/_/nga yis ma rig pa yang bcom/_/stobs bcu nyid ni thob par gyur/_/de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig_/nga 
[\[180a.2\]]yis dgra bcom nyid thob ste/_/nga yi zag pa ma lus zad/_/bdud kyi sde yang bcom par gyur/_/de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig_/sgrib pa lnga yi sgo glegs rnams/_/nga yis 'dir ni thams cad bcag_/srid pa'i khri shing rnams kyang bcad/_/nga 'dir skyil mo krung gzhig go/_/de nas 
[\[180a.3\]]mi yi zla ba de/_/dal gyis gdan las bzhengs nas su/_/dbang bskur chen po bzhes nas ni/_/seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs par gyur/_/lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod/_/steng nas spos chu sna tshogs kyis/_/stobs bcu yon tan mthar phyin pa/_/'jig rten rtsa lag sku 
[\[180a.4\]]yang bsil/_/bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams dag_/lha mo khrag khrig lhan cig tu/_/kun nas rol mo stong dag gis/_/mchod pa gzhal du med pa byed/_/de ltar lha yi bu dag ni/_/sa yi snying po zhag bdun du/_/rgyal ba'i skyil krung ma bshig pa/_/rgyur bcas rkyen bcas 
[\[180a.5\]]gzhi dang bcas/_/dge slong dag de ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[180a.6\]]mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la gdan de nyid la bzhugs so/_/zhag bdun pa gnyis pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyang ring du 'chags pas 'chag go/_/zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[180a.7\]]pa ngas 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes byang chub kyi snying po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs so/_/zhag bdun pa bzhi pa'i tshe ni 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shar gyi rgya mtsho nas nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar du mi ring ba'i 'chags pas 'chag go//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu drug pa/_de nas bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ga la 
[\[180b.2\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags kyis/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol/_/bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[180b.3\]]'da' bar gsol/_/dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can nga'i dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan/_dul ba/_gsal ba/_byang ba/_bag tsha ba med pa/_mang du thos pa/_chos kyi rjes su 
[\[180b.4\]]'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa/_bdag nyid slob dpon du sgrogs pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba byung ba rnams chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcad de dad par byas nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag ma byung gi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/sdig can 
[\[180b.5\]]ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra bzhag par ma gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/sdig can nga'i 
[\[180b.6\]]'khor bzhi po dul ba/_gsal ba/_byang ba/_bag tsha ba med pa nas cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa'i bar du nus pa dag byung ba ma gyur gyi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_phyogs 
[\[180b.7\]]gcig tu song nas 'dug ste mgo smad nas mdas sa la ri mo 'dri zhing bdag gi yul las 'das so snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de nas bdud kyi bu mo dga' ma dang /_mi dga' ma dang /_sred ma gsum gyis bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yab cig ji ltar thugs 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]mi dgyes/_/mi gang lags pa bka' stsol dang /_/'dod chags zhags pas de bcings nas/_/glang po bzhin du dgug par bgyi/_/bkug nas de ni myur du yang /_/khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi/_/de la thugs ngan 'o brgyal 'or/_/dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par 
[\[181a.2\]]'gyur/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_'jig rten dgra bcom bde bar gshegs/_/'dod chags dbang du de mi 'gro/_/nga yi yul las shin tu 'das/_/de bas nga ni mya ngan che/_/de nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa snga nas kyang shes mod kyi/_
[\[181a.3\]]bud med kyis mi brtan pas pha'i tshig ma mnyan te/_bu cig btsas tsam gyi na tshod kyis dar la bab par sgyur nas/_mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas de dag yid la ma mdzad par de dag rga bas 'khogs 
[\[181a.4\]]par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de dag pha'i gan du song ste/_/'di skad ces smras so/_/de ni chags pas mi bkri ste/_/nga yi yul las shin tu 'das/_/de bas mya ngan nga che zhes/_/yab kyis bdag cag gsungs pa mad/_/gau ta ma ni brlag pa'i phyir/_/bdag cag rnams kyis 
[\[181a.5\]]gang sprul pa/_/gzugs la gal te de lta na/_/de yi de snying 'gas par 'gyur/_/yab bdag cag gi lus rga bas 'khogs pa 'di ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_gang zhig sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs ni gzhan du sgyur bar byed nus pa/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 
[\[181a.6\]]dag gi 'jig rten dag na mi de ngas ma mthong /_/myur du song ste thub pa de las rang byas nyes pa shogs shig dang /_/de ni khyod kyis bsam pa bzhin du sngon gyi lus su sgyur bar 'gyur/_de nas de dag dong ste bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la sku brnyas bgyi bar bsams pas/_bcom ldan 
[\[181a.7\]]'das ji ltar byis pa rnams dang /_ji ltar glen pa rnams dang /_ji ltar mi gsal ba mi mkhas shing ma 'tshal ba rnams ltar bdag cag nongs pa can du gzung du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag nongs pa can du gzung du gsol/_zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la bzod par gsol 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_/sen mos ri la bru ba dang /_/so yis lcags ni bca' ba dang /_/mgo yis ri ni dbug pa dang /_/gting mi dpogs la dpog par 'dod/_/de lta bas na bu mo khyed/_/nyes pa can du ngas gzung ngo /_/
[\[181b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas 'chags shing phyin chad kyang sdom par byed pa de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag zhag bdun pa lnga pa la zhag bdun yul ngan chen po byung ba'i tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung 
[\[181b.3\]]gi gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang rlung gis phog tu 'ong zhes rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[181b.4\]]sku la grang ba dang rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes shar phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po gzhan mang du lhags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/_/shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 
[\[181b.5\]]grang ba dang rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes lho dang nub dang byang phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po rnams lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis lan bdun du dkris te mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/_/klu'i rgyal po'i phung po de ni ri'i dbang po lhun po ltar mthon 
[\[181b.6\]]por gnas par gyur to/_/klu'i rgyal po de dag gis kyang ji ltar nyin bdun mtshan bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la reg par gyur pa de lta bu'i bde ba de dag gis sngon nam yang ma rnyed do/_/de nas zhag bdun 'das nas klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yul ngan med par shes te/_de bzhin 
[\[181b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku las lus bkrol nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po btang bzung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]ba byas nas rang gi gnas su zhugs so/_/zhag bdun pa drug pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas nas shing n+ya gro d+ha ra skyong gi drung du bzhud do/_/klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas dang shing n+ya gro d+ha ra skyong gi bar du rlung nai ran dza na'i ngogs su spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu 
[\[182a.2\]]rgyu dang /_nyan thos rgan po dang /_gau ta ma dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_kun du 'tsho ba pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas zhag bdun pa yul ngan chen po'i dus 'di bde bas bde bar 'das par byas sam zhes 'dzer to/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin 
[\[182a.3\]]gshegs pas de'i tshe ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/chos thos pa dang mthong ba dang /_/dben par dga' ba bde ba yin/_/srog chags 'byung po rnams la bsdams/_/gnod pa mi byed 'jig rten bde/_/sdig pa rnams las rab 'das pa/_/'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten 
[\[182a.4\]]bde/_/nga snyam nga rgyal gang 'dul ba/_/de ni mchog tu bde ba yin/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten kun 
[\[182a.5\]]du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar gzigs nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sgra reg ro dang gzugs dang dri rnams kyis/_/'jig rten 'di ni kun du gdungs par gyur/_/srid pas 'jigs kyang srid pa'i sred pa yis/_/phyir zhing sred pa tshol bar byed pa 
[\[182a.6\]]yin/_/zhag bdun pa bdun pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang phyogs pa'i tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po zhes bya ba mkhas pa gsal ba spun gnyis rnyed pa chen po rnyed nas/_zong rnam pa mang po thogs te/_'gron pa phal po che dang /_shing rta shin tu 
[\[182a.7\]]gang ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su dong ngo /_/de gnyis la glang bu cang shes legs skyes dang grags pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/_/de gnyis la thogs pa'i 'jigs pa med de gang du glang bu gzhan mi thar ba der de gnyis gtong ngo /_/gang du mdun rol na 'jigs pa yod 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa der de gnyis phur pa la btags pa bzhin du 'dug go/_/de gnyis la lcag gis mi 'ju'i me tog ud pa la spar gang ngam/_sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas de gnyis ded do/_/shing sgrol rgyu dang nye ba zhig tu shing 'o ma can gyi nags na gnas pa'i lha mos byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[182b.2\]]pas/_de dag gi shing rta de dag thams cad mi 'gro ste/_'breng pa la sogs pa shing rta'i cha rkyen thams cad kyang chad grugs so/_/shing rta'i 'phang lo rnams kyang lte ba la thug par sa'i nang du nub ste/_thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrims kyang shing rta de dag 'gro bar ma gyur nas/_kha cig 
[\[182b.3\]]ngo mtshar dang skrag par gyur te/_shing rta 'di dag thang la yang thogs par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod/_'di'i 'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam nas/_de dag gis glang bu legs skyes dang grags pa de gnyis 'dren du bcug ste/_me tog ud pa la spar gang dang /_sna ma'i me tog gi phreng 
[\[182b.4\]]bas bdas kyang 'gro bar ma gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir 'di gnyis kyang mi 'gro ba las mdun na 'jigs pa 'ga' zhig 'byung du gdon mi za'o snyam nas/_de dag gis sa 'khru ba rta pa dag sngar btang ngo /_/sa 'khru ba rta pa rnams slar log nas 'jigs pa ci yang 
[\[182b.5\]]med ces smras so/_/lha mo des kyang rang gi gzugs bstan nas ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs phyung ngo /_/glang bu de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su shing rta drangs pa dang /_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa me ltar rab tu 'bar ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu 
[\[182b.6\]]rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_nyi ma shar nas ring por ma lon pa lta bu dpal gyis 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'di ni ci zhig tshangs pa 'dir phyin tam/_'on te lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'on te rnam thos kyi bu'am/_
[\[182b.7\]]'on te nyi ma dang zla ba'am/_'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig gam/_rlung gi lha 'ga' zhig snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' ngur smrig rnams bstan to/_/de nas de dag gis ngur smrig bgos pa 'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyis bdag cag 'jigs pa med do zhes smras te/_/de dag 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]dad pa thob nas yang phan tshun du smras pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di ni dus su za ba yin na/_cung zad ci yod/_smras pa/_sbrang rtsi dang /_skyo ma dang /_bu ram shing bshus pa yod do/_/de dag gis sbrang rtsi dang /_skyo ma dang /_bu ram shing bshus pa khyer nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga 
[\[183a.2\]]la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[183a.3\]]la thugs brtse bar dgongs te spyan gzigs 'di bzhes su gsol/_dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis lag pas 'di blangs na ni ma legs na sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod ji lta bus bzhes snyam nas mkhyen 
[\[183a.4\]]pa 'jug par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs kyi dus la bab par rig nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bzhi nas rgyal po chen po bzhi gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/_lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse 
[\[183a.5\]]bar dgongs te/_gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag bzhes su gsol zhes phul lo/_/de dag dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so/_/de bzhin du dngul gyi bzhi dang /_bai dUr+ya'i dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po las byas pa bzhi 
[\[183a.6\]]bzhi dang /_rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na yang dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs te/_de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sngon gyi 
[\[183a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lhung bzed rnam pa ci 'dra ba dag gis bzhes snyam dgongs na/_rdo'i lhung bzed rnams kyis bzhes par mkhyen nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i thugs bskyed pa dang /_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po chen po gzhan gsum la 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]smras pa/_grogs po dag sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi byin pa dang /_de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_/'di spyad par bya'o snyam pa dang /_de nas sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam par snang byed ces bya ba des bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye snod 
[\[183b.2\]]'di dag spyad par ma bya bar/_/'di dag chongs shig mchod rten grags par 'gyur/_/shAkya thub ces bya ba'i rgyal ba 'byung /_/de la lhung bzed 'di dag dbul ba gyis/_/grogs po dag gis shAkya thub pa la/_/snod dbul ba yi dus dang tshod la bab/_/glu dbyangs dag dang sil snyan sgra 
[\[183b.3\]]phyung ste/_/mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dbul bar bya/_/snod de chos kyi rang bzhin mi shigs pa/_/snod 'di rdo ba'i rang bzhin bzhes su rung /_/gzhan gyis blang bar bzod pa ma yin gyis/_/da ni bdag cag de dag len du 'dong /_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang gi 
[\[183b.4\]]gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs len cing rang rang gi lag tu lhung bzed de dag thogs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[183b.5\]]pa la mchod pa byas te/_lhung bzed de dag lha'i me tog gis bkang nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal po chen po dad pa dang ldan pa bzhi po 'di dag gis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi phul na/_bdag la 
[\[183b.6\]]ni bzhir mi rung la/_ji ste gcig gi blangs na ni gsum yang mi dga' bar 'gyur na/_/bdag gis lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag blangs te lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_rgyal po chen po rnam 
[\[183b.7\]]thos kyi bu la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_bde bar gshegs la lhung bzed phul cig dang /_/khyod ni theg pa mchog gi snod du 'gyur/_/nga 'dra dag la lhung bzed phul ba ni/_/dran dang blo gros nams kyang nyams mi 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las lhung bzed bzhes so/_/bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs la lhung bzed phul/_/nams kyang dran dang shes rab 
[\[184a.2\]]nyams mi 'gyur/_/bsil dngos go 'phang sangs rgyas thob bar du/_/bde bas bde bar dus rnams zad par byed/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung las lhung bzed bzhes so/_/bzhes nas 
[\[184a.3\]]kyang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_rnam par dag sems de bzhin gshegs pa la/_/khyod kyis yongs dag lhung bzed phul cig dang /_/khyod kyi sems ni myur du dag par 'gyur/_/lha mi 'jig rten dag na bsngags par 'os/_/dge 
[\[184a.4\]]slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po las lhung bzed bzhes so/_/bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_/skyon med sems dang dad pas skyon med snod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[184a.5\]]tshul khrims skyon med cing /_/tshul skyon med la rab tu phul cig dang /_/khyod kyi sbyin pa bsod nams skyon med 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang las lhung bzed bzhes so/_/bzhes nas kyang 
[\[184a.6\]]mos pa'i stobs kyi lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/_de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/nga yis sngon gyi srid par snod kyi rnams/_/bzang byas 'bras bus rab tu bkang ste byin/_/de nas lhung bzed dbyibs legs bzhi po 'di/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha 
[\[184a.7\]]bzhi rnams kyis byin/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/brtan pa dam pa'i don de dgongs pa de/_/zhag bdun byang chub shing mchog gzigs nas ni/_/seng ge'i stabs 'dra mi yi seng ge de/_/sa ni rnam pa drug tu bskyod nas bzhengs/_/glang po'i dbang ltar kun tu dal gyis 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]gshegs/_/rim gyis sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung byon nas/_/lhun po lta bur g.yo ba mi mnga' bzhugs/_/thub pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin rnams dgongs/_/de yi tshe na ga gon bzang po spun/_/gnyis dang tshong pa'i tshogs dang shing rta ni/_/nor gyis gang ba dag dang lhan cig 
[\[184b.2\]]tu/_/sA la'i me tog nags tshal rgyas par zhugs/_/drang srong chen po'i gzi yis skad cig tu/_/srog shing thug par 'phang lo sa nang nub/_/de dag de 'dra ba yi gnas mthong nas/_/tshong pa'i tshogs ni 'jigs pa chen po skyes/_/de dag ral gri mda' dang mdung thung 
[\[184b.3\]]thogs/_/nags na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du su zhes tshol/_/sprin med 'od zer stong ldan 'dra ba'i rgyal/_/zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra ba mthong /_/khro ba spangs shing rgyags pa bsal nas su/_/mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di ni su zhes dpyod/_/mkha' las lha yis 'di skad tshig 
[\[184b.4\]]smras te/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan don mdzad/_/nyin bdun mtshan bdun bza' dang btung ba dag_/thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'di ni ma gsol to/_/gal te bdag gi nyon mongs zhi 'dod na/_/sku dang thugs bsgoms 'di la bshos gsol cig_/de dag gis ni 
[\[184b.5\]]sgra snyan de thos nas/_/rgyal la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/_/dga' nas de dag grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/rgyal ba bshos gsol bar ni gros bcad do/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis kyi ba'i khyu mtha' 'khob kyi 'or zhig na gnas so/_/de nas de'i 
[\[184b.6\]]tshe ba de dag bzhos nas mar gyi snying khu byung bar gyur to/_/de nas ba lang rdzi de dag gis mar gyi snying khu de khyer nas/_tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de dag gis tshul smos te/_btsun pa dag mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_khyed kyi ba thams cad ni bzhos 
[\[184b.7\]]na/_mar gyi snying khu byung na 'di ci dge ba zhig lags sam/_'on te ma lags/_de na bram ze zas la brkam pa'i rang bzhin can dag 'di skad ces 'di ni dge ba ma yin te/_bram ze rnams la mchod sbyin chen po bya dgos so zhes 'dzer to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe tshong pa ga 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]gon dang bzang po dag gi tshe rabs snga ma'i snag gi gnyen mtshams bram ze rma bya zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa des bram ze'i gzugs su sprul nas/_tshong pa de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/khyod kyis sngon ni smon btab pa/_/byang chub brnyes 
[\[185a.2\]]nas de bzhin gshegs/_/bdag cag rnams kyi bshos gsol te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog_/smon lam de ni rdzogs zin gyis/_/byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs/_/de la zhal zas phul cig dang /_/gsol nas 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/khyed 
[\[185a.3\]]kyi ba mar snying khu byung /_/shin tu bkra shis skar ma bzang /_/drang srong chen po de yi ni/_/bsod nams las kyi mthu 'di'o/_/de ltar tshong pa bskul nas ni/_/rma bya rang gi gnas su song /_/ga gon zhes ni bya la sogs/_/thams cad yid ni mgu bar gyur/_/ba stong 'o ma ji snyed 
[\[185a.4\]]yod pa dag_/de kun ma lus par ni bsdus nas su/_/de yi steng nas pris ma bzham byas te/_/de dag rab tu gus par zhal zas sbyor/_/rin chen gzhong pa tshim byed ces bya ba/_/srang gcig la yang 'bum phrag gcig ri ba/_/gtsang mar rab bkrus dri ma med byas nas/_/zhal 
[\[185a.5\]]zas kyis ni kha da chad du bkang /_/sbrang rtsi dang ni rin chen gzhong thogs te/_/sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung song ston pa la/_/btsun pa bzhes te bdag cag sman yang thogs/_/zhal zas gya nom pa 'di man bas su gsol/_/spun gnyis po la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang /_/byang chub 
[\[185a.6\]]zhugs pa'i sngon gyi bsam mkhyen nas/_/ston pa bzhes pa mdzad de zhal zas gsol/_/gsol nas gzhong pa nam mkha'i dkyil du bor/_/lha yi bu pho rab tshangs zhes bya ba/_/de yis rin chen gzhong pa mchog de blangs/_/des de da dung tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/_/lha 
[\[185a.7\]]gzhan grogs dang lhan cig mchod pa byed/_/de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po de dag la 'di dag gis rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing /_/phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des/_/khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig_/
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]thams cad myur du 'thun par shog_/phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar/_/lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog_/g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig_/yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog_/tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing /_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/_/rnyed pa 
[\[185b.2\]]chen po rnyed gyur cing /_/de dag bde ba skyid par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/smin drug dang ni snar ma dang /_/mgo dang lag dang nab so dang /_/rgyal dang skag ces bya 
[\[185b.3\]]ba ste/_/de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste/_/de ni dri za kun gyi 
[\[185b.4\]]bdag_/nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de rnams khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/shar phyogs logs kyi 
[\[185b.5\]]phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang /_/don grub ma dang mi 'pham dang /_/dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang /_/dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/shar phyogs 
[\[185b.6\]]logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/gzhi 'dzin zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/_/rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/_/de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par 
[\[185b.7\]]ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni/_/me bzhi nag pa lnga pa 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]yin/_/sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/_/de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/'phags skyes po zhes bya bar 
[\[186a.2\]]brjod/_/de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag_/gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de rnams khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par 
[\[186a.3\]]skyong gyur cig_/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/_/grags pa 'thob dang grags 'dzin dang /_/legs par langs dang rab snga dang /_/legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med 
[\[186a.4\]]cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/pad ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/_/rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar/_/rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/
[\[186a.5\]]phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong 
[\[186a.6\]]gyur cig_/lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang /_/brtson 'grus brtan ldan snrums dang ni/_/chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang /_/gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin/_/de dag rnams ni nub phyogs pa/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/nub 
[\[186a.7\]]phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/_/de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag_/chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/_/
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/_/pad ma dkar dang skya reng dang /_/
[\[186b.2\]]cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang /_/rol dang gnag dang stabs myur srid/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod/_/nyi ma zla ba rnams kyang gnas/_/nub pa'ang khyed la nor 
[\[186b.3\]]sbyin gyur/_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/byang 
[\[186b.4\]]phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/mon gru dang ni mon gre dang /_/khrums stod dang yang khrums smad dang /_/nam gru dang ni tha skar dang /_/bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten 
[\[186b.5\]]skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/mi la zhon pa lus ngan po/_/gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/
[\[186b.6\]]mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/rab chags lha mo stong 
[\[186b.7\]]lha mo/_/sa dang de bzhin pad ma can/_/rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang /_/re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/spos ngad ldang ba'i ri bo yod/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]'byung po rnams kyi gnas/_/rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams 
[\[187a.2\]]rnyed de ldog par shog_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/_/phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas/_/lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis/_/phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/_/dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/_/yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad/_/dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad 
[\[187a.3\]]rnams/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur/_/ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog_/gnyen la lta ba bkra shis gyur/_/gnyen gyis blta ba'ang bkra shis shog_/dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgya chen dang /_/dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse 
[\[187a.4\]]bas/_/thams cad du ni bkra shis dang /_/bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog_/tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang /_/zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying brtses bsrung /_/ston brgyar mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog_/rnam 'dren zla 
[\[187a.5\]]med 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/de dag 'thun par sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsungs/_/khyed rnams kyi ni dge ba'i las 'di yis/_/sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa rgyal ba yis/_/lung bstan chags med 'di ni dang po yin/_/phyin chad 
[\[187a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang /_/gang dag lung bstan de dag phyir mi ldog_/rgyal bas lung bstan pa ni 'di thos nas/_/sems ni mgu zhing mchog tu dga' gyur te/_/de dag spun dang grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su dong /_/ga gon dang bzang 
[\[187a.7\]]po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung na bzhugs pa dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gcig pu dben par gshegs te/_nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'jig rten dang 'thun par 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]mdzad pa'i phyir 'di snyam du dgongs te/_kye ma ngas thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'di ni zab pa/_zhi ba/_rab tu zhi ba/_nye bar zhi ba/_gya nom pa/_mthong bar dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_brtag mi nus pa rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa/_'phags pa mkhas 
[\[187b.2\]]pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa ste/_'di lta ste phung po thams cad bor ba kun tu rig pa/_nges par rig pa/_tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa/_don dam pa/_kun gzhi med pa/_bsil ba'i dngos po/_len pa med pa/_nye bar len pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa ma yin pa/_rnam par 
[\[187b.3\]]rig par bya ba ma yin pa/_'dus ma byas pa yul drug las shin tu 'das pa/_mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/_brjod du med pa sgra med pa/_sgras brjod du med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_zhi gnas kyi 
[\[187b.4\]]lam gyis chod pa/_stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa/_sred pa zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_gal te bdag gis chos 'di gzhan dag la bstan la/_gal te de dag gis ma shes na/_de ni bdag ngal ba dang /_log par brtsal ba dang /_
[\[187b.5\]]chos bstan pa don med par 'gyur gyi/_bdag snying las chung ngur kha rog par gnas par bya snyam mo/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/zab zhi rdul bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas/_/bdud rtsi chos ni bdag gis thob par gyur/_/bdag gis bstan 
[\[187b.6\]]kyang gzhan gyis mi shes te/_/mi smrar nags 'dabs gnas par bya ba snyam/_/tshig bral ngag gi lam gyis mi gos pa/_/de bzhin nyid chos rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/_/sems dang yid kyis rgyu ba rab grol ba/_/mchog rab ngo mtshar che ba dam pa shes/_/don tshul 'di ni 
[\[187b.7\]]yi ge rnams kyis su/_/shes par mi nus mdzangs pas rig pa yin/_/sngon gyi rgyal la lhag byas sems can rnams/_/de dag chos 'di thos na yid ches 'gyur/_/'di na chos ni gang yang yod min te/_/yod med gang yin de ni yod ma yin/_/gang gis rgyu dang bya ba brgyud 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]shes pa/_/de la yod pa'am med pa yod ma yin/_/bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par ni/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i gan nas bdag gis spyad/_/'on kyang gang na bdag dang sems can dang /_/srog med bzod pa de ni bdag ma thob/_/gang tshe 'di na skye 'chi gang med pa/_/
[\[188a.2\]]chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin bdag med pa'i/_/bzod 'di bdag gis thob pa de yi tshe/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bdag lung bstan/_/'jig rten kun la snying rje mtha' yas nga /_/gzhan gyis gsol ba btab la nga mi sdod/_/skye bo 'di dag tshangs la dad pa ste/_/de yis 
[\[188a.3\]]gsol ba btab na 'khor lo bskor/_/gal te tshangs pas nga yi rkang par gtugs/_/rnam pa bzang po 'tshal 'gyur sems can mchis/_/rdul bral gya nom chos shod gsol btab na/_/de ltas nga yi chos 'di gzung 'os 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[188a.4\]]de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'od phyung ngo /_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[188a.5\]]thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes te/_bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud cing chos mi ston par shes nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag song la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs 
[\[188a.6\]]pa gtsug phud can gyis de'i tshe/_de ma yin pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_'di ltar chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la 
[\[188a.7\]]thugs btud pas/_kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo /_/grogs po dag kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni rnam par ma rung ngo /_/bdag cag dong ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul gor ma chag go/_/dge slong 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor te/_mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di 
[\[188b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo /_/kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das 
[\[188b.3\]]'jig rten 'di ni rab tu ma rung ngo /_/sems can rnam pa bzang po go sla ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bar rngo thogs pa/_skal ba dang ldan pa/_nus pa dang ldan pa dag mchis te/_de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das chos legs par bstan du gsol/_bde 
[\[188b.4\]]bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/ye shes chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas ni/_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer rnam par 'gyed mdzad de/_/ye shes zer gyis mi yi pad ma kha 'byed pa/_/smra ba'i nyi ma de ring ci slad 
[\[188b.5\]]btang snyoms bzhugs/_/'phags pa'i nor la sems can dag ni 'gron gnyer te/_/srog chags bye ba mang po dbugs phyung mdzad nas ni/_/gang slad mi gsung 'gro la btang snyoms mdzad pa 'di/_/'jig rten rtsa lag khyod la rigs pa ma lags so/_/chos kyi dam pa'i rnga bo che ni 
[\[188b.6\]]brdung du gsol/_/dam pa'i chos kyi dung ni myur du bud du gsol/_/chos kyi mchod sdong chen po bsgreng bar mdzad du gsol/_/chos kyi mar me chen po 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_/chos chu mchog gi char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pa 'di dag bsgral 
[\[188b.7\]]du gsol/_/nad chen nyon mongs 'di dag thar bar mdzad du gsol/_/nyon mongs mes gdungs rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_/bde ba shis pa rims med mya ngan med gyur pa/_/zhi ba'i lam ni khyod kyis nges par bstan du gsol/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam du mi 'gro mgon 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]med pa/_/log pa'i lam du gnas la mgon po thugs rje mdzod/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams rab tu dbye bar gsol/_/chos tshul 'khrug pa ma mchis de ni gzung du gsol/_/skye bo dmus long du ni gyur pa de dag la/_/mgon po khyod kyis chos mig dam pa sbyang du 
[\[189a.2\]]gsol/_/mi yi zla ba mgon po khyod ni ma gtogs par/_/'jig rten dag gi skye dang rga ba sel bgyid pa/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang ni lha yi 'jig rten dang /_/gnod sbyin dri za mi yi 'jig rten na ma mchis/_/lha rnams thams cad ltag par spyad par bgyis nas ni/_/bdag ni 
[\[189a.3\]]chos rgyal khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa lags/_/bsod nams 'di yis bdag kyang rab tu myur bar ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab tu skor gyur cig_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/_thugs brtse 
[\[189a.4\]]bar dgongs te/_tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_a ga ru'i phye mas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par 
[\[189a.5\]]gtor nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos la 'jig rten gus pa bskyed pa dang /_tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can yang de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dang yang bskul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 
[\[189a.6\]]spel ba dang /_chos kyang shin tu zab pa'i phyir yang gcig pu dben par gshegs te/_nang du yang dag bzhag nas/_thugs la 'di lta bur rnam par rtog par gyur te/_bdag gis chos zab pa/_phra ba/_gsal ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_brtag mi nus pa/_rtog ge'i 
[\[189a.7\]]spyod yul ma yin pa/_mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/_mthong bar dka' ba/_phung po thams cad bor ba/_'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi ba/_zhi gnas kyi lam gyis chad pa/_stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa/_sred pa zad pa/_
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_gal te bdag gis chos 'di bstan la/_gzhan gyis 'di khong du ma chud na de ni bdag la shin tu tho btsams par 'gyur gyis bdag snying las chung ngur gnas pas gnas par bya 
[\[189b.2\]]gor ma chag snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de sems kyis shes nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di 
[\[189b.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud de/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mi 
[\[189b.4\]]ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas/_kau shi ka kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ni rnam par ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ni ma rig pa'i mun pa chen por bcug par 'gyur na/_bdag cag de bzhin 
[\[189b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul du ci'i phyir mi 'dong /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma bskul bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ba'i phyir ro/_/grogs po legs so zhes te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs 
[\[189b.6\]]pa dang /_sa bla'i lha rnams dang /_bar snang ba rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_'od gsal dang /_'bras bu che dang /_dge rgyas dang /_gnas 
[\[189b.7\]]gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong rab tu mang po kha dog mngon par 'phags pa dag nam sros pa dang /_lha'i kha dog dang /_lha'i snang bas shing sgrol rgyu'i drung nye tshe snang bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/_/zla ba nya ba gza' las thar ba ltar/_/khyod kyi thugs ni rnam par grol ba 
[\[190a.2\]]lags/_/g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol/_/'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces 
[\[190a.3\]]smras so/_/kau shi ka ji ltar khyod kyis bskul ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba mi gdab bo/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha 
[\[190a.4\]]nga sa la btsugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba/_g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol/_/'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol/_/kun tu 'tshal bar 
[\[190a.5\]]'gyur ba mchis lags kyis/_/thub pa khyod kyis chos ni bstan du gsol/_/dge slong dag de skad ces gsol ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa ngas chos zab pa phra ba/_gsal ba 'di mngon par 
[\[190a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/_de ni bdag la shin tu tho btsams par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro tshangs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag nga la rgyun du snang mod kyi/_nga'i lam rgyun las bzlog par 'gro ba zab pa/_mthong bar dka' ba de ni 'dod chags kyis ldongs pa 
[\[190a.7\]]dag gis mi mthong ste/_de lta bas na bstan kyang mi phan no/_/skye dgu 'dod pa rnams la bcings/_/rgyun gyis rab tu bdas pa yin/_/ngas 'di tshegs ni chen pos rnyed/_/de lta bas na bstan mi phan/_/dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can dang /_lha'i dbang 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar gyur par rig nas/_lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud do/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA'i 
[\[190b.2\]]mi rnams la sdig pa mi dge ba'i lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_'di lta ste/_kha cig ni 'di skad du rlung ldang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/kha cig ni 'di skad du me 'bar bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/kha cig ni 'di skad du char 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/
[\[190b.3\]]kha cig ni chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/kha cig ni lo tog skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/kha cig ni bya rnams nam mkha' la 'phur bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/kha cig ni sbrum ma rnams nad med par btsa' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer ro/_/dge slong dag de nas 
[\[190b.4\]]tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de yang shes/_yul ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang rig nas/_nam sros pa dang /_kha dog mngon par 'phags pa dang /_lha'i snang bas shing sgrol rgyu'i drung thams 
[\[190b.5\]]cad snang bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[190b.6\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa/_ma ga d+hAr ni sngon chos ma dag pa/_/dri mar bcas par sems pa'i smra ba byung /_/de slad thub pa bdud rtsi'i sgo dbye gsol/_/dri med sangs rgyas chos ni nyan cing mchis/_/khyod ni rang gi dgos mdzad 
[\[190b.7\]]rang dbang gyur/_/sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed dri ma spangs/_/khyod kyi dge ba 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/_/khyod 'dir chos mchog pha rol byon par gyur/_/thub pa khyod 'dra 'jig rten 'dir ma mchis/_/drang srong che khyod lhag pa ga la mchis/_/srid gsum 'di na rnam par lhang 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]nge ste/_/lha min gnas na mchis pa'i ri bo 'dra/_/sdug bsngal skye bo thugs rje che bskyed gsol/_/khyod 'dra nam yang btang snyoms mdzad mi rigs/_/khyod ni mi 'jigs stobs dang yang dag ldan/_/khyod ni skye bo rab tu sgrol bar spyod/_/lha dang dge sbyong bram zer bcas pa 
[\[191a.2\]]kun/_/skye dgu 'di dag ring nas zug rngur bcas/_/nad rims ma mchis nad ma mchis gyur cig_/'di na de dag skyabs ni gzhan ma mchis/_/chos de rgyal bas thugs su chud gyur te/_/ji lta bzhin du mi nyung ston 'gyur zhes/_/dge ba'i sems kyis bdud rtsi don gnyer zhing /_/lha 
[\[191a.3\]]dang mi rnams khyod phyir ring nas 'brang /_/de slad mthu rtsal bzang po khyod la gsol/_/ring nas lam las nyams pa'i sems can thul/_/ma thos don rnams rab tu thos par 'tshal/_/shin tu nyam chung rtas par 'tshal dang 'dra/_/rab tu skam pa'i sa la sprin lta bur/_/'dren 
[\[191a.4\]]pa chos kyi char pas tshim par mdzod/_/ring nas nyams pa'i mi rnams srid pa na/_/lta ngan thibs po tsher mar bcas par rgyu/_/gang bsgoms na ni bdud rtsi thob 'gyur ba/_/tsher ma ma mchis drang lam de bstan gsol/_/long ba g.yang lhung 'dren pa ma mchis pa/_/'di 
[\[191a.5\]]na de dag gzhan gyis drang mi nus/_/blo ldan khyu mchog khyod ni mos bskyed de/_/g.yang sa chen por lhung ba gdon du gsol/_/thub pa khyod dang ring nas rtag mi mjal/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog brgya lam ltar/_/'dren pa rgyal ba dag ni sa la 'byung /_/mgon po dal rnyed 
[\[191a.6\]]sems can dgrol du gsol/_/rang rgal nas ni bsgral bar bya'o zhes/_/sngon srid khyod kyi dgongs pa 'di 'byung ngo /_/da ltar khyod ni pha rol byon par nges/_/bden pa'i mthu rtsal thugs dam mad par mdzod/_/thub pa chos kyi sgron mas mun pa sol/_/de bzhin 
[\[191a.7\]]gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan khyod kyis sgreng /_/snyan pa'i gsung brjod pa yi dus la bab/_/rnga sgra [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dbang ltar bsgrag tu gsol/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs na/_sems can 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]dman pa dang /_'bring dang /_gya nom dang /_mtho ba dang /_dma' ba dang /_bar ma dang /_rnam pa bzang po dang /_rnam par sbyang sla ba dang /_rnam pa ngan pa dang /_/rnam par sbyang dka' ba dang /_zur tsam gyis go ba dang /_tshig lhur len pa dang /_sems can gyi phung po 
[\[191b.2\]]gsum ste/_gcig ni log pa nyid du nges pa dang /_gcig ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang /_gcig ni ma nges pa gzigs so/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig rdzing gi 'gram na 'dug pas pad ma kha cig ni chu'i nang nas 'thon/_kha cig ni chu dang mnyam/_kha 
[\[191b.3\]]cig ni chu las 'phags pa dag mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten na sems can phung po gsum du rnam par gnas pa dag gzigs so/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 
[\[191b.4\]]snyam du dgongs te/_ngas chos bstan kyang rung /_ma bstan kyang rung ste/_gang log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di ni chos 'di shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ngas chos bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung ste/_gang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po 'di ni chos 'di shes par 'gyur 
[\[191b.5\]]ro/_/ma nges pa'i phung po gang yin pa 'di ni gal te chos bstan na ni shes par 'gyur/_ji ste chos ma bstan na ni shes par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas ma nges pa'i phung por rnam par gnas pa'i sems can rnams las brtsams te thugs 
[\[191b.6\]]rje chen po bskyed do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di'i dbang du mdzad de/_tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis bskul ba yang mkhyen nas/_tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[191b.7\]]tshangs pa ma ga d+hA yi sems can gang /_/rna ba ldan zhing dad dang ldan gyur la/_/mi 'tshe 'du shes rtag tu chos nyan pas/_/de dag la ni bdud rtsi'i sgo phye'o/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar rig nas tshim zhing mgu la 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe sa bla'i lha rnams kyis bar snang gi lha rnams la tshig tu brjod cing sgra bsgrags pa/_
[\[192a.2\]]grogs po dag do mod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ste/_de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[192a.3\]]kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kye grogs po dag lha ma yin gyi ris ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i ris ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten na sems can mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams 
[\[192a.4\]]kyis sa bla'i lha rnams las thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgrar brjod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams la'o/_/de dag gis kyang 
[\[192a.5\]]tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la tshig tu brjod cing sgra bsgrags te/_grogs po dag do mod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ste/_de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig 
[\[192a.6\]]rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kye grogs po dag lha ma yin gyi ris ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i ris ni yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten na sems can mang po yongs su mya ngan 
[\[192a.7\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de la sa bla'i lha rnams nas bzung ste/_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bar man chad du grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis do mod chos 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ste zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sgra skad gcig mngon du byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha chos sred ces bya ba dang /_chos 'dod dang /_chos kyi blo gros dang /_chos spyod dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi lha bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[192b.2\]]pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grong khyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong lhung ba ri 
[\[192b.3\]]dgas kyi nags su'o/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rA Na sI ni skye bo'i tshogs chung ba lags/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags ni zhugs shing gi grib ma chung ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_
[\[192b.4\]]nyams dgyes pa/_mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/_skyed mos tshal dang /_nags dang nags 'dabs kyis brgyan pa/_gzhan dag kyang mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag cig tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[192b.5\]]dag de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_der ni nga yis mchod sbyin stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig drug cu byas/_/der ni sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig drug cu de dag mchod/_/bA rA Na sI dam pa de ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyi gnas/_/sa de lha dang klu yis mngon bstod rtag tu chos ni 
[\[192b.6\]]mngon par gzhol/_/ngas ni sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig dran/_/de dag drang srong zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor lo dam pa bskor/_/zhi zhing nyer zhi bsam gtan mngon gyur rtag tu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyis bsten/_/de phyir drang srong zhes bya nags mchog der ni 'khor 
[\[192b.7\]]lo dam pa bskor/_/bskul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba mdzad pa/_byed pa mdzad pa/_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bcings pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/_dri ma dang nyon mongs pa sbyangs pa/_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su zhugs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa/_stobs bcu 
[\[193a.2\]]dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rab tu rdzogs pa/_spyan lnga dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa mi mnga' bas 'jig rten thams cad la gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas thams cad kyi thog mar gang la yang chos bstan 
[\[193a.3\]]par bya/_sems can dag pa/_rnam pa bzang ba/_gdul sla ba/_go sla ba/_sbyang sla ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug chung ba/_rnam par shes pa lkog tu ma gyur pa/_gang chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba/_gang dag la bdag gis thog mar chos 
[\[193a.4\]]bstan par bya/_gang la chos 'di bstan nas kyang shes par 'gyur zhing tho 'tsham par mi 'gyur ba ni gang yin snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni dag pa/_rnam pa bzang ba/_gdul sla ba/_go sla ba/_sbyang sla ba/_
[\[193a.5\]]'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba/_rnam par shes pa lkog tu ma gyur pa ste/_de chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/_/de ni nyan thos rnams la 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang 'thun par chos ston pa yin na/_de da ltar ga la 
[\[193a.6\]]'dug snyam dgongs pa dang /_de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas deng du zhag bdun lon par mkhyen to/_/lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_rangs byed 
[\[193a.7\]]kyi bu lhag spyod gum nas deng du dgung bdun lags so/_/dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/_e ma rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de chos shin tu bzang po 'di lta bu 'di ma thos par shi ba'i dus byas pa ni cher nyams so/_/gal te des chos 'di thos na shes par 'gyur te/_de la 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bdag gis thog mar chos bstan par bya zhing de yang bdag la tho 'tshams par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sems can dag pa gdul sla ba zhes bya ba nas/_nga'i chos bstan pa tho 'tsham par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du snga 
[\[193b.2\]]ma bzhin te/_de lta bu gzhan su yod snyam mo/_dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ni dag pa zhes bya ba nas/_nga'i chos bstan pa tho 'tsham par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de da ltar ga la 'dug snyam dgongs na/_de yang 'chi 
[\[193b.3\]]ba'i dus byas nas deng du zhag gsum lon par mkhyen to/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang don de de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol te/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gum nas deng du dgung 
[\[193b.4\]]gsum lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_e ma sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur de chos shin tu bzang po 'di lta bu 'di ma thos par shi ba ni cher nyams so snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sems can dag pa 
[\[193b.5\]]rnam pa bzang ba zhes bya ba nas nga'i chos bstan pa tho 'tsham par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/_de lta bu gzhan su yod snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_lnga sde bzang po rnams ni dag pa/_rnam pa bzang ba/_gdul sla ba/_go sla 
[\[193b.6\]]ba/_rnam par sbyang sla ba/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug chung ba/_rnam par shes pa lkog tu ma gyur pa ste/_de dag chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/_/nga dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na yang de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur te/_de dag ngas chos bstan na 
[\[193b.7\]]shes par 'gyur zhing /_nga la tho 'tsham par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis lnga sde bzang po rnams la thog mar chos bstan par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/dge slong dag de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'di 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]snyam du dgongs te/_lnga sde bzang po dag da ltar gang na 'khod snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na lnga sde bzang po dag grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na 'khod 
[\[194a.2\]]par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag gis lnga sde bzang po rnams la thams cad kyi thog mar chos bstan par bya gor ma chag go/_/de dag gis ngas thams cad kyi thog mar chos bstan pa kun shes par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/dge 
[\[194a.3\]]slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni spyad pa dang ldan pa chos dkar po rnams shin tu yongs su bsdus pa/_thar pa'i lam la mngon du phyogs pa/_bgegs dang bral ba dag go/_/dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de snyam du dgongs nas byang chub kyi snying po las bzhengs 
[\[194a.4\]]te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gshegs nas/_mthar gyis yul ma ga d+hAr rgyu zhing yul gsal ldan du gshegs so/_/de nas ri ga yA dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du kun du 'tsho ba pa gzhan zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas 
[\[194a.5\]]gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/dge slong dag phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang kun tu 'tsho ba pa de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas

[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bzhin du gau ta ma khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni yongs su dag la/_zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mgul rgyan thab nas phyung ste/_mgar ba'i bu mkhas pas legs par yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/_la

[\[194b.3\]]byang ba lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma su las tshangs par spyad pa spyod/_dge slong dag de skad ces gsol ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas kun tu 'tsho ba pa de la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/_nga la slob dpon gang yang med/_/nga dang 'dra ba yod ma yin/_/

[\[195a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes smras te/_lho phyogs logs su song ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang phyogs logs su bzhud do/_/dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ri ga yA'i klu'i rgyal po shin tu blta mdzes kyis bzhugs su gsol ba dang /_bshos

[\[195a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI ga la ba der gshegs so/_/gshegs nas nang par sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/_der bsod snyoms kyi 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]phyir gshegs nas/_bsod snyoms kyi zhal zas mjug tu gsol te/_zas kyi bya ba byas nas drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags ga la ba dang /_lnga sde bzang po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_lnga sde bzang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[195b.2\]]mthong nas kyang 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma lhod pa/_mang du za ba/_spong ba las nyams pa 'di 'ongs te/_'dis sngon gyi dka' ba spyad pa des mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/_'phags pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par cung zad kyang mngon sum du byed ma nus 
[\[195b.3\]]nas/_da ltar kha zas rags pa za zhing bsod snyoms la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_lhod pa mang du za ba/_'di la skal ba med kyis gang gis kyang 'di bsu bar mi bya'o/_/ldang bar mi bya'o/_/chos gos dang lhung bzed blang bar mi bya'o/_/stan dang yongs 
[\[195b.4\]]su spyad par 'os pa'i btung ba dang /_rkang pa gzhag pa yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/stan lhag pa gzhan ni ma gtogs te/_tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma stan lhag pa gzhan 'di dag yod kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug shig par brjod do zhes 'og khrims bcas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes

[\[195b.6\]]bcug par gyur la/_skon pa de'i 'og nas mes bdugs na/_de mes gdungs pas myur ba myur bar 'phar bar 'dod cing 'phur 'dod pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ji ltar lnga sde bzang po dag gi gan du gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde bzang po dag rang rang gi stan la mi

[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bzang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas stan gyi steng na 'dar zhing kun gyi sa 'og khrims zhig ste/_stan las langs nas la la ni rim gro byed/_la las ni bsu ste na bza' chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs/_la las ni gdan bting /_

[\[196a.3\]]bzhugs nas/_lnga sde bzang po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang yang dag par chags par bya ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lnga sde bzang

[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa zad pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te nye bar bsgrubs nas/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsnyen to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa

[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do/_/dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas sku las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba 
[\[197a.2\]]chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_snang ba des 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa/_gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis kyi 'od kyis 'od dang kha dog gis kha dog dang /_gzi brjid kyis 
[\[197a.3\]]gzi brjid lam mer ma gyur pa/_lhang nger ma gyur pa gang yin pa de na sems can gang dag skyes pa rang rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba der yang de'i tshe snang ba chen po rgya cher byung bar gyur to/_/der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur ma thag tu gcig 
[\[197a.4\]]gis gcig mthong zhing gcig gis gcig shes te/_'di skad ces kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so/_/kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes 'dzer to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug dang ltas chen po bco brgyad du 
[\[197a.5\]]g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem

[\[197a.7\]]phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshim par 'gyur ba dang /_mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_dang bar 'gyur ba dang /_brtag par bya ba dang /_rab tu sim par 'gyur ba dang /_bsngags par bya ba dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bsngags pa zla med pa dang /_ngoms par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'thun pa med pa dang /_skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sgra dag kyang grag ste/_skad cig de la sems can gang la yang rnam par 'tshe ba'am/_'jigs pa'am sdang ba'am bag tsha ba med par gyur to/_/skad cig de la nyi ma dang /_zla ba 
[\[197b.2\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal rnams dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan
