[\[218b.7\]]dper na chab dang bral zhing skams pa'i klung dang mtshungs/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na/_/kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya/_/gang dag g.yo ba med par byang chub sems la gnas/_/de dag 'di na lhar bcas 'jig rten 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]mchod 'os yin/_/bu mos smras pa/_byang chub ces bgyi tshig gi don ni gang zhig lags/_/de ni gang las 'thob cing su zhig stsal bar bgyid/_/tshogs rnams gang dag la ni nges par bsten bgyis na/_/mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 
[\[219a.2\]]'gyur/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo brjod pa med pa dang /_yi ge med pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma dag dang bral ba dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar 
[\[219a.3\]]zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/de skad ces smras nas/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo khyod byang chub tu sems bskyed cig dang /_ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lags/_
[\[219a.4\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo khyod nyid byang chub yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ma 'tshal na ji ltar bdag byang chub lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[219a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs pa de 'di skad du/_'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus mnyam pa nyid do zhes chos ston te/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo 'di 
[\[219a.6\]]ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched mngon par grub pa yod dam/_de nas bu mo des bstan pa 'di thos nas de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pas chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/_des snang ba thob nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[219a.7\]]smras so/_/'jam dpal de ni de lta lags te/_bdag gi lus 'di la phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag mngon par grub pa ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs la sems pa'am/_rnam par shes pa yod dam/_
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing rnam par shes pa med de/_sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/_
[\[219b.2\]]sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sems pa'am/_rnam par shes pa yod dam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so/_/
[\[219b.3\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing rnam par shes pa mi sems so/_/sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang 
[\[219b.4\]]chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam/_phyi rol lam/_gnyi ga med par ram/_gzugs 'di sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_le brgan nam/_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog gam/_yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa 
[\[219b.5\]]zhes bstan par nus sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/_phyi rol lam/_gnyi ga med par ram/_byang chub de sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_le brgan nam/_
[\[219b.6\]]shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/_yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/_sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub 
[\[219b.7\]]bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nang ngam/_phyi rol lam/_gnyi ga med par ram/_rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_le brgan nam/_shel dang dngul gyi kha dog 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gam/_yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/_phyi rol lam/_gnyi ga med par ram/_byang chub de sngon po'am/_
[\[220a.2\]]ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po'am/_le brgan nam/_shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/_yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/_sring mo de'i rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis 
[\[220a.3\]]rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_yod pa ma yin pa/_phyin ci log las skyes shing yod pa ma yin pa/_phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o/_/sring mo byang chub 
[\[220a.4\]]kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/_yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa ste/_sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/_/phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu mnyam pa nyid do/_/sgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis 
[\[220a.5\]]sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o/_/sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/_sring mo de'i 
[\[220a.6\]]phyir rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/_/phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid do/_/rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo 
[\[220a.7\]]zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/_'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o/_/sring mo byang chub kyang smig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'o/_/sring mo de'i phyir smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/_/phung po mnyam pa 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]nyid kyis smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid do/_/smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_'pho 
[\[220b.2\]]ba med pa'o/_/sring mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/_'pho ba med pa'o/_/sring mo de'i phyir gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/_/phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub 
[\[220b.3\]]mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming tsam ste/_ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o/_/sring mo byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/_ming de 
[\[220b.4\]]yang g.yo ba med pa'o/_/sring mo de'i phyir g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do/_/phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/_
[\[220b.5\]]sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la byed pa po med de/_ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la byung ba med de/_ma byung ba'i 
[\[220b.6\]]don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/_mi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la bde ba nyid med de/_sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la sdug pa med de/_mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la bdag med de/_
[\[220b.7\]]bdag med pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la mngon par grub pa med de/_mngon par ma grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/_dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la gzung ba med de/_gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]phung po rnams la gzhi med de/_gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med de/_'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa ste/_da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo 
[\[221a.2\]]gzhan yang phung po rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyis tha snyad yin pas byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do/_/phung po rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang bzhin can te/_byang chub kyang tha snyad med pa'o/_/phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos 
[\[221a.3\]]thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/_de ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/sring mo de ltar na phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no/_/byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/_sring mo phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems can thams 
[\[221a.4\]]cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/_phung po ma gtogs par rtogs pa yang med la/_byang chub ma gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas de ltar 
[\[221a.5\]]rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_ji ltar sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/_de gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni byang 
[\[221a.6\]]chub ste/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di la sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_khams bzhi po dag mngon par grub pa de la sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/_
[\[221a.7\]]sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/shin tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sa'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/_/shin tu med 
[\[221b.2\]]pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/_/shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/_/shin tu bstan du med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/_/sring mo sa'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/_mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[221b.3\]]thugs su chud do/_/sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/_/sring mo me'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/_/sring mo 
[\[221b.4\]]rlung gi khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/_/sring mo sa'i khams rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/_sring mo de'i phyir 
[\[221b.5\]]ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi shes so/_/chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so/_/me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par mi shes so/_/sring mo de ltar na khams kyi ming yongs su 
[\[221b.6\]]shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mig mngon par grub pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mngon par grub pa de la sring mo 
[\[221b.7\]]mig ni stong pa ste/_mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/rna ba ni stong pa ste/_rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/sna ni stong pa ste/_sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/lce ni stong pa ste/_lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/lus ni stong pa ste/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/yid ni stong pa ste/_yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs su 'dogs par mi 
[\[222a.2\]]byed do/_/gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed de/_chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid 
[\[222a.3\]]byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo mig ni gzugs mi len te/_byang chub kyang gzugs mi len to/_/rna ba ni sgra mi len te/_byang chub kyang sgra mi len to/_/sna ni dri mi len te/_byang chub kyang dri mi len to/_/lce ni ro mi len te/_byang chub kyang ro mi len to/_/lus ni reg bya mi len te/_
[\[222a.4\]]byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to/_/yid ni chos mi len te/_byang chub kyang chos mi len to/_/sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig gzugs dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sring mo de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin 
[\[222a.5\]]pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sgra'i khams su bral ba 
[\[222a.6\]]ni byang chub bo/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_lce'i rnam par 
[\[222a.7\]]shes pa'i khams dang ro'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang reg bya'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]de ni chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang chos kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de 
[\[222b.2\]]gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang chub dang gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang chub dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang chub dang yid kyi khams kyi bar de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang 
[\[222b.3\]]chub dang chos kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/byang chub dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang mig rtogs pa ni 
[\[222b.4\]]byang chub bo/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/_rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/_rang bzhin stong 
[\[222b.5\]]pa de ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags/_mi sdang /_ma rmongs pa ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags pa/_mi sdang ba/_ma rmongs pa ste/_'dod chags 
[\[222b.6\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/_byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[222b.7\]]dang /_yid kyang bdag po med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/_byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/_bdag gi med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/sring mo mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]yin no/_/sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par 
[\[223a.2\]]ldan pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/sring mo mig ni/_skyes pa'ang ma yin/_bud 
[\[223a.3\]]med kyang ma yin no/_/sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin no/_/sring mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin no/_/sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin no/_/sring mo de ltar mig gi de 
[\[223a.4\]]bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/_de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/_de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras 
[\[223a.5\]]so/_/sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu ma yin/_byed pa po ma yin/_tshor ba po ma yin/_shes pa po ma yin/_mthong ba po ma yin/_
[\[223a.6\]]nyan pa po ma yin/_snom pa po ma yin/_za ba po ma yin/_reg pa po ma yin/_rnam par shes pa po ma yin no/_/sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_gang zag ma yin/_bdag gi ma yin/_yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/_byas 
[\[223a.7\]]pa ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin/_gzugs ma yin/_sgra ma yin/_dri ma yin/_ro ma yin/_reg ma yin/_rnam par reg pa ma yin te/_sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o/_/sring mo gang yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rtag pa med pa ste/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing tha dad du dbyer med do/_/sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid 
[\[223b.2\]]gcig par de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud de/_sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/sring mo gzhan yang sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang /_
[\[223b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni skra la gnas pa ma yin/_spu la gnas pa ma yin/_sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/_pags pa la gnas pa ma yin/_sha la gnas pa ma yin/_khrag la gnas pa ma yin/_rus pa la gnas pa ma 
[\[223b.4\]]yin/_chu ba la gnas pa ma yin/_rkang la gnas pa ma yin/_nang na gnas pa ma yin/_phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin/_gnyi ga med pa la gnas pa ma yin/_mig la gnas pa ma yin/_rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/_sna la gnas pa ma yin/_lce la gnas pa ma yin/_lus la gnas 
[\[223b.5\]]pa ma yin/_yid la gnas pa ma yin te/_gnas pa ma yin/_mi gnas pa ma yin/_rgyun chad pa ma yin/_yul na gnas pa ma yin/_phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_'dre ba med pa/_gzhi med pa/_dag 
[\[223b.6\]]pa/_gtsang ba/_'od gsal ba ste/_sems dang /_yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/_rnam par byang ba med pa ste/_de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing 'od gsal la lus med pa'i phyir/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med do/_/sring mo de 
[\[223b.7\]]ltar na phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams so/_/sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gang dag mngon par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/_byang chub gzhan 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams las gzhan ma yin te/_de dag nyid byang chub yin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du 
[\[224a.2\]]khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/gang dag smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang 
[\[224a.3\]]ba'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 
[\[224a.4\]]'od dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas tshangs par spyad 
[\[224a.5\]]pa dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag kyang khyod kyis rjes su bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[224a.6\]]gdung mi gcad pa dang /_chos kyi gdung mi gcad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i slad du khyod kyis bstan pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang 
[\[224a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du nongs pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o/_/gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/_tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang /_rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid ma rtogs so/_/'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[224b.2\]]'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni ji ltar mchis pa ma lags pa la/_kun brtags pa las 'byung 
[\[224b.3\]]bar de ltar kun brtags pa yongs su rtogs na 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o/_/'jam dpal ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs 
[\[224b.4\]]pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jig cing 'ju ste chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste/_rlung dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_nam mkha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du mi gnas pas chu'i 
[\[224b.5\]]ri mo dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste/_gnod sbyin dang 'byung po 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las byung ba ste/_sprin mar dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung 
[\[224b.6\]]ba ste/_yang dag pa ma lags pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni log par bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni 
[\[224b.7\]]rnam par rtog pa las byung bas mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste so sor mi rtog pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su 'thun pas bskyed pa ste/_nges par mi sems pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/_yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ril por 'dzin pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni 
[\[225a.2\]]ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o/_/'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi phur bu'i gzhi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[225a.3\]]slad du'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/_nyon mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis byang chub ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad 
[\[225a.4\]]du'o/_/'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/_byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/_skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju bas mi gnas pa'o/_/
[\[225a.5\]]'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal sems 'di ni chags pa'am/_sdang ba'am/_rmongs pa zhes sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus te/_'jam dpal ji ltar sems bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs 
[\[225a.6\]]pa rnams kyang yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa zhes nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi nus pa'i slad du'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[225a.7\]]yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags/_gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/_cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]du 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji lta ba de bzhin du zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la 
[\[225b.2\]]blta bar bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_me ni rtswa dang shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o/_/
[\[225b.3\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me yang nyon mongs pa'i rtswa dang shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i 
[\[225b.4\]]shes rab kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_rlung mar ni shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad la mi chags so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la 
[\[225b.5\]]mi chags so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par 
[\[225b.6\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni rdul dang na bun dang /_sprin thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[225b.7\]]'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_ri khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags 
[\[226a.2\]]pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'o ma dang chab bsres pa las 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi chab ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 
[\[226a.3\]]'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'phags pa'i shes rab dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dres pa dag las shes rab nyid ni len gyi nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na nye dur 'brel ba'i bud med rnams la shing gi yal ga 
[\[226a.4\]]'dud par mi bgyid do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes 'dud par mi bgyid do/_/'jam dpal da ltar bdag ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/_skrag pa ci 
[\[226a.5\]]yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_gang dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo 
[\[226a.6\]]zhes mi bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de 
[\[226a.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chu 'dang zhes bgyi ba chab kyi nang du stsal na gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/_chab kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos la/_nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 
[\[226b.2\]]'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am 
[\[226b.3\]]'gag par mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa zhes mi bya'o/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag snang na 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o/_/sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am 'gag par 
[\[226b.4\]]mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o/_/sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni su gang du kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong /_rnam par byang ba yang mi mthong ste/_mthong ba dang /_mi mthong ba dang /_sems dang yid dang /_rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni 
[\[226b.5\]]nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang yid dang /_rnam par rig pa 'jug na/_tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/_de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam sems la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir te/_
[\[226b.6\]]gang gis dge ba'am mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o/_/gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do/_/'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/_sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no/_/sring mo nyon 
[\[226b.7\]]mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/_mig dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid dang /_chos su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/ting nge 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni rgyu ba med pa 
[\[227a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/kun du 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_sring mo grangs dang grangs med pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do/_/sring mo 
[\[227a.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon mongs pa med la/_gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las/_rab tu thar ba la yang shin du brtson pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar bar byed pa ni byang chub 
[\[227a.4\]]sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_
[\[227a.5\]]mtshan ma med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mngon par 
[\[227a.6\]]'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rga ba dang shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_skye ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[227a.7\]]la snying rje ba dang /_nyan thos su nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing sems can thams cad la yang snying rje ba ste/_sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i/_rin po che chen po dag thogs te ldog par ni dka'o/_/sring 
[\[227b.2\]]mo de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pa ni sla'i/_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[227b.3\]]rgyas kyi skyon med pa la yang so sor brtag par ni sla'i/_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_g.yul ngo chen por 'jug par ni sla'i/_ma smas ma nyams par rgal bar ni dka'o/_/sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 
[\[227b.4\]]yang 'jug par ni sla'i/_thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal thabs zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo thabs zhes bya ba ni gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/_'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs 
[\[227b.5\]]dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so/_/sring mo thabs zhes bya ba ni gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/_'khor ba'i sgo dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang /_stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang /_lta ba las rab tu thar ba'i sgo dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang /_mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /_
[\[227b.6\]]smon pa med pa'i sgo dang /_bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang /_skye ba med pa'i sgo dang /_skye ba kun du ston pa'i sgo dang /_'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi sgo dang /_skye 
[\[227b.7\]]ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang /_skye ba dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_dben pa'i sgo dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang /_chos thams cad so sor srung ba'i sgo dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa'i sgo dang /_rang byang chub kyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/_sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang /_sgo thams cad la yang chags pa med pa de ni thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang /_'dod 
[\[228a.2\]]chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang /_zhe sdang gi sgo dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang /_gti mug gi sgo dang /_gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang /_'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/_sring mo 'di ni byang chub 
[\[228a.3\]]sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyis shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[228a.4\]]thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i ngos kyi sman ljongs zhig na zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu ring du 'chags pas 'chag cing bzhugs so/_/
[\[228a.5\]]der bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang thabs la mkhas pa ji skad bstan pa de ni de bzhin te/_legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang /_legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des stong 
[\[228a.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing /_legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[228a.7\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[228b.2\]]'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis su la stsal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[228b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de da ltar gang na mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[228b.4\]]gyur pa ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/_smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang /_lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng shig_/de nas lha dang /_klu 
[\[228b.5\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[228b.6\]]ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_lus rags par sprul nas me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/_me tog gi char des rgyal po'i khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu me tog chal bar bkram par gyur to/_/de na lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams kyang mthong ste/_
[\[228b.7\]]phan tshun smra bar ni mi byed do/_/de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag me tog de dag gis kyang bskul/_lha'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/_'khor de dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_rgyal po dang 
[\[229a.2\]]blon po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon dang khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de 'dod chags kyis nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral te/_dbang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing dbang po mi g.yeng la ngo tsha shes pa dang /_dpal gyis legs par brgyan 
[\[229a.3\]]par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la phyin cad su yang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de 'dus par rig nas/_smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 
[\[229a.4\]]mo skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang phyir zhing chags pa med na/_khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang du bzhag_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[229a.5\]]dbyings la gnas pa ste/_de dag kyang ma bskyed pa dang /_ma bkag pa dang /_ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so/_/nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de 
[\[229a.6\]]gang yin/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal rtog pa ma mchis shing rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so/_/tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so/_/nyon mongs pa rnams ni glo bur te/_
[\[229a.7\]]stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa shes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_dug drag po'i sbrul gdug pas bltas pa 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]tsam gyis skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las der mi zhig gis dug thams cad 'jil ba dang /_dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel ces bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas/_de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas de la khye'u dang 
[\[229b.2\]]bu mo rnams brtse bas rtse zhing /_khye'u dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/_pang par len cing glo la se ral phreng du btags te/_rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/_za bar mi bgyid/_sdug bsngal du mi bgyid do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 
[\[229b.3\]]bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pas tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log la nye bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa na 'dod chags kyis rang gi lus la chags shing rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/_gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor 
[\[229b.4\]]rtog par mi bgyid/_lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du ma 'tshal/_dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/_'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/_srog gi dbang po zil pa'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 
[\[229b.5\]]'tshal/_lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/_'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal zhing /_chos thams cad bdag ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi bgyid de bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis bsgribs shing /_gzhan la yang mun par bgyid/_bdag kyang bcings 
[\[229b.6\]]shing gzhan la yang 'ching bar bgyid pa las/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid thos te/_thos nas kyang mos shing mos nas kyang rnam par grol te de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang slan chad chags pa'i mig gis su la yang lta bar mi bgyid 
[\[229b.7\]]do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smad 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor dang /_mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/_gang gis lha dang mi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas sems can rnams la snying rje 
[\[230a.2\]]bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchid bgyi bar khyod spobs par mdzod cig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sring mo nyon 
[\[230a.3\]]mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no/_/sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma brtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_me sbar ba ni sreg 
[\[230a.4\]]pa'i bdag nyid yin no/_/sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su brtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro/_/sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu yod na khams gsum du 'bar 
[\[230a.5\]]ro/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_me ni rgyu med na mi 'bar ro/_/sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med na khams gsum du mi 'bar ro/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba med do/_/sring mo de 
[\[230a.6\]]bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang skye ba dang 'bri ba med do/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_me shi ba la ni me zhes mi gdags so/_/sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa zhi ba la yang nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdags so/_/sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[230a.7\]]nam mkha' gang la me 'bar yang nam mkha' ni me des tshig par mi nus so/_/sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa byung yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des kun nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so/_/sring mo 'di 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_mtsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[230b.2\]]pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs par gyur pa de bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar 
[\[230b.3\]]blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_'khor 'di ni steng gi nam 
[\[230b.4\]]mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis kyi gnyis phrad pa ma mchis pa bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo nga ji ltar blta bar bya/_
[\[230b.5\]]bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_long ba gzugs la blta ba bzhin du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis chos 'di dag thos sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na/_sgyu ma sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so/_/
[\[230b.6\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/_yang 'dod par mi bgyid do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad 
[\[230b.7\]]dam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du yongs su btang bas spyad lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'byung 
[\[231a.2\]]ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis brtsams lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis 
[\[231a.3\]]smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal/_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[231a.4\]]su rdzogs par byas sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[231a.5\]]bsgoms lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las btsal bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[231a.6\]]slad du zhe na/_gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpas dga' ba ga las btsal bar 
[\[231a.7\]]bya/_bu mos smras pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems las so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni sems can thams cad la mi slu ba 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye bar mchi bar bgyid pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'gal ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/_bu mos smras pa/_gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs 
[\[231b.2\]]pa dag go/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_de dag gang dang 'gal/_bu mos smras pa/_phas kyis rgol ba thams cad dang ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo phas kyi rgol ba gang dag yin/_bu mos smras pa/_gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag 
[\[231b.3\]]lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong /_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis tho btsam pa las mchi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_tho btsam pa ma mchis na bzod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_
[\[231b.4\]]'jam dpal gang la/_sems can thams cad kyis tho btsam pa na/_'khrug pa ma mchis shing gnod pa mi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgom pa lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis 
[\[231b.5\]]bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa 'di ni khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gis sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing yul thams 
[\[231b.6\]]cad la gnod pa mi bgyid pa ste/_de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa lags 
[\[231b.7\]]so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/_bu mos smras pa/_gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ston kyang phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston kyang rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang /_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi 
[\[232a.2\]]ba'i slad du/_rga ba dang 'chi ba ston kyang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho ba dang 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang /_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang phrag dog dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang 
[\[232a.3\]]chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang thabs yongs su sgom pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpas ji ltar sems 
[\[232a.4\]]can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su sgom pas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do/_/
[\[232a.5\]]bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal gang du bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'jug pa de ni nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/_gang la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas rnam par shes pa 'jug pa yang nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes 
[\[232a.6\]]bya ba ji lta bu yin/_bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang /_chos ston pa la sgyu ma'i mi lta bur mos pa dang /_bstan pa'i chos de la yang brag ca'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang /_rnam par grol ba la yang gnyis su mi bgyid pa de 
[\[232a.7\]]tsam gyis na chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/_bu mos smras pa/_chos la ston pa la nan tan bgyid pas chos mnyan par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/_'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg 
[\[232b.2\]]pa pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/bu mo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas chos 
[\[232b.3\]]rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/des bzod pa thob nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te/_'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol/_tshul bzhin ma lags par bskyed pa/_'phags pa ma lags pa/_
[\[232b.4\]]'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo 'di lta ste/_mgo'i skra 'dreg pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bu mo gang 
[\[232b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bu mo gang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_bu mo gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang /_tshul khrims yang dag 
[\[232b.6\]]par blangs la/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang /_brtul zhugs la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[232b.7\]]ma yin gyi/_bu mo gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben pa shes pa la 'god par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/kha dog dang gzugs kyi rtags dang spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]yin gyi/_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can gzhan gyi 
[\[233a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam par gus 
[\[233a.3\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bdag gi sems rjes su 
[\[233a.4\]]srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bdag thar par bya ba la brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad thar bar bya 
[\[233a.5\]]ba la brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bu mo 'khor bas skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba las grol bar bya ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bu mo 
[\[233a.6\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni sems can gzhan dag la snying rje che ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[233a.7\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la skyon du mi lta ba zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gzhan la gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan la sten pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi 
[\[233b.2\]]ltung ba mi gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni nyes pa thams cad las 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ni gzhan la rag las pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpas gzhan la rag ma 
[\[233b.3\]]las par bya'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni tshul khrims la rag las pa yin te/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/_/
[\[233b.4\]]bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa yin te/_brjed ngas pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni shes rab la rag las pa yin te/_shes rab 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba la rag las 
[\[233b.5\]]pa yin te/_sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/_/bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rag las pa yin te/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang med do/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar 
[\[233b.6\]]na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa ma mchis pa lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas na gzhan la rag las pa med pa ste/_rang gi kun shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'dis gang ci shes pa de bdag gis kyang 
[\[233b.7\]]shes la/_'di gang ci smra ba de bdag kyang smra'o zhes gzhan dag gi ngor mi lta bas na/_gzhan la rag las pa med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_legs par bshad pa'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dpa' lnga brgyas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan thams cad lus las phud de/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba legs par bshad de/_bdag cag rnams 
[\[234a.2\]]kyis kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod rta'i shing rta 'di la zhon la/_tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la snying brtse ba'i phyir yongs su smin par gyis 
[\[234a.3\]]shig dang /_de nyid kyis khyod rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'dod chags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gnas su ji ltar rung snyam mo/_/de nas bu mo des skye 
[\[234a.4\]]bo phal po che de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_skye bo phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho 
[\[234a.5\]]ba med la/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/_/grogs po dag zhe sdang dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 
[\[234a.6\]]'dul bar byed do/_/grogs po dag gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/_/grogs po dag nyon mongs pa dang 
[\[234a.7\]]bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/_ma ni bu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]do/_/grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa med do/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/_bcings pa las bkrol ba'i mi ni 'dod chags kyi kun du spyad pa la mi spyod do/_/grogs po dag de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[234b.2\]]sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa dag 'ching ba dang 'obs lta bur 'du shes pas chags pa med do/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal chos kyi 'bab stegs su ni zhugs/_gting ni rnyed/_thang la ni phyin/_ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ni bral te/_srid pa'i skyon 
[\[234b.3\]]gyi nyon mongs pa 'jigs par lta ba ni legs par mthong nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas shing rta la zhon kar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rang bzhin rnam dag chags pas ma chags shing /_/rtag 
[\[234b.4\]]tu byams sems snang bas sdang ba med/_/shes rab snang shar gti mug rmongs bral ba/_/nyon mongs med par shing rta bzhon par bya/_/gang gis sngon chad bdag ni rgyal gyur cing /_/nor chags tshong dpon bu dang lhan cig tu/_/shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal song ba/_/
[\[234b.5\]]'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang du song /_/ji ltar sprin tshogs stug pos sa khebs na/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer lham me lhan ner min/_/'on kyang 'od zer de dag gar mi 'gro/_/sprin gyis bsgribs pas snang ba med du zad/_/de bzhin nyon mongs bsgribs pas byis pa kun/_/
[\[234b.6\]]shes rab snang la blo skye med pa yang /_/shes rab yul gang na yang gnas pa med/_/nyon mongs yongs su shes pas shes rab snang /_/nyon mongs gang nas 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing /_/yul gyi phyogs char 'gro ba'ang ma yin te/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa las nyon 
[\[234b.7\]]mongs 'byung /_/tshul bzhin gyis ni de dag 'byung mi 'gyur/_/bor ba med cing blangs pa'ang yod ma yin/_/bskyed pa med cing bkag pa'ang yod ma yin/_/gzhan la ma byin phrogs pa'ang ma yin te/_/chos mnyam nyid kyis bdag kyang rnam par dag_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]'bru mar sgron ma mun par byung ba na/_/mun pa phyogs su 'dong ba med pa ltar/_/shes rab kyis ni mun pa med gyur na/_/nyon mongs zad gyur med cing 'byung ba'ang med/_/ji ltar sman pas nad pa gso ba na/_/de yi khams 
[\[235a.2\]]ni 'jig par mi byed kyang /_/de yi glo bur nad ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/nad rnams gzhan yang 'byung ba med pa ltar/_/de bzhin sman pa'i dam pa 'jam dbyangs kyis/_/rigs pa'i tshul mkhyen sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/_/sems can nyon mongs nye 
[\[235a.3\]]bar zhi mdzad kyang /_/chos rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa med/_/phung po 'di dang khams rnams 'di dag dang /_/skye mched 'di rnams gzhan du 'gyur ba med/_/gang dag sngon chad nyes ldan dug bcas pa/_/de dag de ni dug med 'gyur 
[\[235a.4\]]ba med/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/_yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas/_tshong 
[\[235a.5\]]dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang /_lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/_de lta bu'i 'byor pa nyid kyis skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo /_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_
[\[235a.6\]]yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so/_/yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/_
[\[235a.7\]]de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag gang dag chos nyan par dga' ba rnams de yang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar deng shig_/de skad ces smras nas/_sa phyogs de nas langs te/_rang rang gi gnas ga la ba de logs su 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]song ngo /_/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang /_der me tog gi chal bar bkram ste bdug pas bdugs/_bla re bres nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[235b.2\]]dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan te/_bza' btung 'byor pa dag kyang bshams nas/_dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang rjes su 'thun pa'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob par glu dbyangs len par byed cing skyed mos tshal na gnas par gyur to/_/de dag gis 
[\[235b.3\]]zos shing 'thungs nas rab tu myos par gyur pa dang /_smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/_tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyi pang par sngas bcas te nyal lo/_/de nas bu mo des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis rang gi lus rnyis par bstan nas/_
[\[235b.4\]]des 'chi ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/_de'i lus thams cad mi sdug par gyur nas/_ro myags pa 'dra bar snang zhing de'i rna ba'i bu ga gnyis dang /_mig gi dbang po dang /_sna'i nang nas mi gtsang ba'i dri mi zhim pa dag 'byung zhing byung nas kyang lus thams cad la khyab 
[\[235b.5\]]par gyur to/_/de'i kha'i nang nas kyang dri mnam po dag byung ste/_dri mnam po de dag gis skyed mos tshal de thams cad kyang khyab par gyur to/_/spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang khrag dang rnag mnam po dag 'dzag go/_/lto ba dang lte ba'i dbus rdol ba nas 
[\[235b.6\]]kyang mtsher pa dang rgyu ma thams cad byung ngo /_/rkub dang mdoms nas kyang bshang gci dag 'byung zhing 'dzag go/_/de'i spyi bo nas kyang [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]'dzag go/_/rkang lag gi sor mo rnams la yang sbrang ma sngon po dag rgyu bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[235b.7\]]'jigs byin gyis/_bu mo de'i lus la de lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'jigs skrag ste yi chad cing skyabs med rten med dpung gnyen med par gyur nas/_skyabs tshol zhing 'jigs pa chen pos skrag par gyur nas 'dar zhing 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]cho nges 'debs par gyur to/_/de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te/_so so'i skye bo nyid yin pa dang /_'jigs pa'i skyon de dag mthong ba'o/_/bdag re shig na/_bu mo 'di'i le lan gyis/_rgyal po ma skyes dgras bsad 
[\[236a.2\]]par 'ong ngo snyam nas/_des bu mo de pang pa nas dor ba dang 'bros par btsal na'ang ma nus so/_/de'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa chen po de mthong nas bros par gyur to/_/de nas de gcig pu grogs med par de na shin tu 
[\[236a.3\]]'jigs shing skrag nas/_bdag 'jigs skrag pa chen po 'di las yongs su thar bar byed pa lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding 'am/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_mi'am/_
[\[236a.4\]]mi ma yin pa'am/_dge slong ngam/_bram ze su yod snyam sems shing 'dug go/_/tshong dpon gyi bu de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo de la chos bshad pa dag kyang ma thos mi shes so/_/de nas 'jam 
[\[236a.5\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skyed mos tshal de'i shing ljon pa thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/'jig rten thams cad yang dag min/_/ji ltar sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin/_/khye'us ji ltar mthong gyur pa/_/chos rnams 
[\[236a.6\]]rang bzhin de yin no/_/sha dang khrag gis bskus pa ni/_/byis pa rnams kyis 'khrul pa ste/_/yang dag min der rnam brtags nas/_/mi mkhas byis pa chags par byed/_/ji ltar mi mkhas mi zhig ni/_/dri nga sla tsa'i bum pa la/_/phyi rol 
[\[236a.7\]]ri mo bris pa zhig_/mgo la khyer te song ba las/_/'gro ba de yi de yang ni/_/de las lhung ste chag gyur nas/_/dri nga sla tsa mthong gyur te/_/chags pa med cing 'bros pa ltar/_/de bzhin byis pa mi mkhas pa/_/bud med rnams la 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]yid zhen cing /_/kha dog gzugs dang dbyibs rnams la/_/brtags nas de la chags par byed/_/lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/de la khye'u khyod rab rtogs shig_/dur khrod rul pa'i dri la ni/_/mkhas pa su zhig chags par 'gyur/_/
[\[236b.2\]]yang dag min la 'jigs med kyis/_/khyod ni 'jigs par ma byed par/_/gang la khyod sngon brgyal gyur pa'i/_/chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ltos/_/chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad cing /_/'jigs gyur 'jigs pa sel mdzad pa/_/
[\[236b.3\]]shAkya seng ge zhes bya ba'i/_/ston pa yang dag byung ba yod/_/'dod pa mi rtag mi brtan pa/_/glog 'od snang ba ji bzhin te/_/snang yang yang dag ma yin pas/_/mkhas pa de la chags pa med/_/ji ltar chu ni 'khrugs pa las/_/
[\[236b.4\]]dbu ba rdos pa byung ba yang /_/rgyu yi sbyor las skyes pa ste/_/de la byed pa po yang med/_/de bzhin ming dang gzugs rnams kyang /_/las kyi sbyor las skyes pa ste/_/rgyu las byung ba yin pas na/_/byed pa po ni gang yang med/_/kha dog bzang 
[\[236b.5\]]po gar song zhing /_/gang gis khyod 'dir skrag pa yi/_/mi gtsang ba yang ga las 'ongs/_/khye'u khyod de la mngon sum gyis/_/chos rnams yul na mi gnas shing /_/de dag phyogs nas 'ong ba med/_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med kyang /_/
[\[236b.6\]]de dag rang bzhin ston par byed/_/'di la byed pa po med cing /_/tshor ba po yang 'di la med/_/byed med tshor ba po med pa'i/_/chos rnams sgyu 'dra dngos po med/_/rang gi lus la rtogs shig dang /_/de yang 'di dang 'dra bas na/_/khye'u 
[\[236b.7\]]khyod gzhan gyi lus kyis ni/_/'dir yang skrag par ma byed cig_/ji ltar rmi lam rmis pa na/_/rtsed mo byed cing dga' ba ltar/_/de bzhin dga' ba'i rtsed mo kun/_/rmi lam rtsed mo byas dang 'dra/_/shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar ni/_/khye'u khyod 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]'gro bar gyis shig dang /_/des ni khye'u khyod 'jigs dang skrag_/rtsa dang bcas te 'byin par 'gyur/_/pha ma khyod kyi skyabs ma yin/_/mdza' bshes rtsa lag rnams kyang min/_/de dag gis ni khyod bor nas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 
[\[237a.2\]]du 'gro/_/'jigs gyur 'jigs pa sel mdzad cing /_/skyabs med skyobs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang tshogs mchog dge 'dun la/_/der ni skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/_/lha dang dri za mi rnams las/_/gang dag de la skyabs song 
[\[237a.3\]]ba/_/'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/bde ba rnyed par dka' ba med/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas/_dga' mgu zhing yi rangs te/_'jigs skrag pa dang bral nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' 
[\[237a.4\]]ba skyes te/_shi ba'i ro myags pa de bor nas nags khrod de nas byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu de gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir sku las 'od rab tu phyung ste/_'od des yul ma ga d+hA thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/_/khye'u des de 
[\[237a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang 'dra ba gzi brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar ba/_mdzes pa dga' bar bya ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba mchog mtshungs pa med pa/_dam 
[\[237a.6\]]pa'i mchog brnyes pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon du 'bar ba/_glang po che ltar dbang po thul cing bsrungs pa/_mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[237a.7\]]su bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs par rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/de'i lam bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_rin po che'i lan kan bres pa/_me tog bkram pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang khye'u de'i mdun du 'greng nas khye'u de la 'di 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/khye'u khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa ni/_rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang khyod nyid la dgongs kyis/_khye'u khyod lam 'dir zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[237b.2\]]spyan sngar song shig_/de nas khye'u de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la/_khye'u khyod kyis me tog 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor cig ces 
[\[237b.3\]]me tog man dA ra ba thu ba gang byin no/_/de nas khye'u des me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[237b.4\]]'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[237b.5\]]yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yul gyi bzang mo rgyal pos thugs su chud pa gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bgyi ba zhig dga' bar rtse ba'i slad du skyed mos tshal du khrid pa las/_bcom ldan 'das de mdog yal zhing lus 
[\[237b.6\]]myags te nye du'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang spangs nas bdag kyang 'jigs pa chen po skyes na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di'i le lan gyis bdag rgyal pos bkum du ma mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u ma dogs 
[\[237b.7\]]shig_/sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba rnams la 'jigs pa phyis mi 'byung bas/_ngas khyod mi 'jigs pas mgron du gnyer gyis 'jigs pa ma bskyed cig_/khye'u de lta mod kyi gzhi gang las 'jigs pa dang skrag par gyur pa'i gzhi de yongs su 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]spongs shig_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/_'jigs skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ni 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[238a.2\]]gzhi'o/_/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni gzhi'o/_/lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba ni gzhi'o/_/sred pas lhag par chags pa ni gzhi'o/_/ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa ni gzhi'o/_/dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni gzhi'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa dang 
[\[238a.3\]]rtsod pa ni gzhi'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'ching ba ni gzhi'o/_/mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o/_/sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o/_/mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o/_/bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du 
[\[238a.4\]]shes pa ni gzhi'o/_/phung po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes ni gzhi'o/_/khams rnams la so sor mi rtog pa ni gzhi'o/_/skye mched rnams yongs su mi shes pa ni gzhi'o/_/lus la skyon du mi lta ba ni gzhi'o/_/srog la mngon par dga' 
[\[238a.5\]]ba ni gzhi ste/_khye'u gzhi de dag las 'jigs pa dang skrag pa 'byung bas de dag spang bar bya'o/_/khye'u khyod kyis bu mo de'i lus rnam par zhig pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[238a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_khye'u 'dus byas thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_bdag med pa/_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_byis pa 'drid pa/_log pa las byung ba/_g.yo ba med pa/_rnam par bsgrubs 
[\[238a.7\]]pa ste/_med pa las snang bas sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/ro myang ba chung bas rmi lam lta bu'o/_/'khrul par snang bas smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/gzod ma nas ma skyes pas mig yor lta bu'o/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan lta 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]bu'o/_/'pho ba med pa'i tshul gyis chu zla lta bu'o/_/sgra med pa las sgrar go bar byed pas brag ca lta bu'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo yin pas grib ma'i gzugs lta bu'o/_/rang bzhin gyis ya ma brla yin pas chad pa stong pa lta bu'o/_/gzung du 
[\[238b.2\]]med pa'o/_/rlung dang mtshungs pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/gzhi med pa'o/_/gsog go/_/'grib pa med pa'o/_/rdzogs pa med pa'o/_/khye'u de ltar na chos thams cad bdag po med pa ste/_de la khyod mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/khye'u de ji snyam du 
[\[238b.3\]]sems/_khyod kyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de dag ji ltar mthong /_khye'us gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'dod chags ni kha dog dang dbyibs bzang po las yongs su brtags pas skye lags so/_/
[\[238b.4\]]de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul bas mi gtsang ba la sogs par so sor brtags pas mi 'byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de las mi rtog na 'dod chags kyi kun 'byung ba kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u legs so 
[\[238b.5\]]legs so/_/'di lta ste/_mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin no/_/khye'u khyod kyis bdag tu lta ba med pa dang /_gzhan du lta ba med pa dang /_gzhan du lta bar sgro 'dogs pa med par chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson par 
[\[238b.6\]]bya'o/_/khye'us gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol 
[\[238b.7\]]lo/_/khye'u de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin dang /_gti mug gi rang bzhin dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol lo/_/khye'u ji ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dngos po med pa de ltar chos thams cad 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa 'jug go/_/khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams ni rtsa ba med pa/_gnas med pa/_gzhi med pa/_byed pa po med pa/_tshor ba po med pa/_nang dang phyi rol dben pa/_stong pa/_bdag dang /_
