[\[239a.2\]]sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang bral ba mtshan ma med pa ste/_mtshan mar rtog pa dang bral ba/_smon pa med pa/_mngon par dga' ba med pa/_dga' ba dang /_sred pa dang bral ba/_mngon par 'du 
[\[239a.3\]]byed pa med pa/_rang bzhin med pa'o/_/khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa 'jug go/_/khye'u gzhan yang tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad ni byang 
[\[239a.4\]]chub yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bstan du med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par rig pa med pa dang /_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu dang /_nang ma yin pa dang /_phyi rol ma yin pa dang /_gzhan dang ldan pa ma 
[\[239a.5\]]yin pas gzugs med pa ste/_khye'u de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub yin te/_khye'u byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems rtogs pa ma gtogs par khong du chud par bya ba gzhan ci yang med do/_/rang gi sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems can thams 
[\[239a.6\]]cad kyi sems rtogs pa yin no/_/rang gi sems dben pas sems can thams cad kyi sems dben no/_/rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no/_/rang gi sems rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems 
[\[239a.7\]]rnam par dag go/_/rang gi sems 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bral lo/_/rang gi sems la zhe sdang med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la zhe sdang med do/_/rang gi sems la gti mug med pas 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems la gti mug med do/_/rang gi sems la nyon mongs pa med pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la nyon mongs pa med do/_/de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no/_khye'u de ltar tshul 
[\[239b.2\]]bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rab tu shes so/_/gang glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs kyang sems kyi rgyud la ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/_chos kyi 
[\[239b.3\]]rigs pa'i lhag mthong gis de dag de la yongs su gdung ba yang med de/_des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams mthong bas na kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin chos 
[\[239b.4\]]rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skyes par gyur to/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/_tshong dpon gyi bu de dul bar rig nas/_lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor te/_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs 
[\[239b.5\]]len pa dag byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[239b.6\]]nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khye'u khyod kyis sring mo 'di shes sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'tshal lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ji lta bur shes/_de nas khye'u des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 
[\[239b.7\]]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra/_/tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin/_/'du shes smig rgyu lta bu ste/_/'du byed rnams ni chu shing bzhin/_/rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu ste/_/yongs su rtogs pas kun tu bskyed/_/byis pas yang dag min brtags pa/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/'di lus mi g.yo bems po ste/_/rtswa dang rtsig pa lta bu lags/_/rnam shes bstan du ma mchis te/_/de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/'di la sems can bdag ma mchis/_/srog dang gang zag ma mchis 
[\[240a.2\]]te/_/lus 'di bsags pa tsam lags par/_/de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/'di la 'dod chags sdang ma mchis/_/gti mug 'byung ba'ang ma mchis te/_/nyon mongs ma mchis bdag ma mchis/_/de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/tshul bzhin 
[\[240a.3\]]ma lags bslad pa 'di/_/byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa ste/_/mkhas pa de la mi chags par/_/de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/dper na 'di ni nags khrod na/_/shi ba'i ro ni mnam pa bzhin/_/gzugs 'di rang bzhin de 'dra bar/_/de ltar bdag 
[\[240a.4\]]gis yongs su 'tshal/_/'di ni sngon mthar ma skyes te/_/phyi mthar 'chi 'phor 'gyur ma mchis/_/da ltar byung ba ma mchis par/_/de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal/_/'di yis bdag ni rgyal ba las/_/mi gtsang ba yis bkrol bas na/_/'jam dbyangs rnam pa ji 
[\[240a.5\]]ltas kyang /_/'di la lan glan rngo mi thogs/_/mi 'gum 'chi 'pho ma mchis kyang /_/sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du/_/bdag ni 'chi bar ston bgyid pas/_/su zhig byang chub tshol mi bgyid/_/ji ltar bdag gis chags sdang dang /_/nyon mongs thams cad 
[\[240a.6\]]tshul bzhin min/_/sems can kun gyi mtshan de 'dra/_/'di ni chos rnams chos nyid lags/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[240a.7\]]kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/_kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/_'jig 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/_slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig 
[\[240b.2\]]tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu 
[\[240b.3\]]dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/_/rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyen la ya mtshan mi mnga' bas/_/ston pa rgyu ma mchis par 
[\[240b.4\]]'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/'di ltar khyod ni 'dzum par mdzad par gyur pa yi/_/khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bdag cag shin tu 'tshal/_/rgyal ba'i zhal 'dzum mdzad par gyur pa mthong nas ni/_/lhar bcas 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom skyes par gyur/_/the tsom gyur pa rnams kyi som nyi 
[\[240b.5\]]bsal slad du/_/mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/_/gang gis de ring chos rnams la ni yid bzhag gam/_/chos nyid du ni rgyal ba la las mthong gyur tam/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis deng bgyis sam/_/bdag cag de dag nyan par 'tshal 
[\[240b.6\]]lo mi yi gtso/_/gang gis de ring bdud rnams bzhon dang bcas bcom mam/_/gang gis ston pa'i thugs ni de ring dgyes bgyis sam/_/gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs sam/_/de dag nyan par 'tshal gyis the tsom bsal du gsol/_/'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu 
[\[240b.7\]]ni mnyan slad du/_/'gro ba thams cad thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te sdod/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi gtso bo thugs rje bskyed mdzod la/_/the tsom gyur pa rnams kyi yid gnyis bsal du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]'od dpal zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni sngon 'jam dpal 
[\[241a.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/_'dis de las thos nas chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_
[\[241a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/_'dis kyang nga las chos thos nas chos rnams la rjes su 
[\[241a.4\]]'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams rin chen can zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_
[\[241a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de na byang chub 
[\[241a.6\]]sems dpa' rin po che dag ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin 'di yang byang chub 
[\[241a.7\]]sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od ces bya bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par byed do/_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen 'od de la/_byang chub sems dpa' yon 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]tan rin chen 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa yang nga'i ci 'dra ba 
[\[241b.2\]]de 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lung bstan ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'jig rten du snang ba 
[\[241b.3\]]chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam 
[\[241b.4\]]grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bkod pa chen po'i sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig_/'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/smad 'tshong ma'i 
[\[241b.5\]]bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal btul ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_
[\[241b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 
[\[241b.7\]]rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]{D97}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi kurbA Na pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[242a.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 
[\[242a.3\]]'dun chen po dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu 'od mang po zhes 
[\[242a.4\]]bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang 
[\[242a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdud bar chad byed na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu ji tsam du las rnams 'byung ba de tsam du bdud 
[\[242a.6\]]kyi las so/_/ji tsam du smon pa dang /_ji tsam du log par 'dzin pa dang /_ji tsam du mchog tu 'dzin pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/_/ji tsam du 'dod pa dang /_ji tsam du 'du shes pa dang /_ji tsam du rlom sems pa dang /_ji tsam du yongs su rtogs pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/_/lha'i 
[\[242a.7\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/sbyin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/sbyin 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa rlom sems su byed pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_bzod pa 'dzin pa dang /_brtson 'grus len pa dang /_bsam gtan la mtshan ma dang /_shes rab rgyu ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/dgon pa la dga' zhing mos pa'i sems dang /_btang snyoms su lhung 
[\[242b.2\]]ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/'dod pa nyung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa rlom sems su byed pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_bdag ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/_bdag ni smon pa med pa la gnas 
[\[242b.3\]]pa/_bdag ni spros pa med pa la gnas pa/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgrub cing gnas pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed cing rnam par rtog pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/lha'i bu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_
[\[242b.4\]]bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal bdud kyi las ga las 'byung /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu bdud kyi las ni brtson pa las 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu brtson pa la bdud kyi 
[\[242b.5\]]glags tshol gyi mi brtson pa la bdud kyis ci zhig bya bar 'gyur te/_de nyid bdud kyi las yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na brtson pa yin/_ji ltar na mi brtson pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ji tsam du gnyis la sbyor ba de tsam 
[\[242b.6\]]du brtson pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gnas pa ni gnyis la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o/_/lha'i bu brtson pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/sbyor ba med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa 
[\[242b.7\]]med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/spros pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/lha'i bu gang na mig la mi sbyor ba dang /_gzugs la mi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang na rna ba la mi sbyor ba dang /_sgra la mi sbyor ba dang /_sna la mi sbyor 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]ba dang /_dri la mi sbyor ba dang /_lce la mi sbyor ba dang /_ro la mi sbyor ba dang /_lus la mi sbyor ba dang /_reg bya la mi sbyor ba dang /_yid la mi sbyor ba dang /_chos la mi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nyon 
[\[243a.2\]]mongs pa thams cad la yang mi sbyor la/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang brtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang khams gsum pa thams cad la yang mi sbyor la/_khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[243a.3\]]can rnams kyang 'byung bar sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_sems can ser sna can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_tshul khrims la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_sems can tshul khrims 
[\[243a.4\]]'chal pa sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_bzod pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_sems can gnod sems can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_brtson 'grus la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_sems can le lo can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_bsam gtan la rlom sems 
[\[243a.5\]]med par yang sbyor la/_sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_sems can shes rab 'chal pa can sdud par yang sbyor ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang stong pa nyid 
[\[243a.6\]]la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_lta bar song ba thams cad dang yang bral zhing lta bar song ba las rnam par grol ba yang ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid la sbyor ba ste/_stong pa nyid gang gis stong pa nyid stong pa'i stong pa nyid des lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa dang /_stong pa nyid gang gis lta bar gyur 
[\[243a.7\]]pa rnams stong pa'i stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong par 'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_/rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]zhing rnam par rtog pa las grol ba yang ma yin pa ni mtshan ma med pa la sbyor ba ste/_rnam par rtog pa gang gis mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de yang mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam zhing rnam par rtog pa de dang mtshan ma med pa yang mtshan ma med par rnam par rtog pas mnyam 
[\[243b.2\]]par shes te/_'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang smon pa med pa la rlom sems med par yang sbyor la/_bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor te/_de smon lam 
[\[243b.3\]]'debs kyang sems kyis bag la nyal bar mi byed cing /_smon lam 'debs kyang smon lam gyis rgyu ba yang med la/_skye yang skye zhing mtha' gnyi gar lta ba dang bral ba 'di lta ste/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang bral bar gyur cing /_skye yang skye la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 
[\[243b.4\]]dang yang bral ba yin te/_'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang med pa gang yin pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa yang dag phul ni gang shes rab kyi shes pas brtson pa yang med la/_
[\[243b.5\]]thabs kyi shes pas dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed 
[\[243b.6\]]par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas chos thams cad blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par yang sbyor la/_
[\[243b.7\]]thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad la bla mar bya ba dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i zhing du yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]yongs su sbyor ba'i rgyan la sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye bar yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas 'phags pa thams cad la bla ma dang /_gus pa dang /_rim gro byed par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[244a.2\]]shes pas sangs rgyas kyi sku zag pa med par so sor rtog par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_rgyan la yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas 'du byed thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung bar so sor rtog par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes 
[\[244a.3\]]pas bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas lta ba dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_smon lam spang ba ston par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes 
[\[244a.4\]]rab kyi shes pas mngon par shes pa skye ba med par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul bar yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched ma skyes pa dang /_mi [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par yang sbyor la/_
[\[244a.5\]]thabs kyi shes pas phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched yongs su 'dor bar yang sbyor ba dang shes rab kyi shes pas srid pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed par yang sbyor ba 
[\[244a.6\]]dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas shes rab kyi mig la yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas chos brjod du med par khong du chud par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston 
[\[244a.7\]]par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]thams cad shes pa la yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas so so ci rig par chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi shes pas sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong khong du chud par byed par yang sbyor la/_thabs kyi shes pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang dag 
[\[244b.2\]]par ston par yang sbyor ba 'di ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa yang dag phul lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di bstan pa na/_'khor de las lha'i bu brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/
[\[244b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/_'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di legs par bshad pa legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de 
[\[244b.4\]]nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin pas ci khyod dga' bar 'gyur ram/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang 
[\[244b.5\]]sprul pas sprul pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin na sprul pa de la ci dga' ba 'gyur ba lta yod dam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sprul pa la rjes su chags pa yang med/_khong khro ba yang med na de la dga' bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de 
[\[244b.6\]]bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de'i mtshan nyid la 'jam dpal yang de'i mtshan nyid yin na/_de la legs so zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci zhig yod/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_brag ca ni sgra snyan pa 
[\[244b.7\]]dang /_mi snyan pa rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni brag ca'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de'i rang bzhin 'jam dpal yang de'i rang bzhin yin na/_de la legs so zhes 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci yod/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas su la legs so zhes bya ba gnang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam par shes pa mi gnas par ston pa dang /_bstan pa thams cad la su'i blo thogs 
[\[245a.2\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_su sems can thams cad la sems can du 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /_su chos thams cad la chos su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /_su bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la/_sbyor ba 'khor ba la yang gnas pa dang /_su bdud kyi las khong du chud nas 
[\[245a.3\]]bdud kyi las kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las su shes shing /_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la mngon par zhen na/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las kyang bdud kyi las su shes pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/lha'i 
[\[245a.4\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la/_legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang mnyam pa nyid de la mi mnyam pa gang yang yod dam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[245a.5\]]dpal mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam pa gang yang med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang mtshams med pa mnyam mo/_/mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/_/mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang lta bar gyur pa rnams 
[\[245a.6\]]mnyam mo/_/lta bar gyur pa rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/_/mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang phyin ci log rnams mnyam mo/_/phyin ci log rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/_/mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang dmigs pa mnyam mo/_/
[\[245a.7\]]dmigs pa gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo/_/mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'khor ba'i mtha' mnyam mo/_/'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang bdag gi mtha' 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mnyam mo/_/bdag gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang /_sred pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/_/ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang /_sred pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang rig pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[245b.2\]]grol ba'i mtha' mnyam mo/_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mtha' mnyam mo/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[245b.3\]]dang smon pa med pa'i mtha' mnyam mo/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang 'dus byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo/_/'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang /_'dus ma byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo/_/'dus ma byas kyi mtha' gang dang 
[\[245b.4\]]mnyam pa de dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mnyam ste/_lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad mnyam mo/_/de la su 'chad pa dang /_gang bshad pa dang /_gang la bshad pa dang /_su la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i chos de dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis 
[\[245b.5\]]mnyam ste/_nam mkha' yang 'dus ma byas yin pas nam mkha' ni mnyam pa yang med/_mi mnyam pa yang med de/_su rjes su mi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid 'di dag gi rjes su song ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[245b.6\]]khyod legs so zhes bya ba dang legs so zhes bya ba ma yin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pa la spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi phyir 'jug pa ni legs pa'o/_/g.yo dang sgyus nye bar spyod pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/snying rje chen 
[\[245b.7\]]pos sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ni legs pa'o/_/sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni legs pa'o/_/gnod sems kyi bsam pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/nyes pa byung ba mi 'chab cing 'chags 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]te rnam par 'byed la kun nas bskor ba med par gnas pa ni legs pa'o/_/nyes pa byung ba 'chab pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pa ni legs pa'o/_/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon tshol ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/byas pa 
[\[246a.2\]]gzo ba dang /_byas pa shes pa dang /_byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang /_byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa ni legs pa'o/_/byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi shes pa dang /_byas pa chud gzon pa dang /_byas pa la lan du phan mi 'dogs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/thos pa yang dag par 
[\[246a.3\]]sgrub pa ni legs pa'o/_/thos pa log par bsgrub pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/bslab pa yang dag par blangs nas ma nyams pa ni legs pa'o/_/bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa las 'da' ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/dben pa la sems gzhol zhing dben pa la dga' ba ni legs pa'o/_/'du 
[\[246a.4\]]'dzi la dga' ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/dgon pa la gnas par lus dang srog 'dor ba ni legs pa'o/_/lus dang srog la lta ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/'phags pa'i rigs la yang dag par dga' ba dang rung ba rnams la tshod rig pa ni legs pa'o/_/chog mi shes shing 'dod pa che la sdig pa 'dod 
[\[246a.5\]]pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/nyam chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa ni legs pa'o/_/sems can rnams la sma 'bebs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/'tsho ba dag pa ni legs pa'o/_/snyom las can ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/skyabs su song ba rnams mi gtong ba ni legs pa'o/_/
[\[246a.6\]]skyabs su song ba rnams la 'khu ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa'i tshig bden pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni legs pa'o/_/'jig rten thams cad la slu ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o/_/dam 
[\[246a.7\]]pa'i chos yongs su spong ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/thos pa la ser sna med cing chos la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud med de zang zing med par chos ston pa ni legs pa'o/_/chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed de zang zing dang 'brel ba'i sems kyis chos ston pa ni legs 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa ma yin pa'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i bsdu ba ni legs pa'o/_/sems can la mi lta zhing thabs dang mi ldan par bsdu ba'i dngos po ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshol ba ni legs pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[246b.2\]]gi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/shes pas byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa'o/_/nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/mdza' ba brtan pa ni legs pa'o/_/ngan pa dang bshes pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[246b.3\]]la sten pa ni legs pa'o/_/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du zhugs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/sdig pa'i las thams cad mi spyod pa ni legs pa'o/_/sdig pa'i las thams cad la zhugs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/lha'i bu dmigs pa can gyi rab tu 'byung ba ni legs pa ma yin 
[\[246b.4\]]pa'o/_/stong pa nyid smra ba'i mngon par 'byung ba ni legs pa'o/_/'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rab tu thob pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni legs pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal bas 
[\[246b.5\]]dad pas byin pa spyad pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thob pa dang /_bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad ni legs pa'o/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gyi byang chub ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par shes pa'i brda sprod pa ni legs pa'o/_/
[\[246b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod par sems pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs par 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed pas 'tsho ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra 
[\[246b.7\]]ba yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i rnyed pa ni legs pa'o/_/lha'i bu de ltar na ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal ba de tsam du thams cad legs pa ma yin pa'o/_/ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'thun pa de tsam du thams cad legs pa'o/_/lha'i bus 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci legs so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson nam/_'on te legs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni legs so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin/_legs pa ma yin pa zhes bya 
[\[247a.2\]]ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu kho bo ni chos thams cad la brtson pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci dge ba'i chos la mi brtson nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni dge ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin/_/
[\[247a.3\]]mi dge ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu dge ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so/_/mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so/_/mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus ma byas pa'am/_
[\[247a.4\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te 'dus byas kyis skrag pa lta na ni kho bo 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas kyis mi skrag gam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa 
[\[247a.5\]]zhig mthong na ni kho bo 'dus byas kyis skrag par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod kyis yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa ma mthong ngam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni yang dag par 'dus byas kyis yongs su grub pa ma mthong ste/_'dus 
[\[247a.6\]]ma byas kyis kyang ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas su gtogs sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas su gtogs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[247a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_gal te 'dus byas su gtogs par gyur na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dus ma byas su gtogs par gyur na ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te khyod 'dus byas su gtogs pa 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin na khyod ji ltar shes par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa 'dus byas su gtogs sam/_'on te 'dus ma byas su gtogs/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[247b.2\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/_'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar kho bo shes par gyis shig_/lha'i bu de ji 
[\[247b.3\]]snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/_gzugs la gnas sam/_smras pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de ci tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams la gnas sam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de ci 'dus byas la gnas sam/_smras pa/_
[\[247b.4\]]ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de ci 'dus ma byas la gnas sam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gang la yang mi gnas so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[247b.5\]]lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la kho bo gnas par shes par bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa gang yin pa de nyid kho 
[\[247b.6\]]bo'i 'gro ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/_des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar 'ongs pas des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar gnas te/_des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/lha'i 
[\[247b.7\]]bu 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ste/_des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid sems med cing zhi ba'i phyir/_'jam dpal yang sems med cing zhi ba ste/_/des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin nyid ni lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams su btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po rnams gang du btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu lta 
[\[248a.2\]]bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[248a.3\]]rnam par grol ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_bsam pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_bsam pa gang du btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul du'o/_/
[\[248a.4\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gang du btsal bar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar 'dir shes pa nyung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[248a.5\]]de lta bur ston tam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang kun shes pa'am/_rnam par shes par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa med pa/_rnam par rtog pa med pa/_brjod du med pa/_bsnyad du med pa/_sbyor ba med 
[\[248a.6\]]pa/_tshig med pa/_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ste/_de sus kyang kun shes par ram rnam par shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la 
[\[248a.7\]]'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par ga la 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang yi ge rnams kyi ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs te ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_me gtsubs 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]pa las me mi 'byung gi gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gal te thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya chen yang dag par rab tu bstan na/_sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de kun shes par mi 'gyur bas/_de bzhin 
[\[248b.2\]]gshegs pas gtsub shing gi gtam gyis ye shes de bstan te/_ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang ci yang rung ste/_sdom pa dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gtam zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gtam gang 
[\[248b.4\]]skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang /_'dren pa dang /_sel ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang /_gtam gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin pa dang /_gtam gang 'khor ba la yid 
[\[248b.5\]]'byung bar bya ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang /_gtam gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang /_gtam 
[\[248b.6\]]gang thob par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa 'di ni lha'i bu dag snying po yod pa'i gtam mo/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gtam 'di lta bu rjod pa'i tshe/_mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig can 'dir mi 'ong ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/tshig de smras nas 
[\[248b.7\]]ring por ma lon par de'i mod la bdud sdig can steng gi bar snang la sprin chen po 'khrugs par mngon par sprul nas sgra chen po'i nga ro phyung ba dang /_des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dngangs skrag nas sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu su zhig gi snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[249a.2\]]gyur pas de'i tshe bdud sdig to can bcing ba dam pos bcings te/_sa'i steng du ltung ba de lta bu'i bsam pa bsams pa dang /_bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so/_/bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so zhes sgra 'byin to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sdig can bcing ba 'di 
[\[249a.3\]]bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/_des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod kyis khong du ma chud do/_/de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang /_phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang /_sred pa dang lta ba'i 'ching ba ste/_sdig can 'di ni 'ching ba 'di bas 
[\[249a.4\]]ches dam pa'i 'ching ba dam po gzhan yin te/_des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khong du ma chud do/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal thong shig dang bdag gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/yang bdud kyi las mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sdig can sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya 
[\[249a.5\]]dgos na khyod ci'i phyir btang /_bdud kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal/_bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sdig can gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud byed du gzhug pa 
[\[249a.6\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul pa'o/_/gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar ma yin te/_gang bdud sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa 'di ni rab tu ngo mtshar to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe 
[\[249a.7\]]gang sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag ci dang ci 'dod pa kho bo la dris shig dang kho 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]bos dris pa lung bstan pas khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras so/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba gang yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po bsam 
[\[249b.2\]]gtan gyi ro myong bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o/_/zhi gnas de la chags pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang /_lta bar song ba rnams bsal bar 'du shes pa 
[\[249b.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /_mtshan ma rnams la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang /_smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /_smon lam la bsal bar 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang /_'khor ba la bsal 
[\[249b.4\]]bar 'du shes pa 'di dag ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po lta bar song ba bsal nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/_lta bar song ba nyid stong pa nyid do/_/mtshan ma bsal nas mtshan 
[\[249b.5\]]ma med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/_mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o/_/smon lam bsal nas smon pa med par bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/_smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'o/_/'khor ba bsal nas mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/_
[\[249b.6\]]'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'du shes pa dang /_rlom sems dang /_mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_zad pa 
[\[249b.7\]]las ma yin gyi/_rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]ldan pa dag sus btul/_dge slong de dag gis smras pa/_gang thob pa yang med pa/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med pas so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_btul ba de ji lta bu/_smras pa/_ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[250a.2\]]kyang khrid pa yang med/_ma khrid pa yang med de/_ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes pa dang /_bskyed pa yang med/_bkag pa yang med de/_mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul to/_/dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la 
[\[250a.3\]]chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can ji ltar na dge slong sbyin gnas yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor nam dge slong len pa yang med de/_nod pa yang med 
[\[250a.4\]]la dad cing dang ba thams cad las kyang yongs su spyod pa na'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang dge slong gang la byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang /_gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo dang /_nye bar len pa'i sems dang /_nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang yongs su mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni 
[\[250a.5\]]sbyin pa'i gnas yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gang la brten nas shin tu zad pa'i phyir zad pa yang zad par mi byed/_rang bzhin 
[\[250a.6\]]gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ma skyes pa yang mi skyed/_myong ba med pa yang myong bar mi byed de/_chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la/_shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing mnyam par yang mthong la chung 
[\[250a.7\]]zad kyang mthong ba yang med/_mi mthong ba yang med pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa'o/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_sdig can ji ltar na dge slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]po nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du shes la/_rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa yang med cing sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba shes la/_'ching bar yang mi byed/_grol bar yang mi byed/_sems gzugs med 
[\[250b.2\]]pas chos thams cad gzugs med par shes/_sems gnas pa med pas chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong /_sems 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad 'dzin pa med par shes kyang sems kyis sems shes pa yang med la/_sems kyis ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis chos 
[\[250b.3\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang shes shing /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dge slong de lta bu ni sems thams cad la dbang 
[\[250b.4\]]thob pa yin no/_/gang pos smras pa/_sdig can ji ltar na dge slong yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_btsun pa gang po nam dge slong gis gzhan las chos thams cad shes kyang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang med/_chos 
[\[250b.5\]]thams cad kyang sgro btags par yang ston/_yi ge dang /_skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad kyang brag ca lta bur shes/_chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar mthong /_gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong /_nyon mongs 
[\[250b.6\]]pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtog pa las byung bar shes/_chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/_dor ba'i phyir ram/_shin tu bzla ba'i phyir ram/_thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos mi ston/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la yang dbang thob cing legs so zhes bya ba la yang 
[\[250b.7\]]re ba med la/_zang zing med par chos ston cing rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes te/_sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes nas phung po'i bdud la dben par mthong ba dang /_nyon 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang /_'chi bdag gi bdud la ma skyes pa dang /_mi skye bar gnas pa dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud la g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/_dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par 
[\[251a.2\]]chos ston pa yin no/_/nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/_sdig can ji ltar na dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/_bdud kyis smras pa/_btsun pa nye bar 'khor dge slong gis nam chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/_nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i 
[\[251a.3\]]mthar shes la/_nyes pa byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang sel cing dam por mi byed de/_de dag gang gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon na/_cho ga dang tshul khrims la log par zhugs pa phran tshegs lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa yang nye 
[\[251a.4\]]bar sgrub/_nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas/_blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la yang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang /_'byung bar 'du shes/_nyon mongs par nang du yang mi ston/_phyi rol du yang ma yin/_gnyi ga med par yang ma yin te/_nyon 
[\[251a.5\]]mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid nyon mongs pa med par shes shing nyon mongs pa yang mi sel/_nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi sgrub/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin 'dra bar shes te/_ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med gnas pa 
[\[251a.6\]]yang med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/_yongs su rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis bzhin nye bar ston pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/_shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang /_mkha' 
[\[251a.7\]]'gro ma dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang 'dra ste/_tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags tshol ba ste/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas sus nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/_sems can nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[251b.2\]]de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab par bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa 
[\[251b.3\]]des/_bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig_/sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang /_de skad 
[\[251b.4\]]ces smras pa dang /_sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 
[\[251b.5\]]'khor bas skrag pa rnams la bsnyen pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba 
[\[251b.6\]]yang bdud kyi las so/_/bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/yon tan dang ldan pa dang sbyin gnas tshol zhing tshul khrims 'chal pa 
[\[251b.7\]]rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang pha rol 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/rab tu brtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang sems can mi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa yang bdud 
[\[252a.2\]]kyi las so/_/lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud kyi las so/_/
[\[252a.3\]]shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing snying rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/thabs dang mi ldan par dge bar spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mi tshol gyi 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so/_/
[\[252a.4\]]mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dogs te chos la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so/_/'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mnyam pa 
[\[252a.5\]]rnams la mi sten/_mi snyen/_bsnyen bkur mi byed/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mi mnyam par dga' ba'ang bdud kyi las so/_/gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_'jig rten skyong ba'am/_rgyal po 'am/_tshangs 
[\[252a.6\]]dpon nam/_khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang /_nor dang /_rin po che dang /_dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi sten/_mi snyen/_bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o/_/
[\[252a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing thos nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag byang chub 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /_
[\[252b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang /_gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngon par shes pa shes pa dang /_chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang /_tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur 
[\[252b.3\]]ba dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang /_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab kyis shes pas sems can sdud cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_g.yo med cing 
[\[252b.4\]]sgyu med pa dang /_phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/_byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig 
[\[252b.5\]]can khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi gang 'byung po babs pa bstan pa de ni mi de'i 
[\[252b.6\]]'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/_'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi blta'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_sdig can khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs 
[\[252b.7\]]rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dga' bar ma gyur tam/_bdud kyis smras pa/_khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na kho bos ni bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_sdig can 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol cig dang de nas gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa 
[\[253a.2\]]chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod par gsol mi dgos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la 'khrug pa med khro ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[253a.3\]]kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/_bdud kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te/_rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /_
[\[253a.4\]]sems can thams cad la mi slu bas g.yo ba med pa'i bzod pa dang /_dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang /_ldog pa med pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang /_lta bar song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /_chos nyid la 
[\[253a.5\]]rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang /_bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang /_sems can thams cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa yang 
[\[253a.6\]]med la mi 'thun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste/_lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_sdig can khyod gal te bkrol na dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[253a.7\]]ram/_bdud kyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo dga' ste mchog tu dga'o/_/de nas lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig dang rang gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod su zhig gis bcings/_gang las dgrol/_bdud kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sdig can khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du 
[\[253b.2\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang /_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/_gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/_tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes 
[\[253b.3\]]med pa dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par 'du shes so/_/sdig can khyod dgrol na gang nas dgrol/_bdud kyis smras pa/_bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol lo/_/
[\[253b.4\]]smras pa/_sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba yang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de/_de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[253b.5\]]pas byin gyis brlabs de bsdus pa dang /_sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so/_/legs so/_/bdud kyis 
[\[253b.6\]]smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi/_'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o/_/de nas lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar 
[\[253b.7\]]bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]dper na/_gal te sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/_sman pas kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras 
[\[254a.2\]]pa/_'jam dpal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba byung na sangs rgyas 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung 
[\[254a.3\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos bskyed pa de gang /_chos bkag pa gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos gang yang bskyed pa yang med/_
[\[254a.4\]]bkag pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/_'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[254a.5\]]dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun tu mi spyod pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[254a.6\]]gyis smras pa/_gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi 
[\[254a.7\]]gtong ba'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la/_lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang /_khro ba dang /_
[\[254b.2\]]tha ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i chos de ni 'di 
[\[254b.3\]]lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus gces pa yang mi 'dor ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan 
[\[254b.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[254b.5\]]rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/_spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spong ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi rnam par dpyod pa na ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 
[\[254b.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar 
[\[254b.7\]]na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]smras pa/_nam chos thams cad la dga' ba yang mi skyed la/_mi dga' ba yang ma yin pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams 
[\[255a.2\]]cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras 
[\[255a.3\]]pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog 
[\[255a.4\]]yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang /_gzhi med par shes pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam byang chub 
[\[255a.5\]]sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas mi dngangs mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur zhing go cha chen po mi 'dor ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' des pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam snying 
[\[255a.6\]]rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du bsrings pa yang ma yin la sred pa'i bag la nyal gyis nye bar bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam 
[\[255a.7\]]bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyis bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing /_
[\[255b.2\]]sems can thams cad dang 'thun par gnas pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[255b.3\]]nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol tu rgyu ba la yang rgyu ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/_chags pa thams cad la zhen pa yang med pa na'o/_/lha'i 
[\[255b.4\]]bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba brten pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[255b.5\]]smras pa/_nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji 
[\[255b.6\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang 
[\[255b.7\]]chub sems dpa' cho ga shes pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas chos gang yang mi len pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la yang gnas la/_'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[256a.2\]]gyis smras pa/_nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir brtson par yang snang ba na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang dga' rang dbang can 
[\[256a.3\]]yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/_ye shes kyi dbang byed kyi nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/_'jam 
[\[256a.4\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing gzhan la yang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam dmigs pa 
[\[256a.5\]]thams cad las 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang chos thams cad 'phros par yang mi byed/_mi 'phro bar yang mi byed pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_nam gzhan dang 'brel pa'i rnam 
[\[256a.6\]]par rig pa mi skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/_rang gi sems kyi spyod pa la yang mi lta zhing /_bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na 
[\[256a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la yang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing /_sgra skad 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]brag ca dang mtshungs par yang shes nas mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[256b.2\]]dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/_sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_dmigs 
[\[256b.3\]]pa med par spyod pa de dag gis kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_de dag ci la mos par 'gyur/_bsam pa ni gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_de dag ni zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/_lhag pa'i nga 
[\[256b.4\]]rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste/_gnyis su 
[\[256b.5\]]med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa las 'byung ba yang tshol la/_ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa na/_
[\[256b.6\]]ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/_de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /_/'dod 
[\[256b.7\]]chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang /_zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang /_gti mug gi mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /_gti 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu shes pa na ste/_de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes par mi byed/_kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/_
[\[257a.2\]]'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed/_lam sgom par yang mi byed la/_sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rjes su rtogs te/_sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/_sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang 
[\[257a.3\]]yin pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med/_sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/_'gag par mi byed/_gnas par mi byed do/_/gang la skye ba med pa dang /_
[\[257a.4\]]'gag pa med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa sgom pa ste/_lha'i bu de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/_/de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_gdong 
[\[257a.5\]]mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na bdud rnams kyi skabs med do/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gi bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad 
[\[257a.6\]]smras nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_yid la gcags bzhin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa 
[\[257a.7\]]ltar na/_gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim de dag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]yin no/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[257b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di 
[\[257b.3\]]thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang /_bzod pa 'dis 
[\[257b.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de'i phyir 
[\[257b.5\]]khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig_/bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lha'i bu 'od mang po 
[\[257b.6\]]dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes 
[\[257b.7\]]bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]{D98}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na sa twA ba lo ke na bud d+ha k+She tra nir de sha na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[258a.2\]]bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas 
[\[258a.3\]]lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang /_me tog rgyas pa dang /_lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[258a.4\]]son pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /_skye ba gnyis dang /_skye ba gsum dang /_skye ba bcu dang /_skye ba nyi shu dang /_skye ba sum cu dang /_skye ba brgya'i 
[\[258a.5\]]bar dag gis thogs pa/_thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang /_sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_dri med tog dang /_nor dpal dang /_glog gi tog dang /_dri med 'od dang /_
[\[258a.6\]]tsan dan dang /_bdud rtsi'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong 
[\[258a.7\]]dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgya stong dang /_gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/_lung bstan 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]pa thob pa/_phyir mi ldog pa dpe med pa dang /_dri med 'od dang /_'od can ma dang /_'jigs byed ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_'phrog ma dang /_dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rnam thos kyi 
[\[258b.2\]]bu dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_nor bu bzang po'i bu dang /_gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin 
[\[258b.3\]]gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang /_na bza' dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/_ri mor 
[\[258b.4\]]byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmigs pa snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus 
[\[258b.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing /_gzugs thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur nas/_sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas 
[\[258b.6\]]sgra dag thos par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to/_/gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to/_/lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs 
[\[258b.7\]]par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag nor dang /_yo byad dang /_longs spyod med pa de dag ni nor dang /_yo byad dang /_longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang bskul nas thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_sems can 
[\[259a.2\]]gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems can gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba 
[\[259a.3\]]yongs su spangs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems can gang dag klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za rnams kyi nang na skyes pa de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas sems 
[\[259a.4\]]can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /_lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[259a.5\]]yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/_de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i 
[\[259a.6\]]tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/_des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di 
[\[259a.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing 'dus pa chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa yang kun tu snang zhing chos kyi 'bel ba'i 
[\[259b\]]
