[\[259b.1\]]gtam chen po'i snga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can 
[\[259b.2\]]thams cad la snying rje skyed la/_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig_/rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can sdig pa byed pa/_
[\[259b.3\]]dbul ba/_nyam chung ba/_lus mdog ngan pa/_rga ba dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/_longs spyod chung ba lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/_tshe thung ba/_blo chung ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag 'byung ba yod de/_
[\[259b.4\]]rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig dang /_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sdig pa 
[\[259b.5\]]thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[259b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas 
[\[259b.7\]]phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/_nyam chung ba/_mdog 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ngan pa/_tshe thung ba/_longs spyod chung ba/_lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar mchis te/_de dag ni ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gum par 'gyur la/_gcig gis gcig gi nor 
[\[260a.2\]]dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing /_gad mo dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_bro gar dang /_rtsed mo dag gis mngon par rtse ba dang /_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes par bgyid lags so/_/
[\[260a.3\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de dag rgyu de dang gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 
[\[260a.4\]]bdag de dag gi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/_de 
[\[260a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma rtogs pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma gsan pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam nyan par 
[\[260a.6\]]'tshal ba dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri 
[\[260a.7\]]za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po lhags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyur cing /_slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de nas thams cad dang 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan 
[\[260b.2\]]gsum du gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te/_snyan cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[260b.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos 
[\[260b.4\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur nas/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/_ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob po/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[260b.5\]]ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mkhyen pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/_thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod nyid dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[260b.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/_de'i 'og tu sems can bye 
[\[260b.7\]]ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstan pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/_'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_re ba thams cad grub pa dang /_nad rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang /_sgrib 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams 'byor pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[261a.2\]]cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang /_tshe dang kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad 
[\[261a.3\]]kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/_nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing /_sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med par gyur pa de dran te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'i sems bskyed de/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan 
[\[261a.4\]]lag lngas phyag byas shing /_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang /_legs 
[\[261a.5\]]so zhes bya bar sbyin par byed pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[261a.6\]]mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang /_nad rnams dang bral ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_blo brtan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtan pa dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal po thams cad dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang /_rgyal bu thams cad dang /_blon po thams cad dang /_dgra 
[\[261a.7\]]thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /_phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro/_/nor dang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi kha nas tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mig ud pa la sngon 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag la lha rnams srung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[261b.2\]]'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/phrag dog med pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[261b.3\]]kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_ming tsam thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin te/_
[\[261b.4\]]de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas pa yang yin pas/_de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tsom bskyed par mi bya'o/_/gang dag rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur 
[\[261b.5\]]bya'o/_/de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang /_longs spyod med pa dang /_blo med pa dang /_sred pa che ba dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba dang /_rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]na ba gang yin pa dang /_zan chad pa gang yin 
[\[261b.6\]]pa dang /_gos ngan par gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang /_reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang yin pa dang /_spyo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/des kyang 
[\[261b.7\]]'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams la sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o/_/bsal bar bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag dang /_pha ma 
[\[262a.2\]]dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las 
[\[262a.3\]]kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_dmus long du 'gyur ba dang /_bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 
[\[262a.4\]]'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_
[\[262a.5\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_longs spyod pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bde ba chen por byed pa dang /_bsam pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang 
[\[262a.6\]]dag par 'grub par byed pa dang /_las thams cad zad par byed pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang /_tshe dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]brtson 'grus dang /_mthu che bar byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /_rims dang /_dug dang /_me dang /_chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]sngags gzhi dag yod de de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu 
[\[262b.2\]]rab tu g.yos pa dang /_ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te/_legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[262b.3\]]'das legs so legs so/_/gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_tad ya thA/_bud d+he/_su bud d+he/_bud d+ha ma te/_lo ke bi lo ke lo ka_/a ti krAn te/_sa twa a ba lo ki ni/_sarba ta thA 
[\[262b.4\]]ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_sarba A sha pa ri pU ra Ne/_byu ti na d+ha re/_na ra de ba pU dzi te/_ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na da de/_ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/_sarba lo ka ma su khI b+ha ba tu/_pU rba karma k+ShA pa ya tu/_rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/_sarba ye b+h+ya sta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs 
[\[262b.5\]]kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/ngas kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[262b.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/_grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[262b.7\]]snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga rgyal dang /_'chab pa dang /_khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /_rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/_gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o/_/des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[263a.2\]]rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob par yang 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang stobs dang /_mdog dang /_
[\[263a.3\]]brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[263a.4\]]rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi 
[\[263a.5\]]ba'i gzungs mchis te/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung lags so/_/bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/_gang 
[\[263a.6\]]gi rna lam du gzungs de grag par gyur tam/_glo bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus la nyam nga ba'am/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/_bro nad dam/_rims sam/_lus bro 'tshal ba'am/_sems gdung ba'am/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa'am/_chab kyis 'jigs pa'am/_
[\[263a.7\]]mtshon gyis 'jigs pa'am/_dug gis 'jigs pa'am/_dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa'am/_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_'byung pos 'jigs pa'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dgra rnams sam/_mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho 'tsham pa'am/_rnam par gtse ba'am/_gnod 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang /_bdag gis chos smra ba dang /_chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /_ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang /_mchod par bgyid pa rnams 
[\[263b.2\]]dang /_'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_sarba bo d+hi satwA nAn/_a ra hA tA na/_tad+ya thA/_oM badzra d+ha ra/_badzra kA ya/_
[\[263b.3\]]badzra ba la/_badzra te dza/_hUM hUM/_badzra pA Ni/_ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ma ba lA ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma/_sarba byA d+hIn sarba pA pAn nA sha ya/_de hi me/_ya thai ba si tam ba ram/_yan ya me ba a b+hi prA yan yA tsa mi tan ta me ba sa mr-i d+h+ya tu/_he he/_tu ru tu ru/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha 
[\[263b.4\]]mA pi lam ba/_dar Sha ya/_badzra kA yam/_dar Sha ya badzra kA yam/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad kyang rab tu dngangs so/_/lha thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 
[\[263b.5\]]bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[263b.6\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/_rig sngags 'chang ba nyid dam/_tshe dang /_stobs dang /_mdog dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_tshe ring 
[\[263b.7\]]po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen par bgyis la dgung zla yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gang du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_snying gar sku gdung stsal ba/_sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]par bgyid pa bgyis la/_gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la/_de nas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 
[\[264a.2\]]'khor bgyis la/_bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi/_phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang /_dri dang ldan pa dang /_skyems dang /_'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la rad pa dkar po bgos te/_sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/_dus gsum du bdug spos dang /_me tog 
[\[264a.3\]]dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang mchod pa bgyis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /_re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par 
[\[264a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_dog sa g.yo ba dang /_'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 
[\[264a.5\]]'gyur lags so/_/bro nad ma mchis pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing yon tan stong yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/'gum pa'i tshe na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/bdag mthong bar yang stsal 
[\[264a.6\]]par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/_'di la som nyi med pa dang /_yid gnyis med pa dang /_the tsom 
[\[264a.7\]]med par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun du ston 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lha 
[\[264b.2\]]rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo 
[\[264b.3\]]ba dag rab tu shes shing /_sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/_nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/_sdig 
[\[264b.4\]]pa spyod par byed par shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing /_sdig pa thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_nga 
[\[264b.5\]]rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang /_sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du yang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la/_yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na 
[\[264b.6\]]rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/_'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264b.7\]]ci'i slad du/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshal lags na de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang /_dka' ba spyod pa ji tsam 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]zhig tu 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[265a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang /_mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_lus dang /_sdug pa'i bu dang /_bu mo dang /_
[\[265a.3\]]chung ma dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'di ni/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba 
[\[265a.4\]]dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yang mchod pa byed pa dang /_
[\[265a.5\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing /_bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_
[\[265a.6\]]mchod pa byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /_
[\[265a.7\]]nyan par byed na de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bro gar la mngon 
[\[265b.2\]]par dga' ba dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems mang ba dang /_mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_mtshon cha dang /_spyo ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_shes par 
[\[265b.3\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang /_mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung bar 
[\[265b.4\]]'gyur te/_dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong zhing /_dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la/_dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang /_sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na 
[\[265b.5\]]lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /_lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 
[\[265b.6\]]'drir gzhug pa dang /_dad par yang mi nus la/_chos smra ba de la yang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar yang mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni 
[\[265b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de dang /_
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi zhing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par 
[\[266a.2\]]bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi ste/_des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te/_bka' stsal pa/_kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so 
[\[266a.3\]]legs so/_/khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig_/gnod pa byed pa dang /_brnyas pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_mtshon 'byin pa dang /_rgya 'gal bar byed na yang lus dang /_srog la mi lta bar byas la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par 
[\[266a.4\]]bya/_yi ger bri bar bya/_yi ger 'drir gzhug par bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bya'o/_/yul phyogs de dang /_gling de dang /_grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad 
[\[266a.5\]]dang /_'khrug pa dag la bsrung bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bskal pa grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du/_/
[\[266a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar/_/rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig_/yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa/_/de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'/_/gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni/_/bskal 
[\[266a.7\]]pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te/_/nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dri byed pa/_/de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te/_/bde bar gshegs pas de snyed 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]tshad ma gsungs/_/rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing /_/sems gzhan med par bsam gtan dag sgom dang /_/sdug pa'i bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing /_/lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas/_/gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni de bas bsod nams 
[\[266b.2\]]mang po 'thob/_/mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste/_/de yi ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs/_/'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste/_/gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa/_/de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing /_/de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin/_/
[\[266b.3\]]'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing /_/ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan/_/de la nam yang sdig pa yod min zhing /_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong /_/de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sems gdung lus la na ba'am de bzhin du/_/
[\[266b.4\]]klad pa na bas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing /_/de ni nams kyang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur/_/des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon tan kun/_/ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos 
[\[266b.5\]]rtag tu ni/_/mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/_/chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te/_/mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing /_/'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis ni/_/bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'drir yang 
[\[266b.6\]]gzhug_/phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdungs gyur la/_/'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen spyo zhing /_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su yongs 'khyam dang /_/za ma ma ning dmad par bya ba dang /_/dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri/_/rigs dma' bud med 
[\[266b.7\]]rnams su skye bar byed/_/phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la/_/khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can/_/sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas/_/de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la/_/der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing /_/de ni phyi ma'i dus 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]la'ang gdung bar 'gyur/_/de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa/_/de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya/_/gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang /_/smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa/_/de ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin/_/
[\[267a.2\]]'dzin la phu dud byas na nga la'ang byas/_/de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang /_/gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'dri zhing klog byed pa/_/de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing /_/tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang rgyun du brjod par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[267a.3\]]chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te/_
[\[267a.4\]]bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so/_/de mnyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklags te/_gzhan dag la yang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/_yi ger 'drir 
[\[267a.5\]]stsal na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_des ji ltar bsams pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/_de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 
[\[267a.6\]]byang bar 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[267a.7\]]chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kA nAn/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te/_shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[267b.2\]]sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad ya thA/_ha ha ha/_ma ma ma/_d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ri/_shAn te/_bra shAn te/_sarba pA pak+Sha yang ka ri/_a ba lo kA ya/_kA ru Ni ka/_bo d+hi tsita ta ma ma na si ku ru/_bya ba lo kA ya/_mA ma/_sma ra sma 
[\[267b.3\]]ra/_yan twa yA pUrbe/_sat+ya a d+hiSh+ThA naM kr-i ten/_te nas t+ye na/_pa tsa ne na/_sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/_bud d+ha k+She tram pa ri sho d+ha ya/_ma me ka sh+tsid bi he thaM ka ro tu/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nen swA hA/_tad ya thA/_te dze te dze/_ma hA te dze/_yan ma ma kA ya 
[\[267b.4\]]du sh+tsa ri tam bA/_wAg dush+tsa ri ta ma bA/_ma no dush+tsa ri tam bA/_dA ri d+r+yam bA/_tad sa k+ShA pa ya/_a lo ka ya/_bi lo ka ya/_ta thA ga ta dar Sha Nan tsa/_a ha ma d+hi kAM/_k+ShA mi/_bo d+hi sat+ya dar Sha Nam/_d+hu d+hu ma/_da das swa me da ra Sha Nam/_
[\[267b.5\]]sarba me ku sha la/_a b+hi bar d+ha na tu/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_na ma Alo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma satwa/_si d+h+yan tu man tra pa dA swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yos shing ga zha'i sgra chen po 
[\[267b.6\]]dang /_lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sems can chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba 
[\[267b.7\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa/_las thams cad byang bar byed pa dang /_sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so/_/bdag cag 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung 
[\[268a.2\]]bstan pa dang /_kho bo yang mngon sum du mthong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /_longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs 
[\[268a.3\]]par khrus byas shing gtsang la/_bsnyen te gnas/_'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang /_me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[268a.4\]]dag dang /_bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang /_chos smra ba de yang mchod pa byas nas lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dag 
[\[268a.5\]]gis mchod nas yi ger bri bar bya'o/_/'dri ba'i tshe na/_nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang /_gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[268a.6\]]byams pa'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o/_/tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa yang de bzhin bya'o/_/cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te 
[\[268a.7\]]bris na de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/_brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe de nyid la yang lus bde ba 'thob par 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'gyur/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro/_/des yi ger 'drir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[268b.2\]]gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/_tshes brgyad 
[\[268b.3\]]nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing /_gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba/_bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/_grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[268b.4\]]nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/_dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag 
[\[268b.5\]]kyang phul la/_dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la gtor bar bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje la yang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o/_/phyogs bcur phyag byas la/_nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs 
[\[268b.6\]]byed ma dang /_shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang /_/steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o/_/des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang 'jigs pa 
[\[268b.7\]]'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sems 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro/_/sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o/_/cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la/_de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]bzhi bzhag la/_bdug spos dang /_tsan dan dang /_pog dkar po dang /_ga bur dag kyang gzhag_/mar me kha bzhi/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dar dang /_ba dan sna tshogs dag 
[\[269a.2\]]dang /_gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang /_gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/_/sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma 
[\[269a.3\]]bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir dor ro/_/de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/_re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o/_/de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 
[\[269a.4\]]'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas las thams cad dang /_dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[269a.5\]]sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams 'byor bar yang 'gyur/_nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /_tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/_dgra thams 
[\[269a.6\]]cad dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spangs par yang 'gyur/_nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur 
[\[269a.7\]]ro/_/brtan pa dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_chog shes pa dang /_'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]'das rnams mthong ba dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang /_byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[269b.2\]]rigs chen po'am/_gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang /_gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni 
[\[269b.3\]]yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs/_klog par yang rngo mi thogs/_mchod par yang rngo mi thogs/_yi ge bri bar yang rngo mi 
[\[269b.4\]]thogs/_yi ger 'drir stsal bar yang rngo mi thogs/_dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/gal te mthong bar gyur na yang nyan par mi 'gyur la/_/gal te nyan par gyur na yang de sems rnam par g.yengs pas nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur/_bsnyen bkur bgyid 
[\[269b.5\]]par mi 'gyur lags so/_/gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur na yang nyon mongs pa dang /_gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir stsal bar gyur na yang de gzhan dag 
[\[269b.6\]]yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste/_de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid cing the tsom skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum 
[\[269b.7\]]bsgrubs na re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags te/_de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang /_the tsom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma bcom 
[\[270a.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[270a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u shAm bI na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags 
[\[270a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge 
[\[270a.5\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_s+yud ya the dan/_ha ha/_hi hi/_hu hu/_sa ra sa ra/_la hUM la hUM/_shI g+h+raM/_ma hA bi d+yA/_sarba 
[\[270a.6\]]bi d+yA d+ha ra na ma skrI te/_ha sa ha sa kiM tiSh+Tha si/_kiM kiM tiSh+Tha si/_ka na ka bi tsi tra/_A ba ra Na bib+hU Shi tAM ge/_pa Ta pa Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_sarba ar+tha na me sA d+ha ya/_tu ru tu ru/_ar+tha na sA d+ha ya/_ar+tha na de hi me/_sarba sa twA nAn 
[\[270a.7\]]sid d+hi na/_hA hA/_pad me/_pad me/_ma hA pad me/_bi Sha de/_bi Sha de/_ma hA bi Sha de/_b+ha ba b+ha ba/_b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/_tam haM g+ho re/_tan me bi d+yA ma pra yo dza nA ya/_sid d+hi ku ru/_sarba A shA me pa ri pU ra ya/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/_bcom 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ldan 'das gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang /_nor dang 'bru 'tshal ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang /_nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal srid dang /_rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang /_bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong 
[\[270b.2\]]bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/_tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin 
[\[270b.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/_rgyan thams cad dang /_me tog phreng dang /_zla gam dang /_se mo dos brgyan pa/_rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[270b.4\]]g.yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/_rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_sug pa na pad ma thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 
[\[270b.5\]]rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa/_'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa/_rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/_grogs dang ldan pa/_nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la/_tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang 
[\[270b.6\]]bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_lag na rdo rje la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing /_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan dang /_ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_tshon sna tshogs 
[\[270b.7\]]kyi gtor ma dag gtor la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing /_re re nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma'i 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o/_/de nas zla ba nya'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la yang cho ga 'di nyid dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag dang /_bdug spos dang /_ga pur dang /_pog dkar po dang /_tsan dan dang /_shing mus dag kyang dbul/_
[\[271a.2\]]'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /_nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /_lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[271a.3\]]srid dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang /_rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /_gter lta 'tshal ba dang /_nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi lags so/_/des kyang sems 
[\[271a.4\]]can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi'o/_/mchod rten dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pa mi 
[\[271a.5\]]phyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gal 
[\[271a.6\]]te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang /_yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la yang bdag mthong ba stsal bar 
[\[271a.7\]]bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras shing dam bca' ba yang byas pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod nus par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas lha mo 
[\[271b.2\]]chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 
[\[271b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyi zhing re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi 
[\[271b.4\]]lags kyis/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA na/_tad+ya thA/_oM shang khi ni de bi/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_tiSh+Tha d+ha ne/_d+ha na dza ye/_bri bri/_bri d+hI ka ri/_d+h+ri d+h+ri/_d+h+ri ti ka ri/_nA nA bi bi d+ha/_
[\[271b.5\]]be sha bsta/_A yu d+ha d+hA ri Ni/_yu yu A yuSh+pA la ne/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sma ra bo d+hi tsita taM/_mA bi lam ba/_de hi me ba ran/_shaM khi ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na/_de'i snyan pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_gzi brjid 
[\[271b.6\]]'phel ba dang /_longs spyod 'phel ba dang /_dbang phyug 'phel ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba yang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/_/sa phyogs gtsang ma'am lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos 
[\[271b.7\]]dang /_pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/_dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /_nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/_dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsams pa thams cad 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni 
[\[272a.2\]]legs par smras so/_/sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig_/de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[272a.3\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang /_chos nyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/_dbyig 
[\[272a.4\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rgyal srid dang /_tshe ring bar bgyid pa/_dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i btsun mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[272a.5\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir stsol tam/_mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 
[\[272a.6\]]'das bdag gis de bsrung bar bya/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dag gis mi 'brel bar bgyi/_thab mo dang /_'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'khrug glong dag las rgyal bar 
[\[272a.7\]]bgyi/_/tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/_de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAn/_sarba bo d+hi sa twA nAn/_na 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/_badzra pA Ni pra b+h+r-i tI nAn/_tad+ya thA/_oM ma hA de bi/_b+hi me b+hI ma ma te/_dza ye dza yA ba he ya sho ba ti/_ya sho dza be/_te dza dza be/_byA ka ra Na prA pa te/_sarba satwa a ba lo ki te/_kri pa te dza ba hu le/_ta thA ga te a nu dz+nyA tam pA la ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma/_
[\[272b.2\]]bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na/_de hi me ba ran/_sid d+hiM ku ru/_de bi ma hA de bis t+ya be tsa na de bi b+hi me/_/sa t+ya ba tsa na pra teSh+Thi te gu h+ya ni bA si ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 
[\[272b.3\]]gnang ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag smras lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te/_ci dang ci 'tshal 
[\[272b.4\]]ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/_re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/_/gang la la bdag rang gis gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bkum 
[\[272b.5\]]pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung ba'i tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod sar pa'i nang du stsal bas/_dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/g.yas phyogs su 'phags 
[\[272b.6\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o/_g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/_rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_ril ba dang /_bgrang phreng 
[\[272b.7\]]thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dag gis mchod 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]pa bgyi zhing /_phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la/_gtor ma ro sna tshogs 
[\[273a.2\]]dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 
[\[273a.3\]]bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi/_dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /_nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /_gter lta 'tshal ba dang /_nor sgyur 'tshal ba dang /_rig sngags 'chang nyid dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa bzlog pa dang /_
[\[273a.4\]]bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang /_bu mchis par bgyi ba dang /_nor 'du bar bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang /_gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dam 
[\[273a.5\]]pa'i chos spong ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la the tsom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na yang bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na 
[\[273a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /_chos kyi rnam 
[\[273a.7\]]grangs 'di yang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang /_thams 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sring mo legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang 
[\[273b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod 
[\[273b.3\]]pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_'don pa dang /_mchid ton du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa 
[\[273b.4\]]de bzhin du lan thob shig_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am/_ma gsan pa'am/_ma dgongs pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_
[\[273b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa dang /_'don pa dang /_kha don du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 
[\[273b.6\]]dpes brjod par yang mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[273b.7\]]na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing /_lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid de/_sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par bstan 
[\[274a.2\]]te/_de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[274a.3\]]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar ba kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpe mi mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_chos smra ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_
[\[274a.4\]]klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_mchod pa byed pa de dag gi phyir/_dbyig yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/_me tog gcig gam/_'bras bu gcig gam/_ba dan nam/_rol mo'i sgra'am/_spos sam/_gos sam/_rgyan 
[\[274a.5\]]gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/_yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_mchod pa byed dam/_yang dag par ston tam/_bsnyen bkur byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston 
[\[274a.6\]]par byed pa gang yin pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis 
[\[274a.7\]]mchod pas/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed cing /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa dang /_skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste/_de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[274b.2\]]'don pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la/_sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 
[\[274b.3\]]byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa yang de lta ma yin no/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po dang /_blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par 
[\[274b.4\]]bya'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs par byed pa dang /_rjod par byed pa dang /_don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /_de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos 
[\[274b.5\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/_bdag cag don med pa la don du 'du shes pa dang /_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde 
[\[274b.6\]]bar 'du shes shing /_lam ma yin par zhugs pa la/_lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /_bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[274b.7\]]pa'i mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang dag par bshad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/_der yang dge 
[\[275a.2\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po dang /_blon po snod du gyur pa mchod pa byed pa/_'dzin par byed pa/_klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_dad par 'gyur/_
[\[275a.3\]]yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang dang /_shar dang /_nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na/_yang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang /_dad par mi byed pa dang /_yid ches par mi byed pa dang /_mchod par mi byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus zhan 
[\[275a.4\]]pa dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_bu smad dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bzhad gad dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_bro dang /_gar dang /_glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i dran 
[\[275a.5\]]pas nyan par mi byed/_yid ches par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te/_de dag ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi 
[\[275a.6\]]bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar ba kho nar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid 
[\[275a.7\]]ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bstan par bya/_yid la yang gzung bar bya'o/_/khrag khrug dang /_'khrug klong dang /_rmi 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dag dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_gnag nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_mi nad dag dang /_nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs dag la yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te/_bklag 
[\[275b.2\]]par bya'o/_/rgyal mtshan btsugs la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/_der yams kyi 
[\[275b.3\]]nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing /_/sems can thams cad rjes su gzung 
[\[275b.4\]]ba'i phyir/_/da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni zung shig kun dga' bo/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/_/gang gis khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/_/mdo sde 'di la mchod pa 
[\[275b.5\]]byas na ni/_/sbyin pas de yi dper yang mi phod do/_/gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dad byas te/_/tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa/_/de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 
[\[275b.6\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'thor byed cing /_/gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te/_/ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na/_/bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[275b.7\]]kAr ShA pa Na'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing /_/byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na/_/de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la/_/ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du/_/
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na/_/de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod 'gyur/_/de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang /_/sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te/_/mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya/_/
[\[276a.2\]]bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya/_/rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing /_/sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la/_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skye ba na/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re/_/'chi ba'i dus 
[\[276a.3\]]na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la/_/yang dang yang du sdam pa 'don byed cing /_/bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su su 'gyur zhes/_/byis pa'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re/_/gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing /_/sangs rgyas chos dang 
[\[276a.4\]]dge 'dun nor 'phrogs pa/_/mi bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing /_/phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med/_/bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med/_/yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med/_/nor dang 
[\[276a.5\]]'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan/_/kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad/_/ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas/_/de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi zad myong 'gyur bas/_/sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na/_/byis pa'i blo 
[\[276a.6\]]yang su zhig dang mi skyed/_/de phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang /_/dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos khor zug dang /_/mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing /_/'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[276a.7\]]pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te/_ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing /_sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so/_/
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te/_kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_rgyas par mi byed kyang /_des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes 
[\[276b.2\]]pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing /_gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la/_nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar mi byed/_klog par mi byed/_mchod par mi byed/_yang dag par ston par mi byed/_yid 
[\[276b.3\]]la mi byed na ni/_des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing /_gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/_nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis phu dud byas te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[276b.4\]]'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/_sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_srog 
[\[276b.5\]]chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa rnams las/_sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni/_ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/lnga brgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/_/srog 
[\[276b.6\]]chags dgu khri ni/_nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/_mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[276b.7\]]gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/_slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang /_'dzin par bgyid pa dang /_ri mor bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te/_de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so/_/slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/_
[\[277a.2\]]sems can gang bzhad gad dang /_'jo sgeg dang /_gar dang /_bro dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mun pa che ba/_rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/_mi 
[\[277a.3\]]rtag pa la/_rtag par 'du shes pa/_phrag dog dang /_ser snas yongs su zin cing /_mchod par mi bgyid/_ri mor mi bgyid/_dad par mi bgyid/_glo ba ches par mi bgyid/_'chang bar mi bgyid/_klog par mi bgyid/_
[\[277a.4\]]nyan par mi bgyid/_nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing /_sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug 
[\[277a.5\]]bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/_yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/_mi dge 
[\[277a.6\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis/_yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/_/de lta lags pas na lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la yang 
[\[277a.7\]]dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/_sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i sems dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /_khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so/_/de nas ji 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dag dang /_
[\[277b.2\]]a la la zhes ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra dag dang /_lha'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/_legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[277b.3\]]don dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[277b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su 
[\[277b.5\]]gnang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing /_sangs rgyas 
[\[277b.6\]]kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[277b.7\]]dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang /_dri med 'od dang /_'od 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]can ma dang /_'jigs byed ma dang /_dpal ldan ma dang /_dung can ma dang /_'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[278a.2\]]mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[278a.3\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[278a.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/_ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
